Sisterly Camp is an immersive adult visual novel that explores the forbidden desires and intricate relationships within a blended family. Join the protagonist on a camping trip with his sisters, where a shocking discovery leads to unexpected romantic entanglements. Navigate the complexities of love, family, and desire through compelling choices as you shape the outcome of this captivating tale. Can you find a path that satisfies all parties involved and challenges traditional notions of family and romance? Discover the boundaries of love in Sisterly Camp.

title: Sisterly Camp

description:
I, Wolfe is a linear furry visual novel that mixes drama, romance, and a healthy touch of humor. Don the tail of mudpuppy and medical professional Charlie Karts as he and his peers hunt for a cure to an enigmatic and deadly disease that has ravaged the avian population of St. Louis, Missouri.

SEVEN YEARS AGO THEY ALL STARTED DYING.

Charlie Karts hadn't even begun his medical residency when the outbreak of Broken Beak swept through St. Louis. Avians of all sorts dropped dead before his eyes. Men. Women. Children. Young and Old. Rich and Poor. The great equalizer came for them by the thousands. 

The masses have largely forgotten now. The metros are packed, nights are bright, and businesses are booming. To many, it seems, the disease is nothing but a bad memory.

BUT NOT EVERYONE FORGETS SO EASILY.

Anxious, the bureaucrats in D.C. broker the creation of the Parasol Research Project: a consortium of leading pharmaceutical companies tasked with developing a successful treatment before the next outbreak shakes the nation. 

As a researcher on the project, Charlie mans the frontlines in searching for this breakthrough while navigating corporate interests, corrupt politicking, and the snarky pedipalps of a hotshot professor from New York.

[From [url=https://kraajlanding.itch.io/i-wolfe]Itch.io[/url]]
title: I, Wolfe

description:
A furry visual novel about a world consumed by madness with very few who remain sane.

[Edited from [url=https://sliceoflifevn.itch.io/driven-by-madness-demo-builds]Itch.io[/url]]

Aell the half-Sylph has spent their life in seclusion in the forest of Lyfthelm Mountain. They are forced to relocate to the town of Byrne in the valley after a mudslide destroys their cabin and a family of frogs takes over the fireplace. Having never spoken to humans other than the grandfather that raised them, and having never dealt with human society, they are wildly curious about the new experiences and people they encounter. 

But a run-in with the city guards leaves them confined and waiting for a messenger from the Lord in charge of the area, who may be interested in their magic abilities. Aell takes the situation in stride and instead focuses on getting to know their two caretakers, Silas and Glen, as they attempt to teach Aell about the town and about living as a human. 

Will Aell escape? Curse the town like a proper vengeful Fae? Bring down a goose apocalypse from the skies? Or will they just fall in love?

description:
Picture this: it's Friday night. You got a drink in one hand, good company to your side, and an important mission to complete: steal a phone charm. That should be easy, right? ... Right?

Within Arm's Reach is a short, silly VN about what happens to you when you accept to work overtime. Stay safe out there.

Your mother has been diagnosed with Stage D heart failure. The doctors estimate that she'll have a year left-- perhaps even less. Taking advantage of your desperation, Louise Lu offers you a proposition:

If you can go on a blind date with her brother, Lu Ren, and successfully collect evidence of his involvement in their parents' deaths, she'll happily supply you with the resources needed to give your mother a life-saving heart transplant.

With little to no other choices available to you, you reluctantly agree to assist Louise in her brother's investigation, all while under the guise of a "blind date".

You understand the risks. You understand the stakes. But did you really know what exactly you were signing yourself up for?

1960s, USA. Jane Ferguson, owner of a New York restaurant, receives a phone call regarding her missing husband Mark, a CIA agent who disappeared without a trace during a mission in Tibet. Jane must follow his trail to confront the terrifying secret that Mark has kept from her.

She is plagued by so many questions... Why did Mark cut contact with the world? What do the ancient monasteries hide? And what does the Tibetan Book of the Dead have to do with all this?

Lessons In Fear
description:
Mr Hemlock is the school’s newest teacher. He’s kind, patient, gentle, and not too bad on the eyes. He’s easy-going in class, takes care of his students, and never gives out too much homework. By all accounts, he’s the perfect example of everyone’s favourite teacher.

Except for one person—Lucy White. 

Lucy is your usual edgy, sassy, and slightly rude teenager, going through the war zone that is high school and trying to make it out in one piece. For some reason, she just can’t stand this new homeroom teacher. 

Does her grudge stem from jealousy? Insecurity? Or is there… something else behind that pretty face of his?

[From [url=https://epykslion.itch.io/lessons-in-fear]itch.io[/url]]

Immerse yourself in a realm of mystery and passion, where your choices shape the course of thrilling narratives. Forge deep connections with alluring companions from all walks of life, as you navigate the intrigues of this vibrant, magical setting. Meet different girls, open secret scenes, solve quests, and enjoy a lot of great content in this game. 

Let your heart be swept away in a sweeping tale of love, intrigue, and self-discovery!
title: Medieval Fantasy Harem

description:
This is a dating sim adventure game that takes place in a gentlemen's haven called "Bunny Garden". At "Bunny Garden", you can enjoy drinking with the adorable staff, and develop relationships. Forget about your daily stress and enjoy to your heart's content. Your choices will shape the narrative.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2654470]Steam[/url]]
title: Bunny Garden

description:
Haruna Masaomi is a man in his early sixties who lives in the small countryside village of Higashikawa. His wife, Mariko, died several years prior, and the couple never had any children, leaving Masaomi on his own.

Masaomi regrets not having any children, but he has made peace with his secluded life, and he’s happy enough whiling away his remaining years reading murder mysteries…

At least, until he meets a young girl collapsed in his garden late at night, during a thunderstorm.

Masaomi doesn’t know where the girl came from or what happened to her, but one thing is clear: she’s no ordinary human. With horns like hers, and long, sharp claws, she can only be a monster.

Ignoring the warnings of his housekeeper, Masaomi decides to take the girl in — but what will happen next?

[From [url=https://ebihime.itch.io/unnatural-urges]itch.io[/url]]
title: Unnatural Urges
Cuckold Sex
description:
Meet Lily and James and join them on their quest to revitalize their marriage in a new and exciting cuckold series.
Confronted with the monotony of their routine, James encourages his wife to go out with a friend and find herself a younger man. Luckily, a hot bartender is ready to show Lily a good time.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2948040/]Steam[/url]]

After centuries of war and annexation, the world is gradually dominated by two great powers, the Oakley Empire and the Alton Federation. They honored different ideologies and viewed each other as arch-enemies. Four years ago, a world war broke out between these two powers and their allies. In the end, after millions of deaths and injuries, an unconditional peace was reached between the two defeated sides a few weeks ago. Though there appears to have been no significant territorial changes, at least within the empire, there are a number of aspirants who are ready for a revolution. The country seems to be at the crossroads of change.

The protagonist, Yang Che: a veteran who came from the East but fought through the four-year war in the Imperial Army, was assigned to the Imperial Royal First Academy as a military teacher after the war. However, he comes to this academy with one purpose in mind - to kill the Emperor.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2930900/]Steam[/url]]

We Need Space
description:
Obsessive planner Gwen, fresh from an explosive breakup with chaotic, scattered Amelia, vengefully signs Amelia up for a service that will temporarily launch Amelia into space on a rocket. But when Amelia signs Gwen up for the same thing and they wind up in space together, a malfunction causes the rocket to fail and they have to work together to make it back alive. Can you save them?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2929180/]Steam[/url]]

title: Shenwu Migong
description:
Plunged into the depths of despair, Haryuu Ryoushi finds himself compelled by dire circumstances to a hidden underground research facility. There, he encounters Kosakai Mio, his childhood friend thought dead for nearly a decade. As fragments of a forgotten summer surge through his memory, Ryoushi is thrust into a bewildering puzzle.

The uncanny revival of a long-lost friend, the unsettling bend of time, and a sequence of chilling murders within this isolated enclave... Ryoushi is forced to navigate through this maze of mysteries, seeking clues that might unravel his twisted fate.

Confined spaces and impenetrable locks, a chain of unexplained deaths; the bending of space-time, quantum entanglements, and experiments that challenge reality itself. Prepare for the science fiction mystery you've been longing for.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2876250/Kanna_Maze/]Steam[/url]]

title: Womanizer
description:
Victor is sure that he is able to seduce any girl with just a glance, but he faces an almost impossible task. The charming heartthrob made a bet with his best friend that within a week he would sleep with five girls from the city's rhythmic gymnastics team, which had recently won national competitions. Will the star athletes be able to resist an experienced womanizer? 

A spicy adventure turns into a tense detective thriller when a serial killer appears in the city. By a strange coincidence, the maniac chooses victims only from the girls that Victor has seduced. 

Will Victor win the bet with the lives of these girls on the line? Will he ever want to stop in his endless chase for lust and connect with one of the girls? Will he be able to protect his chosen one from the insane killer? The answers to these questions depend on the decisions made by, you — the player.

[From [url=https://www.gog.com/en/game/womanizer]GOG[/url]]

You'll find yourself at the center of Chris life, whose idyllic existence is shattered when he discovers his wife's betrayal in the gym.

Desperate times call for desperate measures. Fresh out of journalism school, your only hope to live in the bustling Capital is a thrilling gig: paparazzi extraordinaire!

Unveil celebrities' hidden truths by day to avoid being fired. By night, the glittering facades of artists, actresses, and heartthrobs crumble, revealing their secret cravings.

Build trust, forge friendships, and even fulfill their deepest desires or ignite a forbidden plastic love - all tools in your arsenal (morals optional).

[From [url=https://geiko.itch.io/ch]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Celebrity Hunter

description:
20 years of friendship──Now all grown-ups, a group of two men and one woman were still close friends. When he became a college student, Sonoda Ichiyou began dating the only woman in the group, Higuchi Tsukiyo, and now as adults, they got engaged. It was Tsukiyo who confessed to him. Thanks to the support of another man in the group, Konoe​ Hoshiki, the three of them continued to get along like always. During the day, they hang out as usual, at night, Ichiyou and Tsukiyo make love as lovers.

One day, when everything is going well, Ichiyou happens to borrow a laptop from Tsukiyo, on it, he discovers a "homemade video of a man and a woman having sex." And the people in that video are Tsukiyo and Hoshiki. Feeling dizzy from the shock of finding out his lover's affair, Ichiyou confronts her, but he gets an absurd answer from Tsukiyo.

"It's not cheating. Because, that was before we started dating."

Gradually revealing behind their friendship, the intimate relationship between Tsukiyo and Hoshiki. Beginning to fall apart, their 20 years of friendship. 

The relationship of men and a woman who have spent more than half of their lives together, due to pleasure and discrepancy, it creates an essence of dilemma......

description:
It is an era shrouded in darkness, where the world is sealed off, and a deadly plague ravages the land. A peaceful village is ruthlessly attacked by a knightly order, leaving your home destroyed and family murdered.

Saved by a mysterious figure, you're led to a magical city floating on the sea. There, the stranger proclaims you to be the Moon Witch, destined to guide the people to prosperity. But amidst your newfound safety and status, turmoil begins to brew. A sudden death sends shockwaves through the kingdom, friends turn on each other, alliances falter, and blades begin to clash. You yearn to end the cycle of tragedy and forge a lasting peace.

As tensions escalate, the time will soon come to decide whom to trust and which path to tread to witness the unfolding of your fate.

Fumiko and the Village of Lust
description:
Okimura Fumiko (37 Years Old), a housewife who works as an archaeologist. She is an energetic woman. She has a son who often calls her a gorilla, and a husband who is indifferent.
One day he had to go to a primitive village in the jungle of the African continent.
Fumiko is a person who easily gets along with anyone. In the primitive village, Fumiko has a good relationship with the village head there.
The relationship between the two of them is so close, Fumiko does not hesitate to talk about her personal life. She talks about her hobbies, her family, her personal problems, her husband and even the topics they sometimes discuss about Fumiko's sexual life.
The character of the village head is that he speaks little and is a bit perverted. but being near the village head made Fumiko comfortable.
Sometimes the village head (Mr. Kela) does dirty things, like squeezing Fumiko's ass. At first Fumiko felt uncomfortable.
However, as time went by, the old man's advances and lewd actions didn't bother Fumiko anymore, she instead thought it was normal and thought it was just a joke.
But in the end will they cross the line?

Then about Fumiko's husband, Okimura Nagato, he is an indifferent man who has never even fulfilled Fumiko's sexual needs.

Now regarding Fumiko's son, Okimura Naoto (18), He often bullies his own mother by calling her mother a gorilla.
He didn't realize that this made his mother insecure about her body, and that stress might push her mother to fall for another man.
One day, when they were communicating via computer, Fumiko's special computer experienced a bug, so Naoto could see all of his mother's activities even though his mother had turned off the special computer.

Then what will Naoto see? Will he regret his attitude towards his mother?

The school music room where arduous lessons continue every day.

Summer vacation starts soon.
As summer vacation began, I felt relieved that I could take a break from lessons for a while.

However, she says that she has rented out the entire music room during the vacation, and instead of postponing the lesson, she proposes one condition...

I don't want to live anymore,
I think it would be better to die rather than live like this,
As I had such thoughts and stepped onto the rooftop of an apartment,
There, I met a young girl.

Lead a team of outcast mutants, hunted by humans and nuke-zombies, who decide to come together and become the hunters.

and reveal the truth about the free city of New Lisbon.
They'll have to face marauders, anti-mutant cults, and beasts degenerated by nuclear radiation, while their team and their difficulties grow.

Whether driven by chivalrous love for your lady or by your own base lust and ambition, the future of the kingdom hinges on your decisions.

In this harsh world, what is the truth?

Shunichi Kazama, an ordinary high school sophomore, lives life like a walking corpse due to past misfortunes. He holds no hope for life.

you take on the role of Alice Garcia, a secret agent working for the government. She lives in a small, quiet apartment building. Set during his pre-transition years, Carmara has been stalked by a man named Ferrum ever since their fateful, terrifying encounter on the subway. After forcing Carmara’s hand into letting him intrude upon his life, Ferrum has been influencing him to "take back what the world owes him". "Welcome to 1927's Tianjin."

In 1927, Lu Yanhe, who was a daughter of a royal family of the Qing dynasty, unintentionally learnt that her father was trying to befriend a warlord by marrying her to the warlord’s son. Grief-stricken at her inability to control her own destiny, she decided to run away from home and travelled from Beijing to Tianjin. Then, she met a young girl, Tang Nymph from France and they became good friends. Under the subtle influence of Western thoughts, she began to seek possibilities beyond her destiny......

Tenkai ni Okeru Robespierre to Danton no Taiwa Hen

description:
In this visual novel sequal of Sakura Isekai Adventure, our protagonist Aki was a perfectly ordinary woman who worked an ordinary job…

That is, until she was summoned to the magical world of Anthem by a catgirl in a witch’s hat, who asked her to take up a sword and become a brave hero.

Two months have passed since then, and Aki has slowly been getting to grips with her newfound surroundings. Anthem isn’t anything like Tokyo, but maybe that’s a good thing. Aki was getting pretty tired of working a dull and exploitative office job.

Aki would be content enough to enjoy a relaxing, easygoing life in Anthem, but things aren’t that simple: not when Mina wants her to search for the missing priestess Luna.

While trying to locate Luna, Aki and her party stumble across a promising lead in the form of a bunny-eared girl, Dulce. Dulce is stubborn, however, and she doesn’t believe that Aki and her party are capable of rescuing Luna.

Now, Aki needs to try and convince Dulce that she’s got what it takes to save the day – but why does Scarlet seem to dislike Dulce so much?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2832790/]Steam[/url]]
title: Sakura Isekai Adventure 2

description:
Every year, Aurea pits its most dazzling stars against one another to see who will make it to the very top. The annual Desire Hierarchy is a fight for the position of Actualized, a title that can make your every dream come true. For decades, the Hierarchy has loomed over the city, and the Maslovs who host it have enjoyed their place at the top. But this year, things are different. It has been 12 months since Anna Maslov tragically passed away, there is a new head of the Fulfillment Foundation, and the ghosts are out to play.

You play as Colton, an editor with dreams of making it big in Aurea. When he lucks into being a Rising Star, a program that lets ordinary people compete in the Hierarchy, it seems to be a dream come true. However, that dream quickly transforms into a nightmare after he's contacted by Spectra, and given an ultimatum by a ghost who has kidnapped his parents. Now, without any connections or preparation, Colton must fight to win this year's Desire Hierarchy, all the while attempting to solve the mystery of Spectra, and perhaps the mystery that lies at the heart of this city. Along the way, he will have to work with and against a cast of Aurea's most famous, most eccentric, and most dangerous individuals.

description:
Love Traveler is an exciting BL game that takes you on a time-slip adventure, where you'll relive old memories with friends and discover new romance along the way. In this dating sim game, you play Jess, a character who receives a love letter from someone in the past. As you journey through time, you'll encounter old friends and discover new relationships, all while uncovering the mystery of who sent the letter.

"Someone had a crush on me?"
It's just another day when Jess gets a love letter from someone in the past.
On his way to the cemetery, he runs into old friends who've changed a lot. He slips in time when he's hit by a bus.
As Jess slips in time, he meets the people who might have sent the letter, his old friends from high school before they changed.

"If I was braver back then, would I be with you now?"
#now_star #then_popularkid #classmate #Jacob

"Writing let me breathe and you were the reason I breathed."
#now_bestsellingauthor(?) #then_schoolclubbuddy #Stuart

"If word gets out that the scandalous playboy and billionaire heir used to be a hopeless romantic, stock prices might go up, but you're more important."
#now_3rdgenerationbillionaire #then_schoolpresident #Leo

"I should be grateful for that letter. I might still be chasing after you without it."
#now_prosecutor #then_edgyelite #playmates #Daniel

Which one of them sent Jess the love letter?

Even though Murphy can even see things that move at the speed of light, they look like an ordinary person so they can't even use their powers. Murphy gets caught up in some strange events and meets some even stranger espers....

Staffer Case is a new sort of mystery game, asking players to find clues, arrange them into documents, and point out the contradictions between them to solve a series of murders.

The game is set in a fictional version of London in the 1960s where 10% of all residents have some sort of supernatural ability. In this city, incidents involving staffers, the people who have these abilities, are constantly occurring.

Players take the role of the Mana Affairs Division's newest detective, Notrick, in order to make sense of these incidents. Since the tricks buried within these staffer cases, at their core, revolve around the supernatural abilities of these criminals, conventional investigative methods won't be enough to solve them. Instead, players will have to rely on the documents that explain what their suspects' abilities entail in order to make sense of everything.

Fortunately, it's not only the criminals who have these supernatural abilities. All of Notrick's fellow detectives at the Mana Affairs Division are also staffers (Excepting gumshoe Notrick himself, of course!) The senior detectives use their supernatural abilities to investigate the crime scenes and organize their findings into documents. Testimonies that account for emotional distress, invisible trace that tells when evidence was left, even memories that remain in objects—find contradictions using the various clues at your disposal!

His entanglement with Bowen, his growing acceptance of him, and the accidental revelation revealed by a mistake made in heat, everything was tied together to his past.

A series of mysteries ensued. A mysterious bandit in the royal capital, an informer in the lower town, a nobleman's crime that could not be seen--

title: Oedipus/Antigone
description:
The Theban tragedies of Sophocles have been staged countless times and they will be staged and adapted over and over again as long as mankind exists. This interpretation of the Ancient Greek drama has a fairly obvious distinct feature: it takes the form of a visual novel.

There are three tragedies included: Oedipus the King (also known as Oedipus Rex), Oedipus at Colonus and Antigone.

The Theban plays deal with the story of Oedipus and his family, but it is important to understand that they don't comprise a formal trilogy. Originally they were written over the course of almost four decades. Oedipus at Colonus is one of the last plays of Sophocles and it was staged after his death. And the earliest play here is actually Antigone.

All of the characters in the game are represented as marble sculptures. Usually quite damaged sculptures. The sole developer of the Oedipus/Antigone project is perfectly aware of the fact that ancient statues were painted. And that actors in ancient theaters wore masks. The choice of this particular style was absolutely conscious and one of the main ideas was to evoke a certain feeling. This is pretty much how objects of material culture from classical antiquity came down to us. This is how we frequently perceive classical antiquity. And it has this flavor of the beauty of the broken things that fits the subject matter of these tragedies quite well.

The imagery was generated with the aid from the AI (most of the time using references) and then tweaked manually.

The translation (by Richard Jebb) is in prose and accompanied by the original text in Ancient Greek (for reference) on the right side of the screen. The soundtrack is by FEBRVVM.
She is a insignificant passerby in her life, like walking on the street, turning around, meeting, and passing by in the next moment

description:
This dark fantasy yuri visual novel is the third and last game in the Tales From The Under-Realms trilogy. While there are a few references to the other two games, it can be enjoyed as a stand-alone story.

In this installment, the enigmatic Nameless God tracks the odyssey of three heroines: Lilith, the half-demoness; Odette, a devout warrior-monk of the Goddess of Truth, Irijo; and Evelyn, a formidable half-elf pyromancer and familiar face from TFTU: After Midnight.

As the tale unfolds, our trio finds themselves in dire straits, ensnared by ‘The Seven’—a cabal of sorcerers who have seized control of Grimoire and exert their will over much of the fantastical realm of Aravorn.

Despite the grim outset, the combined valor and cunning of the heroines fuel a daring escape from Grimoire, toppling a swath of the wizardry dominion in their wake. Now fugitives, their sole beacon of hope lies in reaching Shacklesplit, a haven nestled across the ocean on the shores of Zoltar.

The story will follow the adventures of Lilith, Odette and Evelyn, as they navigate through numerous challenges to achieve different potential outcomes. Set in a dark fantasy world, this game intensifies the tone established by its predecessors, offering a blend of joyous, sorrowful, and bittersweet moments and endings.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2537050/]Steam[/url]]

In an icy world suffocated by the stench of miasmas and the oppressive weight of existence, Cain, driven by his love for his younger sister Nica, continues to struggle from his last strength. Every day he explores the mountains of rubbish in search of anything of value. Cain would love to work harder, but his lower origin doesn't allow him to do so either.
Alas, amidst the endless expanse of rubbish and toxic air, hope is nothing but a distant echo, a relic of a forgotten past.

Reality remains unyielding: money, and with it the means to survive, is becoming scarce. They are forced into debts that bring them closer to the abyss of ruin. As collectors' patience is wearing thin, they decide to take away Cain's most precious possession - his sister.

Broken, Cain turns to the heavens, begging for some power. The power to change his fate.

But Gods have abandoned Cain. His desperate prayers go unanswered.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3000310/]Steam[/url]]
title: Kain x Nika

description:
In this story, MC is considered like an outcast due to her extreme shyness and introverted personality. Freshly out of college, she started to realize the struggles of being a young adult.

By going to a concert in place of her "friend", she will have a surprising encounter with a famous personality: Pink Ivy.

But will you be ready to start this blood-freezing story and assert yourself to find what you truly desire ?

[From [url=https://niminie.itch.io/pink-ivy]itch.io[/url]]
title: TMH : Pink Ivy
Tsumugi no Hanayome
description: Aoi and Yamabuki are childhood friends. Aoi is the quiet introverted one, while Yamabuki is the loud extroverted one. One night Yamabuki takes Aoi out to a shrine where Aoi gets possessed by a haunted relic spirit that causes the possessed to grow a penis. Together Yamabuki and Aoi go from childhood friends to lovers as they overcome adversity and find true love with one another.

You’ve been selected to participate in a content creator's challenge where you and a partner are imprisoned in a tiny room for 69 days! If you survive, you’ll earn $250k, but it won't be easy. There are plenty of competitions, struggles, and punishments along the way.

And it doesn’t help that you have the hots for your cellmate...

Enter Dewey, the nerdy, awkward wolf you’re trapped with. Will you hate each other, or will love blossom amidst the hardship? This is a survival challenge, not a romance show, so you better watch out! And don’t forget, your actions are being recorded at all times, so don't do anything inappropriate!

[From [url=https://web.archive.org/web/20240611060923/https://zach-viper.itch.io/werewolfs-prison]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Werewolf's Prison

description:
Reckless Roadie, the first Joker Out fangame ever! In Reckless Roadie, you play as a rookie roadie helping the Slovenian indie rock band Joker Out prepare and setup for shows. Make decisions, help backstage, but most importantly, keep your head cool under pressure as you have been promoted from fan to support!

[From [url=https://aceofspader.itch.io/recklessroadiedemo]itch.io[/url]]
title: Reckless Roadie
The Virus Game
description:
In this novel, we download a deleted game, after completing which people [s]died[/s].
After downloading the game, we meet one of the characters - the Virus, which [s]feeds on the souls of people[/s].
Depending on your decisions you will either be friends with him or [s]die[/s] :)

[From [url=https://oofteriz.itch.io/the-virus-game]itch.io[/url]]

Colleen's life takes an unexpected turn when she is kidnapped by a mysterious man like creature. As she navigates this strange new chapter, Colleen finds herself facing an unusual demand forced upon her by her kidnapper. As their story unfolds, Colleen begins to unravel the mysteries of him and, more importantly, learns profound truths about herself and her world.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3013160/Past_the_Moon_Towards_the_Sun/]Steam[/url]]
title: Past the Moon; Towards the Sun
Project Nihilum: Zero
description:
Stuck in an underground laboratory without any memories, you witness horrible crimes.

Knowing you will be next one day, you start planning your escape. Who can you trust? How can you control the power you feel inside of you? And will you ever fully recover your lost memories along with the truth?

[From [url=https://tiredracoongames.itch.io/project-nihilum-zero-demo]itch.io[/url]]

You’ve awoken in a strange bedroom - a bedroom that is certainly not your own, located in a building you’ve never been inside of before. An equally strange building, with 10 different floors, all lacking windows of any kind. Upon further inspection, you come to the realization you are trapped in this mysterious building. You have no recollection of where this is or why you’re here. Actually, there seems to be a mysterious gap in your memory from the past few weeks. And so, a slew of questions flood your mind. “Where am I? Why am I here?” And most importantly: “how do I escape?”

And you’re not alone here. Far from it. Meet a small but colorful cast of characters in your journey to answer the questions plaguing your mind. A unique group of people, whose thoughts seem to contradict your own. Interrogate them. Hang out with them. Explore this place with them. Uncover the truth with them. And most importantly, escape with them!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2596800/]Steam[/url]]
title: No Recollection
Hibari de naku Nightingale demo naku
aliases: She sings, but she's not a skylark, not even a nightingale.

Early Lily Days
description:
A little fragment from a day in two girlfriends' lives. 

[From [url=https://nihilean.itch.io/early-lily-days-demo]itch.io[/url]]

Take on the role of transfer student Kazato Keita as he explores life at his new high school. Make friends with the many colorful characters and explore the school's various clubs as you experience all Umitachi High has in store for you.

Be warned, however—this peaceful school life is more delicate than it seems. All it takes is a single event to cascade everything into chaos...

description:
When you take a job helping a local baker run a food truck during a weekend festival, you never expected that he’d be this cute… or that he's be this clueless about how to make his donut dreams into a success! Making the right choices can help the wolf expand his business, and it might just make something else grow as well.

[From [url=https://curiouscritters.itch.io/donut-holes]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Donut Holes

description:
"Horatio’s Life" thrusts players into an extraordinary journey that transcends reality, following the unexpected encounter of Akio, a young university student, with a visually stunning visual novel game. By a twist of fate at a game convention, Akio inadvertently purchases "Horatio’s Life" instead of the fighting game recommended by his friend Daniel. What begins as a simple mistake transforms into a gripping adventure as Akio delves into the depths of the game's narrative.

As Akio navigates the game's prompts, he unlocks hidden truths about his past and his mother's enigmatic legacy. A chance discovery of a hidden achievement, ominously titled "THE LOSER," sets in motion a series of events that intertwine Akio's fate with that of Renna, the daughter of Rolando, the game's creator. Together, they embark on a quest to save Rolando from a mysterious illness, guided by cryptic clues and the echoes of Akio's mother's wisdom.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2987620/]Steam[/url]]
title: Horatio: Connector 13
Text Your Life
description:
As a second-year Law student with a part-time job at the Catal Café, you might as well end up going bald from stress. Fortunately, you can keep in touch with your peculiar group of friends and Daniel, your long-distance boyfriend, through your favorite messaging app (😉). They help you see the fun side of your busy life, as well as keep every hair in its place (or not).

Now you've just moved out of home and into your new apartment, and everyone knows that means... party time! Music, alcohol, laughter, kisses... Wait, what?! Kisses?! Your memories are blurry, but somehow you clearly recall the feeling of someone's lips on yours. A warm and pleasant feeling. Hold on!! Pleasant!? 😳

Who did you kiss that night? Will you be able to find out with the help of your girlfriends-turned-detective? How will that kiss affect your relationship with Daniel? And most importantly - how much does a good wig cost 😱?

[From [url=https://pizzawriters.itch.io/text-your-life]itch.io[/url]]

title: Futanari Sex Adventures
description:
Meet Kira, a confident futanari with fiery red hair and an alluring presence.
She starts her day by admiring herself in the mirror, feeling grateful for her distinctive beauty and assets.
Determined to focus on something other than her desires, Kira decides to visit a nearby boutique.
As she browses the racks, she catches the eye of a cute sales assistant, who is eager to help her try on a stunning black lingerie set that has just arrived in the store.
However, things take a wild turn when Kira’s secret is revealed, adding an element of excitement and passion to her shopping experience.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3038190/]Steam[/url]]

Adrian is a cat lost in the world on his search for inspiration. After a trip to a jazz bar, he leaves with the mysterious and seductive wolf Colton for a night of 'fun', but when he wakes up, he finds himself suddenly deep in a world of crime. Now, Adrian must work alongside this dashing stranger to put an end to the gang chasing them if he wants to return to his normal life, or perhaps he'll discover a new life somewhere along the pursuit.

[From [url=https://azzyflame.itch.io/pursuit]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Pursuit

As the two try to weather out the storm together, they experience unusual phenomena, which could be the work of Silverstone itself. The question is: will this be the turning point for the two or cause a downward spiral?

While the Red Queen's Summer Court prepares for a season of feasting, dancing, hunting, jousting, and other festivities, our heroine finds herself surrounded by familiar friends and eligible bachelors vying for her hand in marriage. But is it true love or is it just a matter of politics?

[From [url=https://goddess-of-gales.itch.io/pure-in-heart]Itch.io[/url]]

description:
Luna left her family's house a few months ago for college and never looked back. Not answering calls, letting texts on seen... As Christmas came, however, she decided to come back, but... something unexpected happened.

A little bit of comedy. A little bit of drama. A whole lot of love. Plus dragons!
Set in a modern day Earth AU where dragons disguise themselves as humans so that the two species can live side-by-side in harmony. Dragon Roommates is a visual novel depicting the relationships between an ordinary human and their two dragon roommates as they engage in a polyamorous romance.

An ordinary human who's had bad luck when it comes to romance. Despite being on a number of sporadic dates throughout the years, none of them have led to anything worth mentioning. One night, coming home after a particularly cringe-worthy date, they seek solace in the company of their roommates sparking a chain of events that spiral into an unexpected love triangle. Perhaps the special someone they've been looking for has been living under the same roof all along...

[From [url=https://goddess-of-gales.itch.io/dragon-roommates]Itch.io[/url]]

description:
This new story is about a young man who leaves his hometown to study abroad. His life changes completely as he is now far away from home and the people he loves. He will have to keep in touch with them and maintain a good long-distance relationship with his girlfriend, as he won't always see them.

To help pay the bill for his studies, the idea of renting out the old room comes up, but it's none other than his old high school bully who starts coming to the house.

The guy says he's changed and isn't the same as before, but will you trust him? He's in your house living with the people you love, you need to be careful because your choices can give you the life you've always wanted but were afraid to tell or make it a nightmare.

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/posts/graduation-105241042]Patreon[/url]]

Kimi to Futari de Haitoku o Umou.

Before I knew it, a large black garbage bag was sitting in the center of the room.
The main character, who has no memory, summons "you" and has him deduce the current situation.
The only people here are "you" and the main character.
You, the main character, should think about how to dispose of this garbage bag.

A new VHS tape was left behind, ready to played.

Another night. Another stitch.

ParaBEN is a conceptual romance visual novel set in a hi-tech, solar-fueled future. It's about how the relationships of our past influence our present.

Ben is developing technology that helps patients and therapists. It accurately replicates a personality and its mannerisms using information fed into the algorithm. Ben's boyfriend, Jesper, offers his diaries and vlogs to help him test the technology. The wolf meets with a younger version of his ursine boyfriend, and learns much more than he intended about the struggles he faced in his youth...

🎙️ Sometimes life doesn't go the way we want 📻

Enter Holden, a young husky at a crossroads. After failing out of college, he must now decide what he wants to do. While he would have liked the support of his boyfriend, the ups and downs of his couple have led him to question the very foundations of his relationship with Roy, the boyfriend he's known since kindergarten. Nothing is simple, and Holden, whose self-esteem is at an all-time low, no longer knows where he belongs.

So, to escape these thoughts and melancholy, Holden and his sister treat themselves to three days away from the university, away from the family and... Away from his relationship?

description:
As he's leaving the grocery store, Leon runs into an old friend, and the conversation turns to discussing Leon possibly considering confessing his secret feelings for his long-time roommate Nico.

At the same time his friend confesses that there's been a recent robbery with a stolen artifact that can have dangerous properties. Surely it won't come up as Leon walks home and effects what he does with his roommate, making it become a bigger issue, right?

Probably.

[From [url=https://hollow-soul-stories.itch.io/expanding-sizes-and-feelings]Itch.io[/url]]

However, you'll soon learn its home to a very devilish black and white bear...and he is very keen to make sure you never get out.

Will you escape, or will you be helpless to the cluthes of Monokuma?

While spending time with the girls, you'll notice their weird behavior. Are they hiding something from you? Why did you specifically win the competition? Does it have to do with your memory loss?

Jack Smith has very little left. After he loses his job, his car, and his health in a string of bad luck, he finds himself drowning in debt to a massive corporation with a criminal underbelly. But when he's offered a once in a lifetime opportunity to win a chance to clear his name and make more money than he's ever seen at once, he has no choice but to bet what's left of his future.

After all, rent's due on the first.

Three planets became partly submerged in the Obsidian Sea during The Downheaval, rendering most populations trapped in Stasis. Then Bolo Drives, containing Wolves for Wielders to wield, appeared everywhere. The three planets search to find a legendary Bolo Drive, with the ability to turn worlds: The Æmicus. title: New World Symphony
description:
Hi there! What's up?

My name is Mirko and I am moving abroad from Viruguay to Hispania in no time! I guess it's time to say goodbye to my parents and Boris, a true fella of mine... Boy, sure I will miss them.

What? I am going to live in Barcino from now on? Where Marcelo lives!? That's great, I'll reunite with my old childhood friend, but were we just that?

Let this marvelous story enthrall you with its wonderful landscape backgrounds of real life Buenos Aires and Barcelona. Dive into this sea of expanding feelings and let yourself fall in the spell of our beautiful lyrical music. For a brief time, get in Mirko's shoes and engage in the adventure of emigration. Will feelings expand at the same time Mirko expands his horizons?

Why is Gogo alive?

After six years, six damn years, Didi runs into Gogo. She thought he was dead, but instead he was close to home, ducking into the forbidden ruins?

She has to follow after him. She has to make up for the past.

She has to find him in the unexplored depths.

The Burning Woof (inspired from the actual Burning Man) is an event taking place in the desert, allowing people to express their freedom and creativity. The Burning Woofers, as they call themselves, are a big supportive community, with their own rules and beliefs.

But this event, filled with many dangers such as alcohol, drugs, sandstorm and so on, will be a real challenge for our clueless possum, Tino. Thankfully, the nudist, buff and charismatic wolf, Alenzo, will help our little fella.

Will Hodges and Roan Chambers are engaged to be married! Like any young couple, they enjoy going out to shows, traveling, and performing arcane rituals that strain the very fabric of reality.

Before they get married, however, Roan insists on meeting Will's mysterious Uncle, only to discover that the man is the legendary sorcerer Matthias Aekely! 

The high-society Roan and hillbilly Matthias are at each other's throats instantly, and neither of them cares to listen to what Will has to say.

So Will tries to remedy things the only way he knows how: Dangerous world-ending magic not meant for mortals!

What could possibly go wrong?

description:
A Rebound From MARS! is a linear furry visual novel featuring themes of sci-fi, drama, and MY WOLF. Follow dragon Xander Kamsky as he helps an alien canine get back home after the latter crash lands in a scenic Ozark town.

XANDER KEPT SMILING.

The smell of roses and the bright lights were giving him a headache. His jaw ached, and sweat beaded on his brow.

His sister's seat sat empty. She had stormed out twenty minutes ago to search for the otter. 

His friends were texting. They offered reassuring glances, but they could hardly disguise the embarrassment on their faces.

The otter's mother stared at the phone in her hands. She had already called eight times, but she huffed and dialed the number again.

The officiant was tapping his foot and looking at his watch. There was a fee if he stayed too much longer.

Xander wanted to do something, but he didn't know what. So he continued to stand there.  

And he smiled wider.

[From [url=https://kraajlanding.itch.io/a-rebound-from-mars]Itch.io[/url]]
title: A Rebound From MARS!

Relics of the past with faded colours and broken ruins are all but living. He looks around only to find nothing but nearly expired rations and funky tasting water.

Join Johnathan and Ashleigh as they discover who they are in this whimsical adventure across time and space. From finding out their roles, to figuring out what their place is in this dramatical play of political intrigue, conspiracies, and even meeting themselves in the future. There is only one way to find out, and only a risk that few would dare take.

Take the Path of the Retrograde.

I get along well with my next door neighbors, the Teramari couple. They’re concerned about me, partly because I live alone. But I look at his wife, Sanae, in a sexual way.

She has plump lips and droopy eyes that reveal her gentle personality. Her ripe body, more than a decade older than me, exudes sensuality even through her clothes. The thought of the single ring shining on her finger binding her body, is just too much…

One day, I get an email from her husband. “You’ve received some vegetables from your parents’ house. Come and pick them up after you’re done with university.”

I think about it for a bit. Tsukasa is at work at the time, and Sanae is home alone… Suppressing my uncontrollable fantasies, I head to the Teramari house.

description:
On that day, I picked up a "Kamisama." Conceived by the popular illustrator Nanaka Mai, a visual novel about spending an unforgettable summer with a "Goddess."

◆[b]Synopsis[/b]

"I've come to be your girlfriend."

Just before summer vacation, on a hot and humid night. Our protagonist who lives with his older sister――Mihoshi Kanata――encounters someone "extraordinary."

The mysterious girl calls herself "Kamisama," from the moment that they met, for some reason, she falls head over heels for him. Without hesitation and very straightforward, like a wild boar lunging.

Spending time with such a mysterious girl, everyday is filled with laughter. Living under the same roof, helping others, playing in the sea, eating delicious food. All the time, they have always been together.

Wishing for these peaceful days to last forever. Never thinking that one day, there would be so many tears, at the cost of love. Emotions that are experienced for the first time. Irresistible and helpless feelings.

Having touched by the kindness of this girl, the world changes.

And so begins, an unforgettable summer―――.

Your cool tough dad established an Inn deep inside a monster infested forest, only the strongest adventurers would make the trip out to stay there. It's been left to you to run the place!

The only guests you have to look out for these days are a trio, the strongest sexiest, adventurers in the business; Lobelia, the red-headed rogue, she's positively down bad for a strong guy. Licilis, a classic elven mage. Her ice magic may be as cold as her attitude but that makes her just a little too confident in battle and the bedroom. Finally, there is Rune, the motherly cleric. She means well but the doting might get on some people's nerves, maybe you can give her a couple of children to keep her busy...

They really only came out here to jump your old man's bones after they heard of his epic strength! But let's be real - it doesn't matter who they thought they were going to find at the Inn, all that matters is you're here and for whatever prowess you lack in the monster hunting department you can make up for in the sadistic bedroom overlord department!

You'll have to do your best for your guests. Get them to forget all about being the #1 adventurer trio and instead have them compete to be your #1 onahole!

description:
In the late years of the second millennium, humanity experienced a remarkable surge in technological advancements, particularly in the automation of machines and software.

In the year 2055, DFTech Co. introduced a revolutionary product known as Picobot. This pico-sized robot, developed by a leading corporation in the field of advanced medical equipment, combines cutting-edge technology with medical expertise. With complete automation and AI integration, Picobot II is able to effectively prevent diseases from their early stages, without the need for human intervention. In the 2100s, a vast majority of the population received the Picobot II injection from birth, aiming to achieve a life free from diseases and extend their lifespan.

Is Picobot a flawless solution that can assist humans in bypassing the laws of natural selection? Or is humanity taking a huge, daring risk by depending on technology to combat "fate"?

description:
Delve into the heart of darkness with Enelia, a chilling horror visual novel set in an Avatar-inspired biopunk realm. It's a dramatic story about adventure, love and fate.

Enelia invites you into a world of terrifying secrets and revelations hidden in the shadows of Nauris. Madness takes on human forms, yet it seems no one pays attention. The hearts of Za'ani are shrouded in darkness. Could this be the reason why love is forbidden?

Desperation brings you closer to charming but mysterious characters whose encounters spark feelings you've never experienced before. Each of them will lead you to answers, but only if you are ready for the truth. 

How far will you go to find out about the nature of Madness?

Forge a strong bond with a beloved character or become their sworn enemy, do good and maintain harmony or walk the path of darkness and plunge the world into chaos.

The choice is yours - follow the call of your heart or dive into the very heart of Madness?

Their seemingly petty mischief plunges the peaceful daily lives of innocent people into a blazing inferno.

To deliver the iron hammer of "education" upon these ruthless young women, one man rises to the challenge once again. His name is Yamato Seigi, a specialist in quelling scandalous fires, a man driven by a passionate resolve. Awaiting him in the depths of this ancient academy are noble ladies—whether they are pure or depraved, only time will tell.

description:
I have a younger sister who has been living separately since junior high school due to my parents' divorce. I live with my father and she lives with my mother. 

However, this summer, for some reason, my father suddenly said, "Let's rebuild our house!", and I... had to suddenly move in with my mother and my younger sister. I had only just met my sister this past New Year's, so there was no chance of an emotional reunion... or so I thought, but now that we're living together after such a long time, I'm strangely excited (sweats). And what's more, my mother will be away on a business trip during the time I'm staying with her...

"So it's just me and my sister here for a summer?!"

While I was having this thrilling fantasy, three unknown girls appeared in front of me???

"We're not the only two. I have friends coming to stay."

"Oh, that's right..." I thought with relief...

No!!!!!! My little sister, three strange girls, and me, all spending the summer together... under the same roof, here...

Wait, isn't that more erotic?!!!!!!!

An so an eventful erotic story starts without warning. What will happen next...?

Yuuma lives a tranquil student life, blissfully unaware of the storm brewing on the horizon. That is, until Reika unveils a new controversial policy that sparks widespread debate. Disrupting their lives and turning their world upside down, changing everything they once knew forever.

This is the story of ambitious teenagers confronted with a reality far removed from their expectations. Will they be able to navigate a life that sabotages them at every turn? It all depends on "you".

I'm a normal American office worker obsessed with Korean web novels and comics. One day I get into an accident and die, only to be reincarnated as an extra in one of my favorite books – a BL tragedy fantasy novel. 

I'm supposed to die in this world too so I can be part of the main character's tragic backstory as his lost love, but I won't lose my life again! So I survive my 'death event'. However, my unexpected survival causes a butterfly effect in the story, and suddenly I replace the main character of the novel and become the Saintess of the Golden Bow. 

As the savior of the realm I embark on a quest to defeat the Demon Queen, accompanied by Levi, my valiant knight and the original Saint, the Mad Prince Noah and the High Priest Elijah. How many more times will I have to avoid death before I can bring peace to the realm again?
