title: Kireina Onee-san no Otoshikata
Pjat' princev
description:
Have you ever noticed how undemanding we are to fairy tales?  An intricate detective story always needs clever tricks to fool the jaded reader; a novel ought to have more drama to it, or else you are in risk of creating a cheap pulp fiction. 

A fairy tale is another matter.

A good tale should be simple. But does that make it any less interesting? Our whole world, like fairy tales, is made up of simple plots. If we could learn to see them, how many simple truths would be revealed to our eyes!

Go on a little journey with the main character and unravel all the mysteries of the fairy tale world.

[Translated from [url=https://senmocni.itch.io/patprincev]Itch.io[/url]]

You're a new assistant for the local's witch Mel who makes tea and organizes tea ceremonies for some people of the town. Make your tea and find out what flavors other people like. Maybe they will even share something about themselves!

[From [url=https://onitenjikunezumi.itch.io/tea-work]itch.io[/url]]
title: Tea Work

description:
Touhou: Heartful Threads of the Creative Mind is a game about fashion and identity! Chiyo and Rusty run a fashion shop in Gensokyo, and with an oncoming wedding, they've got a lot of clothes to make! Join them in this half Visual Novel, half Designer Hybrid!

[From [url=https://megapig9001.itch.io/touhou-heartful-threads]itch.io[/url]]
title: Touhou: Heartful Threads of the Creative Mind

description: My younger sister, Sana, was looking forward to an on-the-job experience, but was unable to participate because she was sick. Sana was depressed about it. For the sake of his cute little sister, Yuma, her older brother, decides to buy her a cosplay costume and play the job experience at home. I can't help but get an erection because of the naughty costume, so I ask my innocent younger sister to take care of it...♡
title: Imouto to Shokugyou Taiken
Doki Doki Afterimage
description:
Afterimage is a mod focuses on discovering the feelings and experiences. It tells a story happened four years after the festival, MC unexpectedly meets his neighbor again, they chat, laugh, pick up the pieces and enjoy the beauty of life. 
https://www.reddit.com/r/DDLCMods/comments/v29xbx/doki_doki_literature_club_afterimage/

Homicipher is an adventure horror game where you’ll decipher a language, fall in love and escape. Players will face various horrifying men in this strange world. Your aim is to decipher their language and eventually find a way to escape. Meanwhile, a peculiar feeling also starts to bloom.
title: Mojibake

description:
The name Ikaruga was well-known around this area.
The Ikaruga family was an old and respected family lineage that stood out as the wealthiest in the region. The current head of the family, Torajirō, was a businessman who had successfully expanded the already substantial family fortune many times over, if not more.

Then, one day, an incident occurred at the Ikaruga mansion. The head of the family, Torajirō, was found dead.

The suspects were the five people who were in the mansion on the day of the incident.
These five started a discussion to reach the truth of the matter. (translate by machine)
title: Murder Mystery [Ikaruga-ke Satsujin Jiken]

description:
At the beginning of a warm, sunny summer, you decide to put your responsibilities aside and go to the nearest sea with your friends. Upon arrival, Katherine and Derek announce that they have a surprise for you. You all travel to the Island of Kruelto. An excellent idea, what could possibly go wrong, right...?

Strange weather, adventure, and a dangerous new acquaintance await you on this mysterious island.

[From [url=https://rootfu.itch.io/pearl]itch.io[/url]]
title: Pearl

description:
It's the night after Kate's birthday, and she's feeling the regret in her stomach. It's the perfect day to stay inside and let her girlfriend Sarah nurse her back to health- if only she didn't have therapy to go to.  As the day drags onward, Kate will struggle against her inner fears while desperately clinging to the one thing that keeps her anchored: love.

[From [url=https://air-gong.itch.io/self-portrait-vomit-on-concrete]itch.io[/url]]
title: Self-Portrait, Vomit on Concrete

description:
Masato has admired Ria since he met her in college. She has excellent communication skills, is cheerful and kind, and was the first woman he truly loved.

His feelings were reciprocated, and they have stayed ever since. And every day spent with his beloved wife was nothing short of blissful.

However, the happier he felt, the more shadows fell on Masato's heart.

He started doubting if Ria and him were a good match.

He thought that perhaps there was a man more suitable for Ria.

His feelings became twisted, awakening a cuckolding fetish that further deepened his troubles.

--But upon learning of his feelings, Ria said,

"If you want me to do it, then let's do it... I'll cheat on you"

[From the translator's Discord]
title: Aisuru Tsuma No Netorase Houkoku -Gyaru Tsuma Ria no Baai-
Dama Hame Tousatsu Nikki 2 ~Kyogi de Takuran Choukyou Sareru Aniyome~
MY DEAR☆LOVE
description:
Cherish this moment, and it will become forever—

During her summer job at an amusement park, Megumi meets a lost little boy. The boy is reunited with his parents very shortly, leaving Megumi relieved but sad about their short time together.

A year later, Megumi is in the same class as her crush, the ever-popular Atsuya. In spite of this opportunity to get closer to him, she is satisfied with just watching him from afar...

One day in the neighborhood park, Megumi sees Atsuya with a little boy and mistakes the boy for Atsuya's child. Turns out, the little boy is the lost child she met at her summer job!

Atsuya explains that the little boy is his sister's son—Katsuya, who had come to stay with Atsuya for a month while his mother is away. However, as he is of a single mother household, Atsuya is not confident in taking care of little kids. Megumi, wanting to help her crush, takes on the task of baby-sitting along with Atsuya.

Megumi's life takes a turn as she becomes closer to the two boys...

[From [url=https://h9o6.itch.io/mydear-love]itch.io[/url]]

title: Carbón Hearts
description:
Carbon Hearts tell the story about Alaw. King of the dreads, he was banished to another world by one of the most important members of the enemy kingdom. It could have been his end but for his fortress he ran into her.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2757690/]Steam[/url]]

title: Shili Danshen
description:
You've inherited your family's super-strong pheromones, and now all the girls are after you... Too bad you want to stay a virgin! Now quick, run for your life or lose your chastity... forever!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2812180/Single_By_Choice/]Steam[/url]]

Serena is a cheerful employee for a tech company and she keeps at it to fund her truest love: shopping. A shopaholic and mall shopper extraordinaire, she frequently combats her busy work days by spending time shopping and keeping track of the latest merch drops. 

After what she presumes was a routine shopping day, Serena is shocked to discover three mannequins coming to life before her very eyes, each inhabiting the soul of a either an interdimensional god integrated into the wrong form, a medieval sculptor who’s escaped her fate to be burned for witchcraft, and a nobody who insists he’s anything but the celebrity of the plastic figure he’s inhabiting.

And for some forsaken reason, all three mannequins want Serena to be the one to unleash them from their plastic bodies again.

[From [url=https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/nochistudios/plastic-trick]Kickstarter[/url]]
title: Plastic Trick

description:
Scarlet and Charity were a normal couple, until the latter decided to get a sex-changing surgery. Charity wanted to become a futanari in order to be able to please her girlfriend in ways she couldn't before. After that operation, the two realized that nothing could stop them from having an even more interesting sex life. Not being a fan of monogamy, they decided to try with a third person. The two thought of using the services of a dominatrix. A person who can understand their needs and satisfy their individual desires.

This story contains soft and hardcore scenes of BDSM. Play the game to live the fantasy along the three characters.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1990190/Futanari_Sex__BDSM_Room/]Steam[/url]]
title: Futanari Sex - BDSM Room

description:
"A short story about feeling not quite human, but yearning for connection all the same."

It's been a few months since the strange beginnings of Ximun's friendship with Adair. Yet, even after all the time they've spent together, he still feels like he barely knows her at all. On this day, he attempts to discern why.

[From [url=https://babycatplanet.itch.io/hfv-monster]itch.io[/url]]
title: Monster

description:
It is a female-perspective romance visual novel, in which you will play a marriage fraudster who is trapped between three different men, and it's up to you to decide whether you want to put your interests first or fall in love.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3016700/]Steam[/url]]
title: Tanglang Xiaojie
Koshmary ipotechnoj kvartiry
description:
Lena is an ordinary freelance designer who finally decides to move out of her parents' house into a mortgage-bought apartment. However, as soon as she crosses the threshold, strange things start happening – mysterious reflections in the mirror, groceries ending up in the trash...

It seems there's more to it than meets the eye. But what exactly is happening? You'll need to figure it out quickly before you run out of money for replacing all the broken light bulbs...

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2600640/Mortgage_nightmares/]Steam[/url]]

On the eastern edge of this ocean, lies the [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ryukyuan_religion#Nirai_Kanai]Nirai Kanai[/url].

Agarikata────
One of the eleven cities in Okinawa Prefecture, it is the only city that does not have police forces, instead, a vigilante group called Ookmiza, takes up their duties. But Ookmiza is just a front for the group, its members are made up of descendants of the [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ryukyu_Kingdom]Ryukyu Kingdom[/url], which was dissolved in the past.

To eradicate the [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kijimuna]Majimun[/url], a demon that has been around this region, the power of the [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Onarigami#Kaminchu]Kaminchu[/url] from the [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ryukyuan_people]Ryukyuan people[/url]​ is necessary. Without this spiritual power, the Majimun cannot be destroyed, and for this very reason, the Ryukyu Kingdom is specially allowed to be restored by the Government of Japan.

At the top of Ookmiza, stands the third [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/King_of_Ryukyu]King of Ryukyu[/url] of the third dynasty, Tsukishiro Ichito, during a time of peace, he runs a [i]café[/i] named Kijimunah, occasionally operates a food truck as well.

One day, as a matter of course, Ichito protects a runaway girl calling herself Misaki. In order to reach Nirai Kanai, the Land of the Gods and the Land of the Dead, Misaki arrives at this eastern city. Nirai Kanai is merely a legend, even Ichito, the King of Ryukyu, does not believe in its existence.

However,  Ichito.
His encounter with Misaki as the start.
Beginning with the authenticity of Nirai Kanai, Ichito gets caught up in a major incident that affects the survival of Ryukyu Kingdom.

[Translated and edited from the [url=https://project-navel.com/niraikanai/story.html]official website[/url]]
title: Harukanaru Nirai Kanai

description:
Hatate Himekaidou, a tengu who normally sticks to writing for her newspaper from afar, comes down to the Palace of the Earth Spirits for an interview with its mistress. What follows is talking about some really cute pets! 

... And something a little more personal.

[From [url=https://solarissect.itch.io/featherquill]itch.io[/url]]
title: Featherquill

description:
A mysterious spirit has been haunting a couple in Gensokyo, and it's up to the ace detective, Tokiko Nanashi, to solve the case! There's just one problem, though. Finding out the spirit's identity... might just dredge up one of Gensokyo's greatest secrets. And Tokiko might be in for way more than she bargained for.

[From [url=https://solarissect.itch.io/echoes-of-another]itch.io[/url]]
title: Echoes of Another

description:
Pandora; Delicate Terrors of a Forgotten Dream is a 2D Horror Visual Novel with minigame elements following Alice; a seemingly normal academy student who's nightmares are seeping into her real life. 

[From [url=https://notdax.itch.io/pandora]itch.io[/url]]
title: Pandora; Delicate Terrors of a Forgotten Dream
Into the Depth of the Sky
description:
Lilith finds herself waking up with no memories in the middle of a battle. Under the unusual circumstances of her amnesia, she is also wanted by the Sage Council, the police of the magic world, for reasons unknown. 

Luckily, her family left her with four bodyguards who are equally keen on figuring out what is going on.


[From [url=https://karita0101.itch.io/depthofsky]itch.io[/url]]

title: Crimson Thread of Fate
description:
It's almost time for your reincarnation! With the help of Moira, enter the path of reincarnation and meet certain someone there. Hey, maybe he will be your soulmate in your next life. Who knows? You decide!

[From [url=https://altila.itch.io/crimson-thread-of-fate]itch.io[/url]]

title: Onee-chan no Ama Ero Lesson ~Sewayaki Kyonyuu Onee-chan-sensei ni Tappuri Amaeru Mecha Ero School Life~

description:
"If you can't have sex with a woman, then there's no point in living as a man."
These are the words that our protagonist, Yashiro Kei, heard too often from his handsome brother, Ei.

In the spring of his second year――
One day after school, Kei witnesses a shocking scene involving his childhood friend who became estranged from him due to certain circumstances, Mitsubuchi Yua, and a half-Japanese beauty in the same class who is the chairman's daughter, Takayashiki Jane Serika.

Because he sees the female homeroom teacher, Amano Kusuha, having sex with Yua and Serika. After unconsciously taking pictures with his smartphone, Kei leaves the scene. However, Kusuha finds out about his peeping, and the next day after school, he receives a call.

"I don't want to get expelled," Kei cries, so Kusuha gives him a condition. He has to join the "Sex Friend Club" that she has secretly created, and serve as a partner of Yua and Serika. 

Thus, the ordinary school life for Kei comes to an end, while his extraordinary school life begins── 

[Translated and edited from [url=https://www.getchu.com/soft.phtml?id=1292584]Getchu[/url]]
title: Sex Friend Club ~Ecchi na Kanojo wa Suki Desu ka?~
aliases: Sex Friend Club ~Wouldn't You Like a Naughty Girlfriend?~

title: The Priestess, the Shepherd and the doom of Patras
description:
Comatho, young Priestess of Patras, and Melanippus, son of a shepherd, fall deeply in love with each other. However, their difference in status leads Comaetho's parents to refuse the union.
The two young people therefore decide to meet each other in the secrecy of Artemis' temple. But alas, from love to profanity, there sometimes only is a step, and the two unfortunate lovers end up crossing a line, making Artemis herself spread famine and plague all over Patras. 

How are the two lovers going to appease the Goddess? Can true love triumph at the end of the day? And what are Comaetho and Melanippus ready to do to save the people they love and, more importantly, each other?

[From [url=https://chimeriquement.itch.io/priestess-shepherd]itch.io[/url]]

A few months after the Hachiko High's massacre and even fewer months after Hachiko's Communal School Day, the relation between dogs and cats has gotten someone better. You don't play as anyone with any sort of power, nor a murderer, nor someone exactly smart, you play as Rover trying to have fun on a Saturday. Maybe you'll make new friends, or tighten the bonds with your already existing friends, or you'll do something incredibly stupid and make everything worse, your choice.

[From [url=https://radbrick.itch.io/rovers-pawsome-advenutre]itch.io[/url]]
title: Rover's Pawsome Adventure

description:
Long after Alice's death, Mathilda begins seeing strange visions swimming through her mind and vividly transposed into the world around her. Knights in shimmering armor---roses---even rumors escaped into the real world? Are they all just figments in Mathilda's mind? Armed with only an academy invitation and a mysterious ruby-red necklace, Mathilda ventures forward into the unknown with just one goal:

To seek the truth of her sister.

[From [url=https://starcatgrimoire.itch.io/requiem-of-alice]itch.io[/url]]
title: Requiem of Alice
Wo Shuo Shenme Tamen Dou Daying (OKeverything)
Manhattan Dolls
description:
Barbara Lee has just found out that her girlfriend has been cheating on her and wants to break up. Distraught, she goes out for drinks with her best friend Cassandra to try to comfort herself. Cassandra, who is a very social person, tells Barbara about some cool places she knows where Barbara can probably meet someone new so she can forget about her problems. Cassandra convinces Barbara that she should put less priority on work, to socialise more and eventually go on more dates to help her get over her ex-girlfriend. Join Barbara on this adventure around the Big Apple and let’s see what adventures she will go on.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2556000/]Steam[/url]]

In this universe where science and magic are intertwined, there is a looming evil that seeks to remove this balance. The Blight is an arcane force, an affliction that drains quintessence, the magical lifeforce of the universe. During this booming time of space exploration and extraterrestrial diplomacy by the human race, this menace has drastically slowed such progress and endangered many lives. As if the stars heard the cries of the galaxy, four heroes blessed with godly abilities fueled by astral quintessence could save them all... 

 Or at least...that's what was supposed to happen when it was first prophesized many years ago. The prophesied heroes died a mysterious death, and the Blight boasted success for years since. Generation after generation of “chosen ones” have tested their might against the blight, and generation after generation they have failed. Despite every prophecy, every quintessential hero, every assurance that they’d win…they’ve lost. 

 The 7th generation of heroes shows promise, but with one week before a fateful encounter with the Blight, tensions are rising. Will Bastian, Xezva, Carth, and Nyeleti finally defeat the cosmic blight and break this brutal cycle?
[From [url=https://circenath.itch.io/empyreal-lost-memories]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Empyreal: Lost Memories

description:
You have a new roomie, Cato, a mysterious man who responded to your search for a roommate. 

Maybe because of his appeal, or because of your fear of loneliness, you let him into your house and now you must learn more about him while he tries to date you.

How will it all end? Like a romantic love story between two broken people? Or as a bewildering tale of the hunter and the prey?
[From [url=https://oliverojostristes.itch.io/red-phone-vn]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Red Phone

description:
You are just an ordinary girl, trying to survive in this unfair world filled with misery, studying and working 24/7. Just when you think that nothing worse can happen, everything goes wrong. A strange man tries to approach you, but in very strange and disturbing ways.  Will you run away or take the risk trying to befriend him? However, whatever you will choose will not matter to him...
[From [url=https://lr479.itch.io/tom]Itch.io[/url]]
title: TOM
Groups of Two
description:
It's the first day of class for a sixth grade classroom, and the teacher assigns the students to have a conversation with their assigned partner (hence "groups of two") with the purpose of introducing themselves to the class.

There's a total of six students as the main characters, along with the teacher who is the story's general POV outside of the conversations. Each pair will have different conversations, and you'll have to play through multiple times to get all of them!

[From [url=https://lemmasoft.renai.us/forums/viewtopic.php?p=409533&hilit=groups+of+two#p409533]Lemmasoft[/url]]
You accidentally slip into another hidden world - there you see the existence of a myth closely related to everyday life.
title: Shenxian Jishi Lu

description:
We hope you Sir/Madam are having a wonderful morning in the accommodations we arranged to you!
This will be your new home, and base of operations, for the remaining week.
Just keep doing what you do, working those sales pitches, and everything will work out.

See ya! And have a sunny life!™

CENTRAL OF SALES OPERATIONS DEPARTMENT

Talk to Strangers is a short game of everyday survival. Survive door to door conversations ranging from bizarre to mundane (in this order) while trying to sell products to strangers. But beware: nothing is what it seems in this neighborhood.
[From [url=https://postmortempixels.itch.io/talk-to-strangers]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Talk to Strangers
Fleeting Iris: Alansya Chronicles Ren’Py Edition
description:
Ayame, a beautiful young woman from Ryuugai (Japan) is living a carefree life in search of happiness. One fateful day, she met Robert, a CIA agent who was stationed in Ryuugai during a mission. After a few months, they become engaged and when Robert’s mission ends she decided to move to Heaven City (USA) with him.

Once in Heaven City, she realizes not everyone is who they seem to be. Ayame will have some issues connecting with her future son-in-law that is almost as old as her. Every single boss and co-worker at her potential job places seem to have ulterior agendas, strangers seem to be annoyingly draw to her and if that wasn’t enough, even her old life comes back to haunt her in Heaven City.

How will Ayame's life unfold? Those decisions are in your hands in this slice of life RPG!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2888650/Fleeting_Iris_Alansya_Chronicles_RenPy_Edition/]Steam[/url]]

The story is set in the otherworldly realm of Tir na nÓg.
This mysterious island, inhabited by a diverse array of fairies and monsters, is explored together with a group of unique and charming heroines.
You'll face off against monsters using each heroine's special magic, or sometimes befriend them to gain an advantage in your journey.
By applying various pieces of knowledge and ingenuity, you'll explore forests, ruins, and a wide range of other locations. At times, you'll relax and have fun by setting up camp or diving into marine sports, making the most of an adventure-filled summer.
This is a story brimming with adventure, dreams, and love, painting the picture of an unforgettable summer.

And as the adventure reaches its climax, a great mystery and numerous truths are revealed.
Together with irreplaceable companions, the protagonist challenges the secrets hidden within Tir na nÓg.

[Translated from [url=https://www.getchu.com/sp/soft.phtml?id=1297310&gc=gc]Getchu[/url]]
title: Mugen no Tír na nÓg

description: Elvira has violated her mother's main injunction 'not to mix alcohol with drugs' and is about to die at the underground techno rave. Well-built Pink Rabbit appears unexpectedly and makes a strange proposal (refusal is not accepted). Now, the girl must save the Pink Kingdom, taste cucumber pizza and, who knows, deal with the cockroaches in her mind.
title: Nightmare Fuel

description:
"You are Lea Kim, a pathetic and lonely 32-year old webcomic artist who has been slaving away at a pet project for as long as she can remember."

A death game of cosmic proportions with hundreds of bloodthirsty participants, all of whom claw vainly to save their dying worlds. 

A game that you cannot lose, because you cannot die.

[From [url=https://melon-kid.itch.io/death-of-the-authors]itch.io[/url]]
title: Death of the Author[s]

description:
This is it. Your first year at the elite Veilcrest Academy. Following in your father's footsteps and ready to take on anything. Things were going great until you stumbled upon a magical world hidden in plain sight.

In your curiosity to see how deep this rabbit hole goes, your life becomes entangled with those of three magical men. With your world turned upside down, it’s up to you to uncover the secrets of the academy and navigate the complicated world of young love.

[From [url=https://repulse-games.itch.io/veilcrest-trial-of-the-arcane]itch.io[/url]]
title: Veilcrest: Trial of The Arcane

description:
The day has come for you to serve the Beaumont family at your mother’s request. As you venture into their mansion, you quickly find yourself captivated by the presence of your enigmatic hosts.

At night you have dreams unlike any you’ve dreamt before. Guiding you through mysteries and rewarding you with knowledge of secrets that don’t belong to you.

Use the secrets you’ve learned to tear down the walls around the Beaumont's hearts and earn your place in their embrace. Or use them to your advantage and learn about your mother’s complicated history with the family.

[From [url=https://repulse-games.itch.io/ruby-dreams-immortal-promise]itch.io[/url]]
title: Ruby Dreams: Immortal Promise

description:
Livvie, a Nightingale girl, longs for a life like her idol, the Phantom Diva. But reality is a gilded cage. After 100,000 marathon rereads, Livvie decides to take a page out of her favourite pulp fiction and heads "home." Except, things never go according to plots in the real world, do they?

[From [url=https://echanart03.itch.io/the-gilded-cage]itch.io[/url]]
title: The Gilded Cage
Everfall
description:
Welcome to the Autumn Realm, the wealthiest of the seven magical realms of Faery, where a human girl called Mouse serves in the home of the High Lord. Drawn into a changeling bond when she was just a child, Mouse was spirited away to the Autumn Realm and raised by the Folk. A life among faeries is all she's ever known...

And then a blue moon rises on the eve the High Lord announces Mouse's changeling is returning to Faery and strange things begin to happen—a human is caught sneaking through the faerie gate, the Autumn Prince takes a sudden interest in her, a mysterious creature tries to kill her, and a nightmare begins haunting her sleep.

Something sinister is happening in the Autumn Realm and Mouse must do all she can to protect not only her life, but the life of her changeling.

[From [url=https://frozenstar.itch.io/everfall]itch.io[/url]]

title: Corporate Crush
description:
Violet (renamable), an awkward QA analyst in a large tech company, gets transferred to another team amid company-wide layoffs and reorganization.
Romance should be the last thing on her mind. As long as she can keep her job and get along with the team, that's all that matters, or so she thinks....
Tag along with Violet as she navigates this new team dynamic, making laughs and tears along the way. Will this crush ever turn into something more?

[From [url=https://higancherrygames.itch.io/corporate-crush]itch.io[/url]]

title: The Duke's Sister
description:
When Amara married Prince Amir for her stepfather’s sake, she didn’t expect to be left to die with her dear husband across the country losing a civil war. She also didn’t expect her final moments to be spent with Avery Ly, an old friend and the cold Duke of the North.

So when Amara wakes up on the day her stepfather is to introduce her to Prince Amir, she knows she was sent back in time. Taking this second chance to live her own life, Amara vows to be with the person she truly loves; Evelyn Ly, the Duke’s sister.

Can Amara find her happy ending? Or will the future repeat itself?

[From [url=https://w-iiv.itch.io/the-dukes-sister]itch.io[/url]]

title: Conduct My Heart
description:
As the substitute conductor of the Lune Symphonic Philharmonic Orchestra, you must keep the prestigious group on track for their grand concert. However, this proves to be difficult when you notice the members have had a falling out, which has negatively affected their playing. Luckily, the four section leaders are ready to help you in any way they can.

[From [url=https://cherrishry.itch.io/conductmyheart]itch.io[/url]]

title: Water Mage
description:
Savay is to become the village Guardian on her eighteenth birthday. However, on the morning of her ceremony, a dead body is discovered on the outskirts of the village...

[From [url=https://bluepuzzlebox.itch.io/water-mage-act-1]itch.io[/url]]

title: Office Crush Dating Simulator
description:
Wake up! It’s that time of the week again to go to work as a visual designer a Tsubame Creative Agency  Sdn. Bhd.  (TCA).  As you navigate the competitive landscape of advertising, you’ll find yourself balancing deadlines, brainstorming sessions, and marketing pitches with unexpected romantic encounters. (sometimes over cute lunch dates!)

Surrounded by a diverse cast of charismatic co-workers, each with their unique personalities and intriguing backstories, your journey is filled with choices that will shape your heart. Will you fall for the charming and supportive content strategist, the shy yet thoughtful copywriter, the fun-loving and extroverted photographer, the charismatic yet cunning marketing manager or the quiet but secretly brilliant data analyst? Let’s hope nothing goes wrong with your office romance...

[From [url=https://rienichii.itch.io/office-crush-ds]itch.io[/url]]

title: Divine Trials
description:
When the angel and devil on your shoulders become their own people, the afterlife becomes a battleground for your soul. 

In seven days, you will face trials that test your morality, courage and desires, and ultimately determine your ending location. Will you follow your angel to the gates of Heaven? Or will you enjoy the pleasures of the descent into Hell with your devil?

Your choice matters–in the end, only one may prevail. The fate of your angel and your devil are in your hands. Who to side with, and who to sentence to their eternal sleep… your afterlife is yours to shape. To follow one path means to stray from another–which path will you take?

[From [url=https://summer-light-studios.itch.io/divine-trials]itch.io[/url]]

The protagonist inherits her aunt's debt to a wealthy entrepreneur and an airship. The entrepreneur's son, who took over a few years ago, demands she pay off the debts by the end of the year. She has two ways of doing that: try to make the airship airworthy and start a delivery agency, or sell the airship and be done with the debt immediately, which leads into the in-depth exploration of her home city.

[Edited from [url=https://phantasmagoria-galore.itch.io/windrunner]itch.io[/url]]
title: Windrunner

description:
The protagonist is a proactive girl who is not afraid of challenges, even those relating to the heart. With a date planned this weekend, she has the objective to make it a success.

[From [url=https://faithastique.itch.io/courting-hearts]itch.io[/url]]
title: Courting Hearts
Tik Werlen
description:
You're running late for the lastest festival on the ocean, TIK WERLEN!

You find a mother and her two daughters just beginning to start their search, go and join them.

Search around for trinkets and stones to win the scavenge hunt!

[From [url=https://cedesdc.itch.io/tik-werlen]itch.io[/url]]

You play as Yuri, a new student at Aglaria University. A jumpstart to fulfilling her dreams!  It doesn't hurt that she meets 4 lovely people to be friends, or more, with....But something here feels odd though.  Butterflies and random ticking- Why is there boss music!

[From [url=https://linkybearcomics.itch.io/cc-mending-broken-pieces]itch.io[/url]]
title: Clown College: Mending Broken Pieces
Arcane Dice Wars: Gacha Date!
description:
"Arcane Dice Wars: Gacha Date!" is a fluffy spinoff game where you get a second chance at love with some of the series' most popular characters!

[From [url=https://ekkoberry.itch.io/gacha-date]itch.io[/url]]

Part of the Arcane Dice Wars series.

title: REALITY
description:
Alex is a loner college student that works hard to live up to society's standards. One day she meets a mysterious woman, Helen, who gifts her more food and things than she knows how to handle! What does this woman want from Alex?

[From [url=https://sandpathy.itch.io/realityvn]itch.io[/url]]

title: Halloween Party in Hell
description:
Osiel has a special power - they can see the truth of how other people feel about them! Using their abilities, navigate a party and see the truth about who's a friendly face, and who's just faking it.

[From [url=https://sandpathy.itch.io/halloween-party-in-hell]itch.io[/url]]

title: Marin's Expansion Delivery
description:
Marin here! Once again, it's time to make my round of deliveries! 

Nothing beats seeing how much my customers appreciate my work ♥

Oh, I wonder what will happen at the next delivery~?

[From [url=https://noasfw.itch.io/marins-expansion-delivery]itch.io[/url]]

title: Marin's Expansion Delivery - Chapter 2
description:
Marin here!

I'm all done with deliveries for today! Now I have to go back to my shop and restock. Also, I have some potions that I need to test out before I can use them on customers...

Good thing my assistant is always there for me ♥

[From [url=https://noasfw.itch.io/marins-expansion-delivery-chapter-2]itch.io[/url]]

title: Sweet Cravings
description:
A stylist witch falls for the cute waitress at the new bakery in town. Shenanigans ensue.

[From [url=https://veracity.itch.io/sweet-cravings]itch.io[/url]]

Handsome, long-haired, slightly eccentric(?) beautiful man next door, Koichiro.

He is her "Oshi"!

The protagonist, a high school girl, falls in love with the beautiful guy next door, but avoids having her love for him found out!

[From [url=https://origo-pkt.itch.io/hide-my-love]itch.io[/url]]
title: Hide My Love
The Connected
description: Coming-of-age magical realism story set in 2005. Wren, Jackson and Danielle prepare for a rite that will Realize them!

It’s a lazy Saturday morning with your partner. The sun is creeping through the blinds as you marathon your favorite show to watch together. It’s perfect.

But something is wrong, you can feel it in the silence between you.

Make choices that will alter your relationship forever. Change their mind, save the love you have, and don’t let them leave.

You can win.

You can win.

[From [url=https://merrygold.itch.io/i-dont-think-of-you-anymore]itch.io[/url]]
title: I Don't Think of You Anymore
Bug Dates: a bugs life
description: A short, cozy visual novel where you can date different bugs!

You and your girlfriend, Nienna, have been living together for a while now. As an alien with the ability to read minds, you've had enough time to discover that hers is quite messy sometimes! Over the course of a week, your task is to be there for her as she regresses to old habits.

[From [url=https://sinxsthezia.itch.io/seeing-stars]itch.io[/url]]
title: Seeing Stars

description:
Single, alone, and just plain miserable is not how most people would feel on their birthday, but it’s the sad reality for you. Refusing to have the day be a complete waste, you decide it's worth at least getting a cake for yourself.

Why is it that once you have the cake in hand, fate makes you walk past three incredibly important figures from your past?

What could this even mean for you?

[From [url=https://minthedraws.itch.io/rekindle]itch.io[/url]]
title: Rekindle
Good Lord! Everyone at the Reunion For My Religious All-Girls School Is a Trans Man... And They're Hot?!
description:
It's been 10 years since you graduated from a private Christian all-girls high school, and you decided to head to the unofficial reunion hosted by your old bestie. It's a weekend retreat at a fancy vineyard you photograph happy couples at all the time, but when you get there...

You're the only cis woman who was invited?!

And everyone you went to school with is a hot guy now??

[From [url=https://whatnames.itch.io/good-lord]itch.io[/url]]

title: Save Me!: I Think You’re Super
description:
Moving to a big city whilst knowing no one in town is, to say the least, terrifying. Not to mention the abnormally large criminal rates in the area. But not to fear! Supers are here to protect you!! Only problem? Their identities are painstakingly obvious, despite this, you’re the only one who seems to be able to see through the disguises.

[From [url=https://snatch-gaymes.itch.io/save-me]itch.io[/url]]

Semper Est tells the tale of a unicorn who stumbles upon you while attempting to find their disappearing associates. You play as an amnesiac traveler and join Phillian in their search, meeting new companions and discovering your identity. Is the truth what you hope for? Can you solve the mystery while winning over their heart?

[From [url=https://senchousan.itch.io/semperest]itch.io[/url]]
title: Semper Est
Crowned Conundrum
description:
As the princess of the isles, you have spent your life waiting for two momentous events: the awakening of your innate blessing and your union with your beloved Prince Edward. Now, one of these long-anticipated moments are finally approaching.

After years of separation and only communicating through letters, the prince has summoned you to his side before the coronation. Yet, when you arrive, you are confronted by a strange sight: a new figure who bears a haunting resemblance to your betrothed Prince Edward who knows personal secrets from your past claims to be the true prince.

Who is this new contender, and if he is the genuine Prince Edward, who has been writing to you all these years?

[From [url=https://meranne.itch.io/crowned-conundrum]itch.io[/url]]

After a disappointing career trajectory, Maura the artist decided to embark on a solo journey for the first time in her life.

Will the new sights and experiences she gained during her travels bring her fun, clarity, and perhaps, love?

[From [url=https://mxrandom1401.itch.io/see-you-around]itch.io[/url]]
title: See You Around!
City Lights, Old Flames
description:
Yui has it all. A brand new job, a college degree in a subject she’s passionate about, and her best friend. When she moves to [city name], the only thing on her mind is exploring her new life. When an incident leaves Yui stranded, she’s forced to rely on the only connections she has in the city, her online pen pal and her…ex?

Follow your heart and help Yui untangle her career and her personal life in this too sweet romance where the final decision is all yours.

[From [url=https://sugar-moon.itch.io/city-lights-old-flames]itch.io[/url]]

Oh My Ginger! You’ve been accepted at the “Enchanté” high school and you’re going to live in Mirepoix capital city ALL BY YOURSELF.

Give a try to this plant-based love adventure and taste what it has got to offer, and remember that you are also attending your classes! Which one are you choosing? 

[from [url=https://lauralaureus.itch.io/love-a-la-carte]itch.io[/url]]
title: Love à la carte
Rectifier: In Bloom
description:
To the world of Fae you are known as an Angel, but to you, you're "Rectifier".

Regardless of terminology your role is the same. Save humanity from themselves.

You find yourselves in the party of 7 distinct men, all with their sinful...quirks.

[From [url=https://meant-to-bee-studios.itch.io/rectifier-in-bloom]itch.io[/url]]

title: My Dating Agency
description:
If all is fair in love and war, then there's nothing wrong with stealing the hearts of your clients at your matchmaking agency for yourself.

Get to know your clients intimately, choose their matches, and give balanced dating advice that will comfort them at some points and push them to consider their partner's point-of-view at others. 

It's up to you to give your clients the nudge they need to get to the alter. Will you ensure your matches are a success?

[From [url=https://gsestudios.itch.io/my-dating-agency-demo]itch.io[/url]]

title: Shroudfall Cove
description:
Tired of living with your over-involved parents while working a 9-to-5 job, you decide to take the next step into adulthood and get your own place. That is, until you realise just how jacked-up rent prices are now. 

Luckily, salvation comes in the form of your grandmother’s old cottage which your mother suddenly remembers exists. Sure, the village of Shroudfall Cove might not be everybody’s dream destination, but the house looks nice, the sea breeze is always cool and, best of all, no rent! 

Take the first steps into your new life in a small, friendly community! Make friends (or enemies) with your mysterious neighbours! Find romance along the way! 

And maybe those emails will finally start finding you well. 

[From [url=https://crayoncat.itch.io/shroudfall-cove]itch.io[/url]]

It’s a visual novel about two lovergirls in the aftermath of the mid-late 2010’s Los Angeles anime con subculture.

How did this subculture engage with topics of mental health? What became of its members at the periphery? Which traditions were they drawing on, and did those traditions serve them? Where does envy come from when you're the one better off? What can a girl be? 

[From [url=https://vitasunday.itch.io/cures-most-fickle]itch.io[/url]]
title: Cures Most Fickle
A Sky of Falling Birds
description:
Avia is ready to end her life. But as she jumps off, she is saved midair by Raven, who claims her survival is the only thing preventing the end of the world. Now Avia has a choice: die and take the whole world with her, or fight alongside Raven and save the world.

A Sky of Falling Birds is an action yuri visual novel about overcoming depression, one small fantastical step at a time.

[From [url=https://pumpkin-spike.itch.io/a-sky-of-falling-birds]itch.io[/url]]

Play as Annalee, the new student, who wants nothing more than to be a student council member at her magic academy. Problem? You’re severely underqualified. Befriend the student council members and find the girl that saved you.

Learn about this magical In Between realm while aggressively trying to make your way into the student council, which may hold dark secrets for you to uncover one day. 

[From [url=https://pv-scylla.itch.io/aligning-the-stars]itch.io[/url]]
title: Aligning the Stars

description:
Friendly aliens are trying to help Essie, the sole survivor of Earth's destruction, regain her memories. 

But why should Essie remember the past when she feels so alone in the universe?

The answer comes in the form of an enigmatic cyborg, Sol.

[From [url=https://cairirie.itch.io/interviewer]itch.io[/url]]
title: interviewer
july after june
description:
Tomila moved away up north after the worst mental breakdown of her life at sixteen, only to be forced to move back home and reconnect with her friends by her mom a year later. Everyone she used to know, the bright-eyed teenagers she used to remember, have suddenly turned completely... different. Can she fix them again, and should she really even try?

[From [url=https://fawnflora.itch.io/julyafterjune]itch.io[/url]]

An abandoned hospital.

Home to diseased animals and toxic mold.

Nobody thinks about this place, let alone what happens here.

It's just us.

We need it that way.

[From [url=https://sopy.itch.io/a-machine-that-kills-you]itch.io[/url]]
title: A MACHINE THAT KILLS YOU

description:
Sara is a timid, sensitive girl, getting by in the big city with the help of Miriam, her best friend?

Favorite person?

Queerplatonic partner?

Let's call it a... complicated relationship.

There's a party tonight. It should have been an enjoyable time, but the appearance of a mysterious woman forces Sara to confront her feelings directly.

Is there something real there? Or just scrap paper, fluttering around in the wind...?

[Edited from [url=https://bagenzo.itch.io/paper-girl-chain]itch.io[/url]]
title: Paper-Girl-Chain
flxu_8.rpy
description:
you quit your job because it was dragging your mental health down to a new low. 

you're sitting on a mountain of unfinished passion projects-- most of them having died in the planning stages because you couldn't work the motivation to actually start any of them. 

you're just trying to figure out what to do with yourself, now that you've been left with more free time than you can handle. 

you don't feel free. 


...haven't we been here before?

maybe this time will be different.


an unfinished story about unfinished stories. 

[From [url=https://anpucamilla.itch.io/flxu8]itch.io[/url]]

A short character driven visual novel following Winter, a robotic monster hunter in a fantasy-cyberpunk world, as a routine hunt guided by her operator is interrupted by a duo of strangers.

[From [url=https://miraculouslazuli.itch.io/frostbite-frequency]itch.io[/url]]
title: Frostbite Frequency

description:
You play as Milo, a poor beastmen given sanctuary by your saviour, Lex

Collect ingredients to [s]not get thrown out of the house[/s] help her make the best pies in town!

[From [url=https://dustii.itch.io/perfect-pies]itch.io[/url]]
title: Perfect Pies
ALL PREPARATIONS ARE COMPLETE
description:
With the death of his seventh victim, what he has been working towards for the last twelve years will come into fruition. 

In one way or another, everything will end tonight for Karius Myn.

He just has to make some final preparations, first.

[From [url=https://limverse.itch.io/apac]itch.io[/url]]

You're a fresh graduate who just arrived in the city of Kenne-Merensa, and the people here seem... interesting.

Get to know and romance 4 cryptids across multiple routes and endings!

[From [url=https://undeadluciel.itch.io/esoteric]itch.io[/url]]
title: Esoteric
Maelstrom Masquerade
description:
Play socially anxious and chronically online Mitsuki as you navigate the trials of socializing during a Mardi Gras Masquerade at Delacourt Manor in New Orleans. Mitsuki attempts to conquer her fears of making connections, but when a storm hits causing all partygoers to shelter in place, she realizes she’ll be stuck with the very people she secretly wishes to avoid. Perhaps one may be for good reason…

Manage your own literal social battery and your relationships with others through the choices you make. Pace yourself, or you just might crack under the social pressure. 

[From [url=https://6oymilk.itch.io/maelstrom-masquerade]itch.io[/url]]

title: Codename: Project Dolphin
description:
Your life gets more complicated after meeting two strangers at a strange aquarium shop.

Codename: Project Dolphin is a romance visual novel taking inspiration from late 90’s to early 2000’s grunge and cyber y2k aesthetics. The game is set in an advanced fictional city in the Philippines. 

[From [url=https://toadjunkie.itch.io/codename-project-dolphin]itch.io[/url]]

The princess of Ryzelia finds herself confined at the top of a tower, imprisoned by seditionists who wish to use her status for political gain. Her best bet to escaping is, of course... to partner up with her captor?!

Follow Mirabelle, a princess who isn't quite a damsel in distress, and Galahad, a magic knight whose actions are as unreadable as his countenance, in this enemies to lovers (or enemies to enemies) tale where they work together to descend a tower.

[From [url=https://afilitaria.itch.io/belles-toll]itch.io[/url]]
title: Belle's Toll
Not Another Villainess Otome Isekai
description:
A wage slave in her thirties gets isekai'd into a shitty game and proceeds to walk into the most predictable and stale otome isekai tropes ever.

[From [url=https://afilitaria.itch.io/not-another-villainess-otome-isekai]itch.io[/url]]

"Do you have any idea what it's like to be so deprived of love that you literally starve?"
Erys does, and he's hunting for a heart that will satisfy his hunger...

Could yours be the salvation he seeks, or are you merely another sheep stumbling blindly to slaughter?

As a volunteer for Limbo's pioneering 'Project Salvation' program, you have been assigned a struggling soul to supervise & steer towards a suitable plane of existence.

Loni Yaretzi (renameable + pick your pronouns), a lonely human lost in Limbo, has failed to achieve enlightenment alone, but with your souls synchronised, you can explore all possible outcomes together.

Will you guide Loni to the light or lead you both down a darker path? 

There are no wrong answers. Exploration is within the spirit of the exercise, and the administrators will be monitoring your progress...

[From [url=https://melancholy-marionette.itch.io/lovestarved]itch.io[/url]]
title: Deadly Desires: LOVESTARVED

description:
To Faye, it was pointless to chase after her grand dreams of adventure; after all, she was just a lowly maid. But when a cloaked figure approaches her with the offer of a lifetime,  she can finally get her chance. Little does she know that this deal involves a different world: one that gives her time in the limelight.

[From [url=https://nekoii-studio.itch.io/take-two]itch.io[/url]]
title: Take Two
Adventures In Clairune
description:
Step into the world of Clairune, where dragonborn, elves, witches, and humans all live in harmony.  Worm your way into the hearts of others.  Just remember to keep your name to your chest and heart on your sleeve!

[From [url=https://rexanesolo.itch.io/adventures-in-clairune]itch.io[/url]]

Hey, have you ever heard of Neverland?

She was the first-born in her family. A mature and independent girl.
A kind, reliable sister,
And a well-mannered, exemplary student.
She was old enough not to be coaxed into believing in a world just for children.

You could be a kid forever!

The same old routine began to gain colors
When a boy crash-landed by the fireplace.

The land of fantasies and adventures.
The land of pirates and treasures.
The land of fairies and mysteries.

Look at you. You know how to fly. You know how to be free.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2894840/NEVERLANDER_An_Awfully_Big_Adventure/]Steam[/url]]
title: NEVERLANDER: An Awfully Big Adventure
tinyONE
description: tinyONE is Gameboy doujin title developed by MisakiMix featuring characters from One ~Kagayaku Kisetsu e~ and ToHeart.

title: Wishing Star Academia
description:
Wishing Star Academia is an OtomeJam2024 entry about a college student who is told to take an extra-curricular club before graduation in order to improve her chances at landing a job at her father's company.  When she does go to take that step, she is confronted by ghost of her past, personified through several different men she meets on these clubs. Some are ghosts of her past, while others are an enigma.

[From [url=https://elisedaurio.itch.io/wishing-star-academia]itch.io[/url]]

For all of your academic career, you were always second best to Satoshi Fujihara. And while you seemed to care too much about it, he never seemed to care at all. In your final semester of community college together- he suddenly says he's going to confess to you in four days!

Do you choose to accept his feelings, or is this going to be the one time you can get the upper hand on him? 

[From [url=https://iotenny.itch.io/wait-you-cant-love-me]itch.io[/url]]
title: WAIT! You can't love me!

description:
You play as an invisible person, that has been discriminated because of it. Losing hope, you find yourself in a blind date with some guy that apparently is friends with your best friend Lorra.

As an invisible person, relationships have always been hard. 

Until your best friend organizes a blind date with some friend of hers.

Go through your first date with this new guy, and maybe find your soulmate, along with delicious food !  

[From [url=https://efa-studio.itch.io/blind-to-sight-bound-by-hearts]itch.io[/url]]
title: Blind to sight, Bound by hearts

description:
Being a victim of isekai is hard. It's even harder when you're now Bronte, a blacksmith NPC in your online mutual's favorite JRPG - which you've never played. With only out-of-context posts to go off of and a new job to learn, it's up to you to survive the game's canon... 

Whatever that's supposed to be, now that you're here.

[From [url=https://smokemirror.itch.io/playing-the-favorite]itch.io[/url]]
title: Playing the Favorite
is Love a Crime?
description:
Welcome to Grey City, a sprawling metropolis in the 1920s where glitz and glamour mask a shadowy underworld. The city is secretly run by a powerful syndicate composed of five influential mob families. After the mysterious death of Antonio Moretti and his family, the Moretti organization has been in decline for 11 years.

You are an undercover detective posing as Charlotte Moretti, the thought-to-be-deceased daughter of the Moretti Family. Your mission: infiltrate the syndicate, complete the trials of succession, and dismantle the criminal empire from within. As you navigate this dangerous world, alliances will be tested, and your choices could lead you to control the syndicate instead.

[From [url=https://heavensgates.itch.io/love-crime]itch.io[/url]]

title: Cupid's Chatroom
description:
What's going on?!

A mysterious program called “Cupid’s Chatroom” suddenly appears on your PC, transporting you into a private chatroom. You find yourself joined by five others, who have also been dragged into the server—and it turns out they’re your potential bachelors?!

[From [url=https://peachieevee.itch.io/cupids-chatroom]itch.io[/url]]

The year is 1248.
The magical kingdom of Thrungia is at war against a demonic army of orcs.
To its people, only doom is in store for them.
However, hope has now appeared.
Or has it?

Follow the story of Prince Mahwell of Royaleen, and see how Thrungia is liberated from the iron grasp of a malicious artificial intelligence.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3037380/]Steam[/url]]
title: Ashunnor's Game
Phytocidal
description:
Your life as the royal heir to the throne is suddenly shattered when your father, the king, is brutally murdered in his bedroom—and your childhood friend and loyal knight is the culprit. In this short visual novel, explore your relationship with your knight and their reasons for the crime, and receive four possible endings based on your choices!

[From [url=https://chemicahl.itch.io/phytocidal]itch.io[/url]]

An otome visual novel set in a magic college. The plot is all over the place. 

[From [url=https://justyna.itch.io/witchinghour]itch.io[/url]]
title: Witching Hour: ✨Love Spells And Potions✨

description:
In an alternate Victorian world, vampires are part of every day life. But when an actual cure to vampirism is discovered, not everyone takes too kindly to the disturbance in the status quo...

Determined to make her own destiny as she turns 18, the young head of her family Lucie plunges headfirst in the conniving world of business dealings. Before she's able to seal the deal on a revolutionary treatment to vampirism, her business partner suddenly dies. Lucie finds herself embroiled in the middle of the mysterious death of her former partner and an event from a decade prior...

[From [url=https://crystalgameworks.itch.io/cwes-amaranthine-moon]itch.io[/url]]
title: Crimson Waves on the Emerald Sea: Amaranthine Moon

description:
Hoshiyo Tachibana has always dreamed of becoming a witch, and when she gets that opportunity on her 12th birthday she couldn’t be happier! When she discovers that her classmate, Minari Momiji, is a witch as well, she suggests the two of them become a magical girl duo. Minari rejects her, saying she has given up on being a witch. Hoshiyo remains undeterred however, and is set on proving to Minari and everyone else that magic can make dreams come true.

[From [url=https://nightwingmoon.itch.io/witchs-talisman-demo]itch.io[/url]]
title: Witch's Talisman

description:
Graduation serves as the end, and a new beginning. Marmar knows this feeling well—as her college graduation approaches, all her friends seem to be moving in different directions. Once again, she might be left all alone, but not before one last hangout.

Join Marmar as she summons her courage on the last road trip of the year. Will things stay the same, or will relationships be changed forever? 

[From [url=https://miimibun.itch.io/dont-forget-to-write]itch.io[/url]]
title: Don't Forget to Write

description:
You wake up in an unfamiliar bed in an unfamiliar room in an unfamiliar house. The last thing you remember was speeding down a cliffside road in pouring rain. Then a crash. Now, you find yourself in a mysterious mansion and under the care of its owner, who is very keen to help you get back on your feet. Maybe his offer is genuine, but not everything may be as it seems.

[From [url=https://ktswulf.itch.io/shepherd-among-wolves]itch.io[/url]]
title: Shepherd Among Wolves

description:
a kinetic visual novel about two childhood friends.

[From [url=https://knivves.itch.io/heaven-is-with-you]itch.io[/url]]
title: heaven is with you

description:
When Rei, a shoujo otaku with her head in the clouds, finds a flower on her desk after school one day, she's on cloud nine. That night, after thinking it over, she decides to contact one of three boys she thinks it could be:

- Haruka Kaiba,  her childhood friend with a heart of gold who puts up with all her antics,
- Masatora Tatebayashi, an aloof delinquent that Rei suspects has a softer side, and
- Souichi Mouri , a gloomy kid, but also Rei's neighbor in class.

She makes the call, creating a connection between her and the boy that sheds flowers. As she nurtures her bond with them, though, she begins to discover their vulnerable parts, and in turn, has to confront her own.

[Edited from [url=https://yotsubro.itch.io/colors-of-a-wilted-flower]itch.io[/url]]
title: Colors of a Wilted Flower
Ahoy! Monster Boy!
description:
Play as Bukimi, a girl who offers pizza to otherworldly horrors and just happens to discover unethical secrets along the way . The boys she meets may be monsters, but conveniently, that’s exactly what she’s into. And she can make them worse! 

[From [url=]https://lumayoshi.itch.io/ahoy-monster-boy-demo]itch.io[/url]]

In an effort to support her sister's future endeavours as a matchmaker, Eiren Reeves agrees to a blind date her sister sets up. Several hours later, when her date's a no show...

The planet is invaded!?

But hold on a moment... The invader looks rather familiar? No, it couldn't be. There's no way Eiren's date is an alien invader that just put the fate of the world in her hands, right? Unless...?

[From [url=https://winkingcorvid.itch.io/love-limit]itch.io[/url]]
title: Love Limit
Fairytale Thief: Thumbelina
description:
Our heroine is a no-nonsense teashop worker, perfectly satisfied with her job, if a little bored.

Her best friend is anything but boring, waltzing in one day with a plan to steal a statue from the local museum.

Then there's more colorful personalities visiting the shop for one reason or another... is the heist even going to happen at this rate or will one of these people steal all of the attention?

[From [url=https://jewelswithwings.itch.io/fairytale-thief-thumbelina]itch.io[/url]]

title: Heart's Depth
description:
When June Finch (first name changeable) returns to her childhood vacation home to visit her grandfather, her past comes up to meet her in unexpected, terrifyingly aquatic ways. As protagonist, you are confronted with the dark reality of what it means to be thrust into the deep depths of the sea. After seeing the treatment of mermaids above (trapped, ridiculed, eaten), how will you navigate the seas below as a human-turned fish?

[From [url=https://zenithzyie.itch.io/hearts-depth]itch.io[/url]]

title: Eternal Thorns
description:
Rosaria Caradonna is a vampire who was held captive for almost a century. 

After finally escaping the infamous Pavone family, she is accused of murder and must prove her innocence. Left with no choice, she is forced into the custody of a thorny detective—who hails from a family known for killing her kind. 

To solve the case, can they see past their differences, or will hatred succeed?

[From [url=https://avinastudios.itch.io/eternal-thorns]itch.io[/url]]

When Yunie graduated from college, she believed she had her whole life ahead of her. Returning to her hometown with a shiny new dream job, it seemed like nothing could stand in her way.

However, two years later, not much has changed. She hasn't made any new friends, isn't allowed to investigate anything worthwhile, and feels like she's stuck in mud, moving in place.

So when an unexpected opportunity arises, she doesn't hesitate to take it. The case is a weird one, but it introduces her to an eccentric team of people she immediately connects with, and she decides that no matter what, she won't regret getting involved.

Even if it means crossing paths with a serial killer.

[From [url=https://studiochawan.itch.io/mirage-noir]itch.io[/url]]
title: Mirage Noir
Sanguine Vows
description:
Every year, in the region of Syvlon where both humans and vampires reside, a sacrificial ceremony is held. During this ceremony, a young woman is chosen to be gifted to a family of pureblood vampires and wed to a noble. The Sacrificial Ceremony is celebrated among women despite its restrictive nature; especially for the commoners.

This is not the case for one particular commoner however: You. The permanent disappearance of the chosen individual leaves you to believe there is more than meets the eye.

This year, you are chosen as a candidate alongside your friend, Coralei. Heading to the town of Crestbel, where the ceremony takes place, you just so happen to catch the attention of four mysterious vampires... 

For better or for worse, you are selected as the chosen forced to participate in the ceremony. 

Somehow, fate has other plans as your carriage is caught in an ambush, followed by an attack that proceeds to morph your being into something more monstrous: a vampire. Are you capable of finding out the secret behind the ceremony while navigating newfound discoveries as a turned vampire? Will you uncover the mystery behind the incident that placed an eternal curse upon you? Or will you become enamored by the very beings that threaten your livelihood? 

[From [url=https://mshadowstudio.itch.io/sanguine-vows-demo]itch.io[/url]]

A young knight named Lady Joanne sets off onto her first ever quest; conquering the local dungeon and defeating the Demon King once and for all. She may have other motivations for being there though...

[From [url=https://rosierabbit.itch.io/forbidden-pursuit]itch.io[/url]]
title: Forbidden Pursuit
Oppai Kareshi
aliases: Oppai Kareshi - Or How I was Reincarnated as a Nobleman's Daughter and Became an Adventurer with Big Breasted Men
description:
Like all typical romance fantasies, Carmine is killed and has the chance to reincarnate into a new world known as Wozwald as the emotionally exhausted Hermina Cobalt Fatale. However the moment she does, the news of having to marry her cousin without the chance to argue comes up! Refusing to go down that path, she becomes the fledgling adventurer known as Cobalt and decides to hire some mercenaries to show her the ropes.


But uh, she definitely wasn't expecting to get involved with handsome, big breasted men of all things?! Will she be able to get to the country of Kakarot without losing her sanity? 

[From [url=https://deathhunterashi.itch.io/oppai-kareshi]itch.io[/url]]

aliases: To The Beat Of A Heart
title: A Future With You
description:
A Future with You is an otome game/ dating simulator where you play as Aria Ichimiya, a prolific dancer who suddenly wakes up from a coma to realize that the last 6 years of her life are completely gone from her memory!

Unlock and romance numerous love interests as you struggle to regain your sense of self in this new, unfamiliar world!

[Edited from [url=https://neatcowgames.itch.io/afuturewithyou]itch.io[/url]]

You wake up in a classroom way after your lecture concludes. The person who wakes you up looks familiar. Oh right, it's that one popular guy that everyone likes. 

He was in the same class, but you've  never spoken to him before. Besides you two, the class is empty. Everyone else had already left ages ago. And no one else bothered waking you up? Rude.

With the light of the setting sun on your skin, you engage in conversation with the popular young man, realizing that things are taking a very scandalous turn, and that his interests are far more fascinating than you'd think.

[From [url=https://lehxra.itch.io/lecture-me-later]itch.io[/url]]
title: Lecture Me Later

description:
One moment you’re yet another stressed out philosophy student. The next? You find yourself suddenly transported into ancient Athens! Though it’s a little…different to the one you’ve been studying. While there you’ll come across many mythical names and figures. Will they be charmed by your quick wits and good looks? Or will you fail to impress them, scoring an F on both your finals and love life?

Throw the dice and defy the Fates to try your chance at love...

[From [url=https://hellzanonime.itch.io/loveandlogos]itch.io[/url]]
title: Love & Logos

description:
Kohana, a clever and witty recruit, was just accepted into the detective agency, working under the supervision of the seasoned veteran detective, Ryuu. Set in the bustling city of Tokyo, this pair investigates a continuous series of chilling murders linked to a mysterious illuminated rose and a haunting past that refuses to stay buried. 

By exploring crime scenes, interrogating suspects, and piecing together evidence, Kohana navigates the intricate web of clues that paint a picture with desired intentions and a dark underground world just waiting to be uncovered.

As the case progresses, layers of unraveling discoveries start to unfold and a potential romance between the duo begins to blossom; Ryuu and Kohana find themselves pondering the question…

Is justice worth sacrificing for love or are some secrets better left buried? 

[From [url=https://nickleai.itch.io/case-lumarose-demo]itch.io[/url]]
title: Case: Lumarose

description:
Your best friend went missing and you're to blame.
...Or at least that's how you feel.
Return to the town you left years ago, join the vampire hunters and try to find her... and maybe fall in love along the away.
But be careful.
Anyone who lives in this town... Will die here too.

[From [url=https://violentbunnies.itch.io/evermore-bridge]itch.io[/url]]
title: Evermore Bridge

description:
There you are minding your own business when you find someone's phone and the owner starts texting asking for it back! Will you keep it for yourself to sell, make a new friend, or perhaps romance the cute cosplayer who it belongs to? The choice is yours!

Lost and Found is a mobile phone chat simulator and visual novel where you find yourself in the possession of a cute cosplayer's lost phone!

[From [url=https://corvidscauldron.itch.io/lost-and-found]itch.io[/url]]
title: Lost And Found

description:
A child changes everything—any parent would be quick to tell you that. But for Kieran, becoming a parent also means new fears—and old ones—visions of blood, visions of worst-case scenarios—new and omnipresent thoughts that threaten to swallow him whole.

How do you move forward, when you've got no name for what's happening to you? When you're afraid to even speak the words aloud?

A short visual novel about parenthood, relationships, past traumas, and undiagnosed OCD, featuring gay elfs.

[From [url=https://herotune.itch.io/far-from-the-tree]itch.io[/url]]
title: Far From The Tree
DIVINE DESPAIR DEVIANCE
description:
This game is about angels. This game is about trying to kill your sister. This game is about trying to kiss your sister. This game is about the weight of the world.

[From ingame description]

title: ESP:ExtraSensitive Pervert
description:
Blessed with powerful extrasensory abilities, a gross girl spends all day arguing with strangers on the internet about anime and eating junk food. Has she finally caught her lucky break when a beautiful girl she's never seen before comes knocking at her door? Find out how this easily excitable pervert handles this unusual development in her otherwise monotonous life.

Four tgirls live together in a run down office space while figuring out how to exist. Also they smoke weed.
