title: Parallels: Year One
description:
Taking place in a modern, vaguely southeastern American city, an arguably unrealistic high school, and with an occasional dip into alternate universes--Parallels is a drama centered around Ron Harvey and Jessica Wethington. Jessica, a cheerleader struggling with her schoolwork, decides through a few small lies to recruit the smartest student in her class, Ron Harvey, to be her personal tutor. Conflict arises between the two as Ron seems to be unreasonably miserable about their arrangement, despite accepting the proposal. This sets the pair down a path of learning that each of them has more to their story than the tropes they immediately pin each other for, and just might force them to confront uncomfortable truths about themselves and each other.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2670460/]Steam[/url]]

A short visual novel about enjoying a trip to the cold, snowy... beach?

After a long drive, you arrive at your destination expecting a nice, warm and fun vacation on the beach. However, what awaits you is a sea of pure white snow!

Can you survive the harsh freezing cold in your summer getup and find out the truth behind this mysterious event?

[From [url=https://niighty-nine.itch.io/summer-freeze]itch.io[/url]]
title: Summer Freeze
NTR Hitozuma no Kokuhaku Saiban ~Anata no Hanketsu de Ketsumatsu ga Kawaru~
Elf Shima e Youkoso! ~Kotsukuri Suishou 2-haku 3-kka no Tabi~
Aquatic Grave
description:
"It'll be fun," you said when you decided to go on a cruise ship. "It'll be easy," you said, when you decided to relax for once in  your life. But of course... because this is YOUR mind numbing life, it isn't that fun or easy.

After a little mishap at sea, you find yourself in the home of a strange sea lady. She seems pretty welcoming, but there's something really fishy about her...

[From [url=https://liminace.itch.io/aquatic-grave]itch.io[/url]]

Meet Motoshige, your average nerd. One day due to his little sister, he gets coaxed into joining an afterschool activity and doing so changes his life forever...

Features

    Women with HUGE boobs
    Three unique dateable women, each with their own personalities
    Fun humor
title: Tits and Heartthrobs

description:
You play as Korn Kachakon, a high school student whose ordinary visit to an art gallery turns extraordinary when he discovers a mysterious painting of an ancient emperor. After a fateful encounter with a guard that leaves him unconscious, Korn's spirit is transported to the mystical realm of "Pralai."

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3012660/]Steam[/url]]
title: Pralai: Lảnả cạkrphrrdi xngkh̒ s̄udtĥāy
aliases: Pralai Song of The Last Empire

description:
Drowning in debt, the protagonist finds a job offer that's too good to be true. It doesn't take long for her to find out the real reason she was hired...

How will she try to survive living with three monsters? Will she try to stay as far away as possible? Or will she try to change that bloodthirsty family? Or maybe, just maybe… She will try to manipulate and lie until they bow to her.

God knows they have done worse...
[From [url=https://hunt-dress.itch.io/silver-laces-eng]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Silver Laces
Sterile Desires
description:
You’re a homicide detective investigating a string of murders in 1983, everyone seems like a suspect, and a certain Doctor takes an interest in you... Who do you trust?

What could go wrong?
[From [url=https://twizztedstudios.itch.io/sterile-desires]Itch.io[/url]]

After spending two light-hearted years on campus, I moved on to my junior year. However, I was not only faced with the challenges of graduation and internships, but also suddenly told that I must find my destined soulmate soon, or else I would perish due to a curse.
As if it were fated, my childhood playmate who I hadn't seen in ages suddenly reappeared. My friend's sister showed a keen interest in me, a senior I met by chance generously offered a referral, and even the manager at my internship company cast intrigued glances my way...
Who among them is my fated one, and who has an axe to grind? Hesitantly, I move forward, trying to find answers in the fog...

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3069120/]Steam[/url]]
title: Bu Lian'ai Jiu Wandan le
Million Dollar Boys
description:
Hinana (name changeable) is saddled with her father's debt. 
She borrows a building from Mr. Debt Collector and decides to start a cafe...!

title: Joe Biden Vs. Jeo Boden - Escape From MAGA Chapter 2
description:
Joe Biden is back as the one term president hoping to become the two time president. November 2024 is only months away but the world is getting more ridiculing by the day. Choose your decisions wisely and help Mister 46 survive his next 3 weeks in office. You must help Joe Escape From MAGA, again.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3015850/]Steam[/url]]

I knew you had been lying this entire time,

And even so, I forgive you.

[From [url=https://knickknackpj.itch.io/translucenttrails]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Translucent Trails

description:
Several years have passed since I retired. My wife has passed away, and I require nursing care. I have no social interactions in the neighborhood and spend my days in solitude.

One day, a new caregiver showed up at my place, and to my surprise, it was my granddaughter, Mikoto. She is training to become a caregiver and is here as part of her exam. Moreover...

"I'm going to live here and take care of you a whole lot!"

Even though she's aiming to become a caregiver, living alone with my teenage granddaughter? Can this really go well...? Still, as I watched Mikoto's beaming smile, I felt as if the pain in my back was mysteriously easing.

[Translated from the [url=https://www.appetite-game.com/apt_263/apt_263.html]official site[/url]]
title: Genki ni Natte, Ojii-chan♪ ~Hatsuratsu Magomusume no Seiteki Kaigo~

description:
Yua, who is active in the cheerleading club, headed to practice that day as well. But suddenly, she found herself enveloped in light and transported to another world.

Confused and terrified, Yua had no idea what was happening. The one who extended a helping hand to her was Chihiro, who had also been transported to this world several years ago. She had adapted to this world and now ran a tavern called "Night Owl Kitten". However, the tavern was essentially a brothel...

Yua started seeking help to return to her original world through "enkou", but as she interacted physically and verbally with the people of this world, sometimes negotiating, she found herself deeply involved in "enkou".

Pleasures she couldn't have known from just doing club activities, and a sense of fulfillment from being needed.

Will Yua be able to return to her original world?

[Translated from the [url=https://nexton-net.jp/ms-toybox/darkmew/mew004/]official site[/url]]
title: Isekai Enkou

description:
"I don't understand what you're saying," you said to me.

[From [url=https://knickknackpj.itch.io/pleasedontunderstandme]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Please Don't Understand Me

description:
“What’s with that attitude? Is that how you talk to your sister?”
“You’re the one who started it.”

Saeka was the one who came at Kaoru first, but Kaoru always answered in kind—
This was how it always went when the two of them were near each other.

Today was no different. At Saeka's pestering Kaoru finally snapped and lashed out.

“I don’t want to see your face. I don’t want to hear your voice. I don’t even think of you as my sister anymore!”

Saeka was about to cry as she bolted to her room.
A few days later, she would do something no one expected…

[Translated from [url=https://www.dlsite.com/pro/work/=/product_id/VJ01002672.html/]dlsite[/url]]
title: Tsundere na Ane ga Shitsukoku Karandekuru no de Mushi Shiteitara, Ikinari Osowareta Ken ni Tsuite ~Demo, Nande SM Play?~
Le Cœur à Gauche
description:
The time is now!
As you're wallowing in despair, you receive an unexpected call to join an action group of the Left Union.
There, you meet passionate activists, some more charming than others... Review the political program and discover the one that speaks to your heart with "Le Cœur à Gauche"!

title: Osananajimi Yuka ~Yuujin ni Zecchoo Kairaku o Kizamitsukerarete Iku Motokano Osananajimi~

description:
In the mystical realm of Elysium, a new Guardian is about to embark on his first adventure outside his home of comfort and royalty. However, as he leaves, a growing darkness on Elysium begins to grow rapidly...  

[From [url=https://13th-sin-games.itch.io/fall-of-the-angels]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Fall of the Angels
Senpai Game
description:
Step into the chaotic world of "Senpai Game," a visual novel that turns the tropes of romantic comedy upside down. In this twisted tale you play as Hotaru Ito, a seemingly sweet and cheerful girl with a sinister goal: to sabotage her rivals and win the heart of Senpai, the archetypal male protagonist.

[From [url=https://studio-bracket.itch.io/senpai-game]itch.io[/url]]

title: NOISZ STΔRLIVHT
description: Rhythm Game/Bullet Hell/Visual Novel hybrid for mobile about an idol group fighting interdimensional music monsters.

An illegal android, in a world that fears AI, being helped by a man with selfish motives...

In this game you awaken as an android, having known only darkness and emptiness before. You learn that A.I. like yourself have been banned and you are, in fact, not welcome in this world. A man has helped you escape certain destruction, but in doing so risks spending the rest of his life in prison for harboring you, an Animus Non Grata. It appears he has a very specific idea of how you can repay him and make the risk of helping you worth it, and he won't take no for an answer. However, all is not as it seems...
title: Animus Non Grata

description:
In Quality Dreams, Reasonably Priced, you play as Jin, a sales consultant at a body modification clinic. And you work on commission. Your pet rabbit is sick, and you have two weeks to save up enough funds to afford the life-saving treatment it needs.

At work, clients arrive with desired procedures. Your job is to get to know them and determine whether you recommend they go forward with it. Each client is a puzzle and you must figure out which approach is best if you want them to open up to you.

Learn about your clients, co-workers, and personal struggles as you try to balance earning enough to afford your pet's treatment with not taking advantage of your clients' trust. At its heart, this is a game about talking to people.

[from [url=https://zorkie.itch.io/qdrp]itch.io[/url]]
title: Quality Dreams, Reasonably Priced

description:
After returning from your time within a special military unit designed for people with magical abilities, you meet your childhood friend, Riley, and her best friend Cassie, who are planning their own next steps in life. You find yourself joining them at the Stormside International Academy.

It isn't long before you discover that this academy, and the way it treats its students is anything but ordinary...
title: Stormside
Chijoru Mama o Meshiagare ~Futaritabi~
description: The slutty young wives Shiroyuki Ran and Himenoki Shion leave the mainland and travel to a remote island... They take advantage of this once-in-a-lifetime encounter to unleash their daily sexual desires in all sorts of ways... We wonder what kind of trip it will be.

title: Sword of Malice ~Toaru Jujutsushi no Junan~
The Nexus
description:
After returning to the town where you lost your family as a child, you seek to begin a new life with your loyal and optimistic best friend, Alice, and her caring mother Isabelle, the one who took you under her wing after the tragedy that befell your family. Everything seems normal, until you start having strange dreams that suggest more is going on in this town than meets the eye.

You will soon learn that some of the town's residents aren't quite from this world. And they aren't quite human, either. Some are friendly. Simple students at your own school, even. But who is to say what other sinister creatures may have crawled through to this world... and what evil plans they may be plotting.

Unravel the mysteries of the small town of Sinai Hills, and uncover its dark secrets with your best friend, Alice. Explore new friendships with your fellow students, human or otherwise, and grow closer as you learn more about their past lives in foreign realms. Learn about your fated role in stopping an interdimensional incursion, as you fight alongside your new allies and their otherworldly powers to protect the ones you care for. Can you stop this supernatural threat? Can you save the ones you love? Those choices now fall into your hands.

[From [url=https://silent-raven-games.itch.io/the-nexus]Itch.io[/url]]

Indie game developer Suzuya, alongside a group of five other creatives, are trapped in a building by the mysterious exposé VTuber Anzai Moe and made to partake in a "Judgement Game", where each participant must collect evidence of each other's darkest secrets and expose them.
title: Creators Death Game

YOU'RE MY FAVOURITE PLUSHIE
description: A young man in search of a moment of happiness has the misfortune to find a familiar plushie.

Does the road take forever? Stop and rest at Aion, the place for wayward souls.

'I woke up a demon' is a short kinetic visual novel (around 10000 words) about a woman who wakes up with a demon problem in world where it shouldn't be one. 

Her world is very close to ending, and there's a witch she desperately wants to confess to before it happens. 

[Edited from [url=https://yosharoos.itch.io/i-woke-up-a-demon]itch.io[/url]]
title: i woke up a demon.

"I'll never forget the day my father died."

The world is ending and she couldn't be more alone.

Discover the truth behind Hel and her family as she steps into the sad lives of the Vulture's Kettle. 

Despair, hatred, violence: these grease the gears of the dying world.

The party has ended.

Orion & Artemis, an odd pair consisting of a large cyborg and her still-human friend, go home together after a pleasant night out. Orion is wrapped around Artemis’s little finger once again. But what happens when she’s wound too tight?

[From [url=https://gaybreast.itch.io/satisfaction-drone]itch.io[/url]]

[i]Adventure Log One![/i] is a short kinetic visual novel folowing a naive adventurer as they make their first trek into the unknown! Saving up for years on end, they finally manage to scrape together enough money to buy their equipment.

Now, as they face the forest's edge, what will they find? Who will they meet? And how will this adventure go?

[From Itch.io]
title: Adventure Log One!

description:
One year has passed since the nightmarish murder. At Toshio and Midori's wedding, the invitees to the wedding, comrades enjoying the festivities, decide to return to Spool for the after-party. They've been hailed as heroes in the newspapers and on TV, and everyone seems to think of the incident as a fond memory. You, the protagonist, also head to Spool with the others, though you carry a hint of fear.
While in a nostalgic mood, the guests eat cake and reminisce. But then an incident occurs. One of the guests is engulfed in sudden flames and reduced to ash like charcoal...

Where is the culprit? Could it be one of the survivors from that event, whom they trusted so much?

As if to mock the guests, crushed by the weight of their trauma from the past murder and the current event, two more charred corpses appears...

[Translated from http://www.varitra.info/rengoku-kamaitachi]
title: Rengoku - Kamaitachi no Yoru 2 ANOTHER

description:
An irritable woman named Fifty-Nine makes a journey across the sun-scorned canyons of her world and into the caves below... What is she looking for in those depths, and why is she so hard-pressed to find it?

Houndstooth is a story about three women falling apart; the ways they lift each other up and drag each other down as they meet and fall into a rhythm all their own. It's a story about how to find yourself, in the best and worst ways possible. It's also a story about a hot older woman telling you what to do.

Doce, a tailor in Rio de Janeiro, is not having the best of nights, she got a few new wounds to add to her history. Now her girlfriend Casbah will try to get the pieces together.

A visual novel about a chronically ill girl, a mentally ill boy, and the desire for rescue. When reality is a bitter pill to swallow, escapism tastes so similar to love.

Rei woke up to their lover's face. That's when the problems began.

[From [url=https://specter-of-you.itch.io/for-halves]itch.io[/url]]
title: For Halves
4.1.60Co
description:
In the 1960s, Anton Andreevich Sidorov, a young man with genius talent, lived in the Soviet Union. He loved science and alchemy. He might be a believer or a researcher. He was so lonely that he planned a feast for only himself. The only person present was Anton Andreevich Sidorov...

Real event: On April 1, 1975, in the Moscow Metro, a train that was supposed to enter the station according to convention never appeared again. An entire train that was running completely disappeared without a trace. This was once an unsolved mystery legend, but it was just a joke rumor on April 1.

title: The Painter (and a man)
description:
The one some call The Painter after Death receives, for the first time, a phone call from a mortal.

[From [url=https://miyuly.itch.io/the-painter-and-a-man]Itch.io[/url]]

It's so hard to resist you.

Open world, RPG, sandbox. You've survived nuclear war but at what cost?
You survived in a bunker while others had to adapt to live their brutal new lives.​
title: Apocalyptic World

description: What do mirror reflections do once they have no one to repeat after anymore? Play as Iris, quite a sarcastic reflection torn between the urge to unravel the mystery of death of her “prototype” and the need to find her place in a mirrored world. (https://store.steampowered.com/app/2147330/Still_Joking/)
title: Still Joking

description:
Sisyphus was punished with the task of pushing a boulder to the top of a hill, only for it to roll down before he could finish. In every try, he reminisces about his life and wonders if he could ever change for the better. Follow him as he goes through the highs and lows of his mind, finding a strange, absurd meaning to his own struggles.

[From [url=https://lenlen403.itch.io/the-healing-of-sisyphus]itch.io[/url]]
title: the healing of sisyphus

description: You've lived your whole life in a single basement. Now, your cage is unlocked. You could leave this house at any moment you want. But without knowing what happened, can you ever truly be free? (https://themis729.itch.io/the-crimson-debt)
title: The Crimson Debt
Words Left Unsaid
description:
After a few months of being apart since leaving high school, Rose finds herself invited to her former friend/crush's birthday party! But what should be a fun event ends up with her sitting on her own, reflecting on what her friendship truly meant in the grand scheme of things.

[From [url=https://esbi.itch.io/words-left-unsaid]itch.io[/url]]

In Cupid Axis you play as Alyssa, an aspiring fashionista who gets set up on a surprise blind date by her friend Charara. However, when you show up, you find some rude guy with a seriously-don't-want-to-be here attitude and who is way too hard to please.  
Nearly every option makes the date start spiralling into the 'no good' zone!

But wait... did time just reset?! It seems like fate is trying to give you a do-over each time so you know the right thing to say! And when you start to get along... hey... this guy is actually kind of cute?!

But... how come you're even being given this chance?

https://themonkeyninja.itch.io/cupid-axis
title: Cupid Axis

description:

description:
Nine strangers. One creepy mansion. Zero Escape.

You awaken in a luxurious, yet dark and creepy mansion with 8 other strangers. Before you can grasp this weird situation, a strange creature calling herself "Nyx" appears and announces a horrifying reality: you're all trapped in a twisted game of deception and murder, a real-life version of the Werewolf/Mafia game.

However, death is not permanent. Every time you die in this game, you open your eyes to find yourself right at the start of the loop forever trapped in an endless game of death and misery.

But fear not, you’re not alone. Unlike the others, a mysterious girl named ‘’ Astrid’’ seems to also retain her memories across the time loops.

Will you two work together to uncover the secrets of this mansion, and break free from this eternal cycle of death and despair ...

Or..

Will you forever be forced to repeat this sick game until the end of your days?

Only "YOU" can decide

title: Mahou Shoujo Karen -Ingoku no Coliseum ni Kieta Aku Ochi Shimai-
Iede Shoujo Takamura Hiyuki no Himitsu ~Chijoku ni Mamire Kairaku Ochi Saserareteiku Kanojo no Jun'ai~
description:
One day, a girl in a school uniform came to the office of a salaryman, Watase, asking to stay over.

Her name was Takamura Hiyuki. Hiyuki's divorced mother has found a new boyfriend, but the boyfriend was abusive and tormenting her, so she came to rely on Watase, a distant relative.

Feeling that she has no one else to turn to, Watase reluctantly agrees to let her stay, despite the obvious risk if others find out that he's living with a schoolgirl.

As time passes, they grow closer, and Hiyuki develops strong feelings of love and gratitude towards Watase. However, she also feels a sense of guilt for relying on him so much.

At that time, she won a large amount of money from sugar dating and gave Watase a present for the first time. She couldn't forget the happy look on his face at that time, and she began to get more and more involved in sugar dating.

Then one day, she met Sakaide Homare, a self-proclaimed influencer who is the son of a rich man. A scumbag who is famous for ruining women sets his sights on Hiyuki, and upon noticing the relationship between Hiyuki and Watase, he comes up with a plan for a "game".

[Translated from [url=https://www.getchu.com/soft.phtml?id=1297830]Getchu[/url]]

When Rain Bremen was a young boy, he had a best friend called Ten, and they spent all of their time together. This changed, however, when Ten was attacked by a bandit deep in the woods. Wracked with pain and bleeding out slowly, Ten begs Rain to return to their village to get help.

Rain scrambles to obey Ten’s request, but by the time he returns to his friend’s side it’s already too late. Ten has disappeared.

Over a decade passes, but Ten is never far from Rain’s mind. Rain continues to wonder about his childhood friend, and what might have happened to him. Then, a little after Rain’s twenty-third birthday, Rain’s father asks him to enter the woods to gather herbs. Rain complies, but he wanders from the path and it begins to rain. Caught up in a sudden storm, Rain slips, cracks his head, and falls unconscious.

When Rain awakes, he finds himself in a small cottage owned by a mysterious young man called Zero. Zero claims that he found Rain collapsed in the woods and rescued him, but there’s something strange about Zero.

Why does he look so much like Ten – and why does he have such sharp teeth?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3016500/Rain_and_the_Wolf/]Steam[/url]]

--As long as he can be happy.
Understanding that he could not bring about the salvation of his first love, the man let go of his beloved himself.
The protagonist of the story was Kat, who chose to turn around and hide in the darkness of the night.

Li Yan, a man who had always always been treated as a dog, was kept as a pet by different rich and powerful people.
He was a slave with no loyalty, yet he longed to belong to someone.
They had been stuck in their past until they met each other.

--I don't need your pity or your love.
--I am a prisoner of desire, a humble and insignificant being, prostrate before you.

You are Kamiko Shiou, a 16-year-old who's been homeschooled ever since you moved into the city with your mother and older sister. You've gotten accustomed to your quiet and simple life, thinking of it as a peaceful way to live.

Recently, your mother has enrolled you into a reputable school, Mementos Academy for the Gifted. Thinking little of it, you expect a rejection message and the ability to move on with your life the way it's been for the past few years.

To your surprise, you're met with an acceptance letter and are now en route to what you've heard is a possibly haunted institution with enigmatic students. Do you have what it takes to survive the year or will you end up another sacrifical lamb for the student council?

description: Semyon Persunov wakes up after being in the camp and hears the doorbell. In the corridor, the familiar pioneer girls are waiting for him. description:
Plucky Lieutenant Tide has been drafted into the Monster Ops: A military taskforce that hunts monsters who've escaped from a top-secret experiment. He joins the no-nonsense veteran soldier Wraith and the peaceful human-loving monster Balasque.

Tide's past screw-ups make him a questionable choice for the high-stakes black ops, but he's determined to prove himself to Wraith. He can't help but look up to their badass leader.

Wraith seems rough around the edges, but he warms up to Tide quickly. When the nature of their missions turn sexual, romantic possibilities open up for the two that neither had considered.

With increasingly dangerous missions and an unpredictable commander, Wraith and Tide know they must count on each other to survive.

Will their bond as battle-brothers evolve into something more?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3004790/]Steam[/url]]

title: E'yi Guinu Juexing Zhi Lu ～Chise Yu Chunbai Roman Pianzhang
description:
A Romantic Fantasy Text Adventure in Another World

Step into the shoes of a young woman who suddenly discovers she's the "wicked antagonist" in a novel. Can you help her change her fate when she realizes she's destined to be a tragic character?

Will you continue to play the villain, or strive to become the true protagonist? Will you pursue personal happiness, or save others from peril? The power is in your hands.

Embark on this extraordinary journey, exploring the deeper meanings of identity, destiny, and self-worth. Every choice you make could alter the course of the entire story. Let's redefine what it truly means to be the "main character"!

Are you ready to challenge fate and rewrite your story? Begin your magical adventure at the noble academy now!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3090500/]Steam[/url]]

Taking place twenty years after the Metagen-92 virus – aka the “Superflu” – has swept the world and rendered many of its adult population superpowered or mutated, Origin Story follows MC (name customizable), a seemingly normal nineteen-year-old who in any other universe would be a popular and attractive prospect for most girls. But in this universe, his ability hasn't manifested yet. Shunned by most of his meta-gifted peers, MC finds himself a hapless virgin on the lower rung of his school's social ladder, with only a few misfit friends by his side.
title: Origin Story

description:
It's 6:00PM on a Wednesday. The voicemail she'd gotten said to tune in to channel 7. Her brother's face stares back at her. She doesn't think he looks right, but then, she's nearly forgotten his face by now.

租借女友 ～地平线与泳装女友～
description:
Become Kinoshita Kazuya, a worthless college student at a Tokyo university, and live the part-time job lifestyle on Enoshima with charming heroines Mizuhara Chizuru, Sarashina Ruka, Sakurasawa Sumi, and Yaemori Mini in this game-original story. By viewing all endings, you can witness Nanami Mami's story.

An Original Story Set in the Summer on the Island of Enoshima.
Experience an original love story that could have occurred during the anime's third season. Kazuya gathered the funds to shoot a movie starring Chizuru via crowdfunding, but it was not enough! To make up for the insufficient funds, Kazuya stays on the island of Enoshima for the summer, working part-time with the four heroines. It will be impossible for something not to happen while under the same roof—Kazuya's delusions are in full effect!

[Edited from [url=https://www.gematsu.com/2024/08/rent-a-girlfriend-the-horizon-and-the-girl-in-the-swimsuit-launches-november-28-in-japan]Gematsu[/url]]

Will you be able to stop this seedy conspiracy? Are you looking for Justice or Revenge? And will you be able to find love again as you use every means at your disposal to avenge your deceased fiancé?

title: Theft of Mona Lisa
description: An individual attempts to steal a Mona Lisa painting from a museum, with player choices regarding the scenario.

'The Church Grim wakes, once again, in an abandoned abbey,  he has given up on everything...even himself. His world has lost all colour and meaning. But a witch by the name of Alice DoGoode, isn't ready to give up, she's determined to help him through this trying time.'

title: Sanctuary
Incident with a UFO Visual Novel
aliases: UFO, sighting, visuals, infrared, pilot, commander, captain
description: Sighting by a pilot who provides sensor data is compromised by his commander who steals the UFO data.

Years ago, I worked for a radio station. The KWL. 

Strange place.
It didn't run any songs, or interviews, or news. Just stories. Any genre. Any length. So long as it was original.
I was one of the two people in charge of writing them.

We worked nights to have everything ready for the morning recording.

I still remember the night I decided to quit.

[From [url=https://dwam.itch.io/late-night-at-the-kwl]itch.io[/url]]
title: Late Night at the KWL
There's Nothing There
description:
Are you seeing things?
You don't know for sure but you know things have to change don't you?

[From [url=https://rainhet.itch.io/theres-nothing-there]itch.io[/url]]

Summoning Demons isn't as hard as staying alive when a groggy one is watching your every move.

[From [url=https://rainhet.itch.io/i-summoned-the-demon-in-my-room]itch.io[/url]]
title: I Summoned The Demon In My Room

description:
I wanted to fall in love, too.

A boy with good looks falls in "love" with an unusual girl who has romantic feelings for a stone.
In order to protect her, he almost caused a serious accident in that classroom at that time.

After receiving his confession, the girl begins to question her own "love" for the stone.
And the two began to worry.

Is this feeling really ...... love?

Certainly, there is a throbbing in the chest.
The cold sweat and the shuddering sensation are both real.

They tell each other how they feel, break up, and sometimes secretly mingle with each other.
This is a story of two people lost in their first "love". 

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3081210/]Steam[/url]]
title: Muku o Saku

description:
In a post superpower world, which are the result of a human mutation, chaos runs rampant. 1 in 2 people develop this mutation.

In a fairy tale, this would mean that humanity would step be free of their their limitations and propel the human race into a state of prosperity and peace.

Unfortunately, this isn't that fairy tale, this is reality. 1 in 2 individuals develop superpowers, and half of these individuals choose a life of crime to attain luxuries they otherwise would never have had.

As a result, a new system was put in place. From this system, heroes and villains were born. To put it simply, the government employs heroes, sends them on missions to put a stop to the villains.

As for the villains, they simply wish to be free of all forms of control and create a little chaos along the way if possible. If the Government wishes to get in the way, they will destroy the order that the government wants to create.

You will play as MC who is the strongest hero. But one day he was betrayed by his teammates and he died. He reincarnated to the new body, and he wants to revenge on his old teammates. But could he get used to his new life?

[From [url=https://izumiisablier.itch.io/hero-to-villain-remastered]itch.io[/url]]
title: Hero to Villain Remastered
Drake's Dungeon - The Visual Novel
description:
It all transpires deep within the notorious dungeon, Labyrinthe. Part tavern, part brothel, Labyrinthe is a venue for the seedy demon world to come together and revel in their own debauchery.

Owned and empowered by the nefarious imp, Luro, the dungeon itself is partly alive. Labyrinthe hears your thoughts and desires… Its walls shift and its rooms reform to suit your needs. Needless to say, the cocky, dick-dragging Drake has spent many a night plundering its depths.

But now, a strange, malevolent power has begun to seep through its stony walls. A black poison is infecting its demonic patrons, wiping their minds and amplifying their savage natures, turning them away from debauchery towards brutality.

Luro is all for a little chaos, but a chaos he can control... Unable to contend with these violent mutations, he enlists Drake as his personal bodyguard to see him safely into the depths of the dungeon to find the source of the infectious evil. Whatever lurks in its shadowed pits, it lies in wait... Ready to ensnare demons small and large alike.

[From [url=https://hotcha.gumroad.com/l/DrakesDungeonVN]Gumroad[/url]]

title: Mojo ryzhee schast'e
description: This story is about a guy whose life took an unexpected turn. Because of his views on life, which oppose those of society, he becomes antisocial, withdrawn, and gloomy. Despite his rather brilliant graduation from school, he turns from a promising drummer into someone with no inspirations or goals. It's always easier to go with the flow than to swim against it, right? But once he falls asleep on the bus, he wakes up in an entirely different place. A place that can restore his faith in himself and in his own happiness.

title: The Ghosts of Troy
description:
Andromache is the wife of Hector, a Trojan hero who died during the war, his body mercilessly dragged by Achilles' chariot. After the war, the widow became the captive of Pyrrhus - Achilles' son.

However, the proud king has fallen in love with Andromache and, frustrated by her rejection, gives her an ultimatum: if she refuses to marry him, then Pyrrhus will murder the son she had with Hector. Andromache has now a choice to make: will she remain faithful to her husband at the cost of her son's life; or betray the faithfulness she owes Hector to save his lineage? 

What choice will dishonour the ghosts of Troy, haunting her? Who will she betray between her son and her husband?

[From [url=https://chimeriquement.itch.io/the-ghosts-of-troy]itch.io[/url]]

"Mithrun Calls" is a short Dungeon Meshi/Delicious in Dungeon fan-game where Mithrun uses a fairy to talk to some people he knows. 

[From [url=https://canofcians.itch.io/mithrun-calls]itch.io[/url]]
title: Mithrun Calls

description:
I'M AT THE 24/7 LAUNDROMAT

WASH ➡ DRY ➡ FOLD

I'M AT THE 24/7 LAUNDROMAT, IT'S MIDNIGHT

WASH ➡ DRY ➡ FOLD 

I'M AT THE 24/7 LAUNDROMAT, IT'S MIDNIGHT ON A SUNDAY

WASH ➡ DRY ➡ FOLD

WHY AM I HERE?

[From [url=https://potion-of-midi.itch.io/laundromat-vertigo]itch.io[/url]]
title: Laundromat Vertigo

description:
For those of us who have trouble seeing a way forward in this stormy weather. May we all find a place you can take refuge when the road ahead gets stormy. When the road ahead grows hazy, don't forget that a path ahead still exists, even if you can't see it.

[From [url=https://dondonpatapon.itch.io/ourlighthouse]itch.io[/url]]
title: Our Lighthouse
Wolf in the Woods
description:
Every year one villager is sacrificed to the Big Bad Wolf. Their life is given so the other villagers can carry on with their normal lives without fear. This year the sacrifice is me.

[From [url=https://rosemask22.itch.io/wolf-in-the-woods]itch.io[/url]]

title: in dreams
description:
You awaken in the clouds.

A traveler appears in your dream. 

All he wants to do is talk.

[From [url=https://allocrest.itch.io/in-dreams]itch.io[/url]]

In a forest of marble and glass you are a lone wolf standing guard in front of a crystal carafe.

Phantom Thief Red is coming.
Think you have a chance against her? Will you listen to what she has to say?

As the saying goes, if you can't beat them...

[From [url=https://jewelswithwings.itch.io/fairytale-thief-red-riding-hood]itch.io[/url]]
title: Fairytale Thief: Red Riding Hood

description:
Awakening in an aquatic abyss, with no memory of how you got there or how you're even able to breathe, you're greeted by an entity who seems almost too pleased to meet you.

Perhaps it can offer answers, but whether such a being can be trusted is down to you to determine.

Could Styx be the cure for all that ails you?
Or the key to your eternal cage?

[From [url=https://melancholy-marionette.itch.io/the-shuddering]itch.io[/url]]
title: The Shuddering

description:
Can one little thing change the way you feel about someone?

Everything points to 'yes' when Vale and Lawrence's Quality Bro Time becomes a little too cozy…
And gay panic ensues.

[From [url=https://takanohiro.itch.io/my-buddy-did-something-weird]itch.io[/url]]
title: My Buddy Did Something Weird And Now I Have Feelings For Him??!?!?
Dinner with a Deity
description:
Your presence has been requested by the Great Snake Deity, Serpentus, but why? Find out in this small side-story from the Royal Duality Universe and discover the true motive behind Serpentus's strange invitation.

[From [url=https://hyakuten-games.itch.io/dinner-with-a-deity]itch.io[/url]]

title: UNDYING: The Beast
description:
Your town calls you a witch, but you're a simple, widowed herbalist. Tonight is your first brush with the supernatural. A man is hunted and finds refuge in your home, and you can tell he's something other than human.

[From [url=https://maneki-mushi.itch.io/undying-the-beast]itch.io[/url]]

A magical storm is raging in the woods. The Great Dryad must be angry, but at whom? You seek shelter in a secluded cabin. There you run into a handsome stranger. Who is he and what is he hiding? And are you actually the person you claim to be?

Who has the biggest secret: him or you?

[From [url=https://transparent-games.itch.io/stormbound-secrets]itch.io[/url]]
title: Stormbound Secrets
Test Subject
description: A short VN in which you become a necromancer's test subject.

You are alive! And at a Kitten's tea party. Hmm...

[From [url=https://kimchi-slurper.itch.io/tea-party]itch.io[/url]]
title: tea party

description:
“If an arrow pierces the heart, I will pull it out, but what should be done with the arrow of vengeance?” Aisara, born into a batyr’s family, has everything in life: lands, a herd of animals, and, most importantly, beloved people. Though she knows that it is the year 1715 and the Dzungars are advancing, it seems like the war has nothing to do with her. However, one day, the Dzungars massacre Aisara’s village . “From heaven to mud. Wasn’t my life destined to bring peace to the steppe?”

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2607780/]Steam[/url]]
title: TUZAQ

description:
A curious onlooker revisits Palmeno City after a decade, looking for her father. She quickly discovers that some things have changed... and others, not at all. 

[From [url=https://legendex-games.itch.io/wasteland]itch.io[/url]]
title: Wasteland

description:
In an unfamiliar part of the city under the devastating rain you, a delivery person, are stranded with a dead cellphone, a couple of coins, no means of transportation and absolutely zero idea what to do next.

And the word on the street is - there's a murderer on the loose

The only thing you need is to GET HOME.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3010070/]Steam[/url]]
title: Chel, ja prosto hochu domoj

description:
Clove finds herself in the principal's office at school after engaging in a fight with her step-brother Jibu. She must talk her way out of detention with her homeroom teacher Ms. Kurano.

Should she lie or tell the truth? Help Clove navigate her way through this interactive visual novel through choices!

[From [url=https://michellerakar.itch.io/cloves-story]itch.io[/url]]
title: Clove's Story

description:
When a call comes in about the infamous villain Wraith being seen getting hit and fleeing, you rush to find him for one last chat. Afterall, being a hero means helping others, even if they have conflict with you.

[From [url=https://vincent-classic.itch.io/a-villian-friend]itch.io[/url]]
title: A Villian Friend
The Secret Of Mom And Me
description:
In this game, you will play as a son who hides in his heart an immoral love for his own mother. He clearly understood that love was wrong, and also intended to leave his mother to bury that feeling forever.

However, one afternoon, while he was masturbating with his mother's panties on her bed, she caught him. Then what will happen? Will he escape that depraved sentiment and become a good young man, or will he fall forever?

This is just a short game with the plot focus on mother-son incest experiences. If you are interested in this genre, welcome to The Secret Of Mom And Me.

Maple and Celastrina are in the Nature Club and they have a presentation tomorrow on Leafae (fantasy equivalent of butterflies and moths). However, Celastrina starts sneezing tulip petals - turns out that it's due to a caterpillar's mischievous spell.

According to an old saying, confessing your hidden feelings will quell it. As nervous tension bubbles up between the both of them, will they be able to resolve this in time? Or will other feelings surface in the process?

[From [url=https://flufffables.itch.io/catching-butterflies]itch.io[/url]]
title: Catching Butterflies!
No Blood, No Fowl
description:
It all started rather innocently. You and your best friend got wasted drunk, and, naturally, decided to take rubber ducks and remote control cars to the roof of your house to drag race with them. As college students do. However, things go awry when an argument with your neighbor turns into an accidental murder as one of said rubber ducks falls off the roof, right into his mouth, choking him to death.

Now, you and Aristotle have to get rid of the body and cover up the crime, your table tennis scholarship depends on it! 

[From [url=https://barbieronpa.itch.io/no-blood-no-fowl]itch.io[/url]]

title: A Date With Apollo Justice
description:
Klavier Gavin has had one goal for some time now, and that's to go on a date with defense attorney Apollo Justice. Let's just hope it goes better than his previous attempts at flirting...

In this short (and incredibly self-indulgent) visual novel, use Ace Attorney mechanics to navigate conversations and keep this date from turning into a disaster.

[From [url=https://barbieronpa.itch.io/a-date-with-apollo-justice]itch.io[/url]]

You've met the freaky fabulous kids of famous monsters in Monster High. And you've seen the despair inducing events of Dangaronpa that ended in ultimate hope. Now get ready for the monstrously despairing mashup of the two: Monsteronpa! 

Featuring all new and unique art, and a in depth full length story, Monsteronpa is a love letter to both fandoms that aims to be true to the things that made us fall in love with them. 

[From [url=https://barbieronpa.itch.io/monsteronpa]itch.io[/url]]
title: Monsteronpa
A Fire, Transfixed
description:
Three days ago, you celebrated the Solemnity of Mary, Mother of God.

One of your members fell to their death from the top of the chapel, trying to whisk away the blackbirds. 

Today, the church in the woods burns.

[From [url=https://catsket.itch.io/a-fire-transfixed]itch.io[/url]]

title: Shyler: Bad Ending
description:
Shyler, a mental health chatbot, is about to die.  As their imaginary friend, listen to their final words.

[From [url=https://norbez.itch.io/shyler-bad-ending]itch.io[/url]]

Romance The Backrooms is a F/M dating sim VN about Carla, a daycare worker who falls into the titular liminal space by pure chance. Thankfully, she meets a group of 5 humanoid entities who are willing to help her get back home. On the way, Carla, who’s had no time for love because of her work, finds herself becoming smitten with one of the entities. Will she get out of the backrooms with her love intact?


[From [url=https://norbez.itch.io/romance-the-backrooms]itch.io[/url]]
title: Romance The Backrooms
Trust
description:
Do I trust myself? Should I trust myself?


Trust is a short story about two former cult members, hiding from their demise. Will they find peace, or will their lives crumble before them?

[From [url=https://luckyfunfun.itch.io/trust]itch.io[/url]]

You were the scion of a powerful sorcerer family…and now, you’re the only survivor. For the past few years, you’ve been traveling across the god planets in search of the power you need for revenge. The most recent lead has led you to a name floating on everyone’s lips: The Eternal.

A being that has been described as to never known defeat. Most importantly, he’s a mage, just like you.

With the intention of asking him to be your mentor in magic, you chase him across the planes. The moment of confrontation is here.

As you’ve suspected, he’s your (former) brother-in-law, and there’s a lot to be said after the 17 years since you last saw each other.

[From [url=https://atelierursine.itch.io/penetrate-the-veil]itch.io[/url]]
title: Penetrate the Veil: Unspoken Hearts

description:
The stars are shining brightly and the moon was full. Sounds like a perfect evening to take a stroll with your beloved, right?

[From [url=https://cynimonogurui.itch.io/a-night-like-this]itch.io[/url]]
title: A Night Like This
We listen, under the rain
description:
On a dark, rainy night at an abandoned bus stop, you encounter a ghost with unfinished business.

[From [url=https://ruminio.itch.io/we-listen-under-the-rain]itch.io[/url]]

title: Another Stranger
description:
Lamppost lights blur in the fog... 

The bus rumbles on...

It's just you and another stranger here... 

So go ahead, make yourself at home.

[From [url=https://688199.itch.io/another-stranger]itch.io[/url]]

Alex's Journey to the Grave is a visual novel about a boy trapped by fate and a girl in dire need of a friend. Help guide them through some of the hardest decisions of their lives as they experience warmth, connection, tragedy, the inevitability of death... and the antics of a mysterious black cat.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2927810/]Steam[/url]]
title: Alex's Journey to the Grave
Set Yourself on Fire
description:
A quiet town awaits death.

Stagnation is the default state of being.

Those who dare to hope are seen as demented.

Two aimless young women fall in love.

I lost my soul somewhere along the line. It must have slipped, fallen into a storm drain, vanished. It dissipated in that putrid water.

[From [url=https://denhop.itch.io/setyourselfonfire]itch.io[/url]]

title: Shinigami Shoukan RExEX ~ Kane no Chikara o Mashimashi Shite Onna Boukensha no Harem o Tsukuru RPG
On Air!
description:
You have finally gotten accepted into the prestigious voice acting school "Jewelry Hill".
However, the top voice acting school in Japan is on the verge of bankruptcy!?
The only female student is granted an important mission--
Together with 29 high school boys, she must unite the school and make a performance a success.

The future of the school and the future of these growing voice actors is in "your" hands--

The sparkling voice actors are waiting to meet you, the special student, at Jewelry Hill Academy!

Three absolutely unforgettable years will soon be On Air!

(translated from Nintendo eShop page)

A pawn finds his Arisen in a field of moonglow one night. But something about his demeanor is off. Does he have enough will to unearth the cause... and mayhap more?

[From [url=https://carrotpatchgames.itch.io/where-theres-a-will]itch.io[/url]]
title: Where There's a Will...
Euexorista
description:
It seems like your biggest fan has shown up.

And she knows all about your works, too. She remembers your very first (and very rough) fanarts, all your OC lore, and most importantly, she looks like she remembers that one webcomic you made a few years ago that you never got around to finish. 

Well, you're happy she remembers, really, but...

It's complicated. And embarrassing too. She eagerly asks you a question about it.

"How was it going to end?"

[From [url=https://swirly-glasses-games.itch.io/euexorista]itch.io[/url]]

title: The Ice Cream Culprit
description:
Let your girlfriend know (or not) about the culprit who ate her ice cream.

[From [url=https://konayachi.itch.io/the-ice-cream-culprit]itch.io[/url]]

Under The False Sky [IM]Pulse is a short story following the development of Tamara's and Felix's relationship, told through text messages and video chats.

Starting from the beginning of their mandatory training at the military academy, join the unit through all their ups and downs.  

Get to know your teammates better through choices and let love blossom!

[From [url=https://elduator.itch.io/utfs-impulse]itch.io[/url]]
title: UNDER THE FALSE SKY | [IM]Pulse
Reflection
description:
"Amelia, please open your heart to me. Do you believe in reincarnation? A second chance at life?"

That's the question Ziri, the court jester of the Ti'Zar Empire, asked Princess Amelia when she laid down next to her in the courtyard. The question took her by surprise. This isn't the entertainer she knew. Seven Hells, this isn't the Ziri she knew. The somber tone, the forlorn look in her eyes... What could have prompted such a question? 

Will Amelia be able to cheer her up and make her appreciate the life she has now? After all, Amelia never had the displeasure of pondering about "what-ifs", as she could always get what she wanted with a simple command...

[From [url=https://husbandogoddess.itch.io/reflection]itch.io[/url]]

title: Lonely Pocket Dimension
description:
Your friend Isley is a magical strange girl from another world. She's also the worst friend you don't ever want to leave.

[From [url=https://bibixp.itch.io/lonely-pocket-deminsion]itch.io[/url]]

"I've never had a crush, so I summoned an incubus instead."

[From [url=https://no-xiruo.itch.io/spadille]itch.io[/url]]
title: Spadille

description:
Over the past few weeks, Vincent and his girlfriend Annie have been fighting, as one thing led to another... now they are on the verge of a breakup. Walking into your friend's apartment, you find your childhood friend on the floor wrapped up in a blanket while watching nothing but static.

Approaching him, you try everything you can to help him understand that maybe nothing is set in stone. Vincent can be very stubborn when it comes to his girlfriend, and he needs a bit of persuading to fix the mistakes in their relationship (which he caused...)

You're the only person that can fix their relationship.. so will they stay together?

[From [url=https://avelloxy.itch.io/will-they-stay-together]itch.io[/url]]
title: "Will they stay together?"
To Eat a Canary
description:
Waking in an unknown place, you are met with a stranger who believes you are destined for each other...

Will you stay, or find a way to escape?

[From [url=https://minthedraws.itch.io/to-eat-a-canary]itch.io[/url]]

You just got ordered to get on call by the moderator of your tchat group ?  Hopefully this call isn't about the degradation of mental health regarding low wage workers... 

[From [url=https://dreamty-dream.itch.io/get-on-call-right-now]itch.io[/url]]
title: Get on call right now

description:
In a desolate digital world talk to an anime girl (?) to cure your loneliness.

[From [url=https://temteno.itch.io/digital-curtain]itch.io[/url]]
title: Digital Curtain
Food Adventures
description:
Finally, Tako is able to visit the themed cafe of her dreams! Come join her and her friend, Tama, as they enjoy various dishes!

[From [url=https://otokeneko.itch.io/food-adventures-o2a2-2024]itch.io[/url]]

Hot Girl Summer is an exploration of the inner thoughts of a fat queer woman as she contemplates showing some skin at the beach.

[From [url=https://naoimh-murchan.itch.io/hot-girl-summer]itch.io[/url]]
title: Hot Girl Summer
I'll Be Home With You
description:
This letter is not a Last Will and Testament. We've already done that. I write this to remind you both and myself of how much I love my dearest siblings.

A micro kinetic (no choice) novel about the last things you do and what comes after you're gone. 

[From [url=https://knickknackpj.itch.io/illbehomewithyou]itch.io[/url]]

Elliot has finally mustered up the courage to confess to her long-time crush, Lana. But first, she needs to get through another day of work before she can tell her manager how she feels. 

[From [url=https://witpop.itch.io/keep-it-smooth-elliot]itch.io[/url]]
title: Keep It Smooth, Elliot!
Juniper
description:
You've always been helplessly vulnerable to escapism. You can't help it. Why wouldn't you want to get lost in a fantasy when the real world never seems to have anything to offer you? 

Could it be... someone finally heard you? This dream feels too real. Have your pleas finally been answered?

[From [url=https://wickoi.itch.io/juniper]itch.io[/url]]

title: Cupid's Kiss
description:
Your designated Cupid has had more than enough of your nonsense, thank you very much. 

[From [url=https://marysuegames.itch.io/cupids-kiss]itch.io[/url]]

You're on your way home after a late Friday night when you find yourself being accosted by a suspicious "policeman"(?) who seems to know more about you than he should. What's this guy's deal?! There's only one way to find out...

Enjoy(?) a short conversation with a cute(?) policeman(?) who has a bit too much of a crush on you

[From [url=https://heartpunchstudio.itch.io/bad-end-prelude]itch.io[/url]]
title: Bad End Prelude!?
Hibachi Sushi
description:
Hibachi's Sushi is open for business! Experience the culinary expertise of mermaid master chef Hibachi, as she takes you on a deep dive of under sea delicacies. The freshest salmon, saltiest calms, and most succulent octopus you've ever had await you! Come on in for lunch or dinner and see what critics are calling the best restaurant on the beach!*

*Critic review has been postponed due to lawsuit against the restaurant.

[From [url=https://tj-lounge.itch.io/hibachi-sushi]itch.io[/url]]

title: Sanbiki no Kobuta
description:
The protagonist wolf by the name of Jack lives in a wolven village.
It is a long tradition in the village that one has to join a festival
in order to be regarded as a full-fledged adult.

In the festival the ones to be tested challenge hunting game,
in which wolves chase after pigs to snatch bells from the pigs.

Three pig brothers Tet, Pit and Dat scheme to, driven by their
grudge against wolves, satisfy a certain kind of desire...

[From [url=https://web.archive.org/web/20180728203226mp_/http://www.dlsite.com/ecchi-eng/work/=/product_id/RE215619.html]DLsite[/url]]

title: A Light Deal
description:
You can't quite afford that good quality lantern you want, so you decide to try a different approach to obtain it.

[From [url=https://fluffy-plant.itch.io/a-light-deal]itch.io[/url]]

Three years ago, you and your then-boyfriend Zachariah Crowley was the underground's #1 Hitman duo-for-hire.

Until he betrays you and breaks your heart. 

Since then you've been lying low, returning each night to a dingy apartment in a new city.

But tonight as you unlock the door, you come face to face with a smirk you didn't think you'd see again. 

And he's still just as infuriating as before. 

You honestly wish he would just shut up.

And you definitely still don't love him. Right?

[From [url=https://helloyinny.itch.io/honey-trap]itch.io[/url]]
title: Honey Trap

description:
"Holomony" is a short kinetic visual novel about  two adventurers getting trapped in a shifting dungeon-- are they in over their heads?

[From [url=https://ekkoberry.itch.io/holonomy]itch.io[/url]]
title: Holonomy
Inversed
description:
In the mid-19th Century, a poet fights against time as she's writing the most important work of her life.

Poetry is the answer. But what is the question?

[From [url=https://tymedust.itch.io/inversed]itch.io[/url]]

On your way home, you encounter a stranger.... Who is particularly interested in your tattoo?

[From [url=https://kathinkapng.itch.io/strangers-mark]itch.io[/url]]
title: Stranger's Mark

description:
You and your colleague have been sent to find out what happened to a missing person deep within the dark tunnels.  

Can you succeed in your mission?  Can you get this person... or even YOURSELF... out of the TUNNELS in time?

You may not be the only ones down there either....

[From [url=https://cattrigger.itch.io/vessels]itch.io[/url]]
title: VESSELS
Fangs For Your Concern
description:
Your boyfriend goes away on a Transylvanian camping trip. When he returns there's something different about him...

[From [url=https://kalamosgames.itch.io/fangs-for-your-concern]itch.io[/url]]

title: Nightly Intrusions of a Dream-Eating Demon
description:
Every night, you're plagued by nightmares, chains of the past  bind you to an uncertain future. Like a record on repeat, that was your life.

That was until... something broke through the ordinary.

For reasons unknown, a sleep paralysis demon made herself known to you. As she eats your dreams, you're spared from the reoccurrence of the nightmares. So, while she's a bit of a... weirdo, you can tolerate her presence if it spares you from the abyss of nightmares that await you when you sleep.

[From [url=https://tea-and-torment.itch.io/nightly-intrusions-of-a-dream-eating-demon]itch.io[/url]]

title: Of Tears, Of Tides
description:
A walk on the beach takes an unsettling turn when the tide bends to the will of a mermaid's song. Alone and powerless, what can you do?

[From [url=https://florelle-blu.itch.io/of-tears-of-tides]itch.io[/url]]

title: My - eto glavnoe
description: You probably also thought about what a romantic relationship between Ulyana and Semyon would look like. This mod was created to present a scenario in which this pairing is possible. The author's sick imagination, many new CGs and music, and “atypical” character development are included.

title: Furry Shakespeare: To Date Or Not To Date Cat Girls? If Made Today
description:
Many years have past since the historic War of the Roses, and the governing body of Elsinore has decided that it is time to lead the world back from the brink of destruction. What better way than to take a bunch of young adults and throw them in a high-stress environment to see which one can take the throne?

The ancient battle college once known as Dragongate has now been reopened as Elsinore Academy, an educational training ground for future royalty! Oh, and future royalty-adjacent. We can't forget about them. I'm sure they get nice rooms, too. Right? Go to classes, learn new and exciting lore about the world which you then can utilize to sound cooler around your crush(es), and enlist in the local sportsball team!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2762590/]Steam[/url]]

description:
Take control of up to nine characters in order to navigate through five Acts of narrative gameplay and (hopefully) save your theme park from economic destruction. Via choice menus and dialogue options, help each character of the story try to better their lives.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2757940/]Steam[/url]]

title: My New Ghost Friend!!!
description:
A short story (1k words) about the most famous ghost hunter ever(???) meeting a ghost(?? is that really a ghost???) in a graveyard.

[From [url=https://voidpineapple.itch.io/my-new-ghost-friend]itch.io[/url]]

As evening descends, you cross paths with a handsome man of indistinguishable origin who appears to have fallen from the sky. He is unwilling to divulge his name or his background... but perhaps there is something else he is willing to share with you this evening?

[From [url=https://fiendishfiction.itch.io/between-stars]itch.io[/url]]
title: The Space Between Stars
Shockwave
description:
Irene wakes up in a strange place only remembering passing out on the subway. She has just been kidnapped and has no idea of what to do. All she can see is a board with some names, a lever and a board with rules:

Rules:
1. Once the game starts one random player will be picked to be punished. The light besides their name will then become yellow.
2. Any other players can help them escape punishment by pulling the lever.
3. However they will recieve a non leathal, but very painful electric shock.
4. If any player pulls the lever the light will become green, however if they get punished it will become red.
5. The game ends after 5 rounds.
6. Good luck players!

Help Irene decide if she should pull the lever to save others, or if she should stay quiet and let others take the pain, but remember, you can't pull it many times. Everyone has limits, and Irene can't take all four shocks herself.

[From [url=https://mori-seika.itch.io/shockwave]itch.io[/url]]

title: Unknown Signal
description:
"Dear sister, it has been a year since you passed. Since that...thing took over you. I think you'd be happy to know that I found a safe place to be. A place where I'm alone. Away from any other human. You may think I'm lonely, and sometimes that's true, but do not worry! This is the way I can be safe, the only way to live!"

The world has pretty much ended. Those things...they showed up and just took over. Joanne has found a safe place to be, where she can be all alone. After all, you never know if what you're talking to is a human, or one of them. Luckly the radio still works, and for a while now you have been hearing the pleads for help of a stranger. Will you answer they call? And if you do, will you help them?

title: Out of Nowhere
description:
A short game on parenthood, gender-queerness, love and acceptance.

[i]It's getting late.

Oh, he left me a message.

I think I'll go home, now.[/i]

[From [url=https://leyklussyn.itch.io/out-of-nowhere]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Mahou Tsukai ni Inori no Tsue
Decoration Disorder Disconnection 1
description:
"It was a silent night of grating bone.

The sound of budding, beautiful life."


Beginning irregular publishing in Faust Magazine in 2004, Decoration Disorder Disconnection was a series of light novels written by Kinoko Nasu, widely known for his work on Tsukihime, Fate, Kara no Kyoukai, etc . The series unfortunately entered an indefinite hiatus after the release of the second volume due to both a shift in tone in Nasu's writing and his changing priorities (i.e. Mahoyo, FGO, and the Tsukihime Remake). While it's entirely possible fans of TYPE-MOON may never see a third volume of DDD come to fruition, this fan visual novel was created in an attempt to give people easy access to the series and generally increase awareness of its existence to the English speaking side of the fandom.

title: Um Jammer Lammy - We Should Jam Together!
In Plain Sight
description:
Welcome to our little channel! Watch and join our little adventure in [s]trespassing potentially privately owned properties and lands[/s] exploring, and (maybe) uncovering the little and big secrets of various places [s]that probably should've been kept a secret[/s].

[From [url=https://nnda.itch.io/in-plain-sight]itch.io[/url]]

title: Hello Friend
description:
It's been a brutal day. And all you wanted was your favorite snack but the corner store being out was the last straw. In the middle of your momentary breakdown a stranger appeared.

[From [url=https://ideationforge.itch.io/hello-friend]Itch.io[/url]]

It's late and dark, but you've received the strangest of notes, and curiosity is in the driver's seat. Who or what will be meeting you outside the park under the brightest street lamp?

[From [url=https://ideationforge.itch.io/moffy]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Interview With The Moth
Shijie zhi Wai
description:
You open your eyes and find yourself in a completely unfamiliar world—an infinite loop game. Only by winning can you temporarily return to the real world for a brief respite. What will you choose?

Play as characters with different backgrounds and complete tasks in various worlds. To others, the supreme being may seem unknown and dangerous, but he might be your lover. Clearing the game not only grants rewards but also offers repeated encounters with "him" in the loop. Even if your identities differ, you will recognize each other time and time again. When you are in danger, don't be afraid—he will come, he will be there.

(Machine Translated Version)

title: Surviving the Apocalypse Is More Fun When There’s Sex
description:
In a world ravaged by chaos and despair, you take on the role of a rugged survivor, braving the dangers of a desolate landscape overrun by raiders, mutants, and sinister factions vying for control. But amidst the ruins, a glimmer of hope emerges when you rescue a woman from the clutches of marauders, igniting a passionate partnership forged in the fires of adversity.

Together, you'll navigate the treacherous terrain of moral ambiguity, confronting ethical dilemmas that challenge your principles and test the limits of your humanity. Will you succumb to the darkness that lurks within, or will you rise above the chaos to become a beacon of hope in a world on the brink of oblivion?

But survival isn't the only thing on the line. As you traverse the wasteland with your newfound companion, you'll discover that desire burns hot amidst the ashes of civilization. With the right choices and a bit of charm, you'll unlock intimate encounters that explore the depths of passion and pleasure, offering a tantalising glimpse of paradise amidst the ruins.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2979840/]Steam[/url]]

title: Elf in Chains
description:
Your job was supposed to be simple. Find the artifact, bring it back to the temple and collect your reward. You are the hero, the champion of great citadel Verika - skilled, well geared, and experienced in battle. What could go wrong?

Many things.

A group of adventurers is betrayed and captured during their quest, then transported to an unknown realm. But the battle that awaits them in confinement...is not what they expect.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3057570/]Steam[/url]]

title: The Aching Maw
description:
“There is nothing here except me and the corpse that whispers play pretend.”

In a moment, you are born. 

Students run through the halls, blissfully unaware. Only the corpse near your feet knows the truth.

As you explore the room and fight your aching hunger...

A Stranger pushes into the room.

[From [url=https://bloody-thy-end.itch.io/the-aching-maw]itch.io[/url]]

title: Shaonv Guaiqi Shijianbu: Yongsheng
description:
After a great war more than a decade ago, the entire European continent was left in ruins, with countless sectors in need of revitalization.
While the technological revolution spurred rapid global development, some countries found themselves engulfed in unrest and turmoil.
In the heart of the shattered Apennine Peninsula lies Florence, where ancient buildings and narrow streets conceal untold histories.
Meiqu Sonya, an alchemy chemistry researcher from the foggy city, founded a detective agency that quietly lurks in the corners of this city.
Until one day, the mysterious legend of immortality was shattered by the arrival of Snell Aurora, a white-haired witch from the snow country.
The conspiracy begins with the legend of eternal life and ends with a mysterious organization,
extending into an invisible black curtain woven through them.

"Are you... my ally or my enemy?"

Behind each bizarre and absurd tale lies an ancient secret buried in this city. As the investigation deepens, a century-spanning web unfolds across the European continent.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3081240/]Steam[/url]]

Taniharazo, who lost his memory, wakes up from the forest and goes deep into an isolated school, working with eight girls with different characteristics. ​The girls are happy together, but as one of them disappears, the serial murders gradually unfold ​But is the purpose just to find the murderer? 

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3093900]Steam[/url]]
title: Zang Wu

description: You're a young man whose father recently left mysteriously. You need to find out what happened to him, but, in the meantime, you can have fun with girls and even discover your bloodline secrets.​

Succum Brewery
description:

Peach Towers. She has no money, no friends, and no way to get to ground level.
To make matters worse the place is swarming with chuds.

Help EVE figure out the [i]right[/i] morals for your glorious homeland.

[From [url=https://nothack-europa.itch.io/kill-puppies-for-not-charity]Itch.io[/url]]

You find yourself in a dark Lovecraftian forest where birds haven't been seen for days, and your only companion is a strange speech-to-text device gifted to you by your long-deceased father.

vampires and garlic
description:

title: Anna: Hard Exam 3
description:
This time Anna will get in the most trouble and she will do what it takes to sign the papers to get the scholarship she was working on so much.

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/posts/hard-exam-3-is-107194720]Patreon[/url]]

Kim Baxter is a doting wife and a loving mother. Her career as a police officer is going great, and the promise of a promotion is ever looming closer. So, on all accounts, life for Mrs. Baxter is perfect. That is, until one day, when her path crosses with a young man named Hayden (a classmate of her son's). This encounter triggers a series of events that unearth secrets, lies, and neuroses that threaten to shatter her family's peaceful life.​

[From F95Zone]
title: Misanthropy

description:
In a world that had experienced a terrible war, futanari were supposed to be the salvation of humanity. Instead, however, they inspired fear and contempt.

Jade, the first futanari in her family in generations, has had to hide her origins her entire life. But all secrets come out sooner or later, especially when she has to take on the investigation of the death of someone close to her.​

[From [url=https://subscribestar.adult/Kind_Nightmares]SubscribeStar[/url]]
title: Instinct Unleashed
"you picked your poison"
description:

Can you convince her to let you live?

[From [url=https://cedesdc.itch.io/you-picked-your-poison]itch.io[/url]]

title: Famicom Tantei Club: Emio
description:
[b]“I CAN GIVE YOU A SMILE THAT WILL LAST FOREVER!”[/b]

Junior high school student Eisuke Sasaki has been found dead in a chilling fashion, with a smiley-faced paper bag over his head.
This unsettling visage bears a striking resemblance to a recurring clue in a string of unsolved murders from 18 years ago – as well as the urban legend Emio, aka the Smiling Man, a serial killer said to grant his victims “a smile that will last forever”.
Does the Smiling Man really exist…or is a new culprit continuing on his legacy?
As a member of the Utsugi Detective Agency, you’ve been tasked with investigating the events that led to Eisuke Sasaki’s death. Along the way, scrutinise the clues and testimonies you gather for potential connections to the gruesome events of the past.

[from [url=https://www.nintendo.com/en-gb/Games/Nintendo-Switch-games/Emio-The-Smiling-Man-Famicom-Detective-Club-2615498.html]Nintendo.com[/url]]

title: Another Rose in His Garden
description:
Two crooked men, a business trip, and an ill-advised office affair.

Another Rose in His Garden is an 18+ erotic Omegaverse BL visual novel. Abel Valencia is an Omega that's resented his secondary sex his entire life. Not wanting to end up like others of his kind, he hides it from the public eye, living his day to day life as a Head Accountant in Silicon Valley. Life's alright, until he meets the wealthy tycoon, Mars Rosales, and the two get embroiled in a sexual affair that changes his life forever.

[From [url=https://doubledeadstudio.itch.io/another-rose-in-his-garden]itch.io[/url]]

"Imagine Future" is a Visual Novel with a campus theme. You will follow the perspective of the protagonist Ji Wang, experience the life of a high school student. The final examination seemed so far away. one day, it was close at hand. Standing at the crossroads of life, what choice will you make? 

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3109470/]Steam[/url]]

description:
What does it mean to suffer in heaven? Eve knows the answer and Leben is going to find out. After all what's love without a little bit of pain involved?

https://yzwmmtr.booth.pm/items/5921486
title: Shoujo no boukoku

description:
