"Red and Black" was originally a short story featured within the pages of Grimoire NieR, telling the events that led up to the start of Route A from the perspective of Brother Nier.

Here, is an attempt to adapt said story into the VN style from the game.

(Edited from itch.io page description)
title: NieR Replicant: Red and Black

description:
Fujibayashi Reo is your regular high school student. He would prefer to sleep in than go to class, and he cares more about football than he does about studying for his upcoming exams. He’s not the best student, and he’s always getting into arguments with the exacting student council president, Sugawara Yuuma.

Reo can’t stand Yuuma, and the feeling is mutual. Both boys hate one another — but when Reo discovers that Yuuma has been crossdressing and working at a maid café on the sly, Reo gets an idea.

Reo decides to blackmail the upstanding student council president into aiding him with the seduction of his childhood friend, Chinami. With Yuuma’s help, Reo’s sure that he’ll be able to confess his feelings to Chinami and melt her heart…

So why has Reo started to feel so abashed when he’s with Yuuma? What in the world is going on?!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3096440/]Steam[/url]]
title: How to Melt a Maiden's Heart

description:
Your live-in landlord is very suspicious. How is he an owner of an expensive apartment at a young age? Is he rich? If so, why is he renting out a bedroom? Does he need money? Even more strange, he rarely comes out of his room... What could he be hiding? He's kinda hot, though.

[From [url=https://chanimk.itch.io/very-very-cat]itch.io[/url]]
title: Very Very Cat
Mahjongg Connect
description:
A story where you connect with girls through mahjong.
Enjoy mahjong battles with over 20 girls!!
If you win, erotic events await you!

Follow Princess Calliope as she changes things up and tries to rescue her own knight after a kidnapping gone wrong! With her loyal friend Harper, she'll make sure to have her back in no time at all! What could go wrong?

[From [url=https://helixcube.itch.io/princess-knight]itch.io[/url]]
title: Princess Knight

description:
Once a respected peer at the Academy and now forsaken and very... undead, Shavil enlists his little mage’s assistance in recording his forbidden research, unaware that something far more important is at stake.

[From [url=https://cripticbite.itch.io/oermorrow]itch.io[/url]]
title: O'ermorrow
The Shop on Saltwater and Seventh
description:
You are an uptight thief running for your life and loot. Your only hope to escape the city is with the help of a lovely but mysterious shopkeeper who trades in magic and odd collectibles. 

Will you succeed!? 

You probably will! But what will it cost you?

[From [url=https://gamerartshop.itch.io/the-shop-on-saltwater-and-seventh]itch.io[/url]]

title: The Angel Act
description:
Congratulations! You have recently been hired as a performer at Fortuna Circus. Your job is to be a handler for the star attraction: that's right, the Angel Act! 

Work hard to captivate the audience and do exactly as the ringmaster taught you, and maybe, just maybe, you'll get to become a permanent member of this esteemed troupe!

[From [url=https://sudachys.itch.io/the-angel-act]itch.io[/url]]

Trapped in a winterscape, Momotarou converses with a demon and learns more about himself.

[From [url=https://xxmissarichanxx.itch.io/momotarou]itch.io[/url]]
title: Momotarou
Wenzi Youxi
description: Word game is literally a game of words. Player controls "I" to find clues between lines, delete words to change the meaning of sentences, or shift words to rewrite facts. “I” must be wise and brave enough complete the mission of words. May the best "I” win!

title: MONOKURO ~From here and back~
aliases: モノクロ ~From here and back~
description:
Wishing on a gray feather...

Two lab experiments, Ama and Bon, escape from their
captors in order to reach Paradise, a land high above.
But, what is their connection to the monsters that pursue them?

This is a visual novel developed in Ren'py made to look like a long lost 1997 Sega Saturn video game, complete with purposely low-res graphics, FMVs, and audio. A game manual .pdf is included with a download of the game. There are 4 endings to reach and a gallery with CGs, concept art, and character profiles to fill out and see.

The Demon Lord kidnapped you.

Why?

She won't tell you. She won't tell anyone...

But it's not all bad...

You're free to wander around the castle and mingle with all of her other prisoners, who happen to be beautiful girls.

Build relationships with each of them. Get to know their past, their interests, their skills...their kinks...

Get stronger together, and maybe with their help, you'll eventually find a way to escape, or decide to fight back against the Demon Lord.

[From [url=https://chain-games.itch.io/the-demon-lords-project]itch.io[/url]]
title: The Demon Lord's Project
Rozovyj shum
description:
The town of Riverwood has seen better days. Now it slowly withers away, surrounded by endless fields and drowned in thick shadows. Time seems to stand still, and nothing seems able to awaken the fading life in the decaying houses and gloomy people.

In the midst of this seemingly immutable routine, a few teenagers are faced with an unimaginable horror that enters their minds and takes on the most hideous forms. The nightmare will last forever, devouring one victim after another, unless the protagonists unravel the mystery behind their misadventures.

[From [url=https://sombergamesstudio.itch.io/pink-noise]itch.io[/url]]

title: The Big Speech
description:
You are a politician representing the proud (and slightly rich) district of East Northbrook. They paid big money to be here, and are counting on you to convince them that you are the representative they need in government to further their interests. This is your moment. Give 'em The Big Speech.

Give them... The BS

[From [url=https://maho-studio.itch.io/the-big-speech]itch.io[/url]]

title: Baddies Inc.
description:
Do you have what it takes to conquer and become number one in the gigantic dating app industry? Step into the role of a young man, driven by life's challenges and a burning desire to “make it big.” Leaving his rural farmhouse and past behind, he ventures into the bustling heart of California – Loho City, determined to run a successful dating app company and make a name for himself.

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/fozgames/about]Patreon[/url]]

title: Burn the Rain
description:
After Jennifer Burns, the "Burnout Chick", moves from her childhood home of Arlen to the mid-Atlantic suburb of Lawndale, she struggles to start a new life among the eccentric crowd she finds herself surrounded by.

Soon enough, Jennifer meets fellow maverick Wade and becomes enveloped in the associated throes of first love, whilst simultaneously being forced to come to terms with her repressed trauma and its lingering consequences if she hopes to secure a better future.

title: Today
description:
It was a beautiful day in May, 
but not for long.

[From [url=https://seirzen.itch.io/today]itch.io[/url]]

title: Potion Pleasing
description:
In the vast region of Quercus, somewhere around Fiorosia—the Spring forest area—and not far from Quartzica, a small village of artisans, lies an interesting potion shop. A potion shop that’s said to be home of an odd yet brilliant witch. 

Lots of rumors surround the witch—some are downright terrifying. Regardless, they are said to be capable of creating outstanding potions! Transforming into a bird, making someone invisible, a truth serum… the possibilities are endless! And yet, Parker the Witch has not the best of reputations. 

This doesn’t seem to stop Rue, however: an anxious and somewhat workaholic potter who’s desperate and determined to get her hands on a very special kind of potion… all so that she may finally be accepted by her peers. 

Will she succeed or will Parker be more than she can handle?

[From [url=https://prikarin.itch.io/potion-pleasing]itch.io[/url]]

title: Yuusha Ga Maou Ni Seiken Kakusareta
description:
The brave hero, having endured innumerable hardships to stand before the Demon King, charged forward and swung his sword with all his might.

However, the Demon King was completely unharmed, while the hero's sword broke into smithereens.

"This isn't fair! You've got an unfair advantage! Your armor is too tough! It's all a conspiracy!"

Facing the hero, now red with anger, the Demon King calmly said:

"How about this? Seeing your unusual potential, I'll give you a challenge. If you can pass the trials and find all the holy swords I've hidden, then you'll be able to defeat me. Are you willing to accept?"

"Willing! Absolutely willing! Let's get going!" The excited hero accepted the Demon King's challenge without a second thought.

But what awaited him was—

A slime so powerful it puts the Demon King to shame, a petty merchant who demands money for weapons.

A female knight barely clinging to life from poisoning, a weeping girl destined to be eaten as a sacrifice.

And a lake fairy so enchanting she seems out of place in any game that isn't adult-themed.

...Keep going, hero, a bright future is in store for you!

Time, everything is limited by time; everything except him.

[From [url=https://kbe-game-studio.itch.io/eternal-pt-1]itch.io[/url]]
title: Vichnyj_Pt_1

description:
The novel tells about an adventure that tests the limits of reality and prompts the player to think about the meaning of life, death and loneliness.

[From [url=https://epicbeaver33.itch.io/findingyourself]itch.io[/url]]

description:
Angels are only part of the ornaments in heaven, but their radiance was not as valuable as the freedom for which they became sinners, and of their angelic essence only a halo remained, which means nothing to the Earth.

[From [url=https://daizusii.itch.io/sinfulangel]itch.io[/url]]
title: Hrishnyj anhel
Vertep tinej
description:
Grandma Virlyana is a proud, conflicting and selfish woman. Marrying her daughter off as a city assessor, she gained nobility, and even before that she loved to brag. The years have made her an angry, grumpy woman. She even bullies her own daughter in front of her grandchildren. But was grandma Virlyana always like this? Was there a time when her face was ruddy, and her cheerful eyes shone with a friendly and affectionate glow?

[Translated from [url=https://lislegddivaexe.itch.io/tini]itch.io[/url]]

title: Snowy Jazz
description:
You are the assistant to Hugh Jassoll, ignominious scientist extraordinaire. His latest experiment to create an alternate dimension goes expectedly awry.

title: Departure
description:
A short mood piece about departure and new beginnings. Made for the O2A2 visual novel jam in 2020.

[From [url=https://ff80c38.itch.io/departure]itch.io[/url]]

A simple story of a date between a stone man and a galaxy girl. Nothing can possibly go wrong.

[From https://cavemanon.itch.io/a-star-in-her-eyes]
title: A Star in Her Eyes

description:
A lone wolf, leading a double life as a gas station worker and for something more criminal...
His carefully crafted life is shattered when an encounter with an ordinary customer at the gas station sparks an unexpected connection.

Will his secrets be unraveled to the world?
Join Tyoma as he struggles to navigate his sense of self and find his footing in this world.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2993690/Vs_Self/]Steam[/url]]
title: Vs. Self

description:
You are the ghost of Sammy Grainsville who died at the hands of mysterious circumstances twenty years ago and haunted the home since then, until Natasha tried to banish you ten years ago and stripped away most of your power to leave you dormant. No one else bought it during that time and you remained powerless until a new family has moved in, consisting of Hans the Husband, Marin the Wife and Elizabeth the Daughter.

That night, after moving everything in, Elizabeth decides to play with herself and her lust called to you along with the sexual frustration of Marin, awakening your from your dormant slumber. Now you need to regain your power to interact with the living world and sate the lust that haunts you even now.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1967470/Sensual_Haunting/]Steam[/url]]
title: Sensual Haunting
Wild Wet West
description:
This here is Samuel Nation, that loud, long, lean, loquacious (sometimes laconic) lunatic who loves to deal, delve, and dabble into delirious dialogues and dynamic dissertations. Or, in other words, a con man.

Yes sir, Sam here was the best, and he may not look it, but the man can sell water to a man living on a freshwater lake and turn a profit. But with his name and game sweeping through all the Southern States, Sam packed up and headed west in search of fresh victims.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1581700/]Steam[/url]]

title: Adrianne & Oliver
description:
The story of Adrianne will be touching and focused on the key decisions in her life. She could blindly chase her dreams about being a model and sacrifice everything she has in order to get it, stay in a safe relationship with her loving husband or let her heart decide what is best for her. Is she able to resist the new temptations that she will find on her way? Is her moral compass solid enough to keep her at a safe distance from the people trying to use her? Can she stay faithful to her husband or is she going to locate her emotions elsewhere? We gonna talk about feelings a lot and MISTRESS RUBY will be responsible for delivering the inspiring texts.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1968610/Adrianne_and_Oliver/]Steam[/url]]

title: Namaiki na Imouto no Ana wa Ore no Mono
aliases: Sassy Imouto's Hole Belongs To Me
description:
Little sister Erika.
Earnest personality, a good student with a clear mind.
Never had an interest in boys even though she's at that age... or so I thought!
One day I witnessed a side of Erika I've never seen before.
It was also my key to exploiting her for other things.
Erika's hot little body is mine for the taking, and the day has come to take it.

[From [url=https://www.dlsite.com/maniax-touch/work/=/product_id/RJ185147.html/?locale=en_US]DLsite English[/url]]

title: Doji na Imouto no Ana wa Ore no Mono
aliases: Clumsy Imouto's Hole Belongs To Me
description:
Little sister Hiromi.
A gentle personality in a clumsy body.

One night, after another excessive drinking session, you collapse on the street only to be rescued by an unknown canine beastman who brings you back to your own home. But through a strange twist of fate, he suddenly loses his memory!

During this process, you must coexist with him in your home and embark on an adventure to find his memories alongside other companions. However, in this tumultuous era, adventure is fraught with danger. As you help him regain his memories, your bond grows stronger, and at the same time, some hidden secrets gradually surface, making everything seem different...

Faced with these harsh realities, can you make the right choices to ensure he remains the same person, and your relationship remains unchanged?

To fulfill a promise made ten years ago and to eradicate the sins planted by her family, Hua Xi, as a freshman, entered Xi Hang High School in K City in the early autumn of September. This seemingly unremarkable school has been the site of various strange incidents. What Hua Xi couldn't have anticipated was that everyone she was looking for was in this city. The person she met because of the promise made ten years ago, the twelve immortal lonely souls condemned to eternal reincarnation due to her family's sins, and the spirits that only appear before Hua Xi at night...

The pieces on the chessboard have all fallen into place, and the hands of fate will lead Hua Xi to whose side? Will she live to save her loved ones, or will she sacrifice herself to atone for all her family's sins? Are you ready? The afternoon's drama is about to begin...[Translated from [url=https://www.douban.com/game/26526615/?from=game_subject_view_douban_game]douban[/url]]

[i]"Love conquers all"
A simple saying. If two people love each other, any obstacle can be overcome. But the question is...
How far would you both be willing to go for the sake of that love?[/i]

Vulgar Reverie is a NETORASE adult visual novel game where your wife is an ex-mafia family member who ran away with you when you confessed your love for her!

That means that, over the years, you've always been looking over your shoulder, running from your troubles and constantly living in fear of getting caught by the past she left behind.

All you've ever wanted was to be able to live your life with the one you love in peace. But as you continued to think and think, your mind warped your emotions into something else... description:

Once somewhat of a local legend in their hometown, Mallory turned down a record deal in favour of a scholarship a decade ago. To say that they felt a bit of regret would be an understatement; they spent the bulk of their university years watching their former band mates sell out shows and records, stewing in bitterness the whole time.

After several years of rejection and struggling, they've finally gotten a second chance in their grasp — only to question whether it's something they even want anymore.

description:
The "Night of Flower Crowns" is a traditional festival in Granstia, filled with romance and emotion. On this enchanting night, young women dream of meeting, arranging dates, and dancing with their beloved.
However, for Sophia of the Kusaros family - the empire's third most noble house - this ball is nothing short of a major headache.
After three years away from home searching for the truth about her past, the black-haired girl finds herself forced to temporarily abandon her original path upon returning to Granstia. Instead, she must embark on the miserable quest of "finding a suitable man and compelling him to be her dance partner for the ball"!
Well, if this is a trial set by the true god Aeno, Sophia is determined to solve this problem with dignity and then return to the path that aligns with her true intentions.
With only one month until the event, Sophia must choose from among the eligible men... Let the adventure begin!

Fed up with the Jujutsu world, you live peacefully within the safety of your clan's territory. However, your solace is interrupted when Principal Yaga asks you to mentor the strongest sorcerer of this generation, Gojo Satoru. In exchange for the Gojo clan's support, you accept the challenge and become the teacher for the 5th-year students at Jujutsu High.

As an unconventional mentor to a young man grappling with his closed-off feelings, you and Gojo find solace in each other. But the intense training causes unexpected emotions and obsessions to blossom, and you find yourself entangled in a forbidden relationship. The challenge is no longer just about mastering cursed energy; it's about mastering the heart.

Will you stay loyal to your clan's interests, or follow the path that shadows your heart? Dive into "[i]Teacher's Pet[/i]" and decide your destiny!

Misha is a beautiful, devoted catgirl whose family is deeply in debt.
She decides to sell herself as a familiar to a witch. However, having a humanoid as a familiar is illegal. This is because the contract that binds them to their witch makes them fall hopelessly in love with them, forever.
There's only one store willing to sell her: a black market shop named "WitchMatching". But the only customers willing to break the law and shop there are the four calamitous male witches the city lives in fear of.
What will become of Misha and her family? Can she find happiness, find love, even as a slave?

Perhaps it's love, perhaps it's friendship, perhaps it's loneliness... Some people may be moved to tears, while others may feel nothing at all.
The summary of the story is as follows:
Exhausted from urban life, the young man who moved to the seaside town experienced various encounters and separations in the "Tide Sound Town", which changed his heart
In this game, you can experience the protagonist's life journey.
The original author ImCyan created well-known free to play games such as the "Next Day" series that were once adapted into film and television. In this work, he carefully depicts the inner world of the characters and their connections with others.
There are no battles or puzzles in this game, so you can focus on enjoying the story. Even those who are not good at gaming can enjoy it.
Please feel the gentle and poignant story supervised and assisted by the original author.

Growing up, Leilani hasn’t found it the easiest to connect with people. After the fifth or sixth move, you kinda just….give up. A city not particularly well known for its safety, but more so one she would've preferred to continue avoiding like the plague. 

How can she even think about meeting new people when going outside may prove to be too much even for her. Those thoughts lingered on her mind as she scrolled aimlessly on her phone and there it was, another ad for that new chat site, DigiHearts. “Guess it's worth a shot” she says as she presses the install button.

"I finally finished my overtime work! "

Having finished the overtime work imposed on me by the power-harassing manager, I rewarded myself with a night out on the town. When I arrived at the hotel district and strolled around in circles...

I couldn't believe that I would see my senior in the same department in such a place. My curiosity kicked in, and I keep distance to check on Remi. After a while, someone approached her.

The person Remi was waiting for was that power-harassing department head! I took out my phone and recorded until the two disappeared into the hotel. Then, as I looked back at the footage I had taken, I began to formulate the worst possible plan.

title: Cangkong De Biduan

description:
Tsumiki Tsumi is a third-year college student in the thick of youth.

While enjoying a part-time job writing introductions for escorts—thanks to his friend Kaibashira Kai—Tsumi is having a decent time with his close friends, relishing his college days.

However, with a dating history that matches his age, Tsumi often finds himself questioning, "Is this really youth?" Despite being a virgin who believes that "my first kiss should be with the most important person," his desire for a girlfriend is growing increasingly urgent.

The Story

One ordinary day, while napping on campus, Tsumi feels a soft sensation on his lips... He wakes up to see someone rushing out of the classroom.

His first kiss has been stolen.

Flustered and distraught over the loss of something he valued so highly, Tsumi immediately sets out to find the culprit. But how should he go about it? Asking around campus, "Did you just kiss me?" feels far too embarrassing.

Determined, Tsumi decides that he must interrogate everyone he suspects. He vows, "I will definitely find the culprit." Little does he know, this decision will lead to unforeseen circumstances that will shake up his youth in ways no one could predict...

"Uh, hey? This might sound super creepy, but… did you just kiss me?"

Even though their minds and bodies have matured enough, and they are secretly aware of each other as the opposite sex. Their relationship has never developed into a male-female one.

In particular, Ui has always had feelings for Fuki, but due to her natural shyness, she has never been able to show them off. When Fuki became a university student, he finally got a girlfriend and Ui was about to give up.

However, Fuki coming back home happened to witness Ui changing clothes. Moreover, Ui accidentally witnesses her best friend having sex. Their relationship gradually changes, from the platonic and stagnant relationship they had to one where they fully become aware of one another.

Seira, begins her plan to keep her beloved Fuki with her and to keep the thieving cat, Ui, in check.

In "Harem Inspector 3: Whispers of Dreamland" you can embark on a captivating journey as a government official tasked with inspecting a majestic castle that doubles as a haven for charming courtesans. They say men are always seeking healing. 

My daily dose? Little sister Rena doing her devilishly-cute routine: "Oh big brother, I'd do [I]anything[/i] for you... even the most embarrassing things..."

Before I can process that kind of "healing," our energetic childhood friend Akiha bursts in from next door. "You two are in heat in the MORNING?! W-wait, did your sister just try to KISS you?!"

Another day, another sister-versus-childhood-friend battle. And right in the middle of it, Rena keeps flashing her panties. Some healing this is.

At school, our obviously loli student council president keeps the special treatment coming: "Oh my, you've noticed I've taken a liking to you? *giggles* How wonderful. You're just too precious~"

So that's my healing squad: one mischievous sister, one ride-or-die childhood friend, and one loli student council president. An iron-clad lineup.

And because fate has plans, enter Frederica Ahlqvist, straight from Sweden. Beautiful, blonde, curious about everything - with that soothing voice being her charm point.

Mom says I'm not much of a man if I can't get a girlfriend in this situation. After all, "romance is the ultimate healing for both men and women."

description:
This is not just a text quest, but a real journey into the depths of yourself, an atmospheric immersion in the night city, soaked with rain, melancholy and the mysterious whispering of destinies. You are not just a reader, but the creator of your own story, a composer whose decisions are the chords that form the unique melody of fate.

Imagine: outside the window the rain is pouring continuously, as if the sky is crying in unison with your soul. The drops drum on the windows of your apartment, reflecting the neon lights of the sleepless metropolis. The room is filled with semi-darkness, broken only by the flickering screen of your laptop and the warm light of the floor lamp. You're sitting on the couch, wrapped in a blanket, but the cold of loneliness creeps through the fabric, making you shiver. An undrinkable cup of tea on the coffee table, an open book forgotten halfway through..... Everything around you reminds you that you are alone. Loneliness, like a faithful dog, curled up in a ball at your feet, looking for at least a drop of your warmth. And at this moment, to the accompaniment of the rain, in your soul is born a quiet but firm: "Enough. It's time for a change."

With over 100 varieties of mind-bending puzzles and mini-games, House M.D. guarantees to entertain even the snarkiest player for hours.

Your journey begins in the Fantasy world of Grimburg, a city populated by all characters from your favorite fairy tales. Little Red Riding Hood, Snow White, Cinderella, Alice in Wonderland..................

Have you ever wondered what it would be like if you could have a romantic relationship with one of these characters?

If that is what you are looking for, then this game is for you! But of course, it won't be so dynamic. Come on, it's already 21 st century. We need a little bit of change to our fantasy characters. His target, Vladimirella Rovenvojera, seems to evade all sense of decorum—and deathblows—as she effortlessly throws out insults and attacks. Portal Trials Virtus Ascent
description:
During the Fourth Great World War between Humanity and AI, the machines won, pushing humanity to the brink of extinction. In a last-ditch effort to recover and repopulate, a surviving faction of human scientists and engineers, now extinct, used their scrambled-together technology to create a hidden, rogue AI. At regular intervals, this AI transports four individuals to a new world through the Portal Trials. These trials consist of six game-like floors, each testing a different virtue: Wisdom and Knowledge, Courage, Humanity, Justice, Temperance, and Transcendence.

Will you pass the trials and restore humanity, or will you fall and be forgotten?

She doesn't know who she is. Just her name. Luna.

She doesn't know how she ended up in the cursed lands, an area any sane person avoids.

The Hellions, a tribe of warrior women, found her in the ruins, unconscious but unharmed.

They rescued her, welcomed her into their home...and now they need her help.

Surrounded by enemies, disliked by their neighboring nobles, and targeted by their own king, the Hellions are going to need a miracle if they want to survive these times of turmoil.

Or maybe they just need the help of one woman.

Amid the devastating chaos, there were boys and girls who lost their families. They were raised like real siblings in a certain facility. But the facility, which was like their home, was shut down, and they were each separated - promising to meet again on this land. Time passed, and they reunited at the promised place, just as they had vowed. Along with the unwelcome "darkness".

The narrative explores the trials he faces as various people try to corrupt his girlfriend, the struggles of dealing with family members who don't support their relationship, and the intricacies of planning to move in together. Will their love withstand these tests? Will the temptations tear them apart or will they embrace them?

A college student named Max, returning from a camping trip, decides to visit his aunt and her daughters. The girls teach the inexperienced young man everything a real man should know. Before his eyes, an extraordinary event unfolds - a zombie apocalypse begins.

Now, Max not only has to reunite with his cousins but also survive in this world full of dangers and uncertainties. Can he find a path to salvation and discover love in this apocalyptic nightmare?

title: LustZombie

description:
Sophie has been frozen inside a crystal for two centuries. When the ice thaws, she wakes up in an unfamiliar world. Everything is frozen, including the people of the palace in which she finds herself. When she makes her way to the nearby village, people’s shocked reactions surprise her too - they call her a Hero. Legend says she sacrificed herself two centuries ago to end a terrible war, freezing the leaders of both factions along with the rest of the world. 

But is that tale all there is to the story?

What roles did Richard the Ice King and Ivan the Rebel Leader really play in Sophie’s life?

What will they do now that they have escaped their icy prison too?

Can Sophie reverse the permanent winter, or will the world be thrown into a final, destructive conflict that freezes the future forever?

title: Stellifier
description:
A media journalist, Avalon (rename-able MC), gets the chance to cover the upcoming comeback concert for the former popular idol group, Stellifier, who had disbanded after the abrupt retirement of one of their key members at the peak of their popularity. 

The idol trio, who were formerly under a popular idol machine label, announced their plans to reunite as 30-year-old idols after retaining their group name and going independent to produce new music on their own - a move which has the public wondering if they’ll be able to keep their longtime fans who never left their side while trying to capture new hearts in today’s competitive idol environment.

Looking for their opportunity to write an exclusive news scoop as the revamped Stellifier is set to re-debut at the night of their highly-anticipated concert, Avalon/MC dives into the world of idols who want to leave something everlasting upon the industry as they face against the odds.

As Luna settles into her new school and begins to make friends,her arrival would coincide with a political storm brewing on the horizon...

On one side stand the Democrats, aligned with conservative factions bent on preserving the status quo, perceiving futanari as a disruptive force.

On the opposing end, the Republican Party, once traditional but now dominated by futanari advocates, fervently pushing for expanded rights and recognition.

Who will prevail in this monumental confrontation?

Unable to abandon a young girl to the dangerous streets, Rei begrudgingly takes her in, offering her a reprieve until she gets her bearings in order.

One thing leads to another, however, Akari’s stay becomes more… permanent then he had envisioned.

The year is 2069. A nuclear attack was launched into the South China Sea declaring Southeast Asia a quarantined dead zone named “Hypoxus”.

Uninhabitable and extremely dangerous, “Hypoxus” is now home to species the human race can’t even begin to fathom.

In order to find any normalcy back in this treacherous region, missions are sent out into the sea to study any life that is able to survive the irradiated waters.

Welcome... to the Maritime Excursion.

description:
In Little Regina you play the part of Jack Jensen. He is in the City of Little Regina looking for clues that can help him locate his friend Alexandra's sister Lucy. Naturally, things never go as planned and Jack ends up living with two girls and their cat Loki. Christa a deputy sheriff and Jessie a soccer player. Soon all three get tangled in each other's messes and lives for better and worse. Nobody is perfect, be cautious with your choices. 

Be aware that in the world of Little Regina, every character is flawed, everyone makes mistakes and keeps secrets, but that is what makes life interesting for Jack and he by far has the most secrets.

title: Ace of Affection
description:
Welcome to Ace of Affection’s 10th Season, a provocative journey through love, power, and desire in a dystopian America plagued by soaring divorce rates and a desperate need for genuine connection. As a boxing prodigy on sabbatical, you're thrust into a high-stakes competition aboard the opulent Queensland, vying for four enigmatic Queens of Suits - stunningly beautiful and unfathomably wealthy women obsessed with finding their perfect match in a world of hollow connections.

This isn't just reality TV - it's a multi-million-dollar spectacle spanning private Pacific islands, where hundreds of cameras capture your every move. Daily "Cards" - challenges designed by the Queens and equally alluring VIPs - test your worth as the most desirable lover, pushing your physical, mental, and sexual boundaries. Those who fail to impress face a grim outcome: elimination, forced to satisfy the elite's darkest fantasies or worse.

Navigate a labyrinth of intrigue, uncover The Matchmaking Agency's sinister secrets, and confront society's hypocrisies. Will you dominate, striving to tame a Queen and bend her to your will? Or submit, allowing yourself to be shaped into whatever she desires?

In Ace of Affection, your choices dictate your destiny. Rise as a master or fall as a plaything in this Visual Novel game where true connection with the world's most desirable women is the ultimate prize.

[From [url=https://s1ck-games.itch.io/ace-of-affection]Itch.io[/url]]

title: A Clown's Appearance

description:
Evelyn, a renowned femme fatale model, has been leveraging her secret relationship with her boss, Mark Sar, to climb the ranks in the fashion industry. Mark's wife, Marya Sar, owns one of the largest corporate conglomerates. When she discovers her husband's affair, she fires Evelyn and ensures she is blacklisted from the fashion world.

Financially ruined and seeing her hard-earned career destroyed in a single day, Evelyn vows revenge. She turns to criminal organizations in her quest for power and fame. Utilizing her sexuality, she blackmails enemies, manipulates situations, and forges alliances, igniting a conflict that starts in the dangerous underworld, extends to the glamorous fashion world, and culminates in the corrupt realm of politics.

Many will die, and even more will be ruined as a result of the war between Marya and Evelyn. But neither will stop until they achieve total domination.

reality is shifting right in front of your eyes. you don’t know what to trust anymore. should you believe your eyes or your best friend? you don’t want to think anymore…you are starving.

description:
"The Beautiful Island" is set in a parallel history in a not-so-far future. It is set on an island, resembling the Taiwan of our own world, after a war. You can chose to either play the game after the island lost the war and got annexed by its neighbor or after it successfully defended itself.

Jan, an engineer, visits the island not long after the war ended. He tries to reconnect with people that he knew from his previous visit. He learns about their fates and how the war has changed their views on the political situation.

Will you stay neutral or will you get involved and help?
Can you change fate?
Will you form your own opinion? – Then share it with other players at the end of the game!

description:
Looking for LOVE?
Look no further than Pocket Boyfriend™! 

With Pocket Boyfriend™, you'll meet the love of your life, KIT!

KIT is the perfect man: a great listener with a big heart and, above all else, impeccably clean!

KIT is more than a bundle of code; he's your caring and attentive partner, keen to stick around until the very end.

Santiago's parents are getting a divorce, and he has difficulty coping with the change that's about to happen. In his dreams, he keeps facing that time they told him about their separation, is there something he could say or do differently to change their minds?

title: Re: Great Blues
Sanatorium
description: Visual novel Sanatorium is set in a rehabilitation center, where our protagonist, Max, is a dedicated prosthetist. Through his work, he forms deep connections with his patients and colleagues. One of the central characters you'll meet is Emily, a determined young woman who lost her leg in a motorcycle accident. Their story begins in Max's office, where Emily awaits her first consultation—a moment filled with anticipation and hope.

"On a night at the Galactic Railroad, you will catch a glimpse of the girls' hell."

The protagonist, Soratarou, waits for the usual train by the platform. Having lost the person he loves most, he wastes away his colourless days in shock. Not knowing the meaning of life, nor knowing what he's meant to do from now on...  

Normally, he would take the train at this time and go to university, but suddenly the thought of jumping off the platform crosses his mind. To die, to end everything. 

At that moment, a strangely dressed girl appears before him, as an old-fashioned train he's never seen before pulls up at the station. She extends him an invitation, 

"Come with me, let's take a journey on the Galactic Express to find the real you."

Following her invitation, Soratarou boards the train alongside that girl. 
There, he catches a glimp of the girls' hell...

[Translated from [url=https://enoshima210.work/2024/11/30/karudea/]official website[/url]]
title: Shoujo Jigoku Karudea
Boukyaku no Edicius
description:
She wants to “end” happily ever after...

Saku Koshimizu, the protagonist of this story, is a victim of power harassment and has no courage to commit suicide.

On the day he skipped work, he met a girl who calls herself Nagisa, and they went out on a one-day date.

However, Nagisa is actually an alias, and her real name is Nozomi Katsuragi.

Moreover, she jokingly confesses that she killed her parents.

In the flow of a date with many mysteries, and Saku spends the night with Nozomi.

“I was happy to be able to say I had fun at the end. I was happy to say I had a good time at the end. Goodbye" Nozomi said, then threw herself down and died.

However, the next thing he knew, Saku was standing at the same time and place where he and Nozomi were on their date. 
[From [url=https://www.dlsite.com/maniax/dlaf/=/link/work/aid/vndb/id/RJ01303557.html]DLSite[/url]]

title: Be Safe With Me
description:
Two women going on their first date together, navigating their anxieties and stresses while trying to have a fun day together.

A short sweet visual novel about queer romance.

[From [url=https://tinkering-tail-games.itch.io/be-safe-with-me]itch.io[/url]]

title: Bǐxià Nüyou
description:
I thought I would live my life in obscurity and loneliness, with nothing else to do but write.

Then one morning, someone claiming to be the heroine of my novel, Laura Grace, came to visit me and asked to stay in my house?! After a series of questions, I couldn't even find proof that she wasn't her... My ordinary life changed that morning.

We moved in together, we even started talking about writing, and with Laura's help, my writing process became smoother and smoother, bringing me closer to my dream of becoming a writer.

Things were looking good, but then strange things happened and I realized that it was not that simple. There was no such thing as free lunch, but what was the price of this...? And what was the real reason for Laura's appearance?

What would Laura Grace, a female thief from a fantasy world, steal from my life?

[From [url=https://playmeow.com/store/94]official website[/url]]

Dark days have come to the lands of the County of Fernandez: the Count is gravely ill, and his condition is being hidden from the eyes of the nobility and the common people. The Countess, lacking sufficient authority to manage the county's affairs, finds herself in an extremely difficult position. The situation is further complicated by the assassination attempt on the Countess and the kidnapping of her daughter. This forces the Countess to increase security and enlist the service of the most skilled specialists.

After many years spent in battles, Manuel Vermonda decides to renounce the sword and start a new life in seclusion, dedicating himself to drawing and reading books.

By the will of fate, Manuel receives a letter inviting him to enter the service of Countess Fernandez. After long deliberations, Manuel hears a mysterious voice promising redemption for all sins if he agrees to take on this task.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3121330/]Steam[/url]]
title: Krov' Inkvizicii
Shirokuro ~Shikijoushou no Osananajimi o Sewasuru Koto ni Natta, Kanojo ni Naisho de~
description:
You - Minagawa Tooru - are just a regular student with a bit of an otaku side. About a year ago, you started dating your girlfriend Nagisaku Shiro, who absolutely adores you, and you've been enjoying a cheerful school life together.

One day, when you thought this happy routine would go on forever, you suddenly got a request from your childhood friend Chouno Kuro, whom you had grown distant from over the years. She asked you out of the blue to have sex with her. Kuro, who is a year younger than you, was your first love, someone you had been close to since childhood. Your friendship drifted apart after she rejected your confession. 

Now, seeing her naked body, her heated breaths, and her pleading gaze made you feel a rush of emotions. Despite having Shiro as your girlfriend, you couldn’t resist that sweet temptation and ended up sleeping with Kuro. Afterward, Kuro confessed that she had become a recluse due to developing a hypersexuality after being molested. You were the only one she confided in; she hadn’t even told her parents about what happened to her. 

To help Kuro achieve her wish of overcoming her condition and being able to go back to school, you decided to support her. Kuro, struggling with her hypersexuality, gets aroused in public if she doesn’t release her urges through sex. You found yourself in a position where you had to keep having sexual encounters with her, like handling a ticking time bomb.

But you also have your adorable girlfriend Shiro, who cherishes you and always greets you with a bright smile. So, to keep Shiro’s smile from fading, you decided to take care of Kuro in secret.

[Translated from [url=https://ci-en.dlsite.com/creator/27102/article/1270301]Ci-en[/url]]

You have just moved to a new world and need to complete your citizenship process with the help of Guide, your new friend.
[Translated from [url=https://shelitzin.itch.io/este-pueblo]Itch[/url]]
title: En 'Este Pueblo'

description:
Enjoy the story that our protagonist Kate will tell you, and you, the players, will choose how it ends. 

[Translated from [url=https://nohr11037.itch.io/kate]Itch[/url]]
title: Kate
The Last Challenge
description:
In 2013, Marcus Crowley, his best friend Donnie, and 499.998 other teenagers from around the country left for a college town called Meteor Valley. One week after their departure a global pandemic breaks out named the Crown virus, and it infects the whole world. Except Meteor Valley. For some reason the virus never spread to Meteor Valley and for this reason the government decides to quarantine Meteor Valley off from the rest of the country until a vaccine is developed.

Now its 2023 and its finally time to come home. You spent the last decade stuck in Meteor Valley quarantined off from the rest of the world, and they didn’t just stop people letting in and out, they stopped everything. Imports, exports they even put-up signal jammers so there was no internet, mobile phones or any sort of communication with the rest of the world.

One day after a hard day of work and dying of boredom a bunch of you came out with the Challenges to pass the time. These were innocent and simple at first but as time has gone by, they became more extreme and even dangerous.

Unfortunately, right before leaving, your idiot best friend Donnie accepts one of these challenges from an asshole childhood friend of yours and since you know that he has it out for Donnie, you decide to take over the challenge and this is where your story begins.

[Edited from F95Zone]

title: Sakura Succubus 9
description:

This is a visual novel based on the IP of the 3 time award nominated feature film script entitled “Blade n Blood”– A Post Apocalyptic world that is a cross between Sin City and Blade Runner. It has been nominated 3 times for Best Sci Fi Feature Script at very large and respected film festivals. The film is currently being developed. This is the first of a trilogy of adult visual novels that take place about 25 years before the feature. It is the Story of Sebastian Luscious, the Great Grand Son of the Founder of the order of Jerusalem Knights and the victors of the War of Thorns. It is the road of his perdition and fall.

Now Ayumi must wake up Haruo's latent powers to save himself, but his sisters will have none of that.

You've led a normal life-until this morning, that is! You wake up to discover the world is under attack! Evil Mushroom Men from the far reaches of space have come to conquer our world! What vile plans do they have for us, pitiful mammal?

It's up to you to decide how you cope with this sudden attack by alien fungi. Choose to be a hero, a villain, or just some schmuck trying to survive and not get fried. Rescue your neighbor, or leave her to her fate. Try to escape the alien onslaught, heroically seek to end the threat they pose, or turn traitor and lead the Mushroom forces to victory.

Remember, mammal, the Fate of the World is in your hands! Dum dum dummm!!!

He meets Blake Carrington, a multi-millionaire who gives him the opportunity to work with him at Carrigton Atlantic. Throughout the trip you will have to do missions and take care of some people.
And most importantly you will be able to hang out with lots of girls.​

April will be 24 years old, remembering that in "The Lécuyer Cult" she is 31. This story focuses on her childhood and adolescence, serving as a prequel to "The Lécuyer Cult".​

Your final summer before college is coming to an end, and your stepmother Lena has invited—well, forced—you and your stepsister Alexis to join her on a camping trip as her last-ditch effort to bring the family closer together before you leave. Little do you know, both of them have secret plans in store to make this trip worth your while...

[i]A powerful director offers her the role of a lifetime, but at what cost?[/i]

Navigate the treacherous waters of the entertainment industry, where beauty opens doors, but surrender takes you to the top. Face difficult choices, explore your deepest desires, and corrupt her in the harsh realities that lie beneath the surface of fame.

Will you play by their rules and corrupt yourself to the top?

Or will you fight for your freedom and expose the truth, even if it means sacrificing everything?

All the hidden truths behind these tales are waiting for the player to uncover…

Your old friend sets you up with a job at the local inn! Here you'll make drinks, meet the townspeople and much more!

But… What are you exactly celebrating? As you try to recall what the celebration is about, you start to question why you haven’t seen your friends in so long. How did you even get to this party? 

[From [url=https://wyndei.itch.io/reunion]itch.io[/url]]

They use this magic to fight creatures of darkness that congregate in the no-man's-land between cities. Kotori Mori, a plucky new magical girl, hopes to find a job in one of the famous guilds of Larimar City. During a test for a guild, she and Brie Butternuggets (her animal familiar and friend) will meet Kaida Hikari and Gigi, who are on a mission of their own for the Songbird Guild.

When Rhem meets Luke, the chemistry is clear. But Luke is an Instagram model and Rhem refuses to be photographed. Will their relationship survive if Rhem won’t be photographed with Luke?

Live one day in the role of Max and find out what it’s like to share your life with two women who become both his support and his challenge. "Real Life Day: Threesome" is a game about love, trust, and choices that change everything.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3123630/]Steam[/url]]
title: Real life day: Threesome

description:
The lizards have kidnapped the princess, so three great heroes of ancestors must venture into the deep enemy territory. Show the tyrants that jokes with the Slavs are not tolerated and bring the captive home!
An adventure awaits you in the legendary Hyperborea. The harsh truth of human ancestors, hidden from us for centuries by Masons and historians.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2758940/]Steam[/url]]
title: Rusy Dushat Zmeja

description:
The company suddenly went bankrupt, and the male protagonist, who just got kicked out of his dormitory and ended up on the streets, was picked up by the female protagonist, who had run away from home and started to work at a well-known international restaurant chain where the male protagonist intended to stay the night.

Thus began their joint-rent life.

They began to live under the same roof, awkwardly supporting each other to get through tough times…

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2688380]Steam[/url]]
title: Dongbei Zaitao Qingnian

description:
Alex, an upcoming freshmen college student, embarks on his journey to university life. He lives with his widowed dad, who has been his support of strength since Alex's mother passed away due to her illness. When he was just 15. This tragic loss left Alex struggling with depression and anxiety, shaping his emotional landscape.

Now, as Alex prepares to enroll in higher education, his father has made plans for him to stay and live with Laura, a close friend of his late mother. Laura, a divorce woman, carries the scars of a traumatic past marked from her abusive ex-husband.

As In university, Alex will meet a lot of people with different stories and different challenges. While focusing on his studies, he also faces his own problems like mental health, needing help and seeking support from others. His choices will affect everyone around him, shaping his relationships and experiences.

As Alex steps into this new chapter, he will struggles with grief, resilience, and human connection. He's about to learn how compassion and understanding can change lives, even in tough times.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2879670/All_the_Darkest_Places/]Steam[/url]]
title: All the Darkest Places
Roll of Fate
description: Participate in a mysterious show, taking place far from civilization. The visual novel Roll of Fate gives you the opportunity to make decisions that affect the lives of the other show participants. Don’t try to save everyone – there’s no guarantee you can even save yourself.

title: This Superficial World
description:
A girl wakes up in a world where all living things have disappeared except for her.

[From [url=https://kastelpls.itch.io/superficial]itch.io[/url]]

title: Echoes of the Emergent
description:
In this Playdate-exclusive kinetic visual novel from the creators of Bloom, embark on a personal journey through a shattered post-apocalyptic world, where your pursuit for answers unveils the remnants of both a forgotten past and uncertain prospects for the future.

As Ayumi, confront fears, navigate the delicate balance between hope and despair, and immerse yourself in a captivating narrative that resonates with echoes of both resilience and vulnerability.

From [[url=https://play.date/games/echoes-of-emergent/]Playdate Catalog[/url]]

title: Where Flowers Won't Bloom -DEMO-
description: The story features an unnamed protagonist as they find themselves in a mysterious alternate world. Familiar faces provide comfort, but why are these strangers masquerading as dear friends?

title: Virtual'naja ljubov'
description:
In a futuristic world where people can freely change their appearance, Keito is a typical representative of his generation. He shows a tendency towards superficial connections in virtual spaces. One day, his life is disrupted by Ayana — a new student with a natural, unaltered appearance, who awakens unfamiliar, thrilling feelings in Keito.

Keito gradually realises that Ayana is actually an experimental model of an anthropomorphic robot, whose consciousness resides in a world created by a supercomputer. A deep emotional bond forms between them, but for their romantic relationship to develop, they must accept the terms of a user agreement.

These arrangements involve transferring Keito's human body to Ayana's creator in exchange for eternal life with his beloved in the virtual world. Their fantastical love story unfolds against the backdrop of incredible scientific and technological progress, forcing the characters to make a difficult moral choice between love and hidden desires.

Daddy, Say My Name is an erotic linear visual novel that goes where very few other games have gone before. It follows Zeke, a rat programmer who loves DILFs more than anything else. 

One day, after his friend drags him to a nearby bar, he meets Ron, the hottest and sweetest fellow rat he's ever met. They hit it off immediately and their love grows intense. Unfortunately for them, an awful secret will reveal itself to them and shatter their worlds. Will their love keep them together or will things crumble for these two rodents?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3145550/Daddy_Say_My_Name_Demo/]Steam[/url]]
title: Daddy, Say My Name
Bunny Alice in Wonderland
description:
You are a cute little rabbit named Alice.
One day, you accidentally fell into a tree hole and found yourself in Wonderland, transforming into an adorable bunny-eared girl.

During your journey, you will meet another bunny girl who has lost her colors and a mischievous Cheshire Cat.
Together, you embark on an adventure to find the lost colors.

On this fantastical journey, you will use your extraordinary observation skills and, along with your companions, overcome all obstacles and challenges, bravely moving forward!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2066230/Bunny_Alice_in_Wonderland/]Steam[/url]]

Anaïs, a porn influencer, plunges into a whirlwind of sensations that defy her understanding and awaken her deepest anxieties. Unable to escape the clutches of her agoraphobia, insomnia becomes her constant companion, fueling her relentless pursuit of carnal satisfaction.

The reasons behind this disorder remain shrouded in mystery, but her condition serves only to exacerbate her nymphomaniacal instincts. Though she occasionally attempts to leave her claustrophobic apartment, agoraphobia holds her in its relentless grip, like an invisible prison, limiting her movements and her freedom.

However, an occasional lover, perhaps driven by a mixture of desire and compassion, emerges in her tumultuous life. After a night of fiery passion, he offers her a mysterious vape liquid, a desperate attempt to bring some relief to her restless mind.

Anaïs accepts the offer, desperate for a glimpse of sleep, even if temporary. The nicsalt liquid calms her anxieties, plunging her into a deep sleep, where she finally finds refuge from the storms of her troubled mind.

However, upon awakening, Anaïs is thrust into a world that defies all notions of reality. A haze of eroticism permeates the air, distorting the boundaries between dream and wakefulness. It's as if she has been torn from an erotic dream and thrust into a reality where the most intimate desires are brought to life with surreal intensity.

She finds herself trapped in a whirlwind of temptation and pleasure, where each step sinks her deeper into a labyrinth of lust and seduction. The line between what is real and what is imaginary fades, leaving her questioning her own sanity.

Was the liquid she consumed a drug? Or has she been transported to a parallel world, where darkest desires come to life? Or even more disturbing, is all this intrinsically linked to her agoraphobia, a grotesque manifestation of her deepest fears?

She struggles to find answers as she is dragged into a twisted world, where desire reigns supreme and reality dissolves into a sea of lust and pleasure. Though captivated by this forbidden world, a sense of impending danger haunts her, urging her to desperately seek an escape route.

Now, Anaïs is faced with a harrowing dilemma: to remain in this world of illusory pleasure or to fight to find her way back to reality, where the shadows of her agoraphobia continue to haunt her.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2925680/]Steam[/url]]
title: SPERM INTO LABIA
Spirit Harem
description:
You suddenly wake up in a new world where the spirits of all living things reside and they're cute girls for some reason?!?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2918890/]Steam[/url]]

title: Samantha and the Pieces of a Heart
description:
Samantha and the Pieces of a Heart follows the journey of little Samantha, a girl without a heart.

As a "heartless girl," Samantha is on a quest to find the seven pieces of a heart so that she may have her own. Samantha will meet many people from all walks of life in her journey and at the end of it all, she will discover just where the heart truly exists.

This is a children's story that is meant to be enjoyed by kids and adults alike. You can read the text version of this story [url=https://web.archive.org/web/20230218110535/http://www.jaded-perspectives.com/2017/07/samantha-and-pieces-of-heart-chapter-1.html]right here.[/url]

[From [url=https://web.archive.org/web/20230326054425/http://www.jaded-perspectives.com/2017/09/samantha-and-pieces-of-heart-visual.html]Jaded Perspectives[/url]]

James is sharp, adept, and not afraid to take chances - at least in his professional life. His personal life, by contrast, is nothing to write home about. It goes back 10 years to a formative experience that he's never quite recovered from. Sometimes your friends can be your worst enemies...at least that's what James took away from that jarring event.

So he poured himself into his work and did what he does best, soaring to stratospheric heights in his 9-to-5 at a local software company. He excels, but cannot shake the nagging thought that there is something missing from his life. He's a loner, and any friends he has these days are either at work, or of the online variety.

But that's about to change. A chance encounter while attending a work function sends James down a dizzying new path he'd never thought possible. It all comes to a head when James embarks on his own, personal City Park Play Date.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3002920/]Steam[/url]]
title: City Park Play Date
Mononoke Chigiri
description: After one thousand years, the great yokai “Bakaneko,” who was sealed away by the protagonist’s ancestor Abe no Seimei, begins the process of resurfacing in the world once again. The protagonist, an onmyoji, confronts the Great Yokai alongside the yokai that appear before her…

You'll take on the role of Avar, an ambitious young man who inherits his uncle's celebrity agency.

Avar is an arrogant and rather surly man, and so he has decided to get rid of all the former talents from his uncle's agency, in order to devote himself to the career of Morgane, a family friend who will become his girlfriend in spite of himself, his sister Anna, and childhood friend Elaine.

The aim of the game is, among other things, to develop the careers of your talents while managing your relationships with your sisters and your girlfriend.

[Edited from [url=https://vraiebullebleue.itch.io/e-thots]Itch.io[/url]]
title: E-THOTS

Follow the romantic lives of various characters, some of whom are just starting out in the world of love, others who are hiding secrets they wouldn't want their friends to know about and others who just like to have fun.

[From F95Zone]

title: SEX Massage 2 🔞

You’re playing as a determined owner of a massage business on the brink of closure. You have to make the most out of your management, client service, communication and creativity skills to successfully navigate the struggles of daily operations while forming some meaningful connections with your clients and staff - keeping the business is easier said than done.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3066910/]Steam[/url]]

Your decisions will lead you to one of 20 different Demons, each with unique abilities.

[From [url=https://psyckomeico.itch.io/how-to-summon-a-demon]itch.io[/url]]
title: How to summon a Demon

description:
Attention, question

What happens if two teachers from a Karelian college decide to make a jam game in eight days and lose two artists?

That's right, the circus.
so you will play in the circus.

In the Courier, you will accompany the director of the immortal troupe on his journey to Toronto and take a different look at a variety of things. The Euphrates forbade us to speak any more. It's better to play and find out for yourself.
title: Courier

description: Hi! How are you doing? I hope you're not passing by... You know, I'm all alone. They left me. And now I'm lying in the toilet. It's so nice, I don't even want to leave. But the blood coming out of the rusty tap is getting a bit annoying. Would you like to keep me company? There's not much time left.
title: Skrepljonnye krov'ju

description:
It is the first year of the Genji era. A period of disorder that led to the downfall of the Edo shogunate.

The protagonist, born in the Aizu provincial family of samurai, lost her elder brother to war, and became orphaned at the age of sixteen.

Engulfed in sadness, she fell asleep one night whilst hugging the blade her brother disemboweled himself with.

Suddenly, a deity calling itself Byakko appeared in her dreams—

Byakko informed her that Aizu will eventually lose the war, and bestowed upon her a single mission:

"With this gun, please prevent the 'Tragedy of the Youth' from ever taking place.
If you are able to accomplish this, I shall grant any wish of yours on the following dawn."

When she awoke, her brother's blade had changed into a gun—

Three years later, the protagonist, who had become an expert in artillery, was led to meet with her comrades-in-arms, whom she will share her fate with.

Will the ending they reach be one of tragedy, glory, or perhaps...

—This is a story of the fight against a tragic history.

[Translated from the [url=https://www.otomate.jp/byakko/story/]official website[/url]]
title: BYAKKO ~Shijin Butai Enrenki~
Above the Law
description:
Ty and his sister Taylor are transported by a mysterious event into a world of super cops, sexy spies and an gorgeous ninja assassins battle for the control of the city of Ironhaven. Ty is recruited by the chief of police to find the only person who can send them back to their world: Doctor Tomiko Shibuya.​

[From F95Zone]

title: Shiritsu Burusera Onna Gakuen ~Joshi *nama no Naka ni Dopyudopyu!~
Isekai Paradise
description:
Just after graduating college, your life wasn’t going so great... No job, no prospects, and then... a truck. Yep, you die in a car accident by a truck-kun. But instead of staying dead, you wake up in Evenralm, a fantasy world full of magic, monsters, and adventures just like manga or anime.

With a new lease on life, you’re ready to chase your wildest dream: becoming the Harem King and taking down the Demon Lord! Along the way, you’ll gather a diverse group of amazing women from all corners of Evenralm... Humans, elves, demons,  dragons, and more to join you on your lewd adventure.

[From [url=https://soultice.itch.io/isekaiparadise]Itch.io[/url]]

The game follows the story of Grant, a boy who suffered from a disease that almost killed him, but after a secret experiment, he was saved... Now that he has a second chance, he's going to live more intensely, and everything changes when he starts to feel different and unique sensations that he's never felt before, because he loves reading books, he tries to understand himself through books, and this shapes his personality and his actions... He is a very curious boy whose hobby is to investigate mysteries, and luckily or unluckily for him, his family is full of mysteries.

[From [url=https://m-rabbit.itch.io/family-mysteries]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Family Mysteries
