Fan disc of Doko e Iku no, Ano Hi.
It contains mini scenario, mini games, wallpapers, op/ed movie, system voices, etc.
title: Doko e Iku no, Ano Hi - Okaeshi Disc
Wo yu Tamen de Daxue Huaxiang

description:
Stuck in a blue-tinted sparse room, no visible way in or out. A place where your very existence is slipping away into the darkness.

Armed with only your mind, seemingly detached from the common sense of time and space - find an escape.

[From [url=https://reteryisk.itch.io/after-millennium]itch.io[/url]]
title: After Millennium

description:
Cyclestance is an anti-romance micro visual novel about cycling the past to prevent yourself from making a colossal mistake. Can you actually prevent it, though?

[From [url=https://radiokiro.itch.io/cyclestance]Itch.io[/url]]
title: cyclestance
Iftar for Two
description:
Iftar for Two is a very short kinetic novel made for Ramadan game Jam 2024. It features two former friends who decide to have iftar together and talk about bits about this and that.

[Edited from [url=https://radiokiro.itch.io/iftar-for-two]Itch.io[/url]]

A long-dead ghost wanders a college town. He knows almost nothing: not how he died, not what his life was like, not even his own name. The one memory fragment he has is a vision of another man's face.

In the ten years since he died, he hasn't seen that man even once.

Until one day, as alumni flow back onto campus for a class reunion, he sees someone starkly familiar...

[From [url=https://natashaluna.itch.io/our-haunt]itch.io[/url]]
title: Our Haunt

description:
The man you love was ripped from your arms, gone too soon, but the world has a funny way of giving second chances. 

Memento mori, memento amore.

A short visual novel dealing with love, loss, second chances, and the mystery of the universe. 

[From [url=https://lunamakaio.itch.io/mementomori]itch.io[/url]]
title: MEMENTO MORI: love, loss, romance

description:
At first glance, Kaja and Tara have everything: fame, fortune, and, well, each other. But when the cameras stop following and the spotlights turn off, all the glamour disappears, leaving dread and questions behind.

Should they be where they are right now?

[From [url=https://naarel.itch.io/all-of-us-flames]itch.io[/url]]
title: All of us Flames
In this life
description:
Angsty short story about two men tackling change in their relationship. Vampires are involved.

[From [url=https://teletuu.itch.io/in-this-life]itch.io[/url]]

title: Starlit Regrets
description:
Your partner gets injured in a fight but you manage to find his brother's home. You'll be safe here until he recovers. Until then, just relax and reminisce.

[From [url=https://crystalgameworks.itch.io/starlit-regrets]itch.io[/url]]

Elliot is a troubled boy with a troubled mind, desperately clinging to the world around him. What would happen if his reality were called into question? Where do lies begin and end? Learn the different truths at play over the multiple endings the game has to offer.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3108060]Steam[/url]]
title: My Dear Delirium
In her head
description: "In Her Head" - a captivating visual novel that offers players a unique glimpse into the daily struggles of the main character with social anxiety. Immerse yourself in her inner world, where anxiety, procrastination, and unease are constant companions. In this visual novel, you will experience several days in her life, with the central challenge being a single task — making a phone call to schedule a haircut. But what is it like when every call feels like a trial? Help her overcome her fears and take this step.

You're entirely alone-- until you're not. Entirely out of place, entirely by surprise, a mysterious person appears in your apartment. The first person that you've seen in years-- and then they're gone again, just as quickly. It's undeniable that something is changing, and that is has to with this stranger--

And something tells you that you'll see them again.

[From [url=https://shewassaying.itch.io/under-your-moon]itch.io[/url]]
title: Under Your Moon

description:
On August 19th, 1988, you marched from your grave to the front steps of what used to be your home.

On September 5th, 1988, you will leave our home again to die your second death.

[From [url=https://skyshard.itch.io/a-house-of-endless-windows]itch.io[/url]]
title: A House of Endless Windows

description:
Sena Auriya isn't an ordinary challenge-loving student. Aside from having blessed with physics-based superpowers, she's capable of eating a whole horse if she really tries. Or so she thought. 

Faced with a great challenge ahead of her, she was determined to get the bear plush for her partner, Kayne. Although it appears that she's not strong enough yet, so she asks for assistance from her fellow science-power-havers. Will she end up victorious?

[From [url=https://radiokiro.itch.io/tbhbbc]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Defeat The Black Hole Beef Bowl Challenge!!

description:
Follow the story of a young teenager who feels uncomfortable in her body as she's discovering her transidentity. Unfortunately, her parents are rather hostile to these changes... Help her survive family dinners, and console her in her bedroom!

[From [url=https://brume-ink.itch.io/cohabitation]itch.io[/url]]
title: Cohabitation

description:
Meet Andrea, a talented young pianist who wants to pursue her dreams. But today, Andrea has every reason to stress! With this audition, it's her future that's about to change. Help her keep her composure and push herself to the max, and wow the jury ! 

[From [url=https://brume-ink.itch.io/rhythmic-confessions]itch.io[/url]]
title: Rhythmic Confessions
under the lighthouse
description:
In the middle of a stormy night, Liv reunites with an old friend.

[From [url=https://rombuffer.itch.io/lighthouse]itch.io[/url]]

title: The Butterfly Dreams
description:
Asynthesis is proud to unveil their latest innovation in gaming technology: Fantasia.
A whole-consciousness immersion that doesn't just bring you the game, but bring you INTO the game.

A group of seven distinguished luminaries from various fields have been invited by the CEO of Asynthesis to try this highly confidential technology for themselves. But they're not there simply to play. They're there to create. Create whole worlds, whole universes indistinguishable from the real world, limited only by their imagination.

When the world's geniuses are given free rein to make their own realities, what could possibly go wrong?

[From [url=https://avenueq.itch.io/the-butterfly-dreams]itch.io[/url]]
The protagonist turns into a monster at night and must hunt virgins for survival.
title: Sailor Fuku Senki

description:
Students of a prestigious Hillview academy live normal school life: they go to classes and to the parties, fall in and out of love, date and break up. But everything changes when a student Amanda Murphy disappears without a trace right in the middle of a high school party.

Chloe Green, Amanda’s best friend, starts her own investigation. To find out what happened to Amanda she will have to uncover her classmates’ dirty secrets. But, most importantly, she will have to face the truth about herself...

[From [url=https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.scylax_games.disobedient]Google Play[/url]]
title: Neposlushnye

description: Possessed by an evil voice, a teen comes to a spiritual retreat camp. Aided by a fortune-telling computer the kid bonds with fellow troubled teens, confronts inner demons, and solves an occult mystery
title: Devil's Terminal
Yuusha-sama...♥ Watashi to H Shimasen ka? ~Hime-sama to H o Shinai to Derarenai Dungeon ni Tojikomerareta Ken ni Tsuite~

description: A short ToHeart2 horror visual novel released in 2005. It was made based off the rise in edits of Yuzuhara Konomi as a yandere which became popular at the time
title: Konomi no Naku Koro ni

description:
When you finally quit your dead-end job and move back to your mother's house in the ever-peaceful town of Faybourne, you think things could only get better. However, the moment you set foot in your childhood home, a harrowing nightmare long forgotten appears to haunt you once more. 

A tower that crumbles in the vastness of a bleeding sky. A voice that mourns and yearns for something.

Torn away from your peaceful life and thrown into a world of danger and deceit, you are at the mercy of the Seven Sovereigns of Limbo. Navigate the Realm Between as it faces an impending cataclysm that threatens to swallow you and those you love whole.

As the consequences of a plan set in motion long ago start to unveil, will love be the key to your freedom, or the first chapter of your downfall?

[From [url=https://ravenstar-games.itch.io/lost-in-limbo]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Lost in Limbo

description:
Having been curious for a long time, and being an introvert, you finally decide to engage a Futanari Escort. She's the whole package 🍆 and very professional. For extra discretion you rent out a hotel room and set the date.

Once the lovely Beatrice steps through the door you find it all too real, and second thoughts set in.

Are you ready to be this vulnerable? 🍑

[From [url=https://owlyboi.itch.io/i-got-pegged-by-a-futanari]Itch.io[/url]]
title: I got PEGGED by a FUTANARI

description:
Max, Lexa, & Nyx are three trans friends who want trans rights to progress already. On one of their weekly walks in the local park, a time traveler lets slip that the progress they seek is in the future.

[From [url=https://norbez.itch.io/running-into-a-trans-time-nomad]itch.io[/url]]
title: Running Into A Trans Time Nomad?!
It's My Party
description:
Molly comes home, hoping to relax after a long day of running errands. But she finds that her house isn't as empty as she left it this morning. Why are these strangers throwing her a birthday party and what is it that they want from her?

[From [url=https://plagueofcrows.itch.io/its-my-party]itch.io[/url]]

A short novel about travelling by train. Become the one who (not)helps three girls to get to the final destination at the sea.

Each of us strives to reach the right station, but sometimes it's better for life to get off early. Talk to your fellow travelers, make choices and decide if the girls should get off the train.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3167750/]Steam[/url]]
title: Sumerechnyj Ekspress

description:
It’s your big day, but should you be here ?

A visualnovelas for all audiences full of clichés, caricatural characters, and love.

[From [url=https://seb46.itch.io/a-peaceful-wedding]itch.io[/url]]
title: Un mariage tranquille
Only When You Sleep
description:
The Crooked Man and your close friend are in danger and a mysterious mythic has taken notice of you...or more importantly, in your dreams. 

Join the familiar of the Bamboo Witch, a dream-eating Baku called Akimitsu, as you journey into the sleeping world together. 

You find yourself back in the Neverplace. This is a tale of 'what ifs?'. The question is simple...is this your dream...or is it your nightmare?

[From [url=https://seraten04.itch.io/only-when-you-sleep]itch.io[/url]]

Kakegurui HE is a fan-made game based on the anime, recreating the gambling scenes seen in the series.

[From [url=https://quun.itch.io/kakegurui-he-003]itch.io[/url]]
title: Kakegurui H.E.
Seijo to Yami no Shokushu refine

aliases: The Consequences of Being Caught Jacking Off By My Bitch Gal Imouto
title: Bitch na Gyaru no Imouto ni Onanii o Mirareta Kekka www

description:
"Is it better to dance or to die. Is it better to run or to lie?"

A spin on the story of Swan Lake, from the unique perspective of a Black Swan cursed to hunger for all that is not meant for her. Play as Odile, Sister of Rothbart, and experience her conflict of self in the midst of this classic ballet fairytale.

A tale of brood parasitism.

One must wonder, when the cuckoo chick hatches, does it see the face of its mother, or the face of its prey? Do its flailing legs act out of muscle memory, pushing its "siblings" to their deaths in a fit of restless sleep?

Does the chick take simply to take, or take out of fear that it will be given nothing otherwise? Is its hunger so all-encompassing?

Knowledge. Fear. Action.

Hunger.

...

Perhaps that is what makes a cuckoo.

[From [url=https://lemonink.itch.io/cuckoo]itch.io[/url]]
title: Flight of the Cuckoo

description:
The "Come Right Inn" is a luxurious 5-star hotel in the heart of LA, where the unspoken dress code is long legs, tanned skin, and no shame. This hotspot attracts the elite, accustomed to a lifestyle where every desire is effortlessly fulfilled—for the right price. But what secrets are hidden behind this glamorous facade?

Your sister worked at this hotel. Six months ago, she vanished in LA—or so the official story goes. How far would you go to find the truth?

[from [url=https://fxls.itch.io/come-right-inn]itch.io[/url]]
title: Come Right Inn
WGV: Dreamcatcher
description:
A fanmade visual novel game by Virtual 48Group fans for Virtual 48Group fans, which tells multiple-fanmade-stories about a group of sophisticated 48 Vtuber Idol from Jakarta, Indonesia. You play as a 1st year student where you will interact with friends through multi-ended choice-based storyline.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3037900/]Steam[/url]]

[i]I bump into her on my way home.

I don't recognise her.

So why does she claim she knows me?[/i]

Sorry Do I Know You? is a psychological horror game about navigating a conversation with a woman who seems to know who you are, even if you don't.

[From [url=https://drazillion.itch.io/sorry-do-i-know-you]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Sorry Do I Know You?
Zettai Dorei Kanojo Approach I Densha Onna
Zettai Dorei Kanojo Approach II Mothercon Boy
Witch Was Lost (And Has Been Found)
description:
[i]You are a witch.

You run a tavern with your loyal cat companion.

You are happy.

Or at least you thought you were.[/i]

Witch Was Lost (And Has Been Found) is a game about being aroace, found family and confronting those who've hurt you.

[Edited from [url=https://drazillion.itch.io/witch-was-lost-and-has-been-found]Itch.io[/url]]

A bolt of electricity…

Flesh rapidly healing itself…

Eliza didn’t know what to expect from her date with Princeton, but it certainly wasn't finding out that extraordinary powers exist.

Now Leviare Pharmaceuticals has brought her into their conspiracy, and escaping them is more complicated than just getting out of a building.

But she’s not alone. There’s Princeton, the man who got her into this whole mess. Louise, a woman who seems unfazed by it all. And Brooke, a woman who riles Eliza up more ways than one…

They all have secrets they’re not telling. 

Can Eliza trust any of them to help destroy the conspiracy?

[From [url=https://drazillion.itch.io/a-matter-of-dosage]Itch.io[/url]]
title: A Matter Of Dosage

description:
Hailey is a biochem major who volunteers as a makeup artist for college productions. She has a crush on one of the actors, Shana. Unfortunately, Shana has been giving her mixed signals at best. Is Hailey missing something?

Shana is a lit major who loves doing theater. She always participates as an actor in her college's productions. She has autism, and because of that she hasn't even realised Hailey has been flirting with her this whole time. 

[From [url=https://drazillion.itch.io/i-dont-have-a-cue]Itch.io[/url]]
title: I Don't Have A Cue!

description:
This is a Story of "Love"
One day, Hitomi Tadehara, the best friend of Ichika Shinonome, committed suicide right before her eyes.
"I'm sorry for hurting you so much, Ichika-chan."
"If I could start over with you, I'd like to have a normal romance this time."
Though Hitomi should have taken her own life, one day she naturally reappeared in front of Ichika.
From that day on, Ichika began to be consumed by Hitomi's twisted affection.
Classmates who interfered with Ichika's love were killed by Hitomi, and Ichika herself was gradually tainted by Hitomi's warped desires.
Can Ichika accept Hitomi's love?

[From [url=https://akatsukimeu.itch.io/lilyvaganza]itch.io[/url]]
title: Kimi to Kanojo no LILYVAGANZA
Miss Concepcion's Mysteries and Rumors
description:
You follow a nosy school girl named Maria who enrolled to an all-girls boarding school named Our Lady School. She was brought in by the missing student case, a controversy turned urban legend. After diving deeper to the mystery, you learn more about the school's darker secret and how it affected the girls you meet along the way.

[From [url=https://shrimpone.itch.io/miss-concepcions-mysteries-and-rumors]itch.io[/url]]

title: Lazaret Doktora Kindervuda
description:
An epidemic of flower disease destroys a prosperous village, and the only survivor is the son of a tailor and a witch doctor. His days are numbered: the first symptoms of the incurable disease have manifested themselves, and all the doors of the kingdom are closing in front of the boy. All but one.

The unsociable owner of the fading estate, who hides his face under a sinister mask, gives the emaciated traveler refuge among other unusual guests. A circus acrobat, two highway thugs, and a noble knight and his arrogant young master share a common misfortune: they are living out their last days here, hoping for a miraculous rescue. And the owner of the estate turns out to be a skillful healer, whose methods are not approved by either the church or the medical community.

The hero becomes a pawn in Dr. Kinderwood's chess game with death. A pawn that can turn into any piece.

title: Boku o Hottokenai Futari no Gyaru ~Inkya no Otaku ga Muchimuchi Do Sukebe Gyaru to Ero Sanmai no Hibi o Okuru made~
description:
I am the air in the class, that's me.

I understand that I am what is called a “otaku” so I try to keep my presence out of sight and avoid being seen in a bad light.

I was not happy, but I was not bullied either, and I lived my days peacefully. I thought that would probably continue until graduation. 

“Hey, are you happy to be alive?”

My life was about to change when a gal in my class suddenly started to tease me.

[From the [url=http://www.waffle1999.com/game/105gyaru/#story]official site[/url]]

A strange coffin-like device sits in an empty room, containing a girl with green hair. She emerges from it unaware of anything aside from her name, Susan. To learn about herself and what’s going on at this strange facility, she'll have to leave - but things aren’t that simple. The facility is under attack, and it will take everything she has to make it out alive.

Artificial Nexus is a hybrid point-and-click/visual novel. You will solve puzzles and make choices in order to proceed and uncover the mysteries before you. Will you be able to escape from this mysterious building? And more importantly, will you be able to discover who Susan is, and what she's doing here?

[From [url=https://toomanyteeth.net/games]official website[/url]]
title: Artificial Nexus
This Is Not Your House
description:
You will take on the role of Roger; an elderly widower returning home from an afternoon of errands; only to discover his locks have been changed, and someone else is living in his house.

Take Your House Back, or let the intruder keep it and find another way to survive without your most basic need, SHELTER.

Crush someone's skull, Suffer from Hypothermia, Transcend your Mortal Frame, Find all 10 Endings. GET YOUR HOUSE BACK.

[From [url=https://trasheyes.itch.io/this-is-not-your-house]itch.io[/url]]

You aren't supposed to be here.

The pursuit of happiness has led you nowhere. And yet here you are, in Hell. A short visual novel about being sent back to the living realm whether you like it or not.

[From [url=https://vanillailla.itch.io/my-escape-to-hell]itch.io[/url]]
title: My Escape to Hell
Unluckily in Love: Fragments of Love
description:
Yuel’s life was miserable. Though born into a wealthy family, Yuel’s parents divorced when he was young and his father was cold and callous. Desperate to earn his father’s affection (or, failing that, his approval), Yuel worked hard at university, studying for a degree he wasn’t truly interested in…

Until his father’s sudden death puts a wrench in Yuel’s plans.

Feeling lost and bereft, Yuel seeks help from his older cousin, Tavi, who agrees to take Yuel in while he’s coming to terms with his father’s death. This was only ever supposed to be a temporary arrangement, but feelings begin to grow between the two that are more than just familial.

Now, with his father’s funeral behind him and a hefty inheritance he’s set to earn, Yuel must try to muddle along as best he can while living with Tavi.

It’ll be a while until Yuel comes into his father’s money, so until then, the two need to stay afloat as best they can, all while trying to maintain their unusual relationship. Will they be able to succeed, or will it end in disaster?

[From [url=https://ebihime.itch.io/unluckily-in-love-fragments-of-love]itch.io[/url]]

A city of snow, hearts forged in steel. Doctor Imani Ward carries the scars of a war long ended, and our own burdens as we move forward.  With the Doctor's help mending the wounds of others, both in body and mind, our pasts begin to bind us together, memories echoing into the future ahead.

Assist your patients, as you've done throughout your career — the days carrying on, one after the next.  Provide aid to those in need, forging your bonds with those still here.  Your job is not yet over, your mission still unaccomplished.

[From [url=https://watercress.itch.io/whenthewarwashome]Itch.io[/url]]
title: When the War was Home

description:
GO BACK is an interactive visual novel that will take you through a day in the life of a troubled magic student while you try to guide them away from what seems to be certain doom.

[From [url=https://captoring.gumroad.com/l/BHkR?layout=profile]Gumroad[/url]]
title: Go Back
Open Love Surgery
description:
You've been awfully sick recently...  so you call up your local Doctor....

But he's a lot more... 'morally questionable' than expected...

Will you warm the heart of the charismatic, outlandish malpractice Doctor Medikua? Or succumb to his strange and elaborate surgical practices?!

Or BOTH!?

[From [url=https://fubarashow.itch.io/open-love-surgery]itch.io[/url]]

It's just another day at the office. An irritable boss, overbearing coworkers, and a pile full of papers on your desk. How could this day get any worse?!

[From [url=https://scriptfinch.itch.io/carcinogen]itch.io[/url]]
title: Carcinogen
in the sillage lies your image
description:
On your last legs of life, you decide to go to your friend's house. "Than" has always had your back. He was your best friend, after all. But you're sick of the hospital being your second home, of seeing the nurses sympathetic faces.

So here you are, lying in his bed and wanting to take a nap and maybe talk to your best friend before you take your last breath.

You're dying and you know it (and so does your best friend Than).

[From [url=https://rice373.itch.io/in-the-sillage-lies-your-image]itch.io[/url]]

title: Chotto Namaiki na Toilet no Hanako-san ~Ecchi Gakuen no Obake to Ero Ero Sakusei Seikatsu~
description:
The protagonist, a teacher at a small academy, is approached by a gossip-loving female student who brings up an eerie story.

“Hey, hey? Teacher, have you heard about Hanako-san of the toilet?”

“Actually, this story might not just be a rumor. I’ve heard that Hanako-san recently appeared at this academy.”

When the protagonist dismisses it as just an urban legend, the student gets upset.

After finishing the day’s work, the protagonist looks at the clock, noticing that it’s already pitch dark outside. As they quickly finish patrolling and prepare to go home, they hear a girl’s voice…

The protagonist suddenly remembers the story about Hanako-san they heard during the day.

That’s ridiculous. But maybe it’s not a ghost—perhaps there’s a suspicious person lurking around, targeting the students. That would be a real problem!

Rushing toward the source of the voice, the protagonist finds themselves standing in front of the rumored toilet. Wishing for it to be a suspicious person rather than a ghost, they reach for the doorknob, only to find it locked.

As they jingle the doorknob, trying to open it, the door suddenly swings open with force, knocking the protagonist down onto their backside.

title: Divine Dawn
description: As an aspiring hero, you stumble into an ancient prison and release an angel imprisoned in a previous age. Having freed the angel, you join her on a journey to discover her place in a world which has long since concluded the war she was meant to fight. To her dismay, you are joined by two of her demonic guards, also trying to adapt to the modern world, and an eclectic group of others.

title: High Times
description:
Manage your own donut café in High Times, and help customers escape from their problems by serving special donuts that affect their emotions. Sometimes they don't know what they want, so listen to their stories, offer them advice in the form of donuts, and mend broken relationships.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2251220/High_Times__DatingCooking_Sim/]Steam[/url]]

title: Kuro Bitch Gyaru ga Taiiku Kyoushi ni Hame Ochiru Made ~Tsui Piece Tanetsuke Iki Kurui~

description:
Captain Ambrose was one of the most widely known pirates across the seas. His fame comes from his journey through forgotten islands, cursed waters, and a streak of ruthlessness. When his ship is spotted off the coast, it's no surprise the Spanish guard sent it straight to its water graves and set out to find and arrest the man whose caused them so much trouble.

But Matheo finds him, and offers to hide him until he can get him safe passage off the island. For a price, of course. Matheo wants to know about the truth behind the tale of Captain Amborse and the siren he met once, years ago. For such a simple request, the Captain seems reluctant to answer it. But Matheo's sure the Captain will talk. He has to.

Because Matheo shouldn't be on this island, and the story of the siren is the answer as to why.

[From [url=https://heartsyncproductions.itch.io/whereseafoamfades]itch.io[/url]]
title: Where Sea Foam Fades

description:
A gay romantic comedy visual novel, where you select between two couples:

ROUTE A: Married couple Zal and Miike finally got some time to themselves! Zal has planned tons of funs dates for them, but as things goes for that unlucky man, most of it does not go according to plan...

ROUTE B: Izuki fell in love with the amnesiac man, Nathan. See them go through their many firsts together as a couple, while both Izuki and Nathan realize important things about themselves.

[Edited from [url=https://meiri.itch.io/bohemian-cupid]itch.io[/url]]
title: Bohemian Cupid
Alma está herida
description:
Alma, a teenager, suffers an embarrassing event on the most important day of her life. In the game, you'll realize that the people around her may not be what they seem at their worst... or maybe they are? Discover the power of words, the suffering of losing the one you trust the most, and how your pain can bring out the best or often the worst in you... if you listen to your inner self.

[Translated from [url=https://equipo-vampijams.itch.io/alma-esta-herida]Itch[/url]]

title: Henrei no Susume
description:
March 13th. The night before White Day. Last month, Tsukumo, age 17, received his first real valentine. 
He's gotten obligation chocolate from his female friends before, and always gets a gift from his sister, but this is different. Five little chocolates in a heart-shaped tin from Chiyori, a girl he always sees on his train ride to school.
Could this be real? Does she really have feelings for him?
Tsukumo has no luck with women... if he's ever going to get a girlfriend, this may be his only shot!

title: Milena e o Ipê
description:
Milena and Amanda are high school classmates in mid-2010. Will time be kind to this friendship?

[Translated from [url=https://mangarosacollab.itch.io/milena-e-o-ip]Itch.io[/url]]

Embark on an emotional journey with Ariel in "Orgullo y Repito," a visual novel created for the Women Game Jam 2024. This heartwarming and humorous tale follows Ariel, a young woman with misophonia as she navigates the complexities of love and communication. With a blend of romance, sci-fi, and humor, you'll be encouraged to be yourself and the importance of seizing all opportunities.

[From [url=https://howl-highwind.itch.io/orgullo-y-repito]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Orgullo y Repito
MUNCHIE’S MIDNIGHT ADVENTURE
description:
Munchie, a gentle but curious cat who is comfortable with her mundane life decides - on a spur and whim - to venture into the mystical, alluring moonlit night beyond her window. There, she encounters the mysterious Mr. Kitty, who both frightens her and drives her curiosity further with a tale so fascinating, she is not sure if it is real or imaginary…

[From [url=https://flafon.itch.io/munchies-midnight-adventure]Itch[/url]]

Created for the DougDoug Rosa Charity Stream of 2024, DougDoug's Basement: How I Got a Sea Otter A Promotion! regales the epic quest of a Bell Pepper, an otter, Pajama Sam, and Luther on their unexpected quest to defeat the three Peggle Masters.

[From [url=https://robotortoise.itch.io/dougdougsbasement]Itch.io[/url]]
title: DougDoug's Basement: How I Got a Sea Otter A Promotion!
Disco Dating
description:
Your name is Harry Du Bois and you've got a date! Will you be a suave seducer or a bumbling buffoon? Only you can make the choice in Disco Dating, a dating simulation featuring some of your favorite kissable characters! 

[From [url=https://slugandspore.itch.io/discodating]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Profiler
description:
A mysterious childhood accident took your parents from you, and you swore to become a detective to uncover the truth. However, the fear and sorrow of your youth led you to abandon that goal.

At the strong insistence of a friend, you returned to your hometown, grasping at a final hope, only to find yourself entangled in a massive conspiracy once again. As the investigation deepens, you discover that your parents left you with a means to fight back. Along this journey, you form close bonds with friends who melt your lonely heart and become your powerful allies.

As the truth emerges and the crisis looms closer, you're no longer fighting alone. Are you ready to face the repercussions of your past? 

[From [url=https://divebar-studio.itch.io/profiler]itch[/url]]

title: Haruka no Kisetu
description:
Shunka is my childhood friend.
When she was 12, she suddenly left Japan for health issues.
When she came back 5 years later, she looked the exactly the same when she has left.

[from [url=https://www.dlsite.com/maniax/work/=/product_id/RJ046148.html/?locale=en_US]DLsite English[/url]]

title: Gra☆Mana
description:
My name is Chihiro. I am a l*lita-esque model in the "pretty-young-girl" division.

description:
Tokyo Majin Gakuen: Kenpūchō is a Japanese role-playing game (RPG) developed by Atlus and released for the PlayStation (PSX) in 1998. It is part of the Tokyo Majin Gakuen series, known for blending traditional Japanese culture, mythology, and urban legends with high school drama and supernatural elements.

Summary:
The game is set in a fictional high school in Tokyo, where the protagonist and his friends are ordinary students by day and spiritual warriors by night. They are drawn into battles against demons, ghosts, and other supernatural entities that threaten the peace of the city. The game’s plot is heavily influenced by Japanese mythology and folklore, with various references to historical and legendary figures.

Description:
Tokyo Majin Gakuen Kenpucho combines traditional RPG elements with a tactical, grid-based battle system. Players navigate the story through visual novel-style interactions, where choices can affect the development of relationships between characters, influencing the story’s outcome. The game's graphics mix 2D sprites for characters with detailed 2D backgrounds, creating a distinctive aesthetic reminiscent of other late-90s Japanese RPGs.

  In his surprise and confusion, a mysterious black-haired man appeared before Setsuya.

"You are in danger." — Those words greatly shook Setsuya's destiny.

What is the hidden truth behind the ideal city "Agartha"?
  
Setsuya's chosen path will greatly shake the fate of humanity.
In this chaotic era, what will he choose and what kind of future will he build?

"After the Sea Queen suddenly disappears, her son Ademi plans to go to the surface to rescue her. But fate has other plans when he encounters a human he rescued in the past..."

description: 16 students are trapped in a school where they have to kill a fellow classmate at a chance to escape the school.

Enter a world of femdom and espionage, where lethal, alluring, powerful women are involved in every aspect of your life. The cut-throat ladies are capable of hardcore sex and much more.

As Agent Kris, Agency’s No.1 spy, you’re on the mission to hunt down members of one dangerous crime organization, Syndicate. 

Those highly trained female assassins have caused unquantifiable damage domestically and internationally. Global stability is at stake. The boss is furious. Syndicate needs to be taken down. 

But things are never simple when it comes to politics. Dark secrets hide behind sweet smiles. 

[i]Remember your mission. Remember who you are. Most importantly, enjoy your time with the girls while you can.[/i]

[From [url=https://jmz42.itch.io/lethal-women-world-of-femdom-and-espionage]Itch.io[/url]]

could-ve-been-a-yuri idol girl versions of simon peter and jesus christ.
not meant to be a sincere portrayal of religion.

title: ALLKNOWING IDOL JESUS†

description:
You've just entered your senior year of high school and you only have one goal for the year...to get a boyfriend! Will you be able to find the love of your life or be single forever?

[From [url=https://madizzy-studios.itch.io/i-just-want-a-boyfriend]itch.io[/url]]
title: I Just Want a Boyfriend!

description:
Stuck in a dead-end town with plans that go nowhere, Jackie feels as if her life is doomed to stagnancy forever. Getting by with the support of a few similarly disenfranchised friends, she's resigned to her fate in a small town- until a chance encounter with a deadly life-form sets in motion a chain of events that will force her and her friends to adapt or become bug food.

With nowhere to go and less people to trust, Jackie will have to uncover the mysteries surrounding a seemingly unstoppable killing spree that covers her town, before she well and truly becomes stuck here forever.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3176310/]Steam[/url]]
title: Brood Year

description:
That day, that night.
Tooru was involved in a traffic accident, losing his family and himself.
The last scene he saw was the defiant smile of an unknown 'someone'.
His dead family. His dead self. ...He should have been dead.
Alone, he awoke to find 'someone' saying,

"Welcome to the World of Yoiyoru."

He was taken to a small isolated island floating in the sea, Rakuen. The school built on the hill was Koniwah.
He met them, the scarred ones who lived during the day.

His changed self. Those who are trying to change. The unchanged 'someone'.

Those were unforgettable days.
Living with you, surviving together, the end of the beloved choices—.
title: Phalaenopsis
Magic, Motherhood and Mayhem
description:
Play as  Amaranth, a respected royal mage. She lives with her partner Raoult, a guild master, who face an unexpected hurdle: parenthood. They were once the same party members who saved the Kingdom from a tyrant. Now, since welcoming their little girl, Amaranth feels her magical power dwindling and she is unable to keep up with her royal duties. Meanwhile, Raoult, exhausted from juggling baby care and guild responsibilities, harbors growing frustration.

Their relationship strains under the weight of these challenges, exacerbated by constant bickering. When a rampaging golem threatens the peace of the kingdom, they're reluctantly thrust together by the King on a mission to hunt it down. During the mission, they must confront not just external threats but also their dwindling relationship.

As they navigate this dangerous quest, Amaranth and Raoult must find common ground to save their kingdom and rediscover the strength in their bond, while also... bringing their child with them and keep her alive, of course! 

[From [url=https://azurextwilight.itch.io/magic-motherhood-and-mayhem]itch.io[/url]]

The unknown curse placed on me took away everything from me.
A bright personality, a hobby I enjoyed, a pleasant life at the academy, and... … .
Even my beloved parents, everyone.

9 years after the events of that day.
For the first time, I visited the remains of the house I lived in with my parents.

And the three men I met there.
I hurriedly left the place in an unusually dangerous atmosphere.

But the truth I soon learned was truly shocking.
Who would have thought that those three men were the leaders of God’s organizations!
Even a professor at the academy who hated me suddenly wrote me a letter of recommendation so I could join God's organization.

For a moment, I was confused by the series of incomprehensible events.
If you were the leader of God's organization, wouldn't it be possible to lift the curse placed on me?

So I decided.
I will do whatever it takes to get rid of this curse, even if it means facing him.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3180610]Steam[/url]]
title: Eternal Glory

description:
Something strange is happening today. Help our astronaut deal with a huge meteor shower that is coming!

[Translated from [url=https://naninani-art.itch.io/spaceloop]Itch.io[/url]]

Love&fluxspace
description:
Play as the femme fatale instead of the classic noir "hero".

[From [url=https://saramakesgames.itch.io/lovefluxspace]Itch.io[/url]]

Eli, your genderfluid partner, is staying over for 10 days. But trouble is afoot; You're broke and the world is expensive! Luckily your aunty offers (threatens) you a job at her cafe. But are you sure you want to leave Eli alone for the day? If Eli gets upset, things may take a sour turn...

[From [url=https://hatoge.itch.io/end-date]itch.io[/url]]
title: End Date
Fearbonding
description:
Sweet and viscous like honey, that's how fear tastes to Hinata, a demon. True terror is hard to come by, so the day he meets Kosuke, his new goal is clear:

He Needs to Tame This Terrifying Man.

Help Hinata in his harvest for fear, all without raising suspicion. Tread carefully as you try to get closer to the deranged Kosuke. Will you get to satisfy your hunger or will you be the one to get devoured?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2871980/]Steam[/url]]

title: yumemi ru inu no yuureisen - shouhen atsumari
Doctor Who and the Dalek Super-Brain
description:
Prepare to hide behind the sofa!

You are Doctor Who in this interactive graphic adventure. The Doctor faces his arch-enemies, the Daleks, in a battle of wits and choices. Choose wisely and you may just prevail, choose badly and you'll be swiftly exterminated!

But it's worse! The Daleks have constructed a giant computer "Super-Brain" with a single goal: universal domination. Can you and your assistant, Bex, outwit this formidable foe? Who knows?

Nora Kell is the city of Divello's resident magical girl, and she is alone.

When Claire Wilde enters her life, she isn't. Not anymore.

But Nora's problems don't end there.

[From [url=https://concordandcliches.itch.io/moonstruck]itch.io[/url]]
title: Moonstruck

description:
The country of Izgub is stuck in an unending civil war between Reds and Yellows ever since its defeat to a Semigradian invasion. You are Luka Inostrantsev, a civilian that happened to be in the sunny Free City of Jasnovo at the wrong time. Navigate intricate plots in the political and criminal landscape of Izgub and achieve the ending you consider right.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3071120/]Steam[/url]]
title: IZGUB 2001

description:
An evil organization is threatening the world. In a city that has almost completely fallen into their grasp, there are those willing to stand up against their dastardly ways. Impersonating ordinary citizens, they lie in wait for the moment they can fight back.

Having located the organization’s headquarters in this very city, the magical warriors Kanade and Miya arrive to defeat the organization for good. Known as the Antidomi, these fighters are here to protect the safety of the populace and bring evil to justice.

[From [url=https://www.kaguragames.com/product/heavenly-heroes-of-antidomi/]Kagura Games[/url]]
title: Jingu Hime Hiro Antidomi

description:
Chase Frey, a college student of no particular import, whiles away life with her girlfriend, Marie-Anne Rusa, when one night she suddenly disappears— and a detective knocks on Chase’s door, citing foul play. With Marie-Anne’s parents, both government officials, having died just the week before, concern rises for the absent Marie-Anne, whom they fear has met a similar fate.

Alongside a colorful cast, Chase begins to unravel the convoluted ties behind her disappearance… but there is more than meets the eye to the mystery, including a long-forgotten accident dubbed the “Rosaria Tragedy”, of which Marie-Anne’s family played a part.

[From [url=https://studio8games.itch.io/rusa-tail-of-gazelle]itch.io[/url]]
title: Rusa: Tail of Gazelle

description:
Welcome to the Doki Doki: Red Dawn!

It's an ordinary February evening. An unsuspecting Moscow schoolboy, dreaming of getting into the most prestigious university in the country, is preparing for another Olympiad. His life is monotonous and boring.

The next day he receives a message about a drawing for a house in Japan. And not just anywhere, but in the suburbs of Tokyo! Our hero makes a difficult decision to take part in the lottery and check his luck.

And here, a week later, in no way expecting such a turn of events, he learns of his victory. And this meant unthinkable changes in his own life.
title: Doki Doki: Krasnaja Zarja
"Saimin" Seijun Shojo Manko ni Harem Namanakadashimakuri na Ore Maji Sugee ~Joshikou Hen~
aliases: Hypn*sis - I Am But A Man Cumming in the Innocent P*ssies of Schoolgirls

title: Epsilon Orphan
description:
Nobody knows where the mutagen disease came from, but it has Delve Superstation Epsilon in its insidious grip.

A single mistake leads to Möbi losing everything. Cast adrift, he turns to the one authority he knows has all the answers - but it turns out the Admin has questions of his own. 

The ever-expanding hub city in space known as Epsilon is supposed to be a well-oiled machine. Perfect and planned in every way. But there are things even the all-seeing AI and Admin duo know nothing about - such as the whereabouts of the Admin’s own children, and the cause of the mutagenic disease that is disfiguring the station’s citizens. Not to mention how these things are possibly connected…

 Can Möbi solve every mystery, and return to his previous life? 

Will he even want to, when the truth is known?

[From [url=https://hauntogogue.itch.io/epsilon-orphan]itch.io[/url]]

[url=https://epsilon-orphan.tumblr.com/]Official Tumblr[/url]

Ronald Kitzinger is on the verge of closing his supernatural investigation agency when he receives an unexpected call from an old friend to visit Kingston — a predominantly human town in the heart of Texas, filled with kindly people and picturesque scenery. 

But Ron knows that’s a lie. He grew up in Kingston and knows that there’s something rotten at its core. The people lie and backstab each other. Hate is everywhere. And now, someone is summoning ghouls to attack the town. And all fingers are now pointing to Ron's childhood sweetheart, Sebastian — the only magical being in town. 

Is it prejudice? Is it revenge? Or is someone trying to hide their tracks? Can Ron find the real culprit before Sebastian is tossed in jail for good?

[From [url=https://mintbiscuits.itch.io/town-of-the-damned]itch.io[/url]]
title: Town of the Damned
Sinful Summer: A Tale of Forbidden Love
description:
Embark on an unforgettable journey with Erik and Lyna, two twins entangled in a passionate web of desires. Set against the breathtaking backdrop of a private tropical island villa, their reunion after a year abroad sparks a fiery exploration of emotions that defy traditional boundaries.

As they tread the line between repressed feelings and mutual attraction, their bond deepens and the craving for the forbidden becomes impossible to ignore. With the arrival of their mother Helga on the horizon, will they succumb to temptation or resist the call of their primal urges? Discover the twists and turns of this compelling narrative through a kinetic visual novel, where love, family, and desire intertwine in very interesting ways...

title: Kamaitachi no Yor
description:
A special crossover collaboration between [I]Spy X Family[/I] and [I][url=/v1241]Kamaitachi no Yoru[/url][/I], which adapts the events of Chapter 94 into a Sound Novel style reminiscent of the original game.

During a ski trip, the Forgers take refuge within a ski lodge alongside 6 other guests and 3 employees. Suddenly, one of the guests is found stabbed in the back, and suspicion quickly falls on the only person without an alibi: Yor Forger.

On September 1th, 2020. Argentinian ex-president Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner was a victim of an attempt of murder by a man that went for the name of Fernando André Sabag Montiel, Yet even after being arrested, it seems that there's still some dirt behind this old case.

Find the truth behind the attempt at murder and get politically manipulated with miss-information!
title: ¿Quién mandó a matar a Cristina?
The Grey Rainbow
description:
Grey was brought into a hospital room, where the doctor in charge of his treatment was a female doctor named Red. She looked like she was in her twenties, seemingly not much older than the protagonist. The treatment method appeared rather simple and innocent—Red would accompany the protagonist every day for color memory training, and she would also take him for walks, pointing out the various colors around them. However, as a doctor, Red seemed a bit too lively and carefree.

In the bed next to the protagonist lived a girl who appeared younger than him. The protagonist noticed the nameplate on her bed; her name was Color. Every morning, the girl would leave with a nurse and wouldn’t return until evening. The girl was very energetic, and when she returned that first evening, she grabbed the protagonist’s hand, eager to become friends and play together. The protagonist didn’t refuse, and thus their color game began.

The girl brought out a set of tools marked in some way. On the back of the paths were raised portions representing the names of the colors. The two became study partners, quizzing each other on whether they had memorized the colors of different things.

The protagonist thought that this girl must be in the same situation as him, having lived in a black-and-white world since childhood. When he was with her, he seemed to regain a desire to see colors again. If he could see colors, he was sure that her smile would be incredibly beautiful. However, his subconscious would always stop these thoughts from fully surfacing, and fear would soon swallow everything, returning the world to black and white.

Becoming a professional Quarterback is only half of this young man's dream. The other half is obtaining his own harem. As you navigate through the obstacles of his final year of high school and the college career that follows, You'll make new friends, new rivals, and, if everything goes as planned, lots of money. Can he successfully achieve his dreams or will he crash and burn at every step along the way?

[From [url=https://segremveer.itch.io/game-of-inches]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Game of Inches

description: "Yume no Office" is a visual novel where the protagonists will fight for their performance bonuses using the oldest method to solve their problems: Pong. Their mood is different every day, so don't be fooled by the first impression.
title: Yume No Office
Happily Ever After
description:
Trapped in an endless cycle of damsels and heroes, a princess embarks on a journey of self-discovery. Happily Ever After is a hand-crafted game of confronting fate, uncovering hidden truths, and navigating unexpected relationships. Your choices will shape her character in this story-rich visual novel. Do you believe in happily ever after?

[From [url=https://play-by-play-games.itch.io/happily-ever-after]itch.io[/url]]

A touching story of how to fill the hole inside you after the loss of a brother
⭐ erohorror visual novel
⭐ hand-drawn art. real dirt. real saliva. REAL PUKE. REAL THRILLS
⭐ dark Zoroastrian hell yaoi
⭐ "three" endings…what could they be…well pardner you will see me one more time if you do good…two more times if you do bad…etc etc

title: Perfect Tense: Maggot Therapy
Mujin no Hanen Kansha Shirazu no Hebi

description:
You get to play as a middle-aged man who recently got married. He spent many years of his life devoted to work and career, but one day he met his love.

They love each other and enjoy life together. But everything changes when a young girl appears on the main character's doorstep, who appears to be his wife's daughter. 

It turns out that your wife has a daughter from a previous marriage. The strange thing is that she is silent about it. 

The main character accepts the girl into his house, but very quickly begins to feel sexual attraction to her.

Will the main character succumb to temptation or remain a faithful husband? It's up to you to decide.

In the new versions you will meet new characters and new challenges.

[From [url=https://faphero-games.itch.io/true-husband]Itch.io[/url]]
title: True Husband
MagicSweets-Jiyu Xingfu De Mofa Tangguo-
aliases: MagicSweets-幸せを与える魔法キャンディ-

description:
Recovery is a romantic furry gay horror game in which you have to jump into the unknown of the most ordinary-looking town. Will you be able to restore what everyone has lost, or will you not have enough strength for the task?

[Edited from [url=https://sallyfast.itch.io/recovery]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Recovery

description:
In the vast cosmos, two realms stand out: Navā, a mystical world where magic flows freely, and Terra, a technological marvel at the peak of innovation. Both face exploitation by power-hungry elites.

As the boundaries between Navā and Terra begin to blur, a critical question arises: What happens when these worlds collide?

Will you side with the Extinctionists, who believe one world must dominate the other, or the Expansionists, who seek a harmonious fusion of magic and technology? Or will you forge your own path, bridging the divide between duty and desire, love and vengeance?

The fate of humanity rests in your hands.

[From [url=https://veluxa.itch.io/tlsw1]Itch.io[/url]]
title: The Last Star Walker

description:
Filled with vengeful thoughts, I couldn't resist the devil's sweet temptation and ended up making a request I should never have made.

'Please, make Jia suffer for what she did...'
title: Sesangeseo Gajang Wanbyeokan Boksu
Gaebalsaebal Geim Gaebal Dongari!
description:
One day, the club registration period arrived.
I impulsively decided to start a new club just a day before the deadline.

My childhood friend, On Subin, who always fulfills my requests despite her quirks.
A classmate, Jo Sora, who is a bit odd but full of dreams in her heart.
And Jeong Seol, a quiet junior who loves books.

Can we successfully create a game together with these three?

title: Gyeolmarui Han Georeum dwi-eseo
description:
Isn't it something everyone thinks about at least once?
What would I do if the world suddenly ended one day?

<Here’s the news. NASA has reported a shocking announcement: an asteroid with a diameter of 100 km is set to collide with Earth in three days.>

They say imagination can become reality, and just like that, I was abruptly sentenced to death.
Having found neither dreams nor desires, I headed to school as usual, sat down, and muttered to myself.
"Honestly, does anything I'm doing right now even matter if the world is ending the day after tomorrow?"
"How about planting an apple tree?"
As I mumbled thoughtlessly, a girl’s voice suddenly came from behind me.
"Do you want to go out with me?"
And so began my first and last romance three days before the end of the world.

Seong-hoon, who has a cursed constitution that attracts ghosts.
No matter how hard he tries to maintain a normal daily life, misfortune never leaves him alone.
In front of him, whose days are filled with ominous events, appears a mysterious girl named Sa-hee.
Sa-hee tells Seong-hoon that he has the qualities of a 'God tree' and offers to protect him from suspicious beings...
What is her true intention? Will Seong-hoon be able to regain his everyday life?
title: Sa-hee Seolhwa
Bit Baraen Nalgae
description:
"No matter how much I think about it, it's a mystery..."
"I" was lying on the flower-filled field, lost in memory.
In the old mansion next to that field, a mysterious girl named "Ellie" welcomed me.
"It seems like there's something you can't quite put into words. Am I right?"

title: Mabeopsonyeo-ui Jeonguineun Jugeotda
description: One day, after the death of her admired senior, the magical girl Hyena, who has lost her sense of justice, embarks on a journey with her familiar Nero to reclaim her lost ideals. Will the justice they encounter at the end of their journey be the truth?

title: Naeyeoreum Naekkum
description: Kicked out of the band overnight, I lost my colleagues, my place to go, and my instruments. To keep making music, I returned to the old practice room where I used to play. There, I ran into my childhood friend Jeong Su-hee. But... did she always sing this well? Maybe we could start a band again after all?

I went camping with my family for summer vacation.
While rescuing a puppy swept away by the river, I met a girl named Isia.
In an attempt to find the puppy's master, we discovered a mysterious corpse there...
Will we be able to uncover the culprit before the evidence disappears?
title: De facto

description:
The protagonist attends an academy for training adventurers, but he’s stuck with the underappreciated ability of a Tamer.
On top of that, his overwhelming libido makes him a pariah among women, leaving him frustrated and restless.

One day, after fellow adventures trick him into acting as bait and nearly dying, he stumbles upon a treasure meant exclusively for Tamers.
This treasure grants him a cheat-like ability to tame any living being—humans, elves, and more.

And so begins his new life: taming, impregnating, and reducing the world’s most powerful, noble, pure heroines with potent magical powers into his personal playthings.
Every day becomes a wild, unrestrained indulgence in depravity!

[Translated from [url=https://www.miel-soft.com/tamermusou.html]the official website[/url]]
title: Haramase Tamer no Isekai Gakuen Musou ~Kyonyuu Mesu-tachi o Kozukuri Tamer Shite Saikyou no Harem Gundan o Tsukutte Nariagaru!~
Gekko no Sword Breaker - Yurihime Hen

description:
In the game "RAYS," you take on the role of Adam, a character who wakes up in a hospital with no memory of his past. Completely alone, he is forced to embark on a challenging journey filled with numerous trials and unexpected events.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3154870/]Steam[/url]]
title: RAYS
Ambition Plot 2
description:
Hart Lovelace's ambition knows no bounds.

As a secretary in one of Toronto's finance firms, he sees rich, successful people every day. He wishes he could be one of them, but his job offers no opportunity to climb.

The best chance he has is Evil Batlet.

Evil is the smug, secure financial associate who happens to be three-timing in the office. Hart can't stand that they're sleeping together, and he's not even Evil's favourite either. He'd do anything to take Evil's place, if he can't get there himself.

So when Hart gets fired, he makes one last shot.

He'll drag himself up or take everyone down with him.

[From [url=https://arbitrrrary.itch.io/ambition-plot-2]Itch.io[/url]]

Northern Lights: Excursions is the companion novel to the Northern Lights VN. Over time, it'll feature a collection of stories that take place before, or alongside current events in NL. 

We will explore more of life in the world of Northern Lights. Cody's time in New Orleans, Aldric and Cody's bonding experience at summer camp, and learn more about the lives of Aldric, Devon, and Misty before our main story begins.

[From [url=https://splitpeakstudio.itch.io/northern-lights-excursions]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Northern Lights: Excursions
Time Travel Tea: Two Witches' Magical Brew

description:
Short stories set in ancient times, as the title says, these are mere fragments, a small window into the huge unknown that is the past; enjoy while it may last.

[From [url=https://tavios.itch.io/fragments-of-the-past]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Fragments of the Past

description:
Sanctuary is a gay furry visual novel set in a fantastic medieval realm. You play as a young wolf, who embarks on an unexpected adventure with an unknown wolf prince - an attempt to escape from monotony. What will you find in this long journey - wealth, power, love, or some other purpose?

[From [url=https://sanctuaryfvn.itch.io/sanctuary]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Sanctuary

description:
Ichorous is a horror-inspired BL dating sim that disregards romance in favor of lust toward one insectoid monster with a pinch of perpetual sarcasm.

The game follows Reito, a university student. Reito is unlikable to other people both on purpose and out of spite. Yet there is one person who keeps following Reito despite his annoying personality — Lucas.

[From [url=https://elolaps.itch.io/ichorous]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Ichorous

description:
In a dimension separate from our own lies Edda Realm. There, the Sacred Virth protect the kingdom of Arkthrone — among them is Tierna, the kingdom's princess, who fights as Sacred Claire to shield her people from the forces of darkness. But the peace she guarded was shattered without warning when grotesque demons from the hellish realm of Barbarismos launched an invasion. Now, Claire joins forces with another Sacred Virth - Sacred Noir - to battle these savage invaders. To sever evil at its root, the two journey to the modern world. But the distorted dimension led them to an unexpected encounter with Sword Maidens!

[Translated from the [url=https://www.route2.co.jp/Triangle/Products/SacredArch/index.html]official site[/url]]
title: Gensei Kenki Sacred Arch
Crimson Chains
description:
As a devoted member of Geto's group, you obey his every command without question. After the tragic deaths of the Death Painting Womb brothers, you are tasked with overseeing the last remaining brother, Choso, to ensure he doesn’t jeopardize Geto's plan in Shibuya.

You're not a fan of humanity yourself, but as you guide Choso through the intricacies and challenges of having a human body, you both begin to explore what it truly means to be human. Love and hatred clash, and in the end, it’s not just Choso who must confront his humanity—you must as well.

[From [url=https://khywae.itch.io/crimson-chains]Itch.io[/url]]

A game about finding love in a catholic monastery, featuring a lively cast of handsome monks!

[From [url=https://lutzlig.itch.io/a-taste-of-gods-goodness]Itch.io[/url]]
title: A Taste of God's Goodness
Devil's Delight
description:
Your hands are on the ground. All you see is a bar’s neon sign reflected on a water puddle. Your ears are ringing but you can still hear loud music coming from inside the bar. Your eyes start closing, you try to open them… a dark human volt stands in front you. Everything goes black. 

[From [url=https://goncalogoulao.itch.io/devils-delight]Itch.io[/url]]

You, an incubus in 19th Century England, find yourself summoned by a priest. Things take an unusual turn when it is revealed that the priest has had on you for a long time. Will you be able to free yourself from his clutches?

[From [url=https://rongbirong.itch.io/unholy-confessions]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Unholy Confessions
A Bystander's Worth
description:
A corrupt system. Disgruntled citizens.

And now the president has been assassinated.

Four self proclaimed candidates offer to step up to the position, each with their own version of the perfect city. 

But to obtain this position they need one thing that gives them an overwhelming leg up over the others.

You play as a normal citizen just going about your usual day. But unfortunately you get caught up in one of the villains' nefarious schemes. Will you be able to get through the day?

[From [url=https://rongbirong.itch.io/prologue-a-bystanders-worth]Itch.io[/url]]

The main character works diligently in the alchemical workshop entrusted to him. For the first time, he remained in charge and did not want to let the locals down. However, the deficit of the main resource, mana crystals, is growing strongly due to the closure of the only mine in the region. Besides, the cases of attacks on cargo and reports of missing people are becoming more frequent in the district as well. How is the sweet and kind stranger who recently arrived in a village involved in this?

[From [url=https://zimeongames.itch.io/zalisgame]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Zalis: romantychna pryhoda

description:
"It was always Evil's fault. He made too many enemies and too few friends, then expected Zoomer to help with the clean-up."

One man fishes his partner out of a lake. What more is there to say?

[From [url=https://arbitrrrary.itch.io/blood-in-the-water]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Blood in the Water

description:
Misty Memories is a fantasy visual novel where you find yourself stranded awake in a realm between life and death. Your come across a familiar face, and together you recall and reminisce to your past as you piece together what exactly had happened to you.

However, whether you make it back to your true realm or stay in the realm in between will depend entirely on your choice.

[From [url=https://5000msproductions.itch.io/mistymemories]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Misty Memories

description:
“Capture the moment, then learn to let go.”

OPUS: Prism Peak is a narrative adventure where your choices lead to divergent endings. Play as a photographer lost in an ethereal realm, and unveil its mysteries with your camera to find your way home.

A weary photojournalist, beaten by a life of failures, stumbles into an ethereal realm while returning to his hometown. There, he encounters many spirits as he searches for a way back, guided only by a mysterious girl who claims that a cabin in a distant mountain is their only way home.

[From official page.]
title: OPUS: Xinxiang Wushan
Silent Echoes
description:
From itch.io:

This standalone game features characters from EchoVN using wholly original assets, music, and sound effects sourced from Creative Commons 4.0 and Open Source images/sounds, as well as commissioned work. Please support the official release and consider donating to their Patreon!

Content Warning: This game contains themes of Self-Harm, text depictions of extreme violence, sex, mentions of sexual violence, and (optional) on screen nudity.

Experience Silent Echoes in the way it was intended to be played! Join Leo Alvarez on his search for his ex-boyfriend in the sleepy-ghost town of Echo as the night grows ever darker and his nightmare ever deeper. Features choices, multiple endings compared to the original single ending, text puzzles, and a visual inventory system.

title: The Stars
description: A story of regretful father on the road finding his missing daughter.

Anon and Suzie are moving to Moonripple Lake!

In the wake of his cratering crypto-gained net-worth, Anon is selling their apartment and moving to Moonripple Lake to rent a house, so he might stave off the inevitable: having to get a job.
A genius decision? We'll find out.

In Moonripple Lake, Suzie and Anon will make new friends, bring in old ones, stumble onto mysteries, and go on adventures.
Most importantly, they'll do all that while having lots of kinky sex!

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/posts/moonripple-lake-110200685]Patreon[/url]]
title: Moonripple Lake
Ai Zhi Chao
description:
Love Nest is a psychological horror escape room with multiple endings about escaping from a sickly young girl. Come here to interact with your "Miss Ciel" and experience a heart-pounding love routine!
[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2595110]Steam[/url]]

title: Yuusha no Sato - Seiken no Yama
Kusuri o Kai ni Kitarachi wa Genka ni Makikomareta Hanashi

description:
Arriving in Summitbay as an exchange student, you’re thrilled by the prospect of living in your old friend’s beautiful hometown. The small European town, with its serene beaches, charming houses, and attractive women, offers everything you’d hoped for. But as you chase after your desires, a sinister secret begins to reveal itself, plunging you into a moral dilemma that could alter the course of your life—and the lives of those around you—forever.​

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/elcharlo/about]Patreon[/url]]
title: DESIRIUM
Ventreville: A Cure for Sorrow
description:
Determine the fate of Ventreville, a city plagued by sickness and secrets. Play as six protagonists with unique abilities as you interrogate and outwit suspects, hide from enemies, crack puzzles, and even call the Gods for help! What are you willing to risk to find the truth? 

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2992580/Ventreville_A_Cure_for_Sorrow/]Steam[/url]]

Theater school is a place where ambition and dreams can collide with the harshest of realities. Lily is an ambitious student who dreams of conquering the big screens and becoming a star. For her, Theater School is not just a place of learning, it's an arena where the strongest wins. But what to do when the road to success is strewn with lies, manipulation and forbidden offers?

The rivalry heats up when Sissy, a rich and bitchy rival who is used to getting everything she wants, and Mary, a charismatic and talented girl who is favored by the teachers, appear on the horizon. Each of them is ready to fight for a place under the spotlight, but the stakes increase dramatically when the producer offers Lily a chance that could change her life forever. Is our heroine ready to transcend her principles for the sake of her cherished dream? And what happens when truth and lies become entwined in a dangerous knot, threatening to destroy everything she's built?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3185530/]Steam[/url]]
title: Teatral'naja shkola

description:
Lonely street artist Gene takes the desperate step of joining a crew of fellow graffiti rebels led by the cunning and arrogant young Vanessa. With his help, will the gang be able to shake up the society of their hometown of New Astra, which is suffocating under the cruelty of the authorities and the police?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3202230/]Steam[/url]]
title: VIOLE[n]T RUSH

description:
In Three Sheeps and a Wolf, you take the role of a police investigator, trying to figure out the culprit of a terrible crime. You have four suspects to choose from, and three of them are innocent. Using the case files and some help from your reliable friend Pedro, will you be able to rule out the innocent suspects and find the culprit?

[From [url=https://adri-0211.itch.io/three-sheeps-and-a-wolf]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Three Sheeps and a Wolf
Tuesday's Child
description:
In 1950s Edinburgh, psychotherapist Dr Sinclair McCarthy busies himself with the post-war aftermath. When he takes a schoolboy as a new case, he doesn’t expect much from his Tuesday afternoons: thirteen-year-old Nicholas Farrell has predictable neuroses and avoidant manners.

But Nicholas begins to show unexpected behaviours, and Sinclair realises the boy holds secrets worth exploring. He faces a case that will test his skills, challenge his ethics, and threaten the stability of his carefully-constructed world.

Presented in the sequence of their weekly sessions, "Tuesday's Child" maps a story of compulsion, obsession, and desire, as the therapist and his young client find themselves drawn into a relationship of compelling and dangerous intensity.

[From [url=https://opochrisma.itch.io/tuesdayschild-demo]Itch.io[/url]]

Following the experience of a human protagonist as they prepare body, heart, and mind for a deeply erotic and spiritual ritual that will see them transforming into a 'werewolf', a great and sacred honor in the world they are a part of.

The story will feature five possible ritual/love interests, each with their own stories and relationships to explore. There will not be set 'routes' in the traditional sense. Rather, the player will choose among the lot who they spend time with during each day as the story unfolds. Certain actions, as well as how often an individual character is chosen, will affect your affinity with that character, progressing their story and deepening your bond.

There is no set outcome for these lads; their hearts can be broken, they might fall in love, or they can simply fulfill their duty of assisting the player in the final ritual. It's up to you.

[From [url=https://sanima.itch.io/moontouched]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Moontouched

description:
In the doll's room, the teacher's old stories are flowing out again today.
Alice enjoys these day-to-day moments, but her family members always seem to want to argue at those times.
As if there’s some great wrongdoing or someone is desperately waiting for something.
Could it be that there's a hidden message in the story that only Alice doesn’t know about?
Perhaps Alice must find it after all?
And if she does find it… how should she accept it?
title: Sesangeseo Gajang Seulpeun Inhyeong

description:
This is a record from five days before the 'signs of destruction' appeared.
- If the world we live in is an artificially created fake world... -
One day, rumors began to spread that our current world was a 'fake world' from an unknown source.
Amidst the monopoly and unilateral blocking of some deadly and terrifying information, our society rapidly fell into chaos,
and ordinary people found themselves increasingly pushed into extreme situations as everything humanity had built came to a standstill...
title: 5 Days - Gieogui Juin
The Inception
description:
Amelia City, year 2356, you play as a bounty hunter, an agent outside the system, who survives day to day with a shitty job.
He will be involved in a chase that he does not expect.
Where his past will come to light. Helped by his sister, they will try to escape without looking back, and whatever it takes.

Dreams and ambitions

The older you get, the harder they are to achieve

Getting to the point where they ended up being just empty promises

What would you do if you had the chance to live what you once had?

What do I mean?

I refer...

To the youth...

Follow the path of Jay Junsuina!

A white wolf with the desire to get a better life in a prestigious school!

The first thing he does is join a club. The journalism club!

What will you do? Will you enjoy life?

Will you find your soulmate?

Will you ruin it?

[From [url=https://gcreative.itch.io/living-and-loving]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Living and Loving
Yeolhansiban-ui Bochungsu-eop
description:
"Why do you gamble, teacher?"
'Dong-hoe', who got into massive gambling debt
Just when he thought everything was over, an opportunity arose to pay off his debts by leveraging his experience as a former academy instructor.
"Make sure she passes."
The student assigned to Donghoe was a typical delinquent girl with no talent for studying, no will to try, and only thoughts of running away...
A life-and-death lesson between a gambling tutor and a student with no future!

title: Dear my editor
description:
The protagonist is an editor for the adult video introduction channel [Pumbeonking]!
Due to COVID, he spends his youthful freshman year entirely on editing and gaming.
A year passes, and spring arrives when he turns 21.
In front of him appears the most beautiful girl in the department, but he's become a used secondhand freshman?!
"Hey! Wait a minute!"
Her identity feels suspiciously familiar!

title: A Handful of Dust
description:
There is a shadow under this red rock,
(Come in under the shadow of this red rock),
And I will show you something different from either
Your shadow in the morning striding behind you
Or your shadow at evening rising to meet you;
I will show you fear in a handful of dust.

T.S. Eliot, The Waste Land

Eight years ago, a plague decimated the world, turning all who contracted it into mindless, violent monsters. Now, people remain in walled-off quarantine zones, barely scraping by in the cities where they once thrived. Callum Abernathy, assigned to a wintry perimeter patrol with his old friend Mace Camus, ventures out into the overgrown ruins of Huntington, West Virginia. Together in the wasteland, they reminisce about the past, think about the present, and dream about their future– if it even exists.

[From [url=https://shiroooo-dev.itch.io/a-handful-of-dust]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Torimodose! Ai!! Kon'yakusha wa Megane Danshi

description:
Follow the story of Spur, a lonely outlaw who joins a bounty hunter on a job. Will he manage to run from his past, or will he stand and face it?

[From [url=https://noisin.itch.io/thoroughfare]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Thoroughfare
Kill The Clock
description:
Enter the shadowy streets of mid-1900s Europe as a vengeful protagonist, only to find your nemesis slain by another's hand.
Framed for a crime you didn't commit, unravel the mystery of your enemy's demise while navigating a web of deceit and betrayal.

With each playthrough, discover new killers and methods, all while racing to clear your name.
Will you solve the case, or become the next victim of a twisted game?


[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2763470]Steam[/url]]

title: Oneulbuteo Donggeo 1il Cha
description:
One day. I woke up in bed as usual, and suddenly there was a girlfriend who appeared out of nowhere.
And at her request, our sweet cohabitation life began unexpectedly.

title: Yeogisa Agassi
description: A sweet romantic story with the seemingly strict yet cute knight "Ceris" who hides a secret!

You have the strange ability to see others' red strings of fate and sever them at will. A bizarre encounter led you to share this secret with Tsumugi, an infamous playboy. Whilst bantering with him, you sever the fate of others and bind your own. Let your unfavorable fates be severed, so that you can one day be blessed with a fortunate one.

[Translated from [url=https://novelgame.jp/games/show/10420]NovelGame[/url]]
title: Enkyori Ren'ai
Tsuyoki na Danshi Koukousei ga Joshi Kousei ni Kugusurare Tsudzukeru Hanashi
aliases: Strong High School Boy Keeps Getting Tickled by His Female Classmate

title: Reitetsu na Toshi no Josei Kugusuguri Tsudzukeete Tachiba Gyakuten Suru Hanashi
aliases: Cool-Headed Young Girl's Tickle T*rture Reversal

description:
CRUSHCRUSHCRUSHCRUSH is an interactive abstract horror experience dealing with themes of sexuality, emotional abuse in romantic relationships, religious trauma, and mental health. 

[From [url=https://titanomachyrpg.itch.io/crush]Itch.io[/url]]
title: CRUSHCRUSHCRUSHCRUSH

aliases: 魔王の胎動～正義のエージェントNTR催○調教～
title: Maou no Taidou ~Seigi no Eujento NTR Saimin Choukyou~

description:
Boyhood's End is a juvenile science fiction horror adventure game, in which the world is ruled by a mechanical overlord "R. Karellen". Every aspect of every person's life is rated with a "human score", and R. Karellen decides everything from academic and professional careers, romantic interests, to one's daily meals.

The protagonist, Giovanni, has the lowest human score among the entire human race. Every day, he receives "special treatment" for everything including his meals and classes. On top of that, he gets bullied relentlessly by his classmates at the School, both in real life and online.

But one day, everything and everyone in the school starts attacking Giovanni, trying to "remake" him and raise his human score by making him "more human". A senior student, the famously eccentric genius Campanella, reaches out to Giovanni, and they hop onto (and take over) a driverless train on the galactic railroad. And so, Giovanni gets swept up in a journey to find the "Crimson Southern Cross", located at the farthest edge of the universe.

On their journey, the boys will meet great leaders of the past and pull reckless and destructive "pranks" on them all. Through their encounters with the history, twisted mysteries, and various horrors of the world, they will eventually have to confront the end of their own childhood.

Oh, did you hear that? The boys are (pointlessly) sounding the train whistle. Looks like it's time for the galactic express to depart.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2403290/Boyhoods_End/]Steam[/url]]
title: Shounenki no Owari
Otoko no Ko to H na Natsuyasumi
Pursuers of Mythic Truth
description:
You're changing very slowly...but you don't know why. 

You're trying to research the ‘Neverplace’ and the strange creature you met there. A chance encounter with a wizard/mythic known as the ‘Legacy defiler’ (but Suraj to his friends) gives you hope. But be careful, others are watching from the shadows…who aren't as friendly as Suraj. Discover the truth of the Neverplace, Pandemonium and their sinister servants. 

[From [url=https://seraten04.itch.io/pursuers-of-mythic-truth]itch.io[/url]]

title: Tensai Model Naruya-kun no Ichinichi Manager Taiken
Sunny Shell Resort
description:
Welcome to Sunny Shell Resort! Where you can finally rid yourself of your earthly possessions and humanity and become a Vessel for an eldritch being of your dreams!

Join a cast of colorful characters, all with different reasons and intentions for signing themselves with Vessel (TM)! Will you befriend them in your time together on the island? Or are you there with only one goal in mind? Your choice!

[From [url=https://manioora.itch.io/sunny-shell-resort]itch.io[/url]]

Nadine has never really stood out in her life. She's always been in someone else's shadow, whether it be her greedy boss or her glamorous roommate. Until one day, she gets a call from a mysterious interviewer offering her a way to get her out of her dead-end job. 

Unbeknownst to her, the "job offer" she accepted was actually a contract to be a magical girl phantom thief! Will she just take what she needs to pay her student debts? Or will she just cause chaos?

[From [url=https://joantoine.itch.io/magical-girl-shadow-thief]itch.io[/url]]
title: Magical Girl Phantom Thief
Boku no Kawaii Onna no Ko!?

description:
Step into the shoes of Wineglass, a young spirit with a desire to break out of their monotonous life. Their chance came in the form of DenkiDoku Festival, the biggest music event in the country. However, things change when they enlist the help of Otoha, a melancholic former artist.

[From [url=https://electrinut.itch.io/two-weeks-with-otoha]itch.io[/url]]
title: Two Weeks with Otoha
A Journey Beyond Home
description:
A Journey Beyond Home is a male-focused, furry visual novel centered on a young adult tiger, Tyler, haunted by his father's mysterious disappearance in the woods during his cubhood. Growing up in foster care, Tyler yearns for belonging and a connection to his roots.
