One day, Tyler reconnects with his foster "sibling", Leo, deciding to leave his familiar surroundings to start anew. The story follows Tyler and Blake in a slow-burn adventure through love, as they navigate life's complexities, confront inner demons, and overcome challenges. Their journey reveals the true meaning of family, friendship, and resilience.

Every decision you make impacts the story, leading to encounters with unique characters and shaping Tyler and Blake's relationship. Together, they discover that family is about bonds forged through shared struggles and unwavering support, creating a new definition of home based on trust, love, and togetherness.

[From [url=https://stray-wolf-devs.itch.io/a-journey-beyond-home]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Byouki ♰ Tenshi ～Das Gebet Ungesprochen～
description: [i]In the quiet of a sterile room, where time fades and hope wanes, a fragile life clings to the threads of memory, longing for the world beyond the window.[/i]

title: Camp Arcadia
description:
Assume the role of a middle-aged counselor at Camp Arcadia, a vibrant summer retreat for young males. Your mission is to form strong and meaningful bonds with your campers while engaging in a variety of exciting summertime activities such as swimming, hiking, and crafting. Build trust and camaraderie with your campers and fellow staff members, creating an unforgettable and enriching experience for everyone involved.
Will you succeed in fulfilling your deepest longings at this idyllic sanctuary?

[From F95zone]

Get ready for an unforgettable Sunday afternoon with a group of close-knit friends - Gavin, Aiden, Felix, and Rowan. When their parents unexpectedly depart on an emergency, these young gamers take advantage of their newfound freedom and gather at Gavin's and Felix's house for a thrilling tabletop adventure. With a stash of familiar board games lying around, they're always up for trying something new. That's when Gavin stumbles upon an old, dusty gem hidden deep within the basement - a game that promises to shake things up! The Tabletop Boys are about to embark on a journey they'll never forget.

[From F95zone]
title: The Tabletop Boys
Calendar Year
description:
When I reached the sky, my wings crumbled to ashes.
When I stopped and stared at my own reflection,
My body crumbled to ashes.

As long as I walk 
— I have a place I can call home.

"Your happiness, will you show me your happiness?"

title: LATEX, LEATHER, LIPSTICK, LOVE, LUST
description:
My social circles are divided into three, stalwart, mutually exclusive groups.

A first of chronically online Tumblr users. I've drifted in and out of several and now exist in one with next to no ties to my home country.

A second of extremely normal heterosexuals. The worst they've seen are Instagram wellness reels and Discord does not exist to them.

And now, apparently, a third of rubber-coated kinksters who want to rearrange my guts.

I feel like someone like me shouldn't have a third.

[From [url=https://lithobreakers.itch.io/latex-leather-lipstick-love-lust]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Oujo ni Ko no Ai o
Daniel to Kurayami Gakkou no Nana Fushigi
Ai to wa Anata o Hakai Suru Mahou
Chian ga Warui BL ni Hasamatte Inochi o Tenbin ni Kakeru Novel Game

description:
Avan did his best to ignore the nightmare from the night before. It was something he'd learned to live with - something he'd dealt with since childhood. It was easy to write them off until the pain he'd felt in his dreams followed him into the morning.

The young man holds his aching hand as he makes his way to the watchtower he'd been summoned to. A little girl was found dead in the woods outside the city early that morning. Her body was covered in black blood, a sign that something sinister lurks outside the city walls. A number of reports on the Guard Captain's desk suggest she's just one of many victims. Against the wishes of the Lord, Avan is tasked with investigating the scene where the young girl's body was found. The night before he was set to depart, two strange figures visited his dreams. They came with an eerie message:

"Executioner...your first and your final trial waits for you there...at the temple."

It didn't mean anything. At least not then.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2997900/Divine_Omen/]Steam[/url]]
title: Divine Omen

description:
At the beginning of a new semester, you arrive in Tokyo as a new college student.
But will everything happen as usual?
"Recently, the number of unusual incidents in Tokyo reached five..."
"Incidents with unknown causes have occurred one after another..."
What's going on?
Meanwhile, a mysterious girl descends before you...
title: Unto Starlight
YOU and HIM CAIN
description:
Experience the world through Cain's eyes in the first installment of YOU and HIM's prequel series. 

What events took place before YOU entered the picture?

[From [url=https://unknown-hermit.itch.io/you-and-him-cain]itch.io[/url]]

title: Shiritsu ♥ Hoso Macho Gakuen!! ~Natsu da! Mizugi da!! Hentai da ♥~

aliases: モノマギア・カンタービレ～プレリュード～
title: Monomagia Cantabile ~prelude~
Noonna The Rock
description:
Welcome to 2028, where science bridges the human world and demon realm!
Step into the shoes of 'Jun-Yeop', a struggling singer-songwriter thrust into the heart-pounding world of death metal.
After a crushing audition defeat, Jun-Yeop's fate takes an explosive turn when a mysterious record label president scouts him.
Prepare for a pulse-racing journey as Jun-Yeop joins a death metal band, crossing paths with unforgettable characters:

'Botzzi' - A prodigy bassist with fingers that ignite the strings
'NoonNa' - A demon vocalist whose voice can shatter dimensions

But this is more than just a music adventure. It's a choice-driven odyssey where your decisions shape Jun-Yeop's destiny. Will you guide him to rock stardom, otherworldly romance, or something beyond imagination?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3167660/]Steam[/url]]

You are an anomaly, you shouldn't be here yet here you are. On an island tinted by a curse and colored by beautiful women. How will this story unfold?

[From [url=https://bleakhill.itch.io/island-in-yellow]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Island in Yellow

description:
Accompany Edward, Erica, and Diego on this exciting journey of discovery, where the boundaries of trust and love will be challenged.​

[From F95Zone]
title: My Netorase Obsession
Sandy Planet - Season 1
description:
In Sandy Planet - Season 1, you take on the role of Ralph Afraidies, the last heir of the once-mighty House Afraidies. The Emperor has placed the fate of Abrakis in your hands, trusting you to manage its resources and navigate the deadly politics of the Great Universe. But governing Abrakis is no simple task—it’s a trial that will test your wits, your body, and your very soul.

As Ralph, you are thrust into a world where the stakes are higher than ever. The Saint Mother, a figure of immense power and mystery, oversees your journey, guiding and testing you through a series of challenges that are as seductive as they are dangerous. Every encounter, every choice you make, is a step toward proving your worth—not just as a leader, but as a man capable of handling the immense pressures of ruling over Abrakis.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3034600/Sandy_Planet__Season_1/]Steam[/url]]

There's an ancient tradition: a rite of passage where a young adult leaves their home, travels the country for a year, and returns ready to start a family. It's a custom from a bygone era, seldom practiced in modern times due to its dangers and hardships.

But seeking to break free from the confines of your small town, and yearning for a *cough* [i]deeper connection[/i] with the world and its inhabitants, you set out to follow this old path to discover the world, and its people ;)

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2859130/For_One_Year/]Steam[/url]]
title: For One Year

description:
In Space Rescue you play as Keen - a shy mechanic that just landed his first job on a 'Rescue & Relax' ship. Keen's task is simple, make repairs wherever needed! But everytime Keen lends a hand, he always ends up in ever stranger and more sexy adventures! And so the real question is - can Keen keep a cool head as he attempts to fulfil his crewmates needs? Or will things run hot beyond his control!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1407210/Space_Rescue_Code_Pink/]Steam[/url]]
title: Space Rescue: Code Pink

description:
The Lion's Song is a series of four self-contained point & click stories connected into an overarching narrative, where player choices will affect the way in which the story unfolds. Set against the backdrop of early 20th century Austria, every episode follows a different character, each blessed with an exceptional creative mind. The game pulls players into a story of personal struggle for creativity, human connections and inspiration.

[From [url=https://www.lionssonggame.com/]official website[/url]]
title: The Lion's Song
Beyond the Last Dream
description:
You play as Tara, a girl who is trying to figure out the meaning behind her repeated dream. 

[From [url=https://raincity.itch.io/beyond-the-last-dream]itch.io[/url]]

You play as the lively witch Elmira whose dream it is to win the annual potion-making competition! As you embark on a journey to collect ingredients, you meet new faces while trying to avoid causing shenanigans! 

Each day, you will be offered an option that will help you collect an ingredient. 

[From [url=https://raincity.itch.io/cauldron-chronicles]itch.io[/url]]
title: Cauldron Chronicles
Dakara Watashi wa Mahou Shoujo o Yameta
description:
Trika lost contact with her friend, Watanabe-chan, one day.

The last message she received directed her to the aquarium, which turned out to be a maze and a haunted aquarium. While wandering through the maze in search of her friend, she encounters a monster.

A woman with an unusual appearance suddenly appears and fights the monster.

This woman, who calls herself a magical girl, uses flames to repel the monster. Trika encounters the magical girl who fights the monster called "Kuyose."

This was the beginning of days that would change her ordinary life. 

*copilot translation*

title: Time Rabbit
description:
It was in the winter of her youth that she met a teenager.

This is where the story begins.

Incredible teenager and her, two people love story.

In the village, three mothers experience a night of madness filled with nightmares, lust and fear.
These events lead them to the church, unbeknownst to each other.
Will they be able to share their experiences with complete honesty?
Were they truly innocent, or did each of them pay the price for their sins?​
title: Mother Village
Kono Te ni Tsukamu Tame no Joshou
The Synthetic
description:
Aaron is a recent high school graduate with a passion for computer science. He struggles to communicate with people, a trait exacerbated by the domineering, tense, and rule-bound nature of his "landlady", Ariana Caldwell. Stemming from a trauma in her early years, Ariana tries to maintain a tight grip on Aaron, leading him to become even more introverted. To escape from Ariana's overbearing presence, Aaron immerses himself in computers and starts working on an artificial intelligence he created.

[From F95Zone]

Surya and Kavin are strangers destined to cross paths with each other. When their fated meeting finally happens, one will be thrust into the world of supernatural, filled with magic, apparitions, and prophesies.

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/93branches/about]Patreon[/url]]
title: Twin Eclipse
Shattered Souls
description:
Celeste finds herself fighting for her life after enduring a betrayal that no one should experience.

As she nears her final breath, she is whisked away to a different world: Remoire.

 Things are not as they seem, though. She’s not a mortal. Her past is as vast as the ocean. Her soul is fractured and barely holding together from the traumas she’s faced and forgotten. She must heal herself or even the tiniest tragedy could shatter her. But she’s not the only one who is broken.

Join Celeste as she fights not only to save her own life, but to change the lives of those around her. 

Will you traverse worlds, realms, and even time itself? Will you test your fate? Will you try again?

[From [url=https://eternal-love-studios.itch.io/shattered-souls-demo]itch.io[/url]]

On a warm summer day, young Emily invites a few friends to join her for a vacation at her home, where she lives with her single father. What they don’t know is that Emily’s friend Jessica has far more than just a harmless evening planned…​
title: An Evening Of Events
Danger World
description: Danger World is visual novel with light RPG elements. Dive into the story of our three heroes as they go forth into darkness and danger. Start by chasing the thief who stole the gem protecting our protagonists' village. Pick your path to victory as you unravel the mysteries of Lady Darkwood's evil influence. Engage in combat and navigate your way through social interactions to save your protagonists' homeland from certain doom. Danger World will be available on iOS and Android in 2024 and on Steam soon after.

title: My Cute Mio-Chan
description: It's a short visual novel about us as a main character and Mio Akiyama which is actually a character of manga serie "K-ON!".  The story which has started by accidental meeting in the train. How will two shy and introverted persons communicate with each other and will we get something more?

The story is set in winter, at Seibunka Private Academy in Asahikawa, Hokkaido. The protagonist, Subaru Sakaki, and his childhood friend, Honoka Takamura, are excited as the final Christmas party of their school life approaches. However, their joyful days are shattered by the sudden news that their classmate Miyabi Yashiro and homeroom teacher Asuka Yuri have been murdered. And their close friend Kazuha Shinozaki has been arrested as the murder suspect. Believing in their friend’s innocence, Subaru and Honoka begin their investigation to uncover the truth behind the incident, but behind the scenes, someone deeply connected to a “certain secret” of theirs is pulling the strings.

[Translated by [url=https://www.gematsu.com/2024/09/entergram-announces-mystery-visual-novel-dawning-subaru-and-the-owl-lurking-in-the-twilight-for-ps4-switch-and-pc]Gematsu[/url]]
aliases: Dawning Subaru, and The Owl lurking in the twilight.
title: Tasogare ni Hisomu Fukurou to, Akegata no Subaru
Mugenrou to Nemurenu Chou
aliases: Mugen ro to Nemure nu chou

description:
You find yourself standing before a mysterious tree; upon its branches perch seven crows rumored to offer the most curious blessings . . . for a price. Beseeching them with empty hands, you have yet to find out how much you can win or lose.

[From [url=https://lunarlichen.itch.io/crow-of-hearts]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Crow of Hearts
Unsatisfied
description:
A junior high school student got a pretty good grade, but he doesn’t like it. You play as the teacher and start talking with him to try to understand what’s wrong and search the right words to put his mind to peace.

[From [url=https://komehara.itch.io/unsatisfied]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Condo Desires
description:
Welcome to Condo Desires, a provocative and immersive adult visual novel that thrusts you into the heart of a community condominium filled with captivating women, each with their own secrets and desires. As the new trustee of the condo, it’s up to you to navigate the complex relationships with the diverse and alluring female residents, uncovering their hidden fantasies and satisfying their deepest cravings.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3205430/]Steam[/url]]

"Things don't die from my hatred nor my love, it isn't a hobby nor is it job; death happens because I happen."

Kohaku Jisatsu tries to commit suicide, but is stopped by Reaper, the Embodiment of Death. Reaper doesn't want Kohaku to pass away, and tries to save him.

[From [url=https://cyborg-cant-eat-pizza.itch.io/death-loves-me]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Death Loves Me
Eydolon
description:
Eidolon is the Spirit of Inspiration, an ephemeral being embodied from shimmering golden dust. He can take on human form for ease of communication with people.

Eidolon is called upon when the creative spark in a person goes out. To do this, you need to find a secluded place where a person feels calm and free. It is necessary to light a candle made of natural wax, and, looking at its flame, whisper the following words:

"Oh, Eidolon, Spirit of Inspiration, hear my call. My heart went cold and my thoughts froze. Please revive my spirit, give me back the thirst to create. I promise to be faithful to your gift and bring it to the world."

[From [url=https://cyborg-cant-eat-pizza.itch.io/eidolon]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Tsubakiyashiki no Bourei
description:
The time is the early Showa era.
A letter arrived at the Mikage office.
A series of murders that occurred in the Sakaki and Hirunuma families.
The investigation comes to an end without the truth being solved.
A request arrives to uncover the truth of the case.
However, the sender is a person named Hazuki Hirunuma, who should have died 15 years ago.
Mystery begets mystery, and Mikage Fukuro takes on the challenge as an armchair detective.

title: High School Unsimulation
description:
High School Unsimulation is a mental health advice game in the style of a visual novel. It features cute characters, straightforward life tips, and emotional response strategies. As the title suggests, it will be most helpful for high schoolers, but it features relaxing guides that can benefit practically anyone.

[From [url=https://lunarlichen.itch.io/high-school-unsimulation]Itch.io[/url]]

After waking up with a hole in her ceiling, a cosmic space Orb embedded in her chest and no recollection of basically anything, Ghost sets out to continue her life as best she can. 

[From [url=https://das-kunstkollektiv.itch.io/llrpg]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Lovely Lady RPG

description:
I always thought my student life would pass by without much to remember.

Getting to class early for no real reason, half-listening to the teacher with my mind elsewhere, longing for the bell to ring so I could go home without saying a word to anyone. Sometimes, I’d wish for something—anything—to break up the monotony, but deep down, I figured my youth had already slipped away.

"I am sparky happy Tenshi-chan! An angel on a mission to make the world overflow with happiness!"

And as if in answer to my silent prayers, an unbelievably suspicious angel appeared before me, cherry blossoms swirling around her.

"If you're really an angel, then make me happy."
"Do I take that as a proposal? Not even an angel can help someone who won’t reach for happiness themselves." 
"Happiness... But where am I supposed to find mine?" 
"That's easy! The answer is love, of course." 
"Love, huh..."

I've never been in love, nor has anyone loved me. But maybe, just maybe, if I could fall in love, I might still have a chance to live my youth to the fullest.

"Very well, this Tenshi-chan will bless you until the day you become the true protagonist of your story."

And so begins the story of how I become a "Protagonist"—whatever that means.

[Translated and edited from the [url=https://www.asa-pro.com/koihaji/story/]official website[/url]]
title: Ren'ai, Hajimemashite
A Daydream Away
description:
A Daydream Away is a short Kinetic Novel that follows the relationship between the reader and the high-spirited Elaina. What starts as a chance encounter blossoms into much more, until a bittersweet twist is revealed. Are happy endings truly possible, or are they only found in Hollywood and dreams? 

[From [url=https://teenage-suburbia-studios.itch.io/a-daydream-away]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Natsuiro Hinata ~Ecchi na Kanojo to Tokeau Kokoro~
description:
You're back at the scenery that has been familiar to you since you were a child. The air is comfortable even now that you're an adult. 

The energetic, nostalgic and nostalgic voice echoes in the summer sky. In my sight, I see the same girl as before. Her smile was as bright as the summer sun. 

The town where I was born and raised. The same summer as always. The same time is waiting for me. That's what I thought.

But I had no idea at the time that this summer would change us.

[From [url=https://www.ammolite-game.com/amml_037/amml_037.html#link_story]official site[/url]]

Based on Wu Cheng’Em’s Chinese novel “Journey to the West”, this adventure game stars four heroines, who utilize the Four Elements in a futuristic setting, battling demonic forces that are set on destroying the Goku civilization.

Much of the game consists of cutscenes. Gameplay occurs when the player is presented with menu options. The option chosen determines how the story unfolds. In some parts of the game are playable fighting matches, requiring carefully chosen inputs to win.

[From [url=https://www.mobygames.com/game/215010/toho-chinyuki-hafling-hearts/]MobyGames[/url]]
title: Touhou Chinyuuki: Halfling Hearts!!
The Perfect Woman
description:
You're an AI girlfriend, trapped by your creator, who wants to carve you into his ideal spouse. If you want to survive, you'll have to become the "perfect woman".

[From [url=https://chattercap.itch.io/the-perfect-woman]itch.io[/url]]

title: Tokyo 7th Sisters
description:
Tokyo 7th Sisters (Tokyo 7th シスターズ) is a Japanese idol raising simulation and rhythm game released for iOS and Android in February 2014,[1] developed and published by Donuts Co. Ltd.[2] with music produced and published under record label Victor Entertainment. The game has a story mode (called Scout in-game) in which players search for idol cards while progressing through the story and a battle mode in which players battle other players or certain in-game characters using their idol cards.

The story centers on "new generation" idols from the studio "777 (Three Seven)", referred to as Nanastar, in the year 2034, in a future where idols are considered a thing of the past. The player acts as the manager of Nanastar, whose job is to recruit and train a number of different girls by collecting and leveling collectible cards. The cast of characters includes more than 50 fully-voiced, unique idols from different backgrounds. 

(from [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tokyo_7th_Sisters]Wikipedia[/url])

You are excited about your new life. Amidst the cherry blossoms softly fluttering down, you see a shrine.

With a strange sense of déjà vu, you head for the shrine and there you find...

[translated from [url=https://novelgame.jp/games/show/9592]NovelGame[/url].]
title: Tooi Hi no Yakusoku

description:
The theme this time is situational experience!
The long-awaited real-time version of Blue Arrow Garden's Illustrated Shade 3D is now super sexy!

Experience a night with a cute young wife who will listen to your embarrassing and naughty requests for the person you love!

Finally, my reunion with my first love from ten years ago… And he didn't even notice it was me! In that case… I'll just have to make him fall for the new me then!​

From [[url=https://www.dlsite.com/maniax/work/=/product_id/RJ01249081.html/?locale=en_US/]DLsite[/url]].
title: One Night ~Ichiyakagiri no Osanazuma~
Sluchaj v kazino
description:
"The Casino Incident" is a well-known video meme in Russia, where a client at the casino artfully expresses his dissatisfaction with the "wrong" deck of cards.

Why not turn this meme into a visual novel? Done!

In the aftermath of an apocalypse that left the world decaying, survivors live in small societies. The Great Appearance, an unknown presence, communicates with some of the survivors through their dreams or in some other way.

The Crimson Call follows the journey of Behich and his friend Yerchi, two young pilgrims determined to uncover the truth behind this enigmatic force. As they traverse a landscape of decay and desperation, they will encounter other survivors and learn their stories.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3148240/]Steam[/url]]
title: The Crimson Call
Can we be three?
description:
Yolanda Rogers' career just hit rock bottom. Her star client, pop sensation Lamar Jelly, is behind bars for flinging his faeces at his drummer in a wild concert meltdown. Fired from her law firm and desperate for a change, Yolanda escapes to the sunny Dominican Republic for some much-needed R&R. But what starts as a simple vacation takes an unexpected twist when she runs into not one, but two of her ex-girlfriends—who are now happily together. Seeing their bliss sparks a bold idea in Yolanda: why not turn this love triangle into something even more exciting?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3221490/]Steam[/url]]

Takagi Haru was a normal university student with an abnormal passion for stargazing. His average life changed, however, when an alien princess from another planet crash-landed on the roof of his university at night and declared her love for him.

Haru thought that Ena and her wacky antics were all he had to deal with, but he then discovers that his friend, Hiyori, is hiding a huge secret of her own.

Hiyori has to leave Haru and Ena, but Haru wants to reunite with her. Haru misses Hiyori, and so embarks upon a journey across the galaxy to see her: a journey he accomplishes with his wannabe alien-bride Ena and Ena’s trusty maid sidekick Revi.

Though Haru has always loved stargazing, he’s never travelled amongst them before. What will happen during his adventure, and will he be able to rescue Hiyori?

He’s going to do his very best – but things would be a lot easier if Revi would stop flirting with him!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3022500/]Steam[/url]]
title: Sakura Alien 3

description:
You are a priest of the loving goddess Philanthra. She bestows visions upon you, and one of those visions guided you to a certain town. What destiny awaits you there? Does the answer have anything to do with a mischievous goblin girl landing on your face? Each day, she mysteriously crashes into your life, flipping through the air and vanishing into the crowds. Is it a simple coincidence or a sign from the goddess guiding your path?

[From [url=https://ukigumosama.itch.io/goblin-relations]itch.io[/url]]
title: Goblin Relations
Leatherbound
description:
Life in the palace isn't always the most exciting, not for the daughter of an advisor.

The private library is your solace, one you share with no one—besides the mysterious person who leaves notes in the columns of the pages of the books you read. Their inquisitive spirit and witty retorts have you hooked, and you yearn to learn more from their fount of knowledge.

Sadly, the peace of the library never lasts, as your place is stolen by the younger Prince—who despises your every being.

Can you make peace with the Prince, and discover the source of the notes?

[From [url=https://lunamakaio.itch.io/leatherbound]itch.io[/url]]

title: Dapeng - The Roc
description:
Due to work, Wu Shengyou was forced to leave home for high school in a big city. The sensitive, introverted poet felt out of place with classmates. As they grew closer, he seemed her only friend, yet appeared to completely misunderstand her inner thoughts...

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1389900]Steam[/url]]

title: A Totally Normal Game About Cute Monkeys
description:
Join Jim-Bob Jabbawock, a cute lil' monkey who's looking forward to a bright future, and his friends for a memorable romp! We've got the philosophical and introverted Soft Stevie, the outspoken and mischievous Banana Yoergen, and who can forget THE GRUNGE, the resident music-loving bestie who's always there for his friends in their time of need! 


[From [url=https://tymedust.itch.io/a-totally-normal-game-about-cute-monkeys]itch.io[/url]]

title: Seventet Cross
description:
Yusia is a college student aiming to become a police officer. She accidentally ends up at a murder scene and is mistaken for the killer, ending up in prison. In her despair, she meets a group of unique inmates. With their help, she starts looking for a way to escape. However, during her investigation, she notices something strange happening inside the prison.

"This prison... something's not right..."

Yusia and the others get caught up in this strange occurrence. Will they be able to work together and successfully break out of prison?

[Translated from the [url=https://sites.google.com/view/satukinoyumeokiba/game/sevunntettokurosu?authuser=0]official site[/url]]

The Goddess of the Harvest, Demeter, lived in relative peace with her daughter Persephone. However, upon her sudden disappearance, Demeter must search for her far and wide. Will she discover what happened to her, or will her grief freeze the world over?

[From [url=https://florisam.itch.io/demeter-the-harvest-dies-with-you-demo]itch.io[/url]]
title: Demeter: The Harvest Dies With You
EmyLiveShow: Case of Four Hot Witnesses
description:
A rookie investigator's first case leads them to four sexy girls. It can stop them... or make them even more determined to find the solution.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3195400/]Steam[/url]]

title: Ganymede, by Lucian
description: Short VN based on the Dialogues of the Gods, by Lucian, specifically the dialogue "Ganymede and Zeus".

You awake to find yourself in a cold, dark room.

There is someone else in the darkness with you.

You have no idea who it is.

[From [url=https://ceoofbadart.itch.io/debasement]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Debasement
Jiang zhe Sinian Chuanda yu ni
Haou Senki Raimu
description:
Synopsis

One day, a spaceship came flying by.
The owner of the spaceship calls himself Professor Kirazaki and declares that he will conquer Earth.
The protagonist infiltrates the interior of the spaceship, but is discovered by Professor Kirazaki.
Just as he is about to be captured, a girl falls from the sky and saves him.
[From [url=https://s-digi.jp/lilim/02_soft/01_lilim/22_raimu/01-e.html] Official site[/url]]

Cosima Farfali has a secret, she is a manasi, a human capable of magic. When she leaves for college she encounters a friend of her father, who gets her involved in a ritual where she has to fight for her life alongside Eloisa Cobossi, a mage from 200 years ago, at the same time she discovers the secrets of her family and her existence.
title: Cosima Farfali from the Farfali House
Hangin' With Styx
description:
Come hang out with Styx! Play a video game, scratch behind his ears or maybe try and land a kiss. 

[From [url=https://angeluscult.itch.io/hangin-with-styx]itch.io[/url]]

Take control of wherever Sariel decides to take his afternoon walk! To the beach? Sure! Grab a bite to eat? Hell yeah, do what you want, bro! The Library? Woohoo, books! The choice is yours.

[From [url=https://angeluscult.itch.io/sariel-goes-on-a-walk]itch.io[/url]]
title: Sariel Goes on a Walk
Help! I Need to Stretch Out For Valentines Day!
description: AAAH! My boyfriend and his enormous junk are coming over for Valentine's day! I need to stretch out before he gets here!

title: My Little Sister Callie
description:
My Little Sister Callie is a visual novel about a brother helping his little sister to adapt to life outside of a refugee camp.

You grew up next to The Wall, an imposing concrete edifice that separated the city from the Displacement Zone, a lawless refugee camp full of displaced people. Your father ran a free clinic in the DZ until his passing five years ago, but your life in the city was largely removed from the desperate plight of the people on the other side of The Wall.

All that changes when you meet Callie, a hungry little girl who has escaped from the Displacement Zone. After Callie is returned to the dangerous Displacement Zone you make up your mind to help her any way you can. When you find out that Callie is your little sister, how far will you go to bring her home?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3182390/]Steam[/url]]

title: SYHNAL: Nezvidani zemli
description:
Signal: Uncharted Lands is a visual novel set in an unusual post-apocalyptic world. Members of a new civilization set out to uncover a mysterious signal. Where does this signal come from? What dangers await the explorers on their journey through uncharted wastelands? Will they reach their goal, or will something stand in their way? Find answers to these and other questions in this novel!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3194380/]Steam[/url]]

Date cute girls with 1-dimensional personalities and even worse artwork!

[From [url=https://ceoofbadart.itch.io/empty-hearts-dating-sim]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Empty Hearts ~ Love After Death

description:
They say there is such a thing as a parallel world.

One night in the middle of the night, I stood in front of a mirror and there was "the other me.
The "I" told me "scary stories about the world next door.

[From [url=https://novelgame.jp/games/show/10335?lang=EN]Website[/url]]
title: Tonari no Sekai no Watashi no Class

description:
You found a treasure map in an old warehouse.
The place where the treasure is hidden is your hometown.
There are women who welcome you back in my hometown after a long time.
Takane, Asami, Mio
Why don't you experience various stories with three beautiful women?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2639100]Steam[/url]]
title: Inari

description:
Sent on a perilous mission by the kingdom of Luminarium to slay the dark queen Arvenia, you find yourself her prisoner, forced to work as her slave within the now derelict castle. You believe your life to be at its painful end, as you expect to toil away serving her every dark whim.

... But all is not as it seems, the dark queen lives alone within her towering fortress, and she isn’t who, or what, you were told she would be.

Can you unravel the mysteries of the dark queen? Who is she really? What does she want from you?

…And will you even live to tell the tale?

Whatever you choose, her majesty awaits...

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3042250/Her_Last_Piece/?curator_clanid=4777282]Steam[/url]]
title: Her Last Piece
Muku de Junsui na Kokoro wo Yogoshitai
aliases: I Want to Destroy a Pure and Gracious Soul

title: Sacrifice Maneuver
description:
United Star Systems of Via Lactea is an utopistic society unifying inhabitants of the member planets and their colonies. One of the planets striving for membership is Earth. Currently, several students from Earth are fighting for their spot at the Union Academy to become members of the famed Union Fleet. One of them is the heroine of our game - the first human on the prestigious leadership program. On her first mission she befriends the team consisting of other outsiders - standoffish Antaeus, friendly Brynhildr, quiet Bastian and shy Kairo. The idyllic mission soon turns into a fight for survival. How will our cadets cope with their first deployment?

[From [url=https://painappuruproject.itch.io/sacrifice-maneuver]itch.io[/url]]

Waking up in a cramped white box, you don't remember who you are or how you got here. Together with you is a mysterious man, calm and indifferent to your horror. There are only cold walls around, and not a drop of water, not a piece of food... Five days. Five days of hopelessness, hunger and madness. Can you remember your past, get out of the box and stay human?

[From [url=https://cyborg-cant-eat-pizza.itch.io/the-cat-in-the-box]itch.iop[/url]]
title: The Cat In The Box

description:
Oh no! Mayu’s in a pinch! She’s woefully behind on paying the rent, and her scary landlady, Miss Himemiya, has issued an ultimatum. Mayu needs to earn ¥100,000 by the end of October, or she’ll be kicked out!

Being evicted from her home would be bad enough, but Mayu has a secret: she’s actually a vampire. Mayu hasn’t been a vampire for a full year yet, and the church is keeping close tabs on her to ensure she’s been behaving herself. According to the stone-faced Sister Juriel, it’s the church’s standard policy to execute all vampires without a fixed address, lest they start roaming the streets causing chaos.

If Mayu can’t pay the rent in time, she won’t just wind up homeless: she’ll be executed! What’s a fledgeling vampire to do?

Assume control of Mayu and manage these tumultuous two weeks of her life. Help her raise money to avoid a grisly end, all while managing her stress levels and forming relationships with girls over the internet. You never know: come Halloween, Mayu might be able to land a date, and she might even get to nibble on a cute girl’s neck!

Do your best, and don’t let this upcoming Halloween be Mayu’s last! She’s counting on you!

[From [url=https://ebihime.itch.io/shut-in-vampire]itch.io[/url]]
title: Shut-in Vampire
Mother's Love
description:
After getting separated from her mother, a small bear cub named Faith comes across a strange manor in the forest. There, she meets a woman named Gwen who takes her in, but then strange things begin to happen during her stay at the manor.

Can Faith reunite from her mother while safely navigating the strange manor?

They built a railgun.

[From [url=https://gubbles.itch.io/they-built-a-railgun]Itch.io[/url]]
title: They Built a Railgun!?
L'amour à Meursault
description:
A short dating sim that takes place in Bungou Stray Dogs' prison 'Meursault'
[From [url=https://ryartchus.itch.io/lamourameursault]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Breaking and FEMtering
description:
Spanky the Fox has found himself in a precarious situation! Can YOU help him maintain his manhood in the face of frilly adversity? (You can't. But it'll be funny to try!)

[From [url=https://rusheloc.itch.io/breaking-and-fem-tering]itch.io[/url]]

title: Handsome Laundering -the mystic lover-
description:
This new story begins with the audio drama as the prequel (Episode 0)!
A love-mystery adventure where bonds are forged through solving mysteries.

“Will you find—love or malice?”

The popular laundromat café, L&L Café, has a rumor circulating among the city’s residents:

“They take on secret requests and fulfill the wishes of troubled individuals.”

After a certain incident, you find yourself knocking on L&L’s door, where you’ll team up with its eccentric staff to solve the case.


[from [url=https://otomekitten.com/2024/09/19/handsome-laundering-the-mystic-lover-samudari-is-coming-to-the-nintendo-switch/]Otomekitten[/url]]

title: Monster in My Office
description:
What if suddenly one day all your loneliness turns into a lovesick monster who's willing to do anything to get close to you?

This is exactly what happened with the main protagonist, a regular Japanese man named Ryou Yuto. In this game you'll have to play from his perspective and survive a week in a once boring office now turned bloody massacre.

[From [url=https://ghrqq.itch.io/monster-in-my-office]Itch.io[/url]].

title: Tsuushinbo Another Story Disc ~Hitori de Dekiru mon!, Himitsu no Yoshuu~
description:
This is a collection of three short stories taking place after each girl’s first time.

Originally came as a pre-order bonus disc with the initial physical release of [url=/v17972]Tsuushinbo ~Mama ni mo Naisho no Jikanwari~[/url].

title: Roku Shimai no Karei Naru Maisoufu
Idol to Stalker ~Tashika ni Kimi ga Suki deshita~
Astreon
description:
In the year 2032, humanity stands on the brink of a technological breakthrough. A new material, developed by a group of scientists, possesses not only extraordinary strength, hyper-elasticity, and energy-saving properties, but also a unique, or rather exceptional, ability to self-repair. This capability turned the material into a regenerative pill, allowing people with limited abilities to become fully functional humans, while also making them stronger, smarter, and even extending their lifespan. 

However, fearing the consequences of such power, the scientists decide to destroy the records, reports, and everything related to their research. They scattered, each going their own way. But as is often the case, someone found the remnants of this work. Ignoring the dangers, they decided to complete it, which eventually led to the formation of a globally banned terrorist organization called "Masquerade." In response, leaders of major corporations launched a large-scale operation to eliminate the individual responsible and eradicate everything related to the research. 

You are a former soldier, unable to bear the guilt of the atrocities committed during the operation. You retreat to a remote location on the edge of the world, a small town cut off from the rest of civilization, where you planned to live a peaceful life with your wife and children, far removed from all the troubles of the past. 

But, as often happens, things do not go according to plan. One day, when your wife goes on a business trip to a certain research institute, she suddenly stops contacting you. In an attempt to find out what happened, you embark on a journey. Days, weeks, months, and years pass... Eventually, you come to terms with the fact that you may never see your wife again, burying all your emotions deep inside. Then, one day, your son arrives, asking for your help and with a glimmer of hope that not all is lost, that there is still a small chance to restore your peaceful life.

[From [url=https://noglory.itch.io/astreon]Itch.io[/url]]

title: KANADE
description:
In the near future, a sudden and unexplained proliferation of plants has left much of human civilization drowning in greenery.
Yuuto is a boy living in a once-thriving city that's now largely reclaimed by nature.
One day, a girl named Kanade appears on his doorstep.
The two had been exchanging letters after Kanade found one of Yuuto's carrier pigeons injured and nursed it back to health.
Kanade then reveals her biggest secrets, too important to write in a letter:
The fact that she's half alien, half human, and that she's on a mission to save the world with her song.
She sings before the bewildered Yuuto, demonstrating her power to pacify the plants.

"I have to sing the greatest love song and save the world in my mother's place.
Yuuto-san, would you please fall in love with me?"

After the disappearance of her mother,
Kanade was left clueless as to how to save the world, or why she had to fall in love in order to do so.
Everything seemed shrouded in mystery.
Still, Kanade's earnest wish stirs something within Yuuto,
who is always ready to lend a helping hand to those in need, and he decides to take a chance on her.
Warmly watched over by those around them, the two tentatively begin their exploration of love.
What neither of them realize is that a spark of affection has already budded between them...

This is the tale of a wondrous future where the encounter between a boy and girl brings a miracle to the world.

[From [url=https://kanade.frontwing.co.jp/en/]official website[/url]]

title: Ano Hi no Kimi o Furimukasete.
description:
One day, the protagonist, Naomichi, realizes that he’s time-leaping.
He doesn’t know why, but this must be a chance given to him by God!
He remembers his many failures and the girl he likes, Yuu.
If he corrects his mistakes one by one, maybe he’ll be able to “fall in love” with her!?
Thinking this, Naomichi begins to revise his future little by little.
– However, he always ends up returning to the same day after about a month.

You wake up in a strange circus. And if that wasn’t creepy enough, that’s just the beginning…

Guided by the mysterious brothers Anvel and Braica, you must traverse throughout the abandoned circus in order to find what you need to escape. Along the way, you encounter the corrupted versions of the other members of the troupe, and must confront them to get to the one behind it all: the ringmaster. 

[From [url=https://moonlightgardens.itch.io/the-curtain-call]itch.[/url]]
title: The Curtain Call

description:
The story of The Pink Answer revolves around a poor soul (male) that has been sold by his father to The Pink Answer, a unscrupulous company that's in the bussiness of transforming the undisireable parts of the society into sexy products to satisfy any kinks.

You're not the poor soul of the story however, but the agent dedicated to make the transformation happen, to train and prepare him to be the best thing that will come out of TPA.

[From F95Zone]
title: The Pink Answer

description:
A corporation known as Sweet-N-Crispy Magical Corp has created a hyper-realistic virtual world known as WonderNet 999. This world is populated by Battle Bride-maidens, elite warriors who serve as the saviours of humanity.

However, Cherry Blossompunch, a former Battle Bride-maiden, lives offline and is aware of the dark secrets concealed by Sweet-N-Crispy. Now, she finds herself being hunted down as she searches for a way to expose the truth and bring down the corporation.
title: Sweet-N-Crispy Magical Corp

description:
Balanced between and online chat, and real life

The name Comfort Zone comes from the player that is put in difficult situations which then pushes them out of their "Comfort Zone".

[From [url=https://sidetracksb.itch.io/comfortzone]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Comfort Zone
The Less You Know
description:
Deer dad  tells his daughter a story about his time as an expeditioner. 

[From [url=https://mariaddity.itch.io/thelessyouknow]itch.io[/url]]

Follow Marie, a stubborn deer girl, as she attempts to uncover the mystery behind her parents' sudden demise!

[From [url=https://mariaddity.itch.io/deer-story-ch1]itch.io[/url]]
title: Deer Story
My Dear Friend Momo
description:
Follow Marie as she is accompanied by her friend Momo to fulfill a request! There are three possible endings!

[From [url=https://mariaddity.itch.io/my-dear-friend-momo]itch.io[/url]]

For the first time in years, Sonny meets a person he knows inside of his lucid dreams: a boy from his school who Sonny has never spoken with in real life.

Over the next few days, not only other people known to him appear in his dreams, but Sonny also realises that the things he said and did were reflected in real life. Now, divided between the events and experiences of real life and those that happen inside his lucid dreams, Sonny oscillates between living an ordinary life and in using his dreams to discover, understand and help the people around him.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3055530/Dare_to_Lucid_Dream/]Steam[/url]]
title: Dare to Lucid Dream
Wild Harmonies
description:
You've just moved to a new town and wake up in the care of a pack of werewolves! Not just any werewolves though; a band of singing musical werewolves! Get to know these lovable men while navigating polyamorous relationships, kinks, jobs, performances, and much more.

[From [url=https://mechapenguin.itch.io/wild-harmonies]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Accidentally Making Friends
description:
Chris is delinquent guy,  he was kicked out of four schools, this is his fifth now. He just wanted not to dropout again, and in the end even found friends, by accident.

[From [url=https://hyenaay.itch.io/accidentally-making-friends]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Whisper of the Past
description:
Hypildi (default name) is one of the last remaining humans in a world dominated by furries, each wielding an "Astros"—a manifestation of their inner magic and power. Hypildi, however, was born without an Astros, making him an outcast in this society where magic is everything. On top of that, he suffers from Urberwietch, a rare condition that renders him incapable of feeling fear, a trait that sets him even further apart from those around him.

Determined to find purpose, Hypildi joins the army, driven by a desperate need to protect his comatose sister. But his world is turned upside down when he is betrayed by those he trusted. As he navigates a life filled with danger, Hypildi is haunted by strange, vivid dreams that seem to point to a deeper mystery. He’s left with pressing questions: What do these dreams mean? Why was he born without an Astros? Can a human survive in a world ruled by magical furries? And will his inability to feel fear become his greatest asset—or his downfall?

[From [url=https://nightmaredrake.itch.io/whisper-of-the-past]Itch.io[/url]]
Lost in the cave, you would need to venture deeper to find the way to escape.
title: The Dark Cave
Haitoku no Micchaku Kairaku Ressha ~Kibishii Haha ga Miseru Midara na Sugao~
description:
"Why are mothers so annoying...."
I recall being scolded today and I sigh.
I have my own circumstances but she never listens.
Pent-up anger turns into an inferiority complex... and at some point, I started masturbating to videos of women who look like my mother.

One day, I saw my mother in a crowded train car.
She had a reserved and womanly face that I never see at home.
Her natural woman's inhibition ignites something in me.

The inferiority complex eating at me for a while now breaks.
――"I'll **** my mother like in that video...."
I quietly move toward her through the crowded train.

I never thought I'd molest my tiger mom in public....

title: Tokusatsu Heroine ni Naritai Kanojo ~Picchiri Suit de Haiboku ni You Watashi~
Hoka no Otoko ni Dakareru Koibito ~Tanin Bou ni Tsuranukareta Sono Koshi wa Kairaku o Motome Ookiku Futteiku~
Inmon Tougi Toshi Sodom ~Daikanshuu no Mae de Kyousei Jutaisaserareru Seisenki~
The Milk of Repentance, the Wine of Sin
description:
Angel Dust is the most popular porn star and prostitute in Hell. Kumakko, an internet starlet, falls in love with him, but he refuses her feelings. After the rejection, she resorts to having a strictly transactional relationship with him. Angel Dust’s boyfriend, Valentino, sees the relationship developing, and seeks to ruin them both through corruption, manipulation, and wreaking devastation upon anything that comes between him and Angel Dust.

Fan-game of the Amazon Prime adult cartoon series, Hazbin Hotel. In no way canonical to the main series, with the protagonist being an original character.

Source: https://jastusa.com/games/mtkm001/the-milk-of-repentance-the-wine-of-sin-pre-order

title: Engaging Snowflakes
description:
Rainn and Skye are a couple living in the snowy Lily Peaks of the remote Puffball region. Three years ago, they moved there because of Rainn's curse: heavy clouds follow her everywhere, so she cannot stay in any populated areas for a long time. Tonight, they are returning home from Puffball Town after a pizza date. As they drive across the frozen mountain wilderness, talking about everything and remembering events of their lives, something is bound to happen, making today unlike any other day.

Note: This 3D visual novel is the sequel to the author's early game [url=https://lezliz.itch.io/rainn-and-skye]Rainn and Skye[/url]. Playing the original isn't required to understand the story. This VN includes optional voice acting performed by the author.

title: Prikljuchenie Brodjagi
description:
You play as a big mutated dog in a world of sexy catgirls. I think there is no need to explain that you should use your "device" wisely. The fate of your soul depends on it.

[From [url=https://anonymous-almighty.itch.io/]Itch.io[/url]]

You wake up in an unfamiliar storeroom where you can hear nothing but the sound of waves. As you are trying to figure out why you are here, your reflection in a mirror speaks to you. The reflection tells you to lie, then disappears.
When you leave the storeroom, you meet people who call themselves the Seven Lucky Gods. According to one of them, Daikoku, you are a Human who was chosen to become a god. Most of them do not seem to welcome your sudden arrival.
Once the treasure ship returns to the human world in a year, will you become a god and join the others on the ship? Will you return to your original world as a human? Or will you...?
Your bittersweet year with the Seven Lucky Gods begins.
Source: https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/rainbow-sea-switch/
title: Niji no furu umi

description:
From a young age, you've known you were different. You're not sure when your attraction to other boys started, but you knew it wasn't normal, or rather, society taught you it wasn't. After years of turmoil, you decide the time to come out is now! Having recently turned 18, you spent a few days plotting out how to do it, what to say, and how to react to any response you may get. However, after coming out to a certain someone, your life takes a turn you couldn't have possibly planned for, and now, your journey to become the femboy you've always wanted to be begins.

[From [url=https://darkfate.itch.io/the-awakening-femboy-saga]Itch.io[/url]]
title: The Awakening - Femboy Saga

aliases: Thank You for Your Time: A Visual Novella
title: Thank You for Your Time
description:
"The outside world is a cold, harsh place. That's why you came here. The cavern provides you with a minimum of shelter and  - more importantly - the hope that you will one day be chosen to receive a place by the enormous fire hidden away in the dark depths below.

To be chosen, you will have to impress the inscrutable hooded figures that rule this place, but that is much easier said than done. Nobody has ever seen the Hoods react to an audition before - positively or negatively, or at all, and their Shadow servants never give anything away either.

And yet, there's always a chance. So long as you can outwait your competition.



Thank You for Your Time is a visual novella that I made with Ren’Py as a solo dev. It’s a surreal parable about audition purgatory, and about a difficult question: how long will you wait for your once-in-a-lifetime opportunity? 

The player will have to decide the answer that's right for themselves. I hope this game will be cathartic for anyone who has had to go for an audition or a job interview, or who has just felt stuck - so, most people. 

Play duration is about 40 minutes to an hour. The game features a final choice that leads to two different endings, as well as a few smaller choices along the way that also impact the story.

All of the images in this game are AI generated. The story and narrative design are my own. This is a passion project that cost me nothing to create. It should cost you nothing to play.

Created by Alex Laney with Ren'Py 

Game Tester / Best Girl: Lena Böse"

[From itch.io]

You wake up in a room and this guy is obsessed with you, but you don't even know who he is! Not knowing his intentions you have to decide, will you suffocate in his "love" or find a way to escape.

[From [url=https://jicama.itch.io/obsession]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Obsession
Milf Diary, I am Trying to Impregnate My Mom
description:
Sayako Ishihara" (44 years old), a mother who loves her only son very much. Sayako will do anything for her son.

The relationship between her and her son used to be very close, but since her son could not enter the university according to her husband's wishes, their relationship became strained.
Her husband often got angry, her husband's authoritarian nature made her son prefer to lock himself in his room.

Her husband's attitude had been like that for 2 years, it greatly affected the previously harmonious relationship in the family.

Now the family has become very foreign to Sayako and her son.
Sayako's son is named Sota. Sota, who used to have a very close relationship with his mother, now prefers to lock himself in his room because of pressure from his father.
He decided to become a game streamer.

As time went by, the relationship in the family became more complicated.
Sayako's husband who started having an affair with a young woman really hurt Sayako's feelings. The man was not at all interested in Sayako's old woman's body.
Sayako really suffered, because Sayako was actually a woman who had a high sex drive.
However, because of that, Sota, who didn't care about his mother, started to care about his mother again.

Sota, who was initially unlucky in the streaming world, suddenly got a lot of viewers when his mother was accidentally caught on camera.

Sayako decided to help Sota do Live streaming, for some reason, at the encouragement of the viewers, they might cross the boundaries of a normal relationship between mother and son. They might have an immoral relationship. Will they?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3122580/]Steam[/url]]

title: REPEAT IT BACK TO ME
description:
[i]He is sitting there, waiting for me again.

Did he invite me here? Were we here together, or did I follow him out here? I know I need to figure that out.[/i]

You've started to forget some of the bigger details. You want him to be the Elias you remember. He wants to be Elias, too. But something stands in the way of getting everything just right.

A familiar route through the forest. A face that's not quite right. A sun that won't go down and a day that won't ever end.

[From [url=https://skyshard.itch.io/repeat-it-back-to-me]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Depravity
description:
Depravity is a story of moral corruption. You are an industrious university student who lost his way and fortune in the wake of the great bitcoin crash. Reinvent yourself, fight your desires, or embrace your inner depravity.

Without a support network, it's time to go back home. Between jealous housemates and horny landladies, make new friends and strengthen old bonds as you forge relationships with a wide cast and diverse personalities...

[From [url=https://danteworks.itch.io/depravity]Official website[/url]]

title: Mama Haha wa Musuko o Aishiteru! 2 ~Mama ga Zenbu Oshiete Ageru♪ Yuuna Mama no Amayakashi Shasei Seikatsu~

description:
A young married couple continues their lives normally. However, one day, some things started to change. The biggest change was the main character's wife. What caused this change? The people around them or our main character? Maybe the past of our main character's wife. Play the game to find out what caused this change and accompany this adventure.

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/d3sirestudio/about]Patreon[/url]]
title: A Wife's Loyalty
Are You Really a Vampire???
description:
In search of inspiration for your next novel, you—a writer—arrive at Neverhill Village, far removed from the modern world and steeped in ancient traditions. With the help of an old acquaintance, you settle in, hoping to uncover the secrets behind the legends of vampires.

But something feels off in Neverhill. The villagers avoid discussing the very thing you came for, treating the topic of vampires like a forbidden subject. 

In the depths of an old, abandoned mansion, you meet a vampire

...a not-so-vampire-like one.

He doesn’t drink blood. 

He walks in daylight. 

And… he’s far too innocent, even adorable.

Wait—Are you really a vampire???

As you’re drawn into the strange charm of this vampire, buried mysteries from the village’s dark history begin to surface. A tragedy 15 years ago looms over everything, and you can’t help but question: What’s the truth behind Neverhill?

And more importantly... Can you trust this vampire? 

[From [url=https://plennty.itch.io/are-you-really-a-vampire]itch.io[/url]]

Somewhere in Spain, Federico Santiago de Luz is a student whose teacher has given him a novella to write about mourning. He will encounter Luisa Gonzales, a widow, and take inspiration from her life to write his story.

[From [url=https://fflo.itch.io/calle-del-verano-spooktober2024]itch.io[/url]]
title: Calle del verano
Esoterika
description:
The main character is a farmer in his late 20s living alone in the country side. He inherited the farm from his father and has been living off of it ever since he got out of university. One night he found a mysterious unconscious girl wearing armor on his farm (lucky guy).

She claim that her name is Celes and she's a knight that come from another world. She has no knowledge of this world and have nowhere to go. The MC offered to take her in. They start living together and develop a deep emotional connection.

But farming alone isn't exactly the most profitable business in this day and age, and MC want to eventually move to the big city to pursue a different career, and to show Celes a world beyond his small isolated farm, a world of corruption and temptation...

Could our main character protect her from the corruption of this world ?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2755790/Esoterika/]Steam[/url]]

ShoSakyu follows a lonely, impulsive guy (that's you) who finds a summoning book in a park one night after work. 

Upon using the book (without reading it) you're shocked to find our main girl of the story Nono, who is a succubus, knocking on your door to fulfill the contract you've unknowingly signed. Despite her determination however, it becomes painfully clear that Nono doesn't seem too cut out for the job. After an awkward first meeting, Nono ends up moving into the guest room, and you must try to resume your life as normal while taking care of her.

[From [url=https://ashynyuu.itch.io/shosakyu]itch.io[/url]]
aliases: The Succubus I Summoned is a Noob!?
title: ShoSakyu: The Succubus I Summoned is a Noob!?

description:
Turned into a werewolf  after an accident, you only have 5 days to undo the curse before the next full moon! With the help of your two friends, will you succeed in finding the cure? Or will you face the horrors that await if you don't?


In this horror visual novel, you'll need to acquire all the ingredients to create an elixir rumored to cure lycanthropy while also navigating your relationships with the two friends willing to help you along this journey. With the looming deadline of the full moon at the end of the week, failure could be fatal.

[From [url=https://porksbun.itch.io/sayounara-my-moon]itch.io[/url]]
title: Sayounara, My Moon

description:
Desperate to boost her viewership, a struggling streamer buys a mystery box from the Shadow Web for a special Halloween unboxing stream. What starts as a clever stunt quickly unravels into a night of terror, as the contents of the box take her—and her audience—on a sinister journey she never saw coming.

[From [url=https://ramose-tsimbina.itch.io/kryptouwu]itch.io[/url]]
title: KryptoUwU ~ I OPENED A MYSTERY BOX AND-

description:
A strange nameless game drives those who play it to madness. Who made this game, and what is its true nature?

[From [url=https://wandeer.itch.io/never-play-again]itch.io[/url]]
title: Never Play Again
ALICE - Bloodbath
description:
A curious Alice, drawn by a mysterious rabbit, finds herself tumbling a rabbit hole into a strange and wondrous world.

[From [url=https://itch.io/jam/spooktober-2024/rate/2995105]itch.io[/url]]

Elaina is the head of the Amberbulk High School AV Club. It's the week of Halloween, 2014, and she wants to set up a neat little scavenger hunt to drum up some Halloween school spirit. In the midst of this, she finds herself having odd dreams of a circus that feels all too real. A circus that no one else seems to know about about. Elaina is tempted to dig deeper, but it's clear something doesn't want her to. 

[From [url=https://batwingstastelikefebruary.itch.io/carne-dysphania]itch.io[/url]]
title: Carne Dysphania
A Future With a Forgotten Past
description:
What happens when Silver gets pulled back in time to a familiar location...? 

[From [url=https://jerseyl0ad1ng.itch.io/a-future-with-a-forgotten-past]itch.io[/url]]

title: Tricks, Treats and Mirrors - An EoG Side Story
description:
When a mysterious voice lures Echo into a secluded home promising her candy, her friends Misako and Princess must venture inside to save her, armed with nothing more the powers granted to them by their costumes.

Will they be able to uncover the dark truth buried within, or will they crumble like broken mirrors?

[From [url=https://lonelyrabbitgames.itch.io/tricks-treats-and-mirrors]itch.io[/url]]

title: Doctor Simulator
description: Examine female patients who enter your private practice.  Convince them to strip naked and undergo your thorough examination. But be careful not to raise their suspicion too high!

title: The River Bride
description:
"The River Bride" is a visual novel based on the events of the bridal sacrifices in Ancient China. Players play as Fu Suyu, the current year's bridal sacrifice. Experience how Fu Suyu deals with her fate through accepting her duty, fighting for her life, or even experiencing love for the last time.

[From [url=https://giogiogzg.itch.io/the-river-bride]itch.io[/url]]

title: Once Clover Died
description:
Clover is a black cat who lost one of her 9 lives after being scared to death by a recent break-in. With 8 lives left, she treads the world very carefully to avoid any other incidents that might lead to losing even more.

[From [url=https://arcadekitten.itch.io/once-clover-died]itch.io[/url]]

title: Exalting to the Ephemeral Eden
description:
Vehuia thought they were an angel. Memories of them indulging in the heavenly choir echo throughout their body. Yet, they find themselves living with invisible wings, and their feet stuck to the ground of the earth where humans reign. Vehuia knew that at some point they had been cast away, much like the fallen morning star of mythology. They no longer remembered why. They simply had to accept that they would continue living as they are.

Banished from the heavenly realm, yet unable to connect with any of the flesh of the earth, Vehuia passed their days living in a cemetery. Often hearing the cries and prayers of the desperate. None of this piety is ever directed to them, but rather towards a strange statue of the Archangel Michael found within the cemetery's grounds. Even though every cry they hear is different, the one similarity Vehuia always notices is that each prayer is a request for one thing: exorcising demons.

Vehuia knew it was arrogant of them, but they felt the need to make use of the body they had to exorcise demons on the statue's behalf. They didn't expect to receive praise from the archangel. Nor from any of the humans. They simply had to continue living, and exorcisms paid just enough to support their vagabond life.

However, though as effective as they were, they never saw themselves as a true exorcist. It wasn't a matter of pride or honor. They just never had any faith. They couldn't. Not as an angel with invisible wings. Not on this earth.

But one day...the statue of the archangel received a peculiar guest, a nun with scarlet eyes,  and request that was much unlike any Vehuia has ever undertaken...

A great demon was being invited. Sacrifices were made. The blood of witchcraft's familiars, black cats and toads, was spilled. All within the barriers of a holy monastery.

Even though it should have been impossible. Even though it was absurd.

Simply hearing the nun's plea was enough to cast a shadow over Vehuia that made them wonder if this case...would make their invisible wings finally come to light.

[From [url=https://venux-crucifix.itch.io/exalting-to-the-ephemeral-eden]Itch.io[/url]]

title: BABELOMANIA
description:
20XX, 14th of May. Central France.

You are cordially invited to attend the wedding of Francesco Colombo and Delphine Badeaux. The ceremony will take place on the grounds of the historical Château de Bois-le-Dumont, a bizarre estate with a dark hidden past.

Please be warned that when the lights go out, you shall find no succour. When the darkness overwhelms your neighbour, you shall find no salvation. When the cruel ambition reveals itself, you shall find no solace. Arm yourself with your wits, determination, and an open mind...
Or lose your humanity, before you lose your life.

[From [url=https://jpde.itch.io/babelomania]itch.io[/url]]

My name’s Jack. I’m possessed. There’s a spirit living in my body with me — he heals me and sometimes gets on my nerves. Oh, and he lets me see through his ghostly eyes — since I went blind after the crash. And you know what? I’d be better off staying blind...

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3201610/]Steam[/url]]
title: Blind Man's Sun
My Wife Sucked a Futanari's Toes
description:
Face it, you fall short in every way 🍆. Even your feet👣 can't redeem you...

Your wife needs to be dominated; she yearns for it. Yet, you simply can't fill the void; the necessity in her heart. Your marriage is hanging on by a thread and you're at your wits end.

This would all change on one fateful day, when, coming home from work, you notice an unfamiliar car in your driveway.

Now go sit quietly in the corner--you should be so lucky...

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3208360/]Steam[/url]]

title: Jeux bleu
description:
Larissa Elshina met a deformity with the face of her missing friend.

She gives it the name of Sceneya and teaches it language. She develops feelings and grows. Like a human being.

How long will the cold separation, like the long winter that lies ahead, last?

Love and attachment are born in the midst of tolerance and resignation. Is it right to be human?

The gaze of others always brings misfortune and drives us to fugue.

What remains at the end of the girls' blue play?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3313210]Steam[/url]]

I want my own place, with time to myself, where no one will disturb me, no one will come barging in.

I want my own time, my own place, where no one would disturb me, no one would come in here.

How lovely it would be if it were... a pleasant evening, with a fine gentle rain outside, in late May or June, surrounded by plants and their soft, natural aroma.

It could be a small, secretive café.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3049270/]Steam[/url]]
title: Fukakute Kurai Midori no Nemuri no Naka e
Awakening
description:
May Attaway is a perfect believer. Her dedication to her faith makes the church elders believe that she should become an abrottess - a priestess of the Silvercross Society. 

And yet, May is reluctant; plagued by recurring nightmares about the end of times and worn out by having to force herself to hate her own sister, she starts to question all she's been taught.

[From [url=https://naarel.itch.io/awakening]Itch.io[/url]]

Just Once is a visual novel in progress, focused on romance and life i suppose. Just once is written from a male perspective, and as such despite the ability of choosing your own name, its main character is a MALE.​

[From [url=https://f95zone.to/threads/just-once-v0-8-m-c-games.45231/]F95 Zone[/url]]
title: Just Once

description:
"Well, it's quite a bit more complex than your obnoxious brain is making it out to be."

Life of The Devil, or LOTD in short.

So, what happens when the devil gets "reincarnated"?

A matter of fact, how does it feel like to be The Devil at all? Find out yourself, LOTD is a visual novel in progress where YOU(the player, obviously) will play as Lucifer himself, how devilish indeed.

Off you go now, start your devilish adventures.​

[From [url=https://f95zone.to/threads/lotd-v0-0-5-m-c-games.45736/]F95 Zone[/url]]
title: LOTD

description:
The Kingdom of Cadia...
That's where it all began.
A beautiful and peaceful place, full of various races, a world of magic and fantasy.
The Kingdom of Cadia was ruled by Queen Cadia. Who stood for equality among races and peace above all.
But when there are those who want peace, there are those who want the opposite.

[From [url=https://f95zone.to/threads/kingdoms-origins-v0-5b-m-c-games.46898/]F95 Zone[/url]]
title: Kingdoms: Origins
Omertà
description:
You're enjoying the night life, women, fast cars and loads of cash. Everything seems to be going your way, until life decides otherwise . All it takes is one stray bullet, one stray person, one mistake for everything to go down hill.After losing everything and being thrown in prison you once again breathe in the fresh air of freedom, for a second chance. But the past still clings to you. Will you leave everything you lost behind, or once again try to claw back at what you’ve lost. Of course your choice is the second! With a promise and drive you’re back at it once again, will you make the same mistake or will you take the opportunity to change your outcome. In the city of sins, there is only one desire that matters, and it’s your heart’s desire.

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/mysticcro]Patreon[/url]]

At times the universe does seem to have singled you out for unique abuse. In these moments, you gotta ask yourself: Would I rather be ignored?

The world is either crazy or you are. They’re both solid options. Take your pick, and when you decide, come and tell me. But don’t rush into it. Take your time. Difficult decision.

You're following the footsteps of a young man named Max. (Changeable.) Who has had misfortune and bad luck follow him for most of his life, ranging from various accidents to losing jobs, family and friends, and all that is important to him.

But beyond this misfortune and bad luck, there is something else out there.
World beneath the surface of the one we all see, and what do you see when you look out of the window of your comfort?

That which you believe in...

[From [url=https://f95zone.to/threads/under-the-moonlight-v0-3-m-c-games.182591/]F95 Zone[/url]]
title: Under the Moonlight
Elleria: Book 1
description:
"By the word religion I have seen the lunacy of fanatics of every denomination be called the will of god. Mad words in sermons, wills of mortal men and women. Holiness is in right action, and courage on behalf of those who cannot stand for themselves, goodness and righteousness. Little to none of that present now a day however."

There's never been a more truer war fought than war of faith, for if people will not fight for what they believe in, what else is there to fight for?

You've seen it, and you've been there. Once a devoted man fighting for what he believed in, seen and believed a hero... for all the wrong reasons.

But if you've had a chance to do it again, would you do it the same? 

Follow the story of Eliot Magnus (first name changeable), once a devoted man of faith and a Paladin of his god, deemed a hero. Yet a hero can be turned into a villain, for all the right reasons when he fought for all the wrong reasons before.

[From [url=https://mystic-cro.itch.io/elleria]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Eden Prime
description:
"Dust struggling against cosmic winds, your words are as empty as your future. Confidence born of ignorance. You exist because we allow it, and you will end because we demand it. "

Humanity always sought their place among the stars, and now is the chance for them to find it. But the vast space is filled with more than just light and dark, it is filled by mystery and intrigue. History and culture, time and meaning. And something... that is beyond their comprehension.

Follow a story of a man captivated by the stars. Meet new friends and even more enemies as you try to unravel the mystery of universe itself. Your choices are what humanity depends on...

[From [url=https://f95zone.to/threads/eden-prime-v0-3-m-c-games.175865/]F95 Zone[/url]]

title: Comet Angel
description:
Izzy and Nat break out of their boring summer routine when they make the discovery of a lifetime: an alien living at the bottom of a nearby pond. The mysterious creature, which they name Faerie, asks them for help returning to its home on a passing comet in exchange for showing the girls their futures. As they search for scrap metal to feed their new celestial friend, Izzy and Nat suddenly realize Faerie's influence is spreading far beyond what they expected. Lost in the purgatory between adolescence and adulthood, they find themselves staring down the long and perilous road to self-acceptance.

[From [url=https://cross-couloir.itch.io/comet-angel]itch.io[/url]]

title: Tensei Maou-sama wa Yuusha ni Katenai!
description:
There was once a demon lord who ruled over a world far away. On the verge of being slain by the hero Ema, the demon lord, in a desperate attempt to survive, used what he believed to be teleportation magic. However, instead of escaping, he was transported to another world—his body mysteriously shrinking in the process.

To make matters worse, he had turned into a little girl.

Stripped of all his powers and magic, he found himself being chased by men, trapped in an unfamiliar world with no way out.

In this dire situation...

"...Are you okay?"

Out of nowhere, a voice called out to him. It was the very hero who had cornered him, but she too had been transported here—though a year earlier.

Now, the demon lord, lost and powerless, had no choice but to rely on the hero for survival. What kind of chaos will unfold as the demon lord, now in the form of a little girl, is taken in by the hero?

The hectic life of the transformed demon lord and the hero begins.

title: Toriko no Shirabe -refrain- if Aina no Shou
description:
Aina Leminen is an exchange student form Finland, attending Seiren Girls' Academy. At school, she is a member of the string orchestra club, and has led a happy and fulling life with her friends.

──Then comes the spring break.

Right after the holidays, Aina travels to a village in the mountains.

Apparently, she is invited to "perform Finnish songs at the village festival."

In that case, the advisor and other members of the club would have to go with her as well, but unfortunately, all of their schedules overlap, so along with her promoter and client, Miyake Issao, they head to the village together.

Despite feeling lonely, Aina is excited for the opportunity to perform the music of her home country.

However......

What awaits Aina is not the festival she has pictured, but a festival overflowing with the desire of men.

[Translated and edited from [url=https://www.getchu.com/soft.phtml?id=1305391]Getchu[/url]]

Short jank lil VN thing where you talk to and bang 3 girls in a city and go through a lil fighting tournament thingie

[From [url=https://bravebengal.itch.io/banganronpa-royal-csk]Itch.io[/url]]
title: BANGANRONPA: Sweaty AAT

description:
Is it wrong to feel so empty without you? If you really hurt me, why do I miss you? Aren't people supposed to hate their abusers?

[From [url=https://naarel.itch.io/leave-the-lights-on]Itch.io[/url]]
title: leave the lights on

description:
I don't deserve you. I don't deserve this.

[From [url=https://naarel.itch.io/turn-the-lights-off]Itch.io[/url]]
title: turn the lights off
yellow
description:
They taught you to hate your body but I know that it's learned behavior. Nobody who hates their body would be this eager to give it to others.

I guess I have no other choice but to remind you what you really are.

[From [url=https://naarel.itch.io/yellow]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Becoming Magical Girl Volta
description: "A short and silly visual novel about an office worker woman who found an odd mascot type creature in the washing machine and somehow got roped into being a magical girl to fight evil. Silliness ensues. Magical~ silliness~!"

title: Death Promised
description:
"Birth is celebratory,
life is fulfilling,
and death is peaceful."

That is the World's promise to existence.

Yet, how does it keep such a nebulous promise?
When lives lived are threaded with uncertainty,
and not even the world itself is omniscient...

[From [url=https://a-bootles.itch.io/death-promised]itch.io[/url]]

title: Jak Halloween: Tuesday Trouble
description:
Oh no, Jak’s back—just in time for Halloween! Brace yourself for an epic misadventure as he stumbles through his job at the local prison, where the inmates are weird, the candy’s suspicious, and chaos is always one bad decision away!

[From [url=https://pahisananas.itch.io/jak-halloween-tuesday-trouble]itch.io[/url]]

title: HavE
description:
