In the middle of a much anticipated skiing trip with his family, Jinho falls sick and finds himself confined to the hotel room. As he spends the morning alone feeling sorry for himself, strange things being to happen. Over time, he realises that being sick is the least of his troubles.

[From [url=https://lazytigermade.itch.io/have]itch.io[/url]]

You and your childhood friend both decided to attend a Halloween Party, hosted by a fellow student, on your first year in college.

[From [url=https://itch.io/jam/spooktober-2024/rate/2999794]itch.io[/url]]
title: Halloween Spice
Davno hotela ukrast' sebe mal'chika na rabote i nikak ne reshalas', no u menja eto sluchajno poluchilos', tak chto teper' ja delaju s nim VSJAKOE...
description:
Watching my attractive colleague from work, I didn't even notice how I woke up at her house. Only the duct tape over my mouth and the heaviness in my legs bother me a little. I hope this is just a joke and she won't do A N Y T H I N G to me… But who knows, maybe there is something mentioned in the title of the game? Too high to see, do you see anything?

Let us take a peek at the daily routine after the office hours of one small company. Will the main character be able to escape safe and sound? Will he emotionally (and physically) connect with his love, or will he become another crossed name on the list? And most importantly, will he be forgiven for absenteeism at work? Find out for yourself!

Who is writing this? Bruh, just tell me, where the exit is. Stop pointing your fingers and telling me to shut up, just show me the exit!.. Oh… Are we still recording? Well, you can just edit it out, no biggie.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3212910/]Steam[/url]]

title: te/ra/to/ma
description:
There are so many ways in which a body is capable of giving life. Sometimes, however, the natural order of things gets a little... corrupted.

Something was growing inside of me.

[From [url=https://naarel.itch.io/teratoma]Itch.io[/url]]

title: just go for it
description:
If I really love you so much, why does the thought of hurting you make me feel so good? And why do these thoughts get so violent?

[From [url=https://naarel.itch.io/just-go-for-it]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Subversive Masterpiece
description:
This is not your usual visual novel! It's better! It's subversive! It's a masterpiece! It's a subversive masterpiece! It's not your grandma's harem otome!

[From [url=https://naarel.itch.io/subversive-masterpiece]Itch.io[/url]]

You accidentally connect with a girl in space who is in distress 1000 years later... How will you solve the crisis and discover the truth?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2704110/Aliya/] Steam[/url]]
title: Bifang de Ta - Aliya
Omoi wa Ichitsu Yane no Shita te

aliases: 涼○ハルヒの肉欲野外キャンプ
title: Suzumiya Haruhi no Nikuyoku Yagai Camp
11eyes -Utsuro naru Kyoukai-
description:
Modern magic aims to fuse science and magic. One of such modern magi, Amami Shuu, is told that his classmate, Natsuki Kaori, saw her doppelganger. Shuu begins looking into the case as rumors of people disappearing after seeing their doppelganger make the rounds. One day, he finds another classmate, Kouno Mio, fighting a doll-like, blue haired girl. A few days later, this girl shows up as a transfer student in their class, calling herself Momono Shiori. With their objectives aligned, they begin a battle against the unknown.

[Translated from the game box synopsis]

Utsuro naru Kyoukai is a whole new story with new characters and concepts that takes place parallel to the events of 11eyes -Tsumi to Batsu to Aganai no Shoujo-.

title: The Death Night Show
description:
You are a sinner. Do you know what happens to sinners when they go to Hell? They appear on Hell's best (and only) late-night television program; THE DEATH NIGHT SHOW! If Death considers you entertaining, he might let you escape a gruesome afterlife punishment. After all, boredom is the biggest sin in Hell! What will your afterlife look like?

[From [url=https://cheddyjuu.itch.io/the-death-night-show]itch.io[/url]]

title: Late Night Surfing
description:
Feeling emotionally drained? Exhausted from living through multiple once-in-a-lifetime events? Distract yourself from reality and watch TV! Return to the once popular kids television show about a clown doll that teaches self-care and piece together clues about why it went off air. Discover what happens when memories, TV, and your darkest fantasies blend together. 

Tune in to TV straight from the dark dimension! Surf through channels and watch Looney Lou reruns, the news, infomercials, a talk show, and uncover snippets from a mysterious home movie to dive deeper into your own fractured psyche. But beware: not everything on TV is real.

How far are you willing to go to discover what really happened during the Looney Lou Halloween Special? Can you sit and just watch your fears and true capacity for cruelty be laid bare? And where is Hazel?

[From [url=https://decolfutures.itch.io/late-night-surfing]itch.io[/url]]

title: Genesis
description:
A loose retelling of the Myth of Sophia: an ancient Gnostic scripture about Pistis Sophia, the Aeon who birthed God.

Sophia is excluded by their fellow Aeons, and in their seek of approval, of their love and forgiveness, they are quick to be manipulated by a foreign, chaotic power. Sophia's attempt of repentance quickly turns into violence. 

[Edited from [url=https://web.archive.org/web/20241001215556/https://haddockcore.itch.io/genesis]itch.io[/url]]

title: Ice & Bond
description:
Shen Wei, a dedicated cultivator on a perilous mission to save his master, finds himself lost and near death in a treacherous snowstorm on a remote mountain. Rescued by a mysterious Ice Demon, Shen Wei is faced with an impossible choice.

[From [url=https://shortycake.itch.io/ice-n-bond]itch.io[/url]]

A fish creature shows up at your door and claims to be your child. In order to make ends meet, you donated your biological material to an odd clinic. You now have to make attempts to care for a child and break into the clinic for answers with a stranger offering weirdly devoted help along the way.

[From [url=https://cheribeanart.itch.io/fish-father]itch.io[/url]]
title: Fish Father!
Awayuki Tasogare ~of life ever fleeting~
description:
What is death for the lifeless, and what is life for the deathless?

Matsushita Yuki, a cheerful girl meeting her untimely demise. Nagumo Yuu, a recluse with an unknown past and an even more uncertain future. The Reaper, who had long forgotten his name. Under the dusty sky of this forlorn town, their paths crossed.

[From [url=https://requ.itch.io/awayuki-tasogare]itch.io[/url]]

You are a bored kid.

You  found a creepy pasta online about something called "One Person Hide and Seek" where you invite a spirit in for a little game.

And it's gone horribly wrong.

Use your cell phone to help you locate that doll so you can complete the ritual before things get worse.

[From [url=https://smik.itch.io/maesikas-hide-and-seek]itch.io[/url]]
title: Maesika's Hide and Seek
Rot in Paradise
description:
Rot in Paradise is a short 2D horror visual novel set in October of Australia, following the story of a vacationist named June and her friends on a weekend getaway at an island resort where they have no choice but to go with the tides.

[From [url=https://racheldrawsthis.itch.io/rot-in-paradise]itch.io[/url]]

title: Kyoukai ni Tatsu
description:
Here’s an entry for the 29th Three-Minute Game Contest. 
A visual novel that wraps up in about three minutes, 
no branching choices or replays needed. 
It tells a quick story that hits home fast. 
Blurring lines between nations, 
Memories drifting between past and present, 
The unknown lurking right next to our daily routines. 
And, the flow of consciousness recalling and gently touching on those memories.

[Translated from [url=https://whiteophidion.sakuraweb.com/software/border/]the official website[/url]]

Have you ever wished to find love in another time?

Tired of staring at mullet Stan and college Ford while receIving NO KISSES?

Well, then get ready for "A Stan-tastic Time"!

In this game, you'll make a deal with Bill to travel back to the year 1970-something and romance your favorite intellectual, Stanford Pines at Backupsmore University or your favorite bad boy grifter, Stanley Pines in Cape Cod!

Join the two young men on a quest for love all while immersing yourself in urban legends, time travel, and a little bit of mystery!

[From [url=https://tinyclowngames.itch.io/a-stantastic-time]itch.io[/url]]
title: A Stantastic Time!

description:
A short horror vn where a killer for hire tells his daughter fun stories while they eat together.

[From [url=https://jewelswithwings.itch.io/dads-dinner-stories]itch.io[/url]]
title: Dad's Dinner Stories

description:
Lia, a junior resident, steps into her first night shift in the ICU, expecting exhaustion, not trepidation. Alongside her senior, Satria, this shift begins to unravel in unsettling ways—bells ringing from empty rooms, whispers crawling through the halls, and the dead returning with unfinished business. 

As Lia confronts an eerie truth, she begins to question: is this night shift outside the bounds of reality—or has she crossed over herself?

[From [url=https://azurextwilight.itch.io/intensive-scare-unit]itch.io[/url]]
title: Intensive (S)care Unit

description:
You have unfortunately been captured by a serial killer, and you must increase your chances of survival within seven days.
Your choices will determine how he treats you and the outcome of your relationship.
What will your final relationship with him be...?
Will there be a change in the relationship between the killer and his prey?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3214880/]Steam[/url]]
title: Xuexing Huajia Lian'ai Youxi
Nan Shen Ta Hei Hua Le

description:
This game is only available in French, the English translation will come later.

In this game, you'll follow the lives of two characters, a young man who looks ordinary but hides a huge secret, and a policeman investigating a case in New York. The story alternates between your struggle for survival and the policeman's investigation, where each choice can lead to shocking revelations or a tragic end.
title: Behind The Curtains
A Wife at Stake
description:
This is the story of Laura. A beautiful 26 yo Italian young woman in couple with Mario. She knows what she wants and acts consequently.

Her next step in life is to buy a house in is hometown and have her own store. But money doesn't just fall from the sky. Even less so in this rather poor part of the country.
It's her partner who's going to push her into an adventure that will take her into a world she doesn't know. A world unlike her own, where money seems easier, especially when you're young and beautiful. But this world is also full of dangers...

[From [url=https://ehelljay.itch.io/a-wife-at-stake]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Osananajimi DAYS ~Anna to kurasu 14-nich~
description:
“Good morning, Senpai. Are you up?”
“Senpai~ Let Anna live with you during the spring break!”
And there's that, your cohabiting with your childhood playmate starts.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2507840]Steam[/url]]

title: My Hotwife
description:
You and your wife are in dire financial straits and are visited by an old school friend. You come up with a brilliant idea on how you can make money by filming home videos. How far will you go, will you become a cuckold, will you turn your wife into a hotwife? Who knows​.

[From F95Zone]

Guide either Franz or Marie through one of the most stressful moments of their life- suddenly waking up as a half-human, half-bug abomination. Alongside your sibling, explore the house for something useful to get yourself out of this predicament.

[From [url=https://karelessocelot.itch.io/infected-infestation]itch.io[/url]]
title: Infected Infestation

description:
A strange little Windows 98 style game about life.

[From [url=https://itch.io/jam/spooktober-2024/rate/3005094]itch.io[/url]]
title: is it okay for me to live
As the Cicada's Song Fades
description:
Following a tragic accident, Eito lost both of his parents and is now under the care of his grandmother back in a rural town far from the main city. The town was built upon a strong spiritual community in the past, attracting and trapping souls within its vicinity. 

The near-death experience Eito had, opened up his third eye, enabling him to now see spirits. With the help of his 'classmate' and new friend, Sen, Eito gradually adapts to his new life while finding ways to put the spirits he encounters to peace.

[From [url=https://ruuui-xv.itch.io/as-the-cicadas-song-fades-demo]itch.io[/url]]

Onkai Expo is on fire.  As the guest coordinator of a smalltime anime convention with big problems, it's up to the underpaid and overburdened Stella to solve the murder of a famous cosplayer. 

[From [url=https://vnstudioelan.itch.io/yuri-paddle]itch.io[/url]]
title: Yuri Paddle: An Anime Convention Murder Mystery

description:
A dark lesbian fairytale, On Wings Bringing Sleep is the story of Morgaine, an outcast among the fae as her people's power is ever-dwindled by the advance of human technology. When she meets a mysterious and enthralling human girl within the forest one day, Morgaine grows certain that this girl is in need of her magical protection. But Ilse has secrets of her own, and the growing feelings between them may cost more than either girl might ever pay...

[From [url=https://vnstudioelan.itch.io/on-wings-bringing-sleep]itch.io[/url]]
title: On Wings Bringing Sleep

description:
On the outskirts of a small village stands a massive tree whose canopy disappears far above the clouds. While grandiose on the outside, its interior houses the humble Mortem Post, which receives and delivers letters from those who have passed on. 

Deciding to break protocol to lend a helping wing, Rain, a flighty little courier takes a skittish girl by the name of Mila on an adventure through the inner workings of the post office. Together, they search for a letter containing the last words of someone who seemingly never existed. 

[From [url=https://vnstudioelan.itch.io/upwards-rain]itch.io[/url]]
title: Upwards, Rain! The Post Office of Farewells
Witch You Want
description:
With an oddly sparkly magical paper, you look over the job listing for a local witch needing an assistant with making potions before the town festival that weekend. Something so short notice would surely be hard for her to find workers, and you just happen to be inbetween jobs—so you sign up, unsure exactly what to expect......

A pompous and questionably excellent witch runs a local apothecary in town but finds that if she wants to make enough potions before the festival that weekend to sell (and keep her ongoing potion shop afloat) she'll need some assistance. After a dubious help wanted ad, she gains you as an assistant. Will the two of you see through to the festival? Will you be able to make a single potion? Will this girlfailure capture your heart?!

[From [url=https://vnstudioelan.itch.io/witch-you-want]itch.io[/url]]

Hero Spearmint meets his loyal fan Taro after discovering a dark secret that led to the latter's three-month disappearance. Will it threaten their relationship, or result in something more?

[From [url=https://flufffables.itch.io/bittersweet-battlers]itch.io[/url]]
title: Bittersweet Battlers
Victor's Aesthetics
description:
A short psychological horror experience centered around themes of self-image, trend-chasing, and the never-ending hunt for perfection.

[From [url=https://ruo-ze.itch.io/victors-aesthetics]itch.io[/url]]

title: Oto-hime
description:
Shimako, a socially anxious office worker, escapes the pressures of her company's beach retreat by fishing alone, only to stumble upon a trapped turtle by the shore. When she rescues it, Shimako is mysteriously whisked away to a hidden underwater palace, where she meets Oto-hime, a breathtakingly beautiful but enigmatic princess. Drawn in by Oto-hime's charm and her lavish hospitality, Shimako soon realizes there is something unsettling beneath the princess's kind façade.

In this gripping Yuri Horror visual novel, you control Shimako's fate through a web of choices. Unravel the truth behind Oto-hime's strange motives, explore their deepening bond, and discover whether Shimako will escape the palace or be lured into staying forever... in the clutches of something far darker than she imagined. 

[From [url=https://maple0.itch.io/oto-hime]itch.io[/url]]

title: Hocus Opus
description:
Only you can help save all of imagination's creatures from disappearing for good. Connect with your imagination like never before.

[From [url=https://itch.io/jam/spooktober-2024/rate/2966919]itch.io[/url]]

Hoshisora Runa, an ordinary space research student living in the midst of Tokyo, comes to a predictment after meeting her landlord.

[From [url=https://recofiv3.itch.io/my-landlord-is-an-alien]itch.io[/url]]
title: My landlord is an alien
Hardship Of A Vampire- The Ghost's Call
description:
"Oliver, do you believe in ghosts?" 

When Elias asked this question, Oliver thought it to be nothing more than small talk.  After all, vampires existed, so who could say that ghosts don't? Unfortunately for him, life always seemed to love giving him bad surprises; not only did ghosts exist, but the one he encountered didn't seem all that friendly.

[Edited from [url=https://saitoki.itch.io/hardship-of-a-vampire-the-ghosts-call]itch.io[/url]]

As the youngest woman of the village, you are sent by your village into the forest to perform the annual ritual that keeps the Thousand Eyes Witch trapped there.
Your lantern is your only defense against her, and you'll have to make the necessary choices to avoid running out of oil before you reach the sacred shrine.

[From [url=https://delphin-casado.itch.io/witchlight-woods]itch.io[/url]]
title: Witchlight Woods

description:
Cryptomeria Gravestone follows one night in the shoes of Aria, a no-nonsense florist who finds his life disrupted by the pursuit of three women. From here on out, his fate is in your hands. 

[From [url=https://puddor.itch.io/crygrave]itch.io[/url]]
title: Cryptomeria Gravestone

description:
[i]Tia Taylor, she used to be... yes, used to be.

There are some things in the past that can only be seen clearly once you're in the present…[/i]

This is a Visual Novel game combined with Jigsaw Puzzle mechanics, where you piece together torn photos from the past to uncover old memories of your best friend from 2000s era.

[From [url=https://duhema.itch.io/memoirs-of-my-friend]itch.io[/url]]
title: Memoirs of my best friend

description:
You enter "Halloween Candytown" a magical world full of candy and sweet candied villagers. Will you find a way home safely, or be trapped in this sweet candied world forever?

[Edited from [url=https://en.yorubox.eu/welcome-to-halloween-candytown/]official website[/url]]
title: Welcome to Halloween Candytown

description:
Transform into a middle-aged werecoyote, well into his 10th year as a college professor. Do your damnest to keep your professorship and sanity intact as a fresh-faced, swift-footed new adjunct threatens to ruin it all accidentally.

[From [url=https://zeedikay.itch.io/untitled-toxic-werecoyote-yaoi]itch.io[/url]]
title: Untitled Toxic Werecoyote Yaoi
Sweet Tumor
description:
Dr. Hibiki, a neurosurgeon working on the controversial Ghost Brain project, returns home after five years to find three teenage girls he doesn't recognize living with his wife, Ako. Accused of infidelity and faced with a family in turmoil, Hibiki struggles to understand his situation while dealing with strange occurrences, such as vivid dreams. 

As tensions rise and relationships strain, Hibiki attempts to mend familial bonds by planning a Halloween celebration. However, the lines between reality, memory, and the supernatural begin to blur, forcing players to piece together the truth behind Hibiki's absence, his research, and the mysterious family dynamics. 

[From [url=https://overscoped-studio.itch.io/sweet-tumor]itch.io[/url]]

title: Changeability of Strange Dream: Visual Edition
description:
Based on the Touhou Music CD of the same name, Changeability of Strange Dream ~ Visual Edition features the story from the CD recreated in a Visual Novel style!

[From [url=https://megapig9001.itch.io/changeability-of-strange-dream-visual-edition]itch.io[/url]]

There was once a place. 
It was bare, a landscape of emptiness, a well of desolation.

It ached, this place.
It longed for something more.

Until you.

Do you remember, my love?
Do you remember the way that it was before,
and the way it has changed?

Please, remember.

[From [url=https://wearycat.itch.io/deathwish]itch.io[/url]]
title: deathwish
Muramusume ga Sabaku no Kuni Kara Kita Dansei ni Attack Saretemasu!

description:
PHANTASMIAC is a short psychological horror visual novel game following the story of the game's protagonist, "You" who recently moves into a spacious yet oddly cheap house in a small rural town. Yet strange things start to happen shortly after you moved in... followed by dreams that reflects someone's thoughts.

[From [url=https://sweetsaintess.itch.io/phantasmiac]itch.io[/url]]
title: PHANTASMIAC

description:
Yoyo attends a Catholic university, but he's not religious, which is awkward. Especially since his best friend, his #1 best bro, his guy on the inside, his heterosexual life partner-to-be—his super cool and popular and beloved BFF4L—is starting to get real weird with the proselytizing. 

[From [url=https://rottenmondays.itch.io/olam]itch.io[/url]]
title: Our Lamb Amidst Mortals
All Hallow's Eve
description:
Ana barely escapes the murder of her family. As she tries to escape her aggressors, she ends up stumbling into her family's past and learns that they have been keeping a dark secret.

[From [url=https://cdricn.itch.io/all-hollows-eve]itch.io[/url]]

On Friday the 13th, your plans for a spooky Halloween night are dashed when you show up alone at the escape room reserved by your friend. You consider going home when a handsome stranger offers to accompany you. Maybe the night is saved after all… Or so you thought.

[From [url=https://dimikira.itch.io/bad-manors]itch.io[/url]]
title: BAD MANORS

description:
Ever since you were young, you have been visited by a long dead warrior in your dreams.  Lady Orla, who famously slew the infamous Necromancer of the Swamps, has called on you for help.  She is trapped in a state between life and death, and has called on you to restore her to the land of the living.  She has taught you how to bind the soul of the defeated Necromancer to help you in your quest. 

You must enter the ancient abandoned graveyard in the mire, uncover mysteries only known to the dead, and raise your beloved so she might fight evil once again.

[From [url=https://subversionary-studios.itch.io/necromance]itch.io[/url]]
title: Necromance
UnderHolo
description:
A group of girls are hoping to run a successful VTuber agency so that they can chill out together for the rest of their lives but, unfortunately, the VTuber industry is secretly rigged by an underground syndicate called UnderHolo.

With your expert managerial skills, bring your very own VTuber Agency to the top of the leaderboard!

[From [url=https://cuteshadow.itch.io/underholo]itch.io[/url]]

A quiet town’s peace is shattered when they find a dismembered body. 

From that day on the paranoia of the people only grows as a streak of murders keeps going. Of course they have to accuse and quickly put a stop to the serial killer and so Jessie is seen as a suspect, along with the town’s thief and the stylist. 

But she is the main suspect. 

Not wanting to be carbonized in the stake, she goes with the help of her pet owl on her own mission to find the killer. 

Will she have the wits to succeed?

[From [url=https://savagekitties.itch.io/as-dusk-falls]itch.io[/url]]
title: As Dusk Falls

description:
As a reporter for the local newspaper, you are sent to a greenhouse to cover the blooming of their rare Corpse Flower, named for its peculiar scent of a decomposing body. But as you explore the greenhouse and talk to the widowed owner, you get the sense that she could be hiding a few things among the plants…and the Corpse Flower may be named for more than its scent. Will you break the story, or will you be among those who never returned from the greenhouse?

[From [url=https://poqa-tj.itch.io/corpse-flower]itch.io[/url]]
title: Corpse Flower

description:
On Halloween, a gang of teenagers in animal masks head out to set off fireworks and drink with their friends. Unfortunately, nothing ever goes right for you. As the night grows darker and pranks turn to violence, your friends start to change. Will you?

[From [url=https://ozone647.itch.io/canidae]itch.io[/url]]
title: CANIDAE

description:
"It's been three years since you left that house. You thought getting out would be the hardest part. Turns out freedom can be pretty suffocating."

Escape your monotonous life, willingly or not, by being kidnapped and turned into a monster. Become entwined in a conflict between your captor, her hunter, and your friend. Muse on what it means to be human, and remember, it's never too late to take control of your fate... that is, if control even exists.

[From [url=https://biztheunicorn.itch.io/lovebites]itch.io[/url]]
title: LoveBites: An Existential Romance

description:
You have been sent to The Nightside, a dangerous place filled with powerful inhuman entities most likely due to the shenanigans of Your Local Wizard and Barry the criminal. 

Stay alive, recruit allies, unlock the spirits and most importantly, SURVIVE long enough to be brought back home.

[From [url=https://waywardvoidgod.itch.io/anthems-of-the-nightside]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Anthems Of The Nightside
Thief of Hearts
description:
Embark on a thrilling journey where the line between right and wrong blurs, and the only constant is the fueled pulse of a life of crime. 

In “Thief of Hearts“, you’ll step into the shoes of a young man who is navigating the shadowy world of theft, deception, and unexpected alliances. 

Are you ready to redefine what it means to be a modern-day rogue?

[From [url=https://mrdotsgames.com/toh/]Official site[/url]]

title: Heritage
description: After the festivities of you and your twin sister Emma's 18th birthday party, your mother sits you all down and reads you an important letter from your late father. The contents of the letter will forever alter your family dynamic. You learn that you have a...unique Heritage™ (heh). Be warned, though, as others might be out to capitalize on it.

You wake up in a hospital with no memory of how you got there. A kind and attentive doctor assures you that you will be under his care, patiently nursing you back to health. No one seems to know what caused your condition. 

Will you recover your lost memories...?  Or has he made sure you never will?

[From [url=https://livingslime.itch.io/prescriptionlove]itch.io[/url]]
title: Prescription:LOVE

description:
In the town of Detourville, holidays are a distant memory; banned after a series of brutal murders tied to their celebrations. A serial killer, striking on random holidays, has left the town paralyzed by fear. But this Halloween, Morven, an enigmatic figure, dares to host a party, defying the deadly tradition. You are a former investigator, desperate for redemption. 

Attending this risky gathering, you hope to uncover the identity of the killer who could be lurking among the guests. As the night unfolds, you’re drawn into the lives of three peculiar individuals: Morven, Goethe, and Zegille. How many faces can evil wear?

[From [url=https://komodospit.itch.io/giveevilaface]itch.io[/url]]
title: GIVE EVIL A FACE
NIGHT SECURITY
description:
You work as a gate guard at a condominium complex. Your job is to deal with the various happenings at the condo, letting people in and out. Normally, this is easy, but tonight is Halloween and things might just get a little strange and spooky. Can you last all five hours?

[From [url=https://purple-herring-games.itch.io/night-security]itch.io[/url]]

Two film nerds sit down for a comfy evening watching old movies. Next up is Steamboat Willie, and they quickly take to bickering.

By the time the cartoon is over, one of them will be dead. 

[From [url=https://alexisroyce.itch.io/lets-watch-steamboat-willie]itch.io[/url]]
title: Let's Watch Steamboat Willie!

description:
~The year 6666, October 31st , The Demon of Wishes was awoken underneath a monster extermination company~

You are Remoryn, the Demon of Wishes who was sealed away for 4000 years.

After being released, the story of 3 heros, the holy weapon, the halloween party surrounding you, and most of all, the disappearance of... her only made everything feel stranger than usual.

On top of that, you've been hold captive by a mysterious human named Jeok-Ah,

Who wishes for the end of the world.

If you grant it, you'll be dragged back to the underworld to be imprisoned again. If not, then you will dissipate.

Will you be able to get away from Jeok-Ah?

Would you be able to find the truth behind the 3 heros, and finally find... her?

[From [url=https://usjk0ec.itch.io/endoftheworld]itch.io[/url]]
title: Wish Upon the End of the World!

description:
MAD LAB PARTY is a not-so-serious dark comedy following the serial killer, Noe Vexler, trying to rat out just who is tampering with his crimes. Use any means of exposing the poser… but try to not get caught dead in rights either.

[From [url=https://zenoslots.itch.io/madlabparty]itch.io[/url]]
title: MAD LAB PARTY
Mud in the Memory
description:
You've called your best friend to explain what happened.

You know exactly what you did.

Or...do yo?

[From [url=https://nothack-europa.itch.io/mud-in-the-memory]itch.io[/url]]

Ms Ester's beautiful and neat house has been mysteriously wrecked in the past few weeks and nobody knows why. Patches of dirt on the carpet, things gone missing, and all sorts of mess keeps happening around the house. The police was called to investigate, a priest was invited to bless the house, and a group of ghostbusters was hired (they were so expensive!) and none of them found anything. How useless!

If this problem isn't solved by the time Ms Ester returns from her short trip, she'll kick you out. You have to find someone who can help: anyone will do, even this unreliable looking, self-proclaimed witch you just randomly met.

[From [url=https://konayachi.itch.io/pippa-and-your-phantasmal-problem]itch.io[/url]]
title: Pippa and Your Phantasmal Problem
Skin Deep - Aellure
description:
A Lovecraftian visual novel based on cosmetics and beauty standards. 

A woman named Alex is looking for her friend Heather, who has disappeared after amassing a debt and obsessively hounding everyone about cosmetics from "Aellure." 

Will you finally unveil the culprits behind the disappearances? Or will you too be cast into the otherworldly abyss? 

[Edited from [url=https://wolfg4m3r.itch.io/skin-deep]itch.io[/url]]

What happens if an ordinary trip to the countryside turns into a tragic murder? 

Embark on an incredible journey full of mysteries and riddles. 

Find out about the relationships of friends unknown to you and find out who is guilty of a terrible murder and is anyone guilty at all?

[From [url=https://dancingchairdev.itch.io/halloween-murder]itch.io[/url]]
title: Halloween Murder

description:
It's the 31st of October. 

The one day in the year when evil spirits can roam around humans freely, dressed in costumes without the need to hide their true self.

On this special day of tricks and treats, you were planning to spend your Halloween like usual: eating snacks, watching cheesy horror movies.. alone.

Unfortunately after you finish decorating your yard, you get an urgent call from your boss saying your coworker can't clock in.

Now you're taking an unwanted shift on Halloween. At least you're being paid!

[From [url=https://mewoster.itch.io/halloweendeliveryconsumption]itch.io[/url]]
title: Halloween Delivery: Consumption
Your moth Friend
description:
When it started? You don't know. The only thing you know is that these insects will never let you sleep...

Today you planned to get a healthy amount of sleep, but then the flapping of wings pulled you out of your dreams. What could possibly happen?

[From [url=https://mewoster.itch.io/your-moth-friend]itch.io[/url]]

Within the brain of “Funblood”, you are a “Funblood” who has become severed. So of course, you have to get up now!

[From [url=https://slitherbop.itch.io/play-of-wire]itch.io[/url]]
title: PLAY OF WIRE

description:
You, your boyfriend, and his twin brother were having a great halloween dinner. Who knew that a corpse would be found just a day afterwards? 

Some say that death is a beginning. This situation was no exception. In this case, death became a key to opening a pandora’s box. Suspicions and revelations of long kept secrets emerge as an exchange.

[From [url=https://syllphana.itch.io/rotten-angel]itch.io[/url]]
title: rotten angel

description:
Are high school seniors too old for trick-or-treating?
Lea doesn't think so! 

Join Eve Battem (name customizable) and her best friend Eleanora "Lea" Bourreau for an adorable night of Halloween fun as they celebrate their last year as trick-or-treaters!

[From [url=https://rintittit.itch.io/halloweenfright]itch.io[/url]]
title: Halloween Fright: The Bat's Flight

description:
When a young actress finds herself on a boating trip with her dearest friend and her friend's fiancé, the latest in a long line of horrible beaus, she must use all her wiles to keep her friend's head - and her own - above the water.

[From [url=https://sunlabyrinth.itch.io/drown-the-bride]itch.io[/url]]
title: Drown the Bride

description:
A short, wordplay-themed visual novel made for the 6th Annual Spooktober Game Jam! You play as a "companion for hire" who becomes a 'dating coach' for a very special client. Will you have a "date" with Death or a date with death?

[From [url=https://gutchiotaku.itch.io/adatewdeathspooktoberjam2024]itch.io[/url]]
title: A Date With Death

description:
Trapped in your home for as long as you can remember, three surprise guests bring hope of escape. But will you be able to keep any of them alive long enough to do so? Or, will you be the one to sacrifice them?

[From [url=https://itch.io/jam/spooktober-2024/rate/2960939]itch.io[/url]]
title: Home is Where the Heart is

description:
They say that when it rains while the sun is shining, a witch is getting married...

A Witch Is Getting Married is a story about relationships, platonic, romantic, and in-between. It is also a story about finding comfort in uncertainty. It is also a story about witches, ghosts, pumpkin-headed parental figures, and weird little bat guys. 

[From [url=https://featherboy.itch.io/a-witch-is-getting-married]itch.io[/url]]
title: A Witch is Getting Married
TRACE
description:
Ivan, an apprentice exorcist on Arkathos Exorcist Office finally got his very first mission! Along with his Master, Pavel, he had to find out whether the governor was cursed or not both traditionally and digitally. However, something unexpected happened...

[From [url=https://altila.itch.io/trace]itch.io[/url]]

title: Casey Noir and Carved Pumpkin's Latte
Nine to Five (am)
description:
Your friend is out for a week, and The Boss wants YOU to cover his shift. This is a job you should take seriously! Help the customer with everything they need, or not! We don’t really care! Customers may like some chit-chat tho.

Be ready to aid them around with their possibly evil plans, and above all, make sure the customer is always happy! (All monetary damages in legal trouble will be taken from your salary.) 

[From [url=https://canwi-dogames.itch.io/nine-to-five-am]itch.io[/url]]

Spencer, a former investigative journalist, lives in a small bunker with six other people who have also managed to stay alive after a viral outbreak brought the world to ruin. They're attempting to adjust to this new normal, until they stumble across some notebook pages written by a scientist documenting the infection. Make life or death decisions, form bonds with your fellow survivors, and attempt to unravel the mystery behind the outbreak.

[From [url=https://barbieronpa.itch.io/epimutation]itch.io[/url]]
title: Epimutation

description:
You just got yourself a new girlfriend! She's everything you could have ever wanted! Now just be sure she doesn't escape.

[i]Parasocial! Paranoia! Paradise![/i] is a visual novel about trying to keep the love of your life happy and well fed. And also chained up. She's seems oddly okay with this. A little too okay.

[From [url=https://sevencents.itch.io/paraparapara]itch.io[/url]]
title: Parasocial! Paranoia! Paradise!
These Chains of Ours
description:
Two souls in limbo meet on a balcony.

[From [url=https://itch.io/jam/spooktober-2024/rate/2994526]itch.io[/url]]

title: Red Caps Order
description:
The Centenarian King summons you... He needs you to set off for the strange land of Barbagill in search of Duke Blacktongue, who has mysteriously disappeared...

Witches, monsters, fairies... who knows what awaits you there? All you can be sure of is that evil forces are lurking in the darkness, watching you closely...

[From [url=https://uictoru.itch.io/redcapsorder]itch.io[/url]]

After the recent passing of his girlfriend, Raphaēl makes a deal with the devil to bring her back to life in exchange to work for him. Now, trapped in purgatory he & his newfound friends need to find a way & most of all, a reason to leave that place.

[From [url=https://dion06.itch.io/indentured-overtime]itch.io[/url]]
title: Indentured Overtime

description:
Echigoya, you’re a bad one, too…
A new kind of simulation game where you become a corrupt official and ensnare the daughters of Edo with your poisonous fangs!
The show-girl of a dango shop, a new maid, a female fire fighter, a bride-to-be
A chic geisha from the Tatsumi district, a ronin's wife, and a Portuguese female pirate
A feudal lord's daughter, a nun, a shrine maiden, a retired samurai's female ninja, a shogun's bodyguard, etc...
There are 18 characters to target in total.
A corrupt merchant, Echigoya, colluded with him, exploiting the weaknesses of women and indulging in endless acts of service.
If you like, use the Yakuza boss to threaten them, lock them up in a room and turn them into a living doll!
title: Akudaikan

description:
Thérèse is a young girl wrapped in warmth, showered with the affection of her father for as long as she can remember. He gave her everything—dolls, toys, pets, and all the attention she could ever crave. He was the perfect father, a man who showed her the world. His most cherished gift to her was a garden of her own. 

A place where colors bloom in every shade, a rainbow hue scattered across the foliage; a fantasy come to life, a small paradise she could call her own. 

But perhaps it was merely a delusion. Perhaps it was just a fluke. There was no chance that she… 
 …Would find a dead girl buried beneath her soil. 

[From [url=https://lavendeerstudios.itch.io/puppeteers-lament]itch.io[/url]]
title: Puppeteer's Lament
A Song for the Damned
description:
After too many drinks, Jack, a hapless crooner, makes a deal with the mysterious Madame Laurent. Under her employ, he sings nightly at “The Whispering Wraith,” a supernatural jazz club whose patrons and staff share a terrible secret. 

On the night of his final performance, amidst a burgeoning relationship with the club’s bartender, Jack is forced to choose between success or sacrifice.

[From [url=https://ryanxmesscher.itch.io/a-song-for-the-damned]itch.io[/url]]

title: CAFÉ GUILE
description:
A hospital-themed café is actually a front for a group of witches who perform various deeds in the dead of night for their master! Whether it's moral or not?! It doesn't matter!

[From [url=https://poundtoundhound.itch.io/cafe-guile]itch.io[/url]]

The Emperor sends out 12 letters to 12 animals to be a part of mysterious new council. Upon arrival, 13 animals show up instead.  Suspicions and doubts are thrown left and right as the group of animals work to figure out who the outlier is and overcome their misguided perceptions of each other.

[From [url=https://no-xiruo.itch.io/zodiac-paradigm]itch.io[/url]]
title: Zodiac Paradigm

description:
Toronto, October 31st, 2004.

As the new kid at your high school, you weren't anticipating much excitement for your first Halloween in town. But when you receive an unexpected invitation to the big party being thrown by the ultra-cool theatre kids, you can't say no!

The only problem? Your dorky little brother has to tag along, too.

Will you finally get a chance to talk to the bubbly, popular girl from your English class who invited you? Is your kid brother going to cause a scene after eating too much candy? Did someone actually bring a goose to the party or was that your imagination?

As the evening continues and you encounter a host of colourful characters, you realize there may be more happening at this party than meets the eye.

Solve the mystery, and you just might save a life.

[From [url=https://thecovengamecollective.itch.io/halloween-party-demon]itch.io[/url]]
title: Help! I Took My Little Brother to a Halloween Party and the Popular Kids Want to Sacrifice Him to a Demon!

description:
Her voice is an enchanting tale and a deadly peril. He dreams of becoming a great musician, but an encounter with a mysterious mermaid changes everything. Her voice draws him in, and with every note, he realizes he's losing not just his hearing, but also his very self.

[From [url=https://yura-grustny.itch.io/emo-mermaid]itch.io[/url]]
title: I fell in love with an emo mermaid

description:
Moggie's been waiting forever to come into herself. And what better place to do that than a fun Halloween party at the local club where you've never been to before and maybe kinda don't know if you or your friends can handle? Or even want to go?

After all, parties are fun, and Moggie wants to be fun.  Happy. Someone people like to be around.

She just needs to stay positive, make her friends have a good time, and hope all of her friends from another dimension don't have anything weird happen to them (or herself).

Easy peasy! :D

[From [url=https://bibixp.itch.io/forget-me-nots-club]itch.io[/url]]
title: Forget Me Nots Club
Märchen Line
description:
Embrace the indomitable human spirit by serving in the First Among Father's Voyager Armada- The Bravest of The Brave, who venture out to liberate the Milky Way from the True Enemy.

Serving as a Soldier means embracing infinite potential. With the blessing of His Runes, you will grow stronger, smarter, faster and braver in a few than you have in your entire life. All that growth comes with responsibility, and you will be expected to pay your civic dues- but luckily each Soldier is assigned a Valkyrie to help them manage their priorities.

Train your stats, build your relationships, and be all you can be...or push past the galactic narrative and seek a deeper understanding of humanity's true ranking in the galactic hierarchy. 

[From [url=https://nthcircle.itch.io/marchenline]itch.io[/url]]

title: Demon of Aspenmill
description:
A dog girl named Quinn moves into Aspenmill after having been hired at a bakery named Wicked Treats. Unbeknownst to her, her boss is a demon planning to play some games with her.

[From [url=https://itch.io/jam/spooktober-2024/rate/3003760]itch.io[/url]]

title: Kage to Kage
description:
Natsuki, an ominous island where the descendants of oni live.

The current head of the family, Natsuki Shino, hires bodyguards from various places in order to protect the upcoming "Matsuri" from the Wakou.

Rumors of the man who cursed her, Futatsukage Sougen, was among them reach the girl, Muinsai Sora.

The girl crosses over to the island by herself to begin her search. However, in the midst of investigating the island, a dreadful secret surrounding Natsuki is discovered. 

Furthermore, an abnormal situation arises where the strong that have gathered on the island are being gruesomely killed off one after the other!

Will Sora manage to break the curse and safely escape the island...!?

[rough translation taken from [url=https://www.kamabokoheights.com/]Kamabokoheights official website[/url]]

title: Snacks Fandango
description:
A small, adventurous outing to obtain the one true snack.

The one snack to rule them all.

One snack to find them. 

One snack to bring them all, and in the darkness bind them.

In the Yellin/Sellin where the shadows lie.

Join Fango and his haunted hearing aid on his foolish dance through a legally distinct convenience store to obtain the one snack to rule them all... And banishes evil spirits?

[From [url=https://chasecubed.itch.io/snacks-fandango]itch.io[/url]]

title: Arcana Apothecary
description:
Arcana Apothecary is an Amare Visual Novel where you play as Luna Serana, a protagonist living in a city where most magic has been deemed unsafe and has been heavily regulated by the Grand Council. One day she is gifted a special deck of tarot cards by a rather eccentric stranger, inheriting a shop where only lost souls can wander in. These cards don’t just predict the future, they prescribe it. Along her journey, she meets several other characters who are finding themselves just like she is. There might just be more brewing underneath this magical city’s surface…

[From [url=https://starbound-studios.itch.io/arcana-apothecary]itch.io[/url]]

title: Iris to Id -Ghosts in the Machine-
description:
You're invited into the fragmented tale of four unconventional friends, bound together by a series of increasingly sinister events.

Will these friends be able to uncover its secrets before it’s too late? Or will they succumb to the ghosts haunting them of their pasts?

Iris to Id: Ghost In The Machine is an atmospheric visual novel where you can immerse yourself in these characters’ lives, their struggles, and see if they can overcome the sins looming over them.

[From [url=https://archeia.itch.io/i2igitm]itch.io[/url]]

With plenty of reluctance, you and your two close friends Alicia and Rocco decide to spend Halloween night investigating an abandoned chapel. That is, until, the three of you end up trapped inside with a ticking clock to your demise, blaring inside of your head. One of your friends has been infected with a blight, and the only way home is to find and eradicate it.

No matter the cost.

[From [url=https://lumintree.itch.io/oh-enlightened-one]itch.io[/url]]
title: OH, ENLIGHTENED ONE!

description:
Loraine is a 25-year-old young woman pursuing an unpredictable modeling career. She struggles with her  adult life and the loss of her parents from seven years ago, an event that drastically steers the life she wishes to live. Loraine has chosen to completely forget her past to cope with the present, but she is forced to remember it when she receives a phone call from her deceased parents and finds a letter signed with a familiar name, 'Mary,' calling her back to her hometown. This journey becomes a pretext to visit her parents after seven years from their death, but her plans are disrupted by a car accident. Now, Loraine roams the deserted streets of her hometown seeking help, and the only person left who can assist her is the enigmatic Mary. However, both are threatened by a morbid presence. To save herself and Mary, Loraine must remember and accept her past before it is too late.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3218860/]Steam[/url]]
title: Signed Mary
Her Black Book
description:
On a boring, quiet train ride through the countryside, a lone traveler meets a strange woman in black, carrying with her a handbound dark book.

“We’re both traveling alone, it seems, and we’ve got a while to go until the next station. To pass the time, why don’t I tell you some stories?” 

[From [url=https://glaistigs-garden.itch.io/her-black-book]itch.io[/url]]

A short, simple story about an alien trying to investigate the earth life.

[From [url=https://snuskygames.itch.io/earth-halloween]itch.io[/url]]
title: Earth Halloween

description:
Half gorgon Jade Mason finds herself dragged to a party full of monsters, she doesn't have high hopes. Between her fears of not fitting in and her ever-present anxiety, she's prepared for everything to go wrong.

Of course, she never expected a missing zombie head to be the reason the evening goes awry! With the help of some (cute) monster girls, will Jade be able to solve the mystery and turn the night around?

[From [url=https://maroondrops.itch.io/a-zombie-head-went-missing-at-the-party-full-of-cute-monster-girls]itch.io[/url]]
title: A Zombie Head Went Missing at the Party Full of CUTE MONSTER GIRLS!?
The Stars Under Lockehurst
description:
The Stars Under Lockehurst is a romantic supernatural mystery visual novel about a grad student visiting their friend in the small coastal town, Cape Lockehurst. Here, they unravel the mysteries behind recent disappearances and peculiar happenings around town.  

Inspired by H.P. Lovecraft’s Call of Cthulhu and similar works, this game explores fear of the unknown and the unknowable, featuring a cast of unique, romanceable characters (who just might be a little... fishy).

[From [url=https://nulljamgames.itch.io/thestarsunderlockehurst]itch.io[/url]]

title: Killer Chat!
description:
A reporter by day, an aspiring writer by night: you've been asking all the important questions on the dark web. 

Like, how do you bury a body? How do you kill someone with a crowbar with the right angle to cause blunt-force trauma? What's the best way to hide from law enforcement?

If you're to write a good crime book, this is how you'll do it.

Suddenly, ERROR! UNKNOWN invites you to a server... with a warning. "don't be so obvious smh You're Gonna Get Caught".

...

It's a serial killer chatroom.

You may be slightly fucked.

[From [url=https://rosesrot.itch.io/killer-chat]itch.io[/url]]

Breakfast is the most important meal of the day.

Help Paddy make breakfast by finding and preparing ingredients, cooking, plating, and finally, serving. 

[From [url=https://cindercritter.itch.io/paddymakesbreakfast]itch.io[/url]]
title: Paddy Makes Breakfast
Plastic Perfection
description:
PLASTIC PERFECTION is a short text based  psychological horror visual novel about beauty, addiction and most of all surgery! Throughout the game you follow Vicky V the melancholic wife of Valerio Verrico, the CEO of ByoSynth the totally not evil corporation responsible for the use of  surgical alterations a fashion statement and ever changing trends.

[From [url=https://crustyclownflakes.itch.io/plastic-perfection]itch.io[/url]]

title: Hell's Pawn
description:
The millennium sale is here at Hell's Pawn! Your number one destination for all things paranormal, grotesque, and demonic! Our outgoing and energetic sales associate, Mona, is here to answer all your questions on finding what trinket can cure the hellish torment you are dealing with.  Eternal bleeding? Loss of limbs? Sanity gone? Here at Hell's Pawn, we pride ourselves in finding just the trinket you need in order to better deal with your endless punishment in Hell. 

Stop in to see all the new stock! Only available during the millennium sale! Fill that endless void in your soul by coming down to Hell's Pawn today! 

[From [url=https://tj-lounge.itch.io/hells-pawn]itch.io[/url]]

A cautionary tale about flying too close to the sun.

[From [url=https://itch.io/jam/spooktober-2024/rate/3008093]itch.io[/url]]
title: wax wings

description:
The protagonist of the story is a Soviet boy named Denis.
Denis lived with his father and was an exemplary citizen of his country. He believed in the path to a bright future and was always ready to prove himself wherever necessary.
He was ordinary, for the people of his time...
But, one winter evening, his life breaks into hundreds of fragments, opening up new, sharp facets of a person's life in his country.
At one point, Denis, a thirteen-year-old boy, makes a choice that plunges him into a new world...
A world full of despair, loneliness, pain, and hunger.
And just one dream...
A dream that you can only pray to heaven to fulfill.
title: Sovremennyj Sovjonok

description: A week of rest at the summer camp on behalf of Slava. Will the summer be endless for her?
title: Slavja-mod
Undercover
description:
Her father had been a cop .... a city detective. She dreamed of following in his footsteps.
She joined the Police Academy, studied and trained, endured rigorous assignments, and tried to keep her supervisors happy. All to get enough experience to become a detective! This is her journey to fulfilling that dream.

[From F95Zone]

title: Comme Tu Veux
description:
Comme Tu Veux is a visual novel set in 1966 Saigon, focused on two 14-year-old school girls, Hồng and Như Ý, whose friendship falls apart. They meet again at an antiques market where Như Ý outbuys Hồng for a vase. Như Ý disappears, and Hồng's brother is found murdered.

[From [url=https://yurinationrise.itch.io/comme-tu-veux-demo]itch.io[/url]]

title: Secrets In Green
description:
In 1900s England, Alma believes that she has uncovered a crime in progress - through speaking with plants! Can she convince a patriarchal society that she's right, or will they see her as nothing but a madwoman?

[From [url=https://itch.io/jam/spooktober-2024/rate/2959228]itch.io[/url]]

title: Tell It Slant
description:
Caught between a forgotten friend and unseen threats, you must find the angle where the lies you’re told start to reflect the truth.
But do not fear. If you fail, we can start again from the beginning. 

Tell It Slant is an intimate and layered parable exploring friendship, grief, and what is left behind when power is traded for belonging.

[From [url=https://eeecee.itch.io/tell-it-slant]itch.io[/url]]

Cliff needs help before the monster gets out.  It's been rising inside him ever since he was ████████ .  When an old friend comes back into his life, will he be able to trust her, before the beast breaks free?

[From [url=https://norbez.itch.io/desperate-flesheater]itch.io[/url]]
title: Desperate FleshEater
Undergrowth
description:
You play as Morgan, who is an undercover cop on an expedition as a camp guide-in-training far out in the mountains. You make friends within the camps, searching for answers regarding your lost comrade, who was also undercover before they were wiped off the radar. 

In time, you realize that everyone starts developing a strange infection and you discover that its source is right at the heart of the research center near camp.
Some kind of mold has been growing, and it's not pretty. No back ups have been called, and you're essentially stranded for months. 

Your mission is simple: Find the truth behind the disappearance of your comrade, survive the cold with your newfound allies and escape the frozen confines of the mountains before it’s too late.

[From [url=https://azufx.itch.io/undergrowth]itch.io[/url]]

title: How to be Human
description:
A doll who wants to become a human by any means goes to school, befriending/killing students along the way. She learns what it means to be loved.

[From [url=https://itch.io/jam/spooktober-2024/rate/3002540]itch.io[/url]]

title: Horsementween
description:
A short visual novel about some friends celebrating Halloween (for the first time).

[From [url=https://ghostleif.itch.io/horsementween]itch.io[/url]]

title: toil in trouble
description:
It's Sabine Toil's first day of college. Taking after her sister, she's studying to become a witch. She's eager to learn, hopeful to make friends...

...and oh, so very naïve.

This is a coming of age story about a transgender witch realizing her journey of self-discovery is still ongoing. What will she learn about herself now...?

The difficulty is spicy, as all voyages into self-discovery are.

[From [url=https://anpucamilla.itch.io/toil-in-trouble]itch.io[/url]]

title: Cocoon Heart
description:
Ezra's marriage with his wife has been deteriorating over the years after their daughter died. In a attempt to salvage his relationship he buys a strange cocoon that can replicate his daughter. However,  he finds himself having a hard time remembering how his daughter is like.

[From [url=https://nimesoreol.itch.io/cocoon-heart]itch.io[/url]]

title: Y2K!LL
description:
Stuck in the woods, five seniors on their final project are being hunted down, one by one. There’s a killer out there, and they won’t stop until the crystal clear lakes run red with blood.

Y2K!LL is a campy, horror visual novel set in the late 2000s. Play as Barbara “Barbie” King as she attempts to survive this night of horror. Will you save the final girl, or will this camp be her final destination?

[From [url=https://lemonink.itch.io/y2kill]itch.io[/url]]

title: Still On Patrol
description:
In the year 1989, the SSBN Asphodel disappeared without a trace. One second it was there -- the next, it was gone. Of course there were searches, inquiries, accusations... but those naturally tapered off as it became evident that the missing sub would never reappear.

Until it did, two hundred and forty-three years later.

Where had it been for over two centuries? Why did it reappear? And what caused it to disappear in the first place?

Irwin-class MAID 644G6 has come from the far future to find the answers to these mysteries.

Will she succeed? Or will she only turn up more questions?

[From [url=https://decayedbarrier.itch.io/still-on-patrol]itch.io[/url]]

title: Beyond the Veil
description:
A haunted artist, desperate to uncover her mother's fate, finds a mystical book that promises to bridge the gap between the living and the dead.

[From [url=https://befinamor.itch.io/beyond-the-veil]itch.io[/url]]

title: Sengoku MONSTER
description:
The old world has fallen, a new one struggles to be born.
Get ready, it's not the era of monsters

Divided by war, the land of Yamato sees nothing but conflict.
As the endless feud rages on, no less are those who seek to etch their names into the annals of history.

Who will be the one to unite Yamato? What shall become of this world?

[From [url=https://kappasoup.itch.io/sengoku-monster]itch.io[/url]]

title: High School Rizz Party
description:
After being invited to Mogwards University in Ohio, a young boy named Virgin needs to Rizz some badies before big end of school Rizz Party. Will he be able to defeat his Beta side and become a true Sigma? Help him get some baddies in this new Brainrot Rizz Simulator.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3055400/]Steam[/url]]

title: Lost Connection
description:
Lost Connection is a short visual novel following the events that take place between a space station in peril and the skeleton command crew back on Earth charged with supporting it's mission.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3193620/]Steam[/url]]

title: Hangoverse
description:
Hangoverse is a dumb game where the characters from the Hangover Cat's universe interact with each other in a college setting. Follow Harry as he's getting cuck left and right, and meet with old friends from previous Hangover Cat's NTR titles.

Written by Hself, and part of the story's direction is decided through Hangover Cat's community.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3220680/]Steam[/url]]

title: Kami-sama no Suki na Iro true color

description:
Terminated is a surreal horror comedy set in a gloomy administrative complex.

The first day at any new job is always hard, but especially for the itty bitty kitty new hire. He is given a simple task - make a cup of coffee for his new boss.

There are many things unfamiliar about this place, but how hard could it be?

Now that the nice HR Lady that hired him is gone, how will he navigate the labyrinthine bureaucracy of this strange institution?

And what were those weird noises, barely audible in the distance?

Maybe teaming up with a closeted tech savvy wolf will help?

Armed with a little more than just feline curiosity, the new hire will have to delve deeper and get to the heart of his new workplace - the Administrator.

[From [url=https://city-of-sneps.itch.io/terminated]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Terminated
Empire of All Suns
description:
In the depths of space, a malevolent force known as the Devourer scours the galaxy, reducing vibrant worlds to ashen husks. The Veridian Sigh, captained by the indomitable Elena Serova, stands as a beacon of hope - a team of terraformers sworn to restore life to the ravaged cosmos.

But when a mission to the galactic core goes awry, Elena emerges forever changed - a harbinger of the very blight she once fought against. As she unleashes a twisted gospel of rampant destruction, her former crew must band together to stop her... or bear witness to the end of all things.

[From [url=https://foxlabs.itch.io/empire-of-all-suns]Itch.io[/url]]

The year is 2017, and Geto Suguru has announced a terrorist attack in Tokyo and Kyoto. You’re tasked with seeing possible futures to predict his moves. Despite everything he’s done, you never stopped loving him. So when you discover a way to go back and change his dark fate, you don't hesitate.

But changing the past doesn't come without consequences. Geto's obsession with killing shifts into an obsession with you. Can you break the cycle of pain and tragedy, or will you become trapped in a fate worse than the one you tried to rewrite? Be Geto's light… before the darkness consumes you both.

[From [url=https://khywae.itch.io/before-the-darkness]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Before the Darkness

description:
Dan leads a difficult life, but just when he thinks he's had enough, salvation appears in his inbox in the form of a mysterious invitation. It promises an all-expenses-paid vacation on a state-of-the-art luxury train, featuring some of the most colorful partygoers the world over. Who could refuse that?
What is Dan to do, however, when this party goes completely off the rails and turns into a deadly killing game?  Worse yet, a killing game that charges Dan with the impossible choice of which passengers are executed?

Trainwreck is a nonlinear visual novel where your choices will have a significant impact on the story. Navigate it wisely, as their lives are in your hands.

[From [url=https://harmoyena.itch.io/trainwreck]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Trainwreck

description: Several years have passed since the events of the first part, Alexander returned from the camp, it seems that life should get better, but no. The "owl" does not let Sasha go, he suffers in nightmares, gradually the guy's health begins to deteriorate, even going to the doctors and taking medications do not change the situation. Deciding that this can no longer continue, Alexander decides to solve the mystery of the "Owl", for this he finds a relative of Semyon Persunov, who gives Sasha Semyon's diary. Semyon himself came to the camp to relax and see old friends. However, there is an evil that will not give a peaceful life to the camp. Alexander will have to find out through Semyon what the ghosts of the past hide.
title: Sovjonok: Prizraki proshlogo
Sovjonok: Poslednij koshmar
description: The "Sovjonok" reminds of itself every day. Headaches, nightmares at night, illnesses — all this does not let Alexander go, he needs to do something, but what? How to defeat demons, how to overcome the evil that hung over him? Fate is kind to our hero and he meets one person who can help. But not everything is so simple, you have to pay for a normal life, but it seems that Sasha has no choice. Will he succeed? Will life be the same? Would he die or become a pawn of the demons? That's what you're going to find out.

title: Claire Hikari no Densetsu Middleland part
Monster Social Club
description:
Monsters have always been real and lived in secret and isolation along humans. Fortunately the Internet changed everything and monsters are not lonely anymore.

There is an online communicator server called Monster Social Club where monsters can hang out and make friends. You see a post about a party near you and decide to go, because as a single monster you have been lonely for a quite some time and you are looking for a companion.

[From [url=https://ajgiel.itch.io/monster-social-club-chapter1]itch.io[/url]]

Weeks after waking up in a desolate forest, the first person you find is this girl...
Orange hair, black horns, white wings, and... a bombshell of a body...

Can you trust her? Or is she just after your body?

---

A wholesome romantic nukige between two unique souls in an empty forest!
title: Orange Smash!
Mystery no Arukikata
description:
The Sanmeisou Incident, also known as the “Narumizawa Landscape Painter Murder Case.”

30 years ago, on the grounds of a manor called Sanmeisou in Narumizawa, the famous painter Suiryu Uchida was murdered. The body, found by the pond, was in a bizarre state. While the police investigated, the case ultimately closed with the death of the suspect.

Now, 30 years later, a group of unique individuals from the seminar of Ayame Minato, a young expert in criminal psychology, travel to Sanmeisou to investigate the case as part of their research. As they dig deeper into the truth of this unsolved mystery, new facts gradually emerge, suspects come into focus, and the hidden emotions behind their positive attitudes are revealed…

[Edited from [url=https://www.gematsu.com/2024/10/serial-drama-x-mystery-visual-novel-mystery-walk-announced-for-switch]Gematsu[/url]]

Evelyn inherited the small cocktail bar‘Hyacinth Bar' in her hometown according to her grandfather’s will. However, she is not easy to running a store, becuse she knows nothing about cocktail bars.

At that time, five men appeared in front of her!

With their help, evelyn becomes increasingly interested in alcohol, studies cocktails, and becomes skilled at running a bar. But these guys seem to be crossing a line too far when it comes to helping develop cocktail menus.

Developing new menus, increasing sales, an unexpected love line, a turbulent story unfolds before Evelyn.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3247130/]Steam[/url]]
title: Sul-do, Sarang-do Eoryeoun Agassi
Call the Tune
description:
You'll be following Neo, a young idol dissatisfied with her life. After suddenly moving to a new school for one week, she finds herself wrapped up in the school's student council and its (unofficial) idol group.

But all takes an unexpected turn once a simple accident causes our cast to delve deeper into the school's lower floor. During a series of investigations done by the astute Detective Emilia Ruth, your actions will determine the conclusion of the case as well as the story as a whole.

So get ready to call the tune!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3173870]Steam[/url]]

title: It Could Happen to You
description:
Your peaceful holiday is interrupted when the small village you’re staying in becomes terrorized by strange lights roaming the night and bizarre cattle mutilations. Enigmatic men in black are stalking the villagers, and some have gone missing.

You are their only chance to find them.

Will you be able to save everyone and learn what is really happening when the sun goes down?

Prepare yourself for a mystery that will follow you home.

This could happen to you.
Source: https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/it-could-happen-to-you-switch/

The hero's path is a beautiful and terrifying phenomenon. Every character in his story goes through this thorny path and I was no exception. Ten years of meaningless existence, the pursuit of an empty and cruel dream, in the end, the loss of everything. After walking part of the way in utter darkness, I plunged into the bright, beautiful seven days of summer. But as it turned out, the road closed into a single circle. From Hell to Heaven and back, taking with me a piece of heaven — the legacy of the one who was able to heal my heart.
title: Moj Sychik
Storm the Swan 🦢
aliases: Storm the Swan - And the Power of FRIENDSHIP and IMAGINATION
description:
You just moved to HEDGEHOG HILLS, a small village full of ADORABLE CUTE ANIMAL CHARACTERS!  You get your own HOUSE, and can visit the many places in this PEACEFUL area!

There you meet STORM THE SWAN, a ZANY and WACKY character who is always SCARED of something.  STORM says there's a MONSTER in the WOODS, but surely, they're only imagining things!

Enjoy this CUTE and EDUCATIONAL 8-bit adventure on your own portable 'Data Kid Entertainment System' available in select toy stores in the California area!  

[From [url=https://cattrigger.itch.io/storm-the-swan]itch.io[/url]]

title: A Game of Three Princes
description:
The Belladonne family has had it rough for the last couple of years. After the patriarch of the family passes away and their wealth with him, they are forced to move to a little cottage in Morrowhill. 

Fortunately, they might have the chance to gain back what was lost. At least that's what the letter in the mysterious box says. 

And all they have to do is play a game. 

[From [url=https://fairytime.itch.io/a-game-of-three-princes]itch.io[/url]]

A group of High-School Students gather outside an abandoned hospital. They hope to make contact with a girl that went missing many years ago... But what they find instead may be far worse than they ever imagined.

[From [url=https://vermillion-rex.itch.io/as-inside-from-within]itch.io[/url]]
title: As Inside, From Within
Imagination
description:
You've lost your best friend in a motorbike accident. You decide to write a novel in order to cope this and make him live in another way.

But something goes strange... You wake up in your room from noise somewhere near the hallway, you try to find the culprit of the sound and suspect your lovely cat, but you find out that it is not her. It was a knocking on the door.

You rush to the door and greet a person, a Death itself, it is a Halloween after all, it says that I can reunite with my friend again, but how? He died, or maybe there is a chance it wasn't him?...  After giving you an invitation to the party, you left with the decision, visit this party to know if this person about which Death told, really your friend, or is it something else?...

[From [url=https://hammerfall-interactive.itch.io/imagination]itch.io[/url]]

title: Thoughts of Us
description:
This apartment is Andrew’s. Cethin is close to him, and so is Grimes. Martha is his girlfriend, yet he can’t quite recognize any of it. They’ve just dropped by for a get-together, but Andrew suspects there’s something else under the surface.

In the midst of his dreamlike confusion he’ll have to talk to the right people if he hopes to find the truth, carefully listen to their thoughts, or not.

Will he choose the true path or will he choose his own undoing?

[From [url=https://heavensgates.itch.io/thoughts-of-us]itch.io[/url]]

You play as a young man who labors under the guidance of his mother - a confident, bossy woman who commands the respect and admiration of everyone around her. But one day, during a meeting in the meeting room, a strange tension develops between them that is impossible to ignore. This unexpected burst of passion becomes the beginning of a new, forbidden chapter in their relationship.

The mother invites her son to a café where, over a glass of wine, the atmosphere between them becomes even more heated. Her glances become more daring and her touches more sensual. When they return home to their mother's house, they stop holding back and plunge into a whirlwind of passion. For the first time, they kiss not as mother and son, but as two people with an irresistible attraction to each other. Their kisses become deeper and more passionate, and soon they move on to much more intimate acts, breaking down all moral barriers.

Now they are forced to hide their forbidden connection from their coworkers, although it becomes increasingly difficult to hold back their desires. Their passion for each other is so strong that they start fucking right in the office, in places where they can be seen. The protagonist begins to notice the glances of his colleagues and feels that they may suspect that something inappropriate is going on between him and his mother. Your task is to help him balance on this fine line by making choices that will affect the development of events.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3134600/]Steam[/url]]
title: Family Secrets: Mommy

description:
Perfect Family is an incest paradise game.

Set in a fantasy world of Elves. You are a young adult who after a 10-year-long coma wakes up to see that his family changed quite a lot. Will you be able to form your own family harem? (Yes. Yes, you will.)

[From [url=https://powerofhgames.itch.io/perfect-family-a-family-of-perverts]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Perfect Family: A Family of Perverts
Tsuma wa Kon'ya mo Ubawareru ~Seiso Kei Kyonyuu Hitozuma wa Choukyouzumi Niku Ana Dorei~
description:
Little did you know that in the process, a deep, dark shadow would be cast over your beloved wife’s past and present.
She is innocent, gentle, calm, and has the most beautiful face and body that anyone could ever envy.
You will witness her unknown face and hear her unknown voice. ……
You will see her face and hear her voice.
She shakes her big tits and buttocks and screams out in a vulgar climax: ……
Is your beloved wife a slutty bitch masquerading as a neat and tidy wife? ……
Or is she a loving wife masquerading as a slut to protect her happiness with you? ……
You are about to find out: ……

title: Haishin NTR ~Ano Douga wa Nagasanaitte Yakusoku Shita Janai Desu ka!?~
Kaze no You ni, Hana no You ni
Gyaru Hamari ~Nukedasenai Inyoku no Uzu~
aliases: Into Gal ~Inescapable Vortex of Lewd Desires~

title: Memoria High School: Heartfelt Times
description:
The winter that year was especially harsh. Everybody knew deep inside that the cold made them feel more alone than ever. You could hear the loneliness in the corridors— on the wind piercing through the windows. 

"Aren't you in the need of someone?"

Upon receiving a love letter from a secret admirer, a lost and confused teenage boy finds himself wrapped in a great mystery to uncover the girl who likes him. Meanwhile, a major incident puts his school at a pivotal point of transformation. A girl detective is at the heart of the conspiracy… What role will she play in all of this?

Goth Girl goes to get an energy drink and encounters a stalker.
High jinks ensue
title: Snared

description:
« A Whisper of Blue » is an upcoming slow burn horror romance centered around a merman who was recently brought to your workplace. His wild nature and wariness makes him an especially hard to deal with. Don’t lower your guards. 

[From [url=https://bellpheria.itch.io/a-whisper-of-blue]itch.io[/url]]
title: A Whisper of Blue
Axxx: Jiaodao he Xingjiao
description:
You are in your third year of medical school. Innocently, you think home tutoring is a good idea, and it is. But there is nothing innocent about it.

You want to be an ethical and responsible guy, but you are dominated by the throbbing you feel in your dick.

The college girls interested in your classes, don't make it easy for you to be a good guy, you end up groping them and fucking them.

Does that mean you're not professional? Not at all! You offer a comfortable service, but they want more from you.

Apparently, they are good girls; dedicated, hardworking, kind and with great virtues that you are about to discover. They need you, and you love it that way.

Now, when you have the chance to get into bed with them, you have to choose how to fuck them.

Knowing them can inspire you to know what you want from them.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3200590/]Steam[/url]]

title: Meddlesome Reflection
description:
Your boss has about 170,791 daily tasks to attend to, she's so busy she even started resurrecting the dead to help her. 

You are one of those little helpers, one problem though there is a very strict law in the universe that: NOTHING EVER COMES BACK FROM DEATH.

To get around this hard rule, your boss wipes the memories of her corpsy workers, so they don't actually know who they are,  only their tasks:

Go to where she sends you and note down all death that has happened there.

[From [url=https://atinylittlecloud.itch.io/meddlesome-reflection]Itch.io[/url]]

After you come to the town, what are they planning to GET you?

[From [url=https://rice-love-coffee.itch.io/heart-cage-dlc-before-the-war]itch.io[/url]]
title: Heart Cage - Before the War

description:
Atlas Ablaze is a visual novel that follows a girl named Andi as she discovers how it feels to yearn to know someone the way you know yourself. It's a story about a coming of age, sonder feelings, the acceptance of change and simply owning up to being human.

She's a 16 year old who finds herself falling in love with a young sex worker as she's simultaneously dealing with a sharp decline in her mental health. Her lack of experience in relationships not only affects her love life, but her friendships as well. As she begins to understand how it feels to care for people so much that love becomes your crutch, she also realizes just how many people care for themselves more than anyone else.

Acting as somewhat of a subconscious or an imaginary friend, you can help Andi make choices in her day to day life, influencing the way she interacts with the people around her. There are many different characters you can meet, some of which have secrets to be discovered. If your humor is warped to a point where you can't explain why any of it is funny anymore, living inside Andi's mind might be exactly what you need.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1870930/]Steam[/url]]
title: Atlas Ablaze

description:
"Are you in it for love?"

The whimsical shores of a Florida resort set the stage for romance and rivalry among presidential candidates vying for your heart! Experience an unforgettable romantic journey in a reality TV show that decides the fate of a nation through love.

You’ll spend four wild days navigating flirty banter, heartfelt moments, and heated rivalries. But beware—a shadowy manipulator is secretly working behind the scenes, trying to rig the game and tip the scales in their favor. Will true love prevail, or will the election of love be sabotaged? It’s up to you to uncover the truth and choose your perfect match!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3239100/]Steam[/url]]
title: Love Love 2024: The Love Election
Exposure
description:
The wildlands of the western frontier are full of wonders yet unclaimed. Opportunity awaits for those brave enough to grab it.

But not all are interested in land or fortune. You have your eye on a bigger prize. Strange creatures, undiscovered by science - cryptids - roam these lands, and you seek to prove their existence. Armed with nothing but your camera and determination, you wander the western wilds to find cryptids, photograph them, and show the world what you’ve found. But you’re far from the only thing in these lands, and they’ve noticed you, as well. 

And not all of them are friendly.

[From [url=https://borderbreakers.itch.io/exposure]itch.io[/url]]

Violet has been in a coma for many years. Though paralyzed and incapable of anything but thought, her helpful B.T. (Brainwave Translator) allows her to communicate. When an unexpected visitor arrives, Violet's life will change forever.

[From [url=https://flappyjack.itch.io/iris]itch.io[/url]]
title: IRIS

description:
