Content warnings at the bottom, proceed there first if you're concerned!

In this village, a deadly curse has ensnared its residents for centuries. After a resident turns 20, they will turn into a demon. One borne of their greatest vices. But it isn’t immediate. Some wait days. Some decades. But the curse comes for all.

Caligo is a week away from her twentieth birthday. Her mothers have trapped her in an abusive household her entire life. But all of a sudden, she is freed. But her freedom isn’t without reason. Not every demon looks the part, and her parents…they haven’t been human for a long while.

As she ventures out into the village she’s lived in, but never known, Caligo grapples with making friends, learning how to trust, fighting against demons both real and not, grappling with the horrifying reality that soon she, too, could turn, and that perhaps her mothers’ monstrousness runs deeper than she could’ve ever imagined. And through it all, she may be the only one with the knowledge to stop them. 

[From [url=https://flappyjack.itch.io/mothers]itch.io[/url]]
title: Mothers
Death & Faeology
description:
You are a renowned faeologist in 1920s New York who has been tasked with solving a chilling crime:
Bizarre murders happening across the upper echelons of New York society, with the mystery deepening with every clue.

Follow the clues with your fae expertise and keen investigative tools such as a magnifying glass and a blacklight, and gather vital information by interviewing those who hold fragments of the truth, all while navigating your allegiance between a relentless detective and your enigmatic patron.

Will you unravel the truth and cement the importance of faeology in a world that relegates it to the realm of pseudoscience?

[From [url=https://mushroomallow.itch.io/dark-and-faeology-prologue]itch.io[/url]]

title: Chakotto Game Kenkyuukai ~Suzume Taichou no Maid Cafe~
Star Majesty - Kagayakeru Hoshiboshi ni Erabareta Futago no Utahime -
description:
Kotone Rina, a girl who loves singing, enrolls in the sky magic school Lyceum with her twin sister Kotone Runa.
To make her dream come true, she and her sister become the first twin divas chosen by the shining stars in history.

Translated from the booth.pm page

title: The Scaly Valley
description:

Against the backdrop of a rural estate, their bond grows as they sketch, bake, and navigate the unspoken rules of Victorian propriety.

He yearns for a lost simplicity, a time where things were a bit simpler and might’ve felt right. In a chance encounter with Vivi, a girl from the drama department, he’s given a flier to a theatrical performance – her last performance before she also graduates that semester.

Though their time left as students is fleeting, the two continue to walk their different but interwoven paths, as they discover and embrace the beauty in their shimmering but fading moments as students.

The world that the young girl was going to explore turned out to be not quite as simple as she thought, and now she has to find out what her uncle forgot and what her new housemates are hiding.

It wasn't long before he was approached by two absolutely gorgeous girls – a mum and her daughter – that he was lucky enough to become a part of his life!

title: The Lust of Us

description:
The protagonist has been living with his step-sister, who is much older than him, since his parents left home for a long-term overseas assignment.
His step-sister lives alone because she wants to focus on her work, but she supports him and sends him to school.
But one day...

"What? The payments have stopped?"

The protagonist is suddenly kicked out of the school dormitory for non-payment.
He is forced to go to the apartment where his sister lives alone--

"She's dead!!"

He finds his sister collapsed in her underwear for some reason.
But she's not dead.

"No, it's all over now..."

"Sister...?"

His sister is actually a manga artist, and she's in a serious slump.

Because of this, her work has stalled, and her dorm rent payments have stopped.

"Ugh, brother... I can't think of anything..."

"Sis... You've pushed yourself so hard for me..."

The protagonist makes a decision.
He must now support his sister who has been working so hard.
He blurts out the words with that thought.

"Don't worry! I'll help you with anything, even ideas!"

"Really...? Did you just say anything...?"

That statement will greatly change the fate of the brother and sister.
Because the sister is not just a manga artist.

"I've been keeping it a secret up until now... but I support my brother by drawing erotic manga..."

And so, to save his good-for-nothing, perverted sister.
And to create even better erotic manga.
Their innocent yet greedy sex life begins...!!

Eight new vampires are forced to live together in a remote mansion. Each episode, they must vote off one of their fellow Fledglings. But the losing contestant isn't just forced to leave the show — they're executed for the pleasure of the viewing audience.

Can Rocky live long enough to figure out what happened to him? How will he deal with his fellow Fledglings? Find out in Fledgling Manor, a supernatural horror visual novel.

When the Sun fell from the sky, and the world was covered in darkness and cold, it seemed that there was no more hope for people. But even after leaving its domain, the Sun did not go out. It sank into a deep slumber and continued to shine. Although not as majestic as it once was, this light was enough for people to build a new home in the middle of the snowy wasteland — the town of Svargo. Residents honor and protect their little Sun, which still sleeps at the top of the grim lighthouse.

But what will happen when the Sun wakes up and abandons the heavenly grandeur for a few days of simple childhood?

description:
The Ethics Teacher, Naofumi Hidaka, had built a peaceful home with his wife, Manami, a former actress who started her career in glamour modeling. However, five years into their marriage, Naofumi secretly received a diagnosis revealing that he was azoospermic—unable to produce sperm.

For Manami, who grew up in a single-parent household, creating a "happy family" was her way of repaying her mother’s sacrifices. Wanting to fulfill her dreams of motherhood and happiness, Naofumi begins to stoke the flames of his twisted "love," a love he keeps hidden deep within.

"I want to see the woman I love—not just as my wife, not just as a person, but as a woman."

Around this time, an opportunity arises: a nude photoshoot offered by the agency Manami worked with during her glamour modeling days.
This marks the beginning of Naofumi's warped love taking action. He exploits the cracks forming in Manami's ideal image of a perfect wife and family. Under the guise of understanding and mutual consent, he orchestrates situations where she is embraced by other men, men she doesn’t know.

All to protect their ideal family.
All to protect the one he loves.
Most of all, to love her more deeply than anyone else ever could.

You are a highly anticipated up and coming volleyball star. Or rather, you were up until you destroyed your shoulder and your prospects along with it by overworking yourself. Now you're just a nobody who drowned your sorrows away with a series of poor life choices.

This story takes place after a wake up call following a year of wallowing in despair with a life that spiraled downhill under the shadow of the star volleyball prospect you once were. You have just received a vague invitation for a meeting from the Dean of Baskerville State University, a highly prestigious university, regarding a potential scholarship when no other universities would give the current you a second glance.

The condition of this scholarship however would turn out to be facing your demons as you return to the sport you turned your back on in a new role, becoming the coach of the school's women's volleyball team.

But little did you know that facing your demons would be the easiest part of this task as the team is riddled with fatal problems, each threatening to end your scholarship left, right, and centre!  Yet by earnestly facing these girls and their issues with your eyes wide open, you might just end up growing in a way you never thought you would. description:
What begins as a simple weekend getaway turns into a steamy, forbidden adventure that pushes boundaries in ways you've only fantasized about. In this game, you're about to experience a dangerously intimate escape with your sister Amber and her best friend Tiffany, where family ties become tangled in desire, and the line between right and wrong fades away.

You never expected this weekend would bring you closer to Amber in more ways than one. At a secluded villa, just the three of you, the playful teasing starts innocently enough—but Amber’s lingering touches and flirtatious glances make it clear she wants more from you than a brother should. And when her best friend Tiffany joins in the fun, it becomes a game of seduction where every move, every touch, brings you closer to crossing that forbidden line.

As the heat builds under the sun and the temptation between you and Amber grows impossible to resist, the weekend spirals into a passionate exploration of hidden desires. From daring games in the pool to intimate moments under the stars, Amber and Tiffany lead you through a weekend that will push all your boundaries.

[From [url=https://inkandtease.itch.io/getaway-with-my-sisters]Itch.io[/url]]

description:
Legend has it that there is a mysterious flower imbued with power that can only be found by the chosen one. There were many who sought power in their search for the flower, but their efforts were in vain. Only one young man had overcome the obstacles to find the flower.

"You shall become an agent of the gods..."

The flower, cradled in the palm of the young man, was taken from him one fateful night.

"Go forth, embark on your journey... and find the White Flower..."

Guided by the divine and his own will, the young man set out on a quest to find the flower once again, forging bonds with talented companions along the way.

At the end of his journey, the young man reclaims the white flower... But he did not realize, although the flower's color remained, its purity had long since faded... Now, all who came into contact with the white flower would be cursed for all eternity.

The young man used the white flower granted by the gods as his symbol and established the Kingdom of Nirai, where people live in peace and prosperity, and the land is fertile.

Until one day, the cursed flower started to spread throughout the land.

A pandemic ensued, leading to misery and suffering, ultimately culminating in a war that shattered the once-mighty kingdom overnight...

As time passed, the past became buried in dust. A white-haired youth, living a humble life as a wheat farmer, embarks on his journey...

description: Tonomura Zenji is a poor student from the countryside who moved to Tokyo to attend university. Attracted by the convenience of getting to university and the exceptionally low price, he decided to live in the cheap apartment Momoyamaso, but he was worried that it might have a bad reputation. However, Momoyama Marin, the landlord of Momoyamaso, is a stunning beauty and she has big breasts. His new life is filled with hope and anxiety. While he feels happy with Marin's misleading behavior, he is terrified of being attacked by sleep paralysis every night. Yes, the landlord, Momoyama Marin, is just a disguise. Her true nature is... a succubus named Marin.

Top idol boy group, 『ALL⊿tius』, face a crisis when tensions with their producer finally reach a breaking point. In search of a new producer to create their next hit album, the group decides to hold a music production competition. That's when the group's leader—known for his sharp intuition—personally recruits you, claiming that 『ALL⊿tius』 is in great need of your talents.
As you work closely with each member, your relationships deepen, revealing each member's hidden struggles and desires. Now, you must balance the demands of being their producer with the demands of your heart...

Without the stress of exams, it can truly be an amazing experience.

Abandoned, alone and without purpose, you’ve never felt so isolated after your parent’s divorce. Taken in by your grandmother, your days drift by aimlessly in a picturesque town by the ocean.

During a midnight stroll you’re drawn to the sea by a mysterious song, the melodic singing of a siren on the beach…

With this fateful encounter your journey of self-acceptance, friendship and love begins.

Serena often feels an eerie, unexplainable gaze on her.

She notices the empty seat in the classroom, finding it odd, but brushes it off as nothing.

But one day, when her friend Cindy disappears, she’s finally forced to confront that unsettling feeling...

title: My Time Travel Romance : Romance You Choose
description:
After having spent most of your life living aimlessly, you even contracted cancer and were on the verge of death.

Something happened to you during your high school days, and you have always felt regret over what happened.

During your school years, a crazed serial killer entered your school and murdered every last student.

The girl that you had liked at the time was also killed right in front of you. You regret that you had frozen from fear and not tried to save her.

Suddenly, a mysterious person appears in front of you as you lie on your deathbed.

He says, “I will allow for you to relive your school days. BUT, you must not let anyone find out that you are from the future. If someone finds out that you are from the future or if you cannot save the person that you loved, not only will you die, but you will also suffer through an eternity in hell.”

Instead of just dying of cancer, you decide that you would like to have a chance to save your past love. Therefore, you decide to relive your high school days.

When you wake up, you are in your teenage body once more.

The girl you saw die is stands right in front of you...alive...

A ritual sacrifice got her everything she ever wanted: an adoring crowd (faceless), a newfound power (dangerous), and a whirlwind romance (one-sided). But without a heart in her chest, how could she love anyone back? Does she even need to?

description:
Everybody's got problems...

...and just about everyone would pay to get answers to them. Sometimes that's tricky, such as when the problem involves dealing with someone or something that has moved on from this world.

That's where you come in!
As an itinerant, fraudulent medium,

you'll meet clients, read their body language and subtle tells, and then blow them away with shockingly accurate messages from the spirit world. They pay you, and everyone leaves happy!

Plus, you get to meet lots of interesting people.

Sure, the last few stops didn't go so well, and sure your assistant keeps bothering you about their "wages." But surely this'll be the time you turn things around. As the great Ignacio Mysterium always said: "Even the skeptic wants to believe. Your job is to simply provide the excuse."

[From [url=https://subtleart.itch.io/the-subtle-art-of-pretending-to-contact-the-dead]itch.io[/url]]

On all Hallow's Eve, they say the veil thins and the living can commune with the dead.

But what if, perhaps, this too applied to the undead? What secrets could be laid bare? What dreadful truths would be revealed?

Fortunately for you, these secrets could be yours.

Unfortunately for you, they may cost you your life.

Your chances for survival are slim, but society is on your side. Be thorough. Be fast. And above all, know your pursuer.

I was forced to attend a drinking party at work with many people.  My crush and coworker Minami Akitsu was also there. 

By coincidence, Minami fell asleep next to me on the train on the way home.  She was leaning against me, and I quickly put my hand on her shoulder to support her.  Although I knew she was married, I was thrilled to see her defenseless figure.

The car is sparsely populated and there is no one in the front seat.  There would be no fear of being witnessed no matter what I did now. Even if they did, it would only look like a lover joking around.

Create your own story and adventure as a young adventurer driven by an insatiable thirst for discovery, leading you across vast seas in search of a better life. Journey through dense jungles where every bush could conceal deadly danger. Traverse ancient ruins where the shadows of the past come to life and the walls whisper forgotten secrets. Amass a fortune or choose the path of a wanderer. In this world, every step you take is a gamble between life and death. Make a mistake, and the abyss will swallow you

The game always presents choices, and which path you take is entirely up to you. Can you face all the challenges and uncover every secret? Or will you die without finding the answers? Only you can decide what your

Your choices are the key to everything. You'll enter a world where over 2,000 events shape your story, each trying to prevent you from completing it. More than 200 ways to die await you, ensuring you may never solve all the mysteries and riddles. Your journey will never be easy, filled with pain, loss, and tough decisions, and remember—every action comes with a cost, and often that cost is death. Whether you uncover all the secrets and reach the finale depends solely on you and your choices.

Every interaction uncovers hidden facets of his soul, forcing him to confront his deepest fears and repressed desires. With a lucky four-leaf clover in hand, fate is on your side. Will you finally build up the courage to confess to your crush? Or will an unexpected spark reignite the affection between you and your childhood friend?

Navigate the ups and downs of college life while balancing relationships with two captivating girls. And don’t forget about your goofy but reliable best friend — or the teacher who's dead set on making your life miserable.

description:
Arabella Harlow is a governess seeking new employment in the city of Second London one Halloween season.  Her paths cross with an eccentric alchemist-inventor, who introduces her to his myriad of creations.  One particular automaton is Jack, a humanoid construct with ruby-red eyes and intellect on par with a human's.  But Jack cannot speak - not verbally.  So Arabella is hired on to teach him how to communicate through alternate methods.

As they grow in their relationship - are they colleagues?  are they comrades?  are they confidantes?  Arabella herself is not quite sure. - a series of tragic, dramatic events culminate in a murder.  Secrets lurk in the city of Second London...secrets that may put Arabella's life in danger...

"One day, I accidentally stumbled upon a mysterious themed café hidden at a street corner—'Heaven and Hell.'"

"Good afternoon, are you here to fall into Hell alone?"

A staff member, dressed in an elegant outfit, greets you with a smile and leads you into the restaurant called "Heaven and Hell," where you embark on a lunchtime filled with surprises and a magical experience.

This visual novel takes you into a role-playing themed café, immersing you in a unique atmosphere brimming with "hellish" vibes. Prepare for an unexpected encounter with the "demon" staff!

+ A short but captivating story +
The game contains a total of 4,429 characters.

Every line of dialogue is carefully designed, with many hidden surprises in the details.

description:
Deminisis: Rise of Sinners is a Dark Fantasy Visual novel where the story revolves around Sebak.

In the cosmic void, The Celestial One created the supercontinent Deminisis and its four kingdoms. After a mysterious seven-day absence, despair led to the rise of Infernis, a group that undermined faith in The Celestial One and promoted the false divine Varcolac. In the midst of the chaos, the faithful followers of the true divine, attempted to regain their faith by a desperate revolt. However, they face defeat in battle, leading to the sad realization that their true god seems to have abandoned them.

A thousand years after the chaos, Cedric and Edmund find a wolf in the ruins, but it has no memory. But some pieces of it are quite familiar to him but he doesn't know when and how.

[From Itch.io]

title: Pygmalion's Folly
description:
Pygmalion's Folly is a survival murdersim where you play as Roxham Police Department's star detective, hellbent on finding your sister's killer... until he finds you. 

In a story inspired by new and old horror classics, you spend five days in the basement of a doctor that's as genius as he is insane, experiencing new forms of torture that break the laws of nature. With thirty different endings, you can explore divergent approaches to escape his wretched basement and bring him to justice... or go down darker paths, and experience fates worse than death.

[From [url=https://doubledeadstudio.itch.io/pygmalions-folly]itch.io[/url]]

title: SpyLens: Jujiao Xing'ai
description:
How lucky you are!🍀

You start college in Tokyo and your dear uncle lends you the house he has nearby.

Arriving at your new residence, you make a small route inside until you find the room that is going to be yours.

You approach a cardboard box which has a note signed by your uncle: “This camera has the power to irretrievably attach you to the person you take a picture of. It is loaded with 4 shots. Use it with care and don't be too naughty.”

Your first expression is to roll your eyes and laugh at such nonsense. However, after setting up all your stuff and realizing that the female residence is in front of the house, you decide to give it a try.

The camera's zoom gives you views that make you gulp. Without a second thought, you shoot, capturing the image of a girl.

You decide to lie down without giving it much thought, not knowing that you're going to cross paths with the girls in the dorm.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3285790/]Steam[/url]]

The popular idol group, PAPILL◇N, rented out an isolated island for their live concert. However, after their concert concludes, their manager is discovered dead outside the venue.
Both the idols and their fans are horrified at this terrifying scene, which completely washes out the dream-like feelings they had before. 
As if it were a twist by fate, the weather conditions suddenly take a turn for the worse as well, making it so that it'll take a considerable amount of time for the police to arrive. 
So, Sakai Kyou and Yokozimo Koboshi, who happened to be visiting the concert during their vacation decide to take matters into their own hands and investigate who the murderer is.

description:
Flint Hawthorne, an aspiring mechanic with a supernatural secret, is thrilled when he lands a job with the Haunting Fang Crew, a racing team struggling on the brink of dissolution. However, upon arrival, he finds himself immersed in the chaotic world of a ragtag group of misfits who have never tasted victory. Tasked by his enigmatic boss, Mathias, to address the crew's internal issues, Flint must conceal his true identity as a fey, gifted with the ability to sense others' emotions, while navigating the complexities of his new role.

As tensions rise and the crew faces their make-or-break race, Flint's fey powers may hold the key to their salvation. Will he unravel the tangled web of desires and insecurities within the crew, or will the weight of their collective baggage drag them down into oblivion? With love and loyalty hanging in the balance, Flint's journey is fraught with choices that could change everything for the Haunting Fang Crew.

[From [url=https://moonescope.itch.io/ghoul-racing]itch.io[/url]]

Welcome to the magical world of Grand Duke Valeran, where elves, beastmen, dragons, and even gods truly exist.
You will step into the role of a young man who, after being struck by lightning while fapping, is reincarnated into the body of a young marquis in this fantasy realm.
And just like many other protagonists, you carry the heavy burden of saving the world.
Follow our hero's journey as this ordinary guy figures out how to save the world. This is a tale of adventure, war, and intrigue. And trust me, it won’t follow the usual tropes. After all, a protagonist isekai'd while fapping has to be different from one hit by a truck, right?
