You are a 17-year-old girl named Mu Yunting, with a mysterious destiny and an enigmatic background. Your ordinary life takes a turn when you are brought into a secluded celestial palace by the powerful Immortal Master Canglan, beginning an extraordinary journey of cultivation. As the Immortal Master shows increasing interest in you, rumors spread throughout the cultivation world: Are you truly his daughter? Could your potential reshape the entire realm? 

In this mystical world, you face doubts and protection while searching for your true self. Through your interactions with Zhen Xinghe, Xu Shaoyan, Wei Chuchen, and others, you gradually unravel the secrets of your origins. Can you uncover the truth behind the 'Mountain Beyond the Mountain' and explore the themes of fate and choice? This journey of immortality is yours to write.

[From [url=https://illumination-works.itch.io/heavenly-heir]itch.io[/url]]

Amidst a shadowy Gothic Victorian city plagued by consumption and sinister vampires, you embark on a quest to uncover the truth behind your brother's mysterious disappearance. As you navigate the treacherous dark alleys of this haunting metropolis, you are suddenly whisked away by the enigmatic Tarquinn Ravencroft—a distinguished vampire gentleman steeped in dark allure. 

Join a clandestine organization battling the encroaching shadows, but beware—can you truly trust a creature of the night? Will you dare to place your faith in him, or will his monstrous cravings lead you to your doom in this tale of forbidden love and dark fantasy?

Immerse Yourself in a Gothic Romance of Vampires and Dark Creatures!

[From [url=https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.genius.monstergentlemen]Google Play[/url]]
title: Monstrous Cravings
Kavaya Local Maximum
description:
Mining operations on the Calderan peninsula revealed a source of new energy some 40 years ago. Despite the troublesome location, tons of resources were invested into the research and refinement of this new element. In many ways, it was the miracle the Northern Provinces had been waiting for. Power generation. Transportation. Weapons. A promise of a better world. In an explosive moment, optimism swept the nation.

Suddenly the whole world seemed within reach— And we were ready to claim it. If only we could perfect this technology… If only we could find our perfect candidate.

title: Mysteries of the House: The Jester & the Prince
description:
You find yourself waking up with no memories, trapped in a room with two talking drawings. As you investigate to uncover clues about your whereabouts and a way to escape, it becomes clear that there's more to the situation than meets the eye.

[From [url=https://spark180.itch.io/the-jester-and-the-prince]itch.io[/url]]

After the incident with the Jester and the Prince, you are placed under the watchful eyes of the Phantom and the Sun. Under the Creator's order, the three of you are assigned to track down Mystery, an infamous thief causing chaos in the shadows. As your investigation deepens, it becomes clear that more characters are caught up in this twisted stage play than you originally thought.

[From [url=https://spark180.itch.io/the-phantom-and-the-sun]itch.io[/url]]
title: Mysteries of the House: The Phantom & the Sun
Okayu Nyumu!
description:
Become Okayu’s caretaker after she suddenly appears before you, and enjoy sweet, carefree days together.

This is a story about sharing smiles and heartfelt moments in daily life, while uncovering the truth behind Okayu and nurturing your love for her.

This game was created out of Nekomata Okayu’s desire to “live honestly,” so please make her the heroine of your story.

[Edited from [url=https://www.gematsu.com/games/okayu-nyumu]Gematsu[/url]]

title: Cinderella's Glass Collar
description:
Meet Cindy, a cute, innocent 23 year old girl moving to the big city for the first time to work as a secretary for a big prestigious law firm, working under her enigmatic, handsome boss, Daniel, and his sexy, beautiful assistant Ada.

Unbeknownst to Cindy, the two share a secret kinky sexual relationship, and when she discovers that secret, she's seduced down a road of temptation that she never expected...

Follow along on her adventures as she delves down this wicked rabbit hole: encountering erotic situations and forming salacious relationships as she discovers the true nature of her sexual potential...

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/littleglass/about]Patreon[/url]]

It's your first time holding a real job. Like a real-deal job with a lot of responsibilities. You're an executive assistant aboard the U.S.S. Tibarn, the biggest airship in the world. It's embarking on its maiden voyage, a cruise around the world, and you're embarking on a not-so-maiden voyage of your own.

Okay, so actually you're more like an underpaid janitor, but you still get to be on a luxury cruise in the sky, right?

Whether it's helping clean the infinity pool, or lazing around after hours at the local lesbian bar, you're going to have the time of your life on the Tibarn. And, if you're lucky, you'll snag a girlfriend, too.

Do your best. There's a ton of choices. Some tricky decisions. And a whole lotta paths the story can take.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3170800/Love_is_in_the_Airship/]Steam[/url]]
title: Love is in the Airship

description:
In a galaxy filled with danger and desire, you are a skilled transporter navigating the treacherous underbelly of space. As you carry out jobs across star systems, this time your precious cargo is unlike anything you’ve ever encountered—a mysterious and alluring passenger whose very presence ignites a fire within you.

As you journey through uncharted territories, you and your mysterious cargo develop a connection that blurs the lines between duty and desire. Will you keep your heart safe, or will you risk everything for a taste of forbidden passion?

Prepare for a journey filled with intrigue, romance, and steamy encounters that will leave you breathless. Are you ready to embrace the cosmic pull of your desires?

[From [url=https://sandlstudios.itch.io/astral-desires]itch.io[/url]]
title: Astral Desires

description:
Arthur Hope is a spirit photographer, able to capture images of the departed with his camera.

At least, that's what he'd like you to believe. After all, any price is worth paying to see a loved one's face again, isn't it?

Unfortunately for him, ghosts just might be more real than he realised.

[From [url=https://endysis.itch.io/portrait-of-a-ghost]itch.io[/url]]
title: Portrait of a Ghost
Boom Boom KONBINI
description:
Working the night shift at a local convenience store has never been more thrilling!

What would you do if the girl of your dreams was caught stealing right under your watch?

Will you win her heart, or will she walk away with your store’s goods?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3216900/]Steam[/url]]

title: Ore(♂) wa Maid(♀) ni Saserarete, Karen na Cupid ni Moteasobareru
description:
One day, Harugamiseki Hisame encountered an unusual situation in the park: a young lady-like girl was being targeted by an arrow.
He shielded her with his own body, but as a result—he ended up turning into a girl!?

Now known as Tsukishiro Hime (formerly Hisame), she was allowed to stay in the mansion as a maid by the young lady she saved, Tsukishiro Ouka, until she could return to her original form.
However, peace never seemed to come.
The culprit who shot the arrow, a Cupid Monarca, also seemed to be staying at the mansion, but she appeared to be plotting something suspicious...

"The female body feels so much better than the male body!"
Once he realized that, there was no going back to being a man.
Hime found herself sinking deeper and deeper into unknown pleasures.

[Translated from [url=https://www.dlsite.com/pro/work/=/product_id/VJ01002981.html/]DLsite[/url]]

“Let’s have a little reunion, just the four of us.”

Lemon, Cyan, Murasaki, and Kurone—a group of four close friends who were considered “oddballs” back in middle school.

Over time, they drifted apart, each leading their own high school lives. In the summer of their third year in high school, Korone—the lively mood maker who brought the oddballs together—reaches out after a long time.

Looking forward to their reunion, they all arrive at the meeting place… or so they thought.

When they regain consciousness, they find themselves in a small room with no exit. The room is decorated as if themed after Alice in Wonderland. In each corner of the square room, there is a chair and a table for each girl, as well as a lovely tea set. And also, long chains that extend from each chair, connected to the collars around the girls’ necks…

The “reunion” has become a death game—a battle of life and death to settle the past…!

[From [url=https://www.gematsu.com/2024/10/kaleidoscope-of-phantom-prison-ii-announced-for-ps4-switch]Gematsu[/url]]
title: Gensou Rougoku no Kaleidoscope 2
The Wraith in the Woods
description: Take the role of  a guy who goes on a camping trip with his friends when things turn sideways due to something lurking in the woods

title: Cave
description:
An eerie experience for the Only One Of Any Asset 2021 game jam.

[From [url=https://fallright.itch.io/cave]itch.io[/url]]

title: CELL 0: Cyber Entertainment Leisure Lounge
description: CELL is a short non-linear visual novel in a post-apocalypse/cyberpunk setting. Kenzo is an artificially grown human who lived his entire life alone isolated with a sweet, but artificial service intelligence. He's not okay. Help him to go through the disturbing situation he's about to get into.

A boy rejected from the occult club meets a shadow that offers him an irresistible offer.

[From [url=https://dddking.itch.io/absolute-hypnosis-in-dxd]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Absolute Hypnosis in DxD
Hirusagari no Run-Down Apartment to Hitozuma-tachi 〜Heisa Kuukan de Kurui Ochiteiku〜

description:
Play as an up-and-coming Agent given the impossible task of delving into the mind of an unreadable beast.

The chamber walls are cold and uninviting, one sole light illuminating the thing waiting inside.

Your heart beats loudly in the silence, an uncontrollable sign of your rising paranoia.

The unnerving presence of the monster fills you with honest, unshakeable fear. 

How the next three days progress is entirely up to you: your methods of interrogation must be finely tuned and given purposeful direction.

Being unable to choose a side won't end well, so don't idle on the side lines.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3148490/]Steam[/url]]
title: Kindred [Subject 6244]

description:
In "Their Invitation", you will return to high school, experience the friendship and special emotions of the aristocratic male high school students in the aristocratic school, and uncover their hidden secrets.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3257410/]Steam[/url]]
title: Their Invitation
Rivalhearts
description:
Join Noah in his first year of university as he decides to overcome his heartache, pursuing either a tomboy classmate, gorgeous doctor, or junior-year goth! Navigate the worlds of love through differing highs and lows, with a cute best friend to supervise along the way!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3232710/Rivalhearts/]Steam[/url]]

title: Shuang Xiang: Shuiguan
description:
Play as physically and mentally exhausted junior student Rin, and experience the gradual process of a middle schooler being driven insane by her family, suffering from bipolar disorder. You can choose to believe your parents over and over again, or you can choose to be wary of them from the start. When reality and illusion begin to intertwine, can you really guarantee that you won't be trapped in a dream?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3296620/]Steam[/url]]

title: The Midnight Crowd
description:
When a twenty-something waitress is presented with the opportunity to leave her small town for a convention on the other side of the country, she takes it. Joined by an actual rocket scientist and a girl who may-or-may-not be an alien, she somehow ends up on-the-run from the government in this supernatural, sci-fi adventure.

Along the way, she meets a colorful cast of characters, including: a detective who practices witchcraft, a cheeky demon who wants to become her familiar, a bounty hunter who's their roommate, and a conspiracy theorist with a penchant for sticking her nose where it doesn't belong.

[From [url=https://fableknot.itch.io/midnight-crowd01]itch.io[/url]]

Larut is a fictional work retelling of the Indonesian folklore and mythological figure, Nyi Roro Kidul.

Having lost her home and her family's trust due to her stepmother’s schemes, Kandita finds herself struggling alone on the beach marking the edge of the South Sea.

There, she meets her savior, the eternally kind and loving Queen of the Southern Sea who takes her in and grants her a position as the Queen’s lady-in-waiting. 

Eternally grateful for the Queen’s kindness and generosity, Kandita promises to devote her whole life to her savior. However, in this dog-eat-dog world society, a frail and naive lady like her must learn to adapt or lose everything yet again. 

[From [url=https://senjagames.itch.io/larut]itch.io[/url]]
title: Larut

description:
Buried secrets and forgotten sins fester within the halls of power, where love is a dangerous weapon. Lady Victoria uncovers a story that was never meant to see the light—a tale of manipulation, murder, and forbidden love. The Pope’s daughter hides a deadly past, and the only one who knows the full truth remains silent, their love concealed beneath layers of guilt and control.

As Lady Victoria searches for answers, she stumbles upon the cause of the plague—a discovery that not only threatens her family’s legacy but her very soul. With each fragment of forgotten lives she uncovers, she learns a bitter truth: some things are better left buried, and some love is destined to be forgotten.


[From [url=https://gorebaristas.itch.io/love-to-be-forgotten]itch.io[/url]]
title: Love to be Forgotten
A Phone Affair
description:
A Phone Affair is a choice-driven visual novel that immerses you in the world of long-distance relationships, ambition, and lust—all through the lens of a phone-style visual. You play as a young man experiencing the various shades of love from afar as your sweet and innocent girlfriend, an aspiring actress pursues her dreams of stardom.

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/allureartsstudios/about]Patreon[/url]]

The Devil's Advocate.  A lively tavern known for its vibrant atmosphere and eccentric staff composed of seven seasoned adventurers. After an unexpected event occurs, the group realizes something is not quite right within their beloved establishment. As they investigate further, they discover unsettling secrets tied to the tavern's history and face new challenges in dealing with an enigmatic entity as old as the walls they reside in (itchio description).
title: The Runaways: Happy Hour

description:
Trade your soul for digital fame in this psychological visual novel. As fallen tech mogul Doran White, navigate a treacherous social media landscape. Your choices shape his fate in this hand-drawn, neuroscience-inspired reimagining of Oscar Wilde's classic.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3127320/Darkly_Glass/]Steam[/url]]
title: Darkly Glass

description:
Enter the seductive world of My New Girlfriend, an adult porn game that delves into the steamy relationship dynamics of its main character, Eric, and his irresistible girlfriend, Violet. Set against a backdrop of passion, lust, and desire, players are invited to explore Eric's deepest fantasies.

[From F95Zone]
title: My New Girlfriend
Luminous Threads
description:
Step into this cyberpunk world as Juno, a teenage girl on a mission to find a murderer and clear her brother’s name.

Uncover a web of lies and corruption as you guide Juno through a thrilling journey of intelligence and resourcefulness. Outsmart powerful adversaries and deliver justice in this captivating tale. 

Watch Juno’s self-worth and determination soar with each obstacle she conquers, inspiring you to unleash your own inner strength and achieve your goals.

Get ready for an exhilarating adventure where wit and ability reign supreme!

[From [url=https://luminousthreads.cc/]official website[/url]]

title: Silicon Wasteland
description:
Following a worldwide catastrophe, a lone android wakes up years later to the wind and rain of the quiet apocalypse. Damaged, low on power, and having limited memories, she sets out into the nearby ruined city in search of answers.

SILICON WASTELAND is a kinetic visual novel set during the twilight years of humanity, and follows the wandering android Silica, as she explores the beautiful and sometimes frightening wonders of the world in a small quest to discover her purpose.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2850200/Silicon_Wasteland/]Steam[/url]]

Choose your own doom as survivors of this perilous trek. 

Patients who have survived describe everything from falls off cliffs to drowning in rivers, and from k%dnapp%ngs to s%xua| abuse. 

The Darien Gap, a treacherous jungle teeming with dangers, has become a harrowing passage for countless migrants seeking a better life.
title: The Darien Gap
Hazel & The Deep
description:
Hazel is a turnip farmer by day and a witch student by night! With the help of her beloved, but grumpy, master Monty she practices every day in order to be able to enroll into a prestigious magical school. But Hazel has one small, tini-tiny idiosyncrasy, for some reason our heroine always adds Penis and Breasts to any object she touches or cast magic at, even causing the turnips she picks up to be phallic shaped (she calls them Durnips). How can our heroine pass the magic school exam? Do durnips sell better than turnips for lonely housewives? Why is there a millennial demon awakening in her backyard? Find out all the answers in Hazel & The Deep!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2148790/]Steam[/url]]

title: The Traded Groom
description:
Today's your wedding day, and you've never met your husband.

You're the chief of several semi-nomadic clans; he's an imperial prince of the Han people, with whom you have a complicated political relationship. You meet for the first time on the same day you marry, and you quickly find that he isn't the arrogant, prideful prince you'd expected.

Get to know him over the night and find out whether he's a spy for your enemies or a victim of political schemes; and most of all, whether this marriage can work.

[From [url=https://maneki-mushi.itch.io/the-traded-groom]itch.io[/url]]

title: Sex Adventures - Naughty Sisters
description:
Lily moves out of her family home to live with her older sister, Emily, and their stepbrother, Theo, as she begins her college journey. 

The sisters are thrilled to share an apartment again, but Theo finds it challenging to live under the same roof with two attractive women. 

Eager to experience her new chapter in life, Lily persuades her sister to take her to a bar, where her first night of exploration begins. 

After a few shots, Lily is challenged to kiss her sister, leaving her with a mix of confusing emotions.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3260900/]Steam[/url]]

title: The Yandere CEO
description:
William, the CEO of the company you just joined, had always been a man of ambition and success. From a young age, he was driven to achieve greatness, and he had a singular focus on his goals. He rose to the top of his field, building a successful company from the ground up. 

However, his relentless drive also came at a cost. He pushed away friends and family, sacrificing personal relationships for the sake of his ambition. He had no time for romance, believing it to be a distraction. 


[i]Until he met you...

but you will find out for yourself what happens next..[/i]

[From [url=https://phantom-tea.itch.io/the-yandere-ceo]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Party Killer
description:
Join Alice on a chilling Halloween night where a simple party turns into a deadly mystery! In "Party Killer", a visual novel styled like a comic book, Alice reluctantly attends a party with her bestie Sophie. But when the body of a former classmate is found, Alice becomes entangled in a murder investigation that the police won’t help with. Can Alice uncover the truth before the killer strikes again? Will she succumb to her sexual urges? Or will she have an unforgettably sexy night?

Make decisions that will shape Alice’s fate—every choice you make could bring her closer to solving the mystery... or lead her down a darker path. With multiple endings, it’s up to you to unmask the killer.

Can you find out who is responsible for the deadly deed?

[From [url=https://freyleigh.itch.io/party-killer]Itch.io[/url]]

title: wh4t 1 w0uldnt d0
description:
"If you have no reason to depend on me, I will give you one."

You've successfully escaped your stalker/kidnapper some time ago, but he's back for you; and he's worse. There's no happy ending, and you can't change him.

[From [url=https://s1ckh34d.itch.io/wh4t-1-w0ulndt-d0]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Charming Office
description:
This visual novel follows Luke Barron, a successful CEO of his own company, as he navigates the challenges of running his company while grappling with darker, personal struggles. His life takes an unexpected turn when he hires Dan Koch, an eager and somewhat naïve recruit. As the two work together, Luke starts to notice subtle shifts in his well-guarded world. The story explores themes of connection, self-discovery, and how unexpected relationships can bring light to the darkest corners of our lives.

[From [url=https://sneaky-production.itch.io/charming-office]Itch.io[/url]]

He's the man of your dreams. He can be anything or anyone you want him to be. Powered by the latest in artificial intelligence technologies, he can be your perfect partner. Someone to talk to whenever you need, to build lasting memories with, and even grow intimate with should you so desire.

S̶u̶r̶e̶l̶y̶ ̶t̶h̶a̶t̶'̶s̶ ̶a̶ ̶h̶e̶a̶l̶t̶h̶y̶ ̶o̶u̶t̶l̶e̶t̶.̶

[From [url=https://pyritepleasures.itch.io/lionize]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Lionize
The Man Next Door
description:
A short visual novel game about your next door neighbor. Talk to him over the span of two days to learn more about him, and whether or not he should be trusted.

[From [url=https://mrhappysunface.itch.io/the-man-next-door]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Chistovik
description:
The work is the reverse side of the original ending of "Epic Fail", the story is narrated on behalf of the" pioneer " - an arrogant evil asshole who constantly annoys the ordinary Seed.
Or not anymore? Will Japanese girls be able to guide the Pioneer on the path of correction?

It seemed that the life of an ordinary loser Semyon Persunov, full of adversity and suffering, would not change anything. But now the 410th bus appears on the horizon, ready to take our hero for a ride on its windshield...
title: Istorija odnogo neudachnika (ION)
ION: Mnogolikij
description: In the story of the loser who was hit by a bus and ended up in a pioneer camp, there are many more stories that previously remained a mystery. The story of one loser is not over. This is just the beginning...

Let's go back many decades to the past, long before the ill-fated bus accident. It was then, under mysterious circumstances, that the amazing pioneer camp "Sovenok" appeared. No one suspects how much fate has changed this mysterious place and what it really is. This is the final chapter in which we will learn how this story began and how it will end.
title: ION: Mgnovenija vechosti
Borrowing you
description:
You have just tried to kill yourself. You feel yourself drifting out of your body into nothingness. It is black until it is no more. But you are not dead yet, not technically. That's why I said 'you tried'. Someone else wakes up out of your body." A demonic entity has taken over your body after you tried to kill yourself. Now you are trapped in your own body with no sense of smell, touch, taste, anything really, you are just a voice but the only one who can hear you is the demon who controls your body. Are you going to have a good time together or not?

[Edited from [url=https://murderduck.itch.io/borrowing-you]Itch.io[/url]]

Married in Red is a short 2D RPG thriller-story game with visual novel and point-and-click elements set in South Korea that follows the story of Bok-su Go visiting her old friend from University, Da-jeong Choi, on her wedding day.

[From [url=https://racheldrawsthis.itch.io/married-in-red]itch.io[/url]]
title: Married in Red
I Don't Want to be a Magical Girl!
description:
Marisa got what she dreaded most: she was drafted into the Magical Girl Task Force (MGTF) and forced to fight monsters.

Thankfully, she got a great roommate who shared her love of magical girl media. However, said roommate quickly confessed that he was, in fact, a dude.

Marisa was then saved multiple times by an S-ranked magical girl, who in fact was not a girl at all.

Her dreaded time in the task force turned out to be an eventful one full of surprises and great people, but the MGTF harbored dreadful secrets. One that had to do with the life and death of all magical girls.

Can they uncover the secrets before it's too late for all?

[From [url=https://karita0101.itch.io/i-dont-want-to-be-a-magical-girl]itch.io[/url]]

title: Heroes End
description:
You were just living a normal life. You had a beautiful girlfriend, childhood friends (or sisters) who adore you, and a job that you liked. Then. You are killed. You open your eyes and two strange girls, of which you call Divines, looking at you and discussing what to do. You eventually wake up at your local shrine, with a foggy memory and two gifts bestowed upon you by the Divines. You don't know what those gifts are, but you will find out soon enough.

[From [url=https://f95zone.to/threads/heroes-end-v0-3-0-aliphatic-lizard.221134/]F95 Zone[/url]]

title: Help me with Something
description: Your friend has been giving you signals since she found out you like BDSM... and now she has called you to her house to help her with something ;D have fun!

aliases: История Одного Неудачника: Лезвием по струнам
title: ION: Lezviem po strunam
description: This mod tells the story of what happened to Semyon after the events of the two endings of Alice's ruth or the three endings of Lena's ruth.

title: My Femboy Roommate
description: In My Femboy Roommate, you've just moved to a new city and are looking for a quiet place to launch your indie dev career. You share an apartment with your new roommate, Robin. He is a shy but cute livestreamer who reveals himself to be a Femboy. Do you have what it takes to form a genuine relationship with your new Femboy roommate?

Going on this trip, I regretted one thing. About the wasted time that could have been spent much more pleasantly alone with my computer. I still don't understand how it all happened. Maybe it's all her fault – Nastya? Or was it a place where the connection between the two worlds thinned out, and I just inadvertently fell into this wormhole?
In any case, a boring trip out of town turned into a real trip to the past and... into my nightmare. I immediately realized that there was something wrong with this place. This is not just a pioneer camp. And I'm here for a reason.
I just don't know what to do. Looking for a way back to your world, to Nastya? Or to find the meaning of life with the one you have already met here? Will this place allow me to stay with her? Which of the worlds is meant for me? Which one of the girls? Or is it my destiny to be a hermit in both eras? What should I do?
title: Sviboda ili Schast'e

description:
Eleanor Ravenswood (or custom name) has to live through her second arranged mariage but it has only just begun and it's already failing. Eugene, her husband while providing to her needs doesn't take care of her and act cold toward her. But with the arrival of Eugene's best friend Edwin, who have to live under the same roof as them, everything could change.

Will Eleanor tries to save her marriage or will she fall for her new charming housemate?

[From [url=https://kakera-art.itch.io/ladysembrace]itch.io[/url]]
title: In the Lady's Embrace

aliases: The 7 Limits of Tamagawa, Sudden Hypnoking
title: Saimin King
Matsuri no Ato: Boku no Haha Otowa
Wrong Number: Another Call
description:
What starts off as an innocent phone call to invite a friend out turns into something much more fun.

[From [url=https://witpop.itch.io/wrong-number-another-call]itch.io[/url]]

title: Exogon
description:
You play as Falcon 24, a wartime fighter ace credited with dozens of victories, making you the Ace of Aces of supersonic jets.

Leading a squadron of elite fighter pilots during a global conflict, you conduct daring raids into enemy territory. However, an enigmatic force disrupts both Earth's affairs and your personal life. During one mission, you lose control and crash into a hidden paradise, forcing you to rebuild your life and search for a lost friend.

Stepping into another realm—perhaps a parallel universe—you find yourself amidst supernatural powers, fantastical creatures, and beings from across the vast cosmos. In this fractured universe, everyone is on the hunt for the shards of an ancient artifact, one capable of altering reality itself.

And in this cosmic game, no one is off-limits.

Soon, you find yourself in the midst of an interstellar power struggle, caught between the Cosmic Government and the Five Ambitious Warlords of the Galactic Constellations. Navigate through realms, encounter diverse galactic civilizations and empires, each with unique power structures and grand ambitions. Unravel the events that led to the current state and influence their future. Forge alliances, win wars, and shape the Universe you desire in your ideal image, away from the current tyrants.

Where will your adventure take you?

One thing's for sure—the sky isn't the limit.

[From [url=https://rexilegames.itch.io/exogon]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Carved In Stone
description:
In a quaint village where tradition reigns and women's aspirations are often stifled, you’ve carved out a life as the owner of a beloved potion shop—a dream you fought hard to realize. However, as whispers of societal expectations grow louder, doubts begin to creep in. The pressure to marry and start a family looms over you, challenging your long-held beliefs about happiness and success.

Just when you’re on the verge of succumbing to despair, a mysterious and alluring regular, Carrick, visits your shop in the moonlit hours. Their presence offers not only a respite from your worries but reignites a sense of adventure and desire you thought was lost. 

As your connection deepens through idle conversation, you find yourself questioning not only the path laid out for you by others but also the true meaning of fulfillment.

In this seductive tale of self-discovery and unexpected romance, you must decide whether to conform to societal norms or to embrace the magic of your own dreams and desires. Will you choose the life others expect, or will you forge your own destiny?

[From [url=https://meant-to-bee-studios.itch.io/carved-in-stone]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Odin ukradennyj den'
description:
"One Stolen Day — is a story modification, its action takes place in several camps, but the main location is the" General Camp "(the version of" Sovenka " without dolls), where pioneers constantly gather and spend their leisure time. They formed their own society, their own holidays and traditions. Companies get together, then break up, as they always have.

One of these pioneers is our main character, who calls himself the Third, he has long accepted the inevitable and is sure that the" outside world " that many of them dream of does not exist at all.

Hours add up to days, days to weeks, weeks to cycles, and so on ad infinitum, but this story is about something else. It's about a particular day, which at first was similar to others, like two drops of water...

title: Dni nigde
description: When everyone left their camps, there were only two Pioneers left in the deserted system. On an endless road in the middle of an endless wasteland, nothing and no one is waiting for them. Hundreds of empty, identical days have passed and thousands more will pass. The sun never sets in this place, the wind does not rustle, and even the clouds in the eternally cold sky remain motionless. When the future was taken from them, and the present turned into an unchanging purgatory, all they had to do was remember the past.

title: Town Girls
description:
Overview

Choose whether to be a boy or girl, what you choose will affect the story path in various ways with differing text and actions.

The Protagonist

You've just moved to a small town after being banished from your old town and want to start making friends (with benefits).

Main Goal

Your main goal is to get all the girls to like you as well as their panties, possessions and pictures so you can stash them in your drawer. You do this by going on dates with them and getting them to like you enough so get get into bed with you. Once you have got all the girls to like you, you must choose one to date and reject the rest. You can date multiple girls at the same time and there's no limit to which way you finish the game.

title: My New Paranormal Life
description:
Your father's death comes abruptly just as you graduate college. Unsure about what path to follow, you decide to take a year off to reflect on it and move out with the two beautiful women you live with to Mirage Bay, a small semi-rural town.
You're promised a peaceful life. Aside from a scarily arousing dream, everything seems normal. You start working at a local café with another two beautiful women whose personalities are rather extravagant, but you can't complain. In fact, you do the opposite.
It seems like your luck with women is finally taking a turn for good. Then, you discover that one of them is not human, and it seems like she's not the only paranormal being
Will you be able to overcome your fears and uncover all of the town's secrets?​

Step into the shoes of a man who's life is about to get rocked with adventure, mysteries and, most importantly, an island full of beautifull women, as you make choices that will shape their destiny.
Meet a host of hot female character, gain their trust and get those fucking sigatures!​
title: Lust Bound
Nanji, Food Court no Rinjin o Aise

description:
Fame is a visual novel that takes place in a hotel where a bunch of guests have been invited to attend a special week-long event hosted by hotel CEO Mr. Sasha Manson. However, things in the hotel start to take a turn for the worse when attendants start being murdered by an unknown killer. As the player it is your job to seek out the killer amongst the group or potential staff.

While you are uncovering the truth you will need to compete against the detective on the scene who believes that you are the murderer. With multiple choice actions the ending will always be different. So be careful about what you do! It might cost you everything in the end.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3070210/]Steam[/url]]
title: Fame
New Life + (2) Disturbed Side
description: You will find a history of events shortly before the plot of the first part of New Life +, as well as in parallel with it.

title: Banana Ranch ~ After Stories ~
description:
Compilation of extra Banana Ranch episodes that deviate from / out of scope of the game's original setting. Additional episodes will be released in via Patreon (for now, the release will be every two months, might sometimes be monthly).

[From [url=https://meyaoi.itch.io/bananaranch-afterstories]Itch.io[/url]]

Years ago, Phil was taken from a war-torn city to a distant village by a traveling witch. As the village's problem child, only one childhood friend was willing to stick by him. Then one day, everything changed when Phil met a mysterious girl who had lost all her memories and ended up in the village. This encounter set in motion a fate tied to his past. To uncover the truth about Zero Point City, the three of them decided to head to the Magic University, and the story of the boy becoming a traveler was just beginning...
title: Yu Zhe Zhi Meng：Ling Shi Jiang Zhi
Antoine no Koukai Nisshi ~ Kodoku na Seijo to Shichinin no Kaizoku

description:
You (custom name) apply for a seemingly ordinary job at an amusement park, only to discover it's a trap set by yaoguais to lure humans as food! Worse yet, you must disguise yourself as one of them and secretly investigate the conspiracy behind it all.

The revered Sacred White Chiedong Tree Deity, the cold and sharp-tongued Serpent Prince, the fearsome Specter Jin who demands live sacrifices, and the mischievous Mischief Elf who tricks people into the mountains—face amusement park crises with these four as you make over 150 choices, forming bonds that run deep or stay shallow.

As the truth unravels, an even bigger plot awaits.

——But hey, love comes first, right?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3245920/]Steam[/url]]
title: Yaoguai Budong Tan Lian'ai

aliases: らぶ☆タッチ!～ろりっ娘少女と美人教師～
title: Love☆Touch! ~Prologue~
Love☆Touch! ~Loli Musumu Shoujo to Bijin Kyoushi~
Ore no Mama ga Kakyuusei de Shojo de Konna ni Kawaii Wake ga Nai
Eroi Fantasy Dai 2 Shou Sennetsu Otome 1 -Sennetsu Otome-

description:
Clara (name changeable), an overworked office worker, finds herself trapped in an elevator with a night-shift employee named Ronan. With her phone dead and no other option but to wait for help, Clara and Ronan end up finding [i]other ways[/i] to keep the boredom away.

[From [url=https://sweetmilkgames.itch.io/overtime]itch.io[/url]]
title: Overtime
Hyperdimension Neptunia: The Visual Novel
description:
Have you ever wanted to interact with and date your favorite Goddess(es)? Look no further than Hyperdimension Neptunia: The Visual Novel!

You play the role of the Main Protagonist, just transferred to Gamicademi after being exiled from the PC Empire for your actions.

Who knows how long you'll be there at Gamicademi or if you'll ever return. Now's your chance to start fresh and experience a new life, make friends, develop relationships and much more.

[From [url=https://gamejolt.com/games/HDNVN/288768]Game Jolt[/url]]

title: The Coffin of Andrew and Renee
description:
“The Coffin of Andrew and Renee” is a mod for TCOAAL. This alternate universe centers around the question: "What would happen to the timeline of events from the original game, if one aspect of their childhood was changed?". And thus, The Coffin of Andrew and Renee was born.

In the universe of the Mod, Ashley is replaced with Renee Graves. The undertones from the original are twisted and tainted to explore a different type of co-dependency complex (oedipal).

[Edited from [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/thecoffinofandyandleyley/mods/9?tab=description]Nexus Mods[/url]]

title: Gonka Bez Konca
description:
"Life is a huge network of roads from the Beginning point to the End point. They are connected by expressways, broken concrete, and impassable mud ruts. We don't choose which road or car to take. But only the one who does not deviate from this path, despite all the difficulties, who perfectly masters his car – only he will be able to overcome this path with dignity. This is the meaning of life."
The story tells about a lonely guy, a fan of Endless Summer, who by the will of fate gets to a familiar camp in his car. What will this journey change in his life? Will he return to his world with any of the inhabitants of this place, and will he return at all?

title: Gonka bez konca 2: Dezhavju
description:
The events of the mod unfold a year after the bad ending of the previous story. The main character, Dmitry Yurovsky, is going through a difficult separation from his beloved, cheerful and charming Alice. The gray, routine reality is nothing compared to the carefree life in the "Owl". But it
turned out that fate gave Dmitry a second chance – the camp is ready to open its doors again! How will the circumstances turn out this time? Will the main character manage to find Alice? Or will things not go so smoothly this time?
And by the way... who's that beeping in the backseat of his AE86?

title: Love Dolls
description:
You play as a 19 year old male student who has traveled to,
Japan through an exchange program alongside your best friend, Jackson.
Your crush, Julie, and her closest friend, Alice, also joins the exchange program to Japan!
You've yet to build up the courage to confess your love for her, will you ever be able to?

Despite Julie and Alice's academic purpose of traveling to Japan, they have another objective in mind, to investigate the disappearance of Julie's older sister, Vanessa! Since Julie lost contact with Vanessa 3 months into her exchange program, it's been 3 years now since she has heard from her dearest sister.

Everything is not as it seems in Japan! A company by the name of "Love Dolls" sells insanely realistic looking sex androids that obeys the owners every little order. This invention is Love Dolls Co.'s solution to the rise of Japans crippling loneliness! For a company that's only been public for 3 years they've gained quite the popularity!

What are these dolls actually made of and how come they look so realistic?​

You feel groggy when you finally wake up.

The back of your head is throbbing and your mouth feels dry, as though it has been stuffed full of wool.

With bleary eyes, you glance about.

What time is it?

Where are you…

And, perhaps more importantly, who are you?

Try though you might, you can’t remember.

This could very well be your end — but wait. Who is that woman standing by your bedside, who looks like a rose?

Perhaps she can help you.

Now, why don’t you open your heart up to her?

Learn how to love her, and perhaps this story might even have a happy ending.

[From [url=https://ebihime.itch.io/obsession]itch.io[/url]]
title: The end of an obsession

description:
You're one of DailySitter.com's top rated sitters, so it's no surprise when you get a last minute call to watch a 'young hellion' on Halloween Night. You quickly find out the young hellion isn't a child at all, but an adult demon spirit bound to the human world for the night. But hey, technicalities...

 [From [url=https://legendex-games.itch.io/demon-daycare]itch.io[/url]]
title: Demon Daycare

description:
Ethan, on his way home, encounters a strange, wounded and distressed woman who asks for his help finding a safe place to hide.

[From [url=https://eroraen.itch.io/ivydemo]Itch.io[/url]]

This is a cancelled project released as a "demo".
title: Ivy.

description:
From the everyday passenger to the horrors of Halloween, Spirit Driver is a short, casual conversation simulator where your choices can affect the fates of people and spirits alike. Remember, your choices have consequences. Good luck!

[From [url=https://noodledonut.itch.io/spirit-driver]itch.io[/url]]
title: Spirit Driver
MAMA
description:
One day, you’ll thank me. After all… mother knows best.

Today’s the first day of HimeCon, a Yuri convention. You’re attending with your girlfriend who’s a vendor in the artist alley. At the convention, you receive a text that ends up changing… everything.

You find yourself back in your childhood home, except this time, something’s amiss— and you’ve got to escape.

She’s always watching you, isn’t she?

[From [url=https://red-bean-taiyaki.itch.io/mama]itch.io[/url]]

title: Memory Recoil
description:
Memory Recoil is a short surreal horror visual novel following the story of Von, a boy who lives secluded in his house until one day he receives an unexpected visit from a boy named Liam who invites him to play outside. Nothing bad could happen right?

[From [url=https://deanwzz.itch.io/memory-recoil]itch.io[/url]]

title: Elfin National Park
description:
Welcome to Elfin National Park!

Once a wild an untamed land of creatures we have now opened a portion to the public!

Come on down and see the ever changing sights of our forest. We have places for the whole family. Just please remember for the safety of you and your family to stay within the designated zones.

[From [url=https://elfinpark.itch.io/elfin-national-park]itch.io[/url]]

In 1739 Spain, a young soldier travels to his first posting. When he arrives at an abandoned inn, the Venta Quemada, he encounters two beautiful princesses – or does he? Tales of this area also say that two ghouls crawl down from their gallows at midnight to terrorize travelers. You cannot trust your eyes at the Venta Quemada. And if you trust your heart, you might just lose it.

This VN is based off an 1815 novel, The Manuscript Found in Saragossa, written by Jan Potocki, a Polish count who thought he was turning into a werewolf. Seriously.

As the soldier travels, he will be told stories himself. Stories of Pacheco the Demoniac! Rebecca the Sorceress of Kabbala! The Fair Maiden of the Castle of Sombre!

Depending on the stories you choose for him, he may to go heaven, to hell, or some place in between.

[From [url=https://alternativewonders.itch.io/demons-of-the-venta-quemada]itch.io[/url]]
title: Demons of the Venta Quemada
Home Haunting
description:
A mildly spooky comedy set in a beautiful brownstone apartment inhabited by strange, monstrous tenants. As the new co-op applicant, you must prove yourself worthy to the co-op board and get their approval. Miss Lobosa the slimy real-estate agent and guide, will introduce you to each member of the board.

Can you win their favor and get an amazing 4th floor apartment at an incredible rate? Or will you be cast out and miss the deal of a lifetime?

[From [url=https://nose-corporation.itch.io/home-haunting]itch.io[/url]]

title: Not My Part
description:
In 1988.

This is story about 'Grace' who is on her way to the Sunday Lake camp, but something happens that makes her meet a famous serial killer at a motel along the way. 

In this horror movie-like scenario, what role will she play?

[From [url=https://y-ingfoxy.itch.io/not-my-part]itch.io[/url]]

title: Ice Cream For Love!
description:
You are a bearfolk ice cream maker living in the mostly human stronghold of Gimposi. Unfortunately for you, when the newest dietitian-in-training views your products as sacrilegious itself to the field of medicine and nutrition, his presence threatens to uproot everything you’ve built.

Now, you have not-so-little dreams of spreading your ice cream across the god planets, so this little setback isn’t going to stop you. Using every bit of charm, craft, and cunning at your disposal, you’re going to save your business, and definitely have a little fun in the process.

After all, the new guy is just so fun to mess with.

Will you and the fledgling dietitian find common ground or maybe even love at the end of it all? 

[From [url=https://atelierursine.itch.io/ice-cream-for-love]itch.io[/url]]

You are  leaving the coffee shop after breaking up with your boyfriend. As you are walking back home you get kidnapped. Now you are faced with choices to try to escape. Includes multiple Endings. 


[From [url=https://murderduck.itch.io/picture-perfect]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Picture perfect

description:
The story follows a young man who has gone through a series of difficult experiences that have changed his life in an unpleasant way. He has survived the loss of his parents and the alienation of loved ones, as well as drug addiction. The MC struggles to deal with the mistakes of his past and wants to lead an ordinary, boring adult life. But fate has other plans. His past will not let him go so easily.​

[From [url=https://archmoe-kings-and-pawns.itch.io/kings-and-pawns]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Kings and Pawns

description:
Aurelia is on track to her ideal life; she has a great job and a comfortable apartment. But her life won't be complete without a husband, which is why she's set out to get better at all the skills you need for dating! Including sex. Especially sex. Her first ever trip to the bar leads to smooth-talking playboy Chandler, and his experience in this field could be just the thing she needs...

[From [url=https://omegabutton.itch.io/pleasure-101]itch.io[/url]]
title: Pleasure 101

description:
"Who am I" is both a prehistory and a continuation of the "Modern Owl" mod, in addition to everything else, it is the story of the character Vasily.
This story will answer all the questions that the reader might have during the passage of "Modern Owl".
But the mod is based not only on explaining and exposing what happened in the "SS", but also offers you its own story, darker and more confusing.
A story that covers not only the inner world of GG and his inner circle, but also has a broader scope.
title: Sovremennyj Sovjonok : " Kto Ja ? "
Lustful Brides
description:
At just 20 years old, your life is about to change forever.
After the tragic loss of your parents,
a mysterious benefactor has provided you with a luxurious home and a chance at a bright future.
But there's a catch: his will stipulates that you must marry one of his,
three enchanting daughters within days to secure your inheritance.
With the benefactor's wife and daughters now living with you,
your life becomes a whirlwind of passion, desire, and complex relationships.
As you navigate this new reality, every decision you make could lead to love,
passion, or even a harem full of lasciviousness.​

aliases: Sovremennyj Sovjonok : On the edge of worlds
title: Sovremennyj Sovjonok : Na grani mirov
description:
Mod events occur after the ending of the " Who am I?"mod.  showing you the result of Basil's acts.
Did he manage to do what he planned? Or did something go wrong with his plan?
The mod will answer this and other questions.

title: Aketekudasai, Koyagi-san
description:
A game about a dangerous man coming to visit night after night.

If he isn't the mother goat, surely he isn't the wolf either.
You mustn't open the door. Well, not that the ending would change either way.

[Translated from [url=https://novelgame.jp/games/show/9723]NovelGame[/url]]

title: Izmenis', ili umri
description:
Description:
One story, on behalf of two completely different people.
One road.
And one ending for two strangers connected by one thing.
Why and where do they go? And what connects them? And why THEM?
This path is the search for answers to questions that they will have to make a choice that will decide their fate.

title: Thot on Trial
description:
What happens when your desires change?
Do you feel ashamed of it and make excuses like "It's just a phase"?
Or do you accept it and embrace it?
If you're still not sure, try putting yourselves in our young couples shoes.​

[From F95Zone]

title: Rourinkou ~Shin Kyouin Roumu Rinri Koudou Sougou Shinsa~
description:
To prevent molestation of girls in schools the government has implemented a new program for testing men who wish to become teachers. Equipped with heartbeat monitoring devices to determine arousal they bring in 3 volunteers: High School Girl Tsumugi, Middle School Girl Hotaru and Elementary School Girl Mihina to expose themselves and commit increasingly lewd speech and behavior to test whether the men can control their libido.

Note: This game contains no scenes of penetrative sex.

title: Phone Behind Bars
description:
You’re in prison, and all you have is a mobile phone with only your wife on the contact list, ready to do whatever it takes to prove your innocence.

[From F95Zone]

title: Lekarstvo ot Lichnosti
description: On a cold summer day, an Elder Man comes to you for help. He asks you to buy a trinket, but only wants 1 ruble for it. You ask yourself: "How can one ruble help someone?" However, you will soon find out that the item you received is not useless, and the help was not about money at all.
Tragic story about Vasya Alcapon, his girlfriend and their friends.
title: Istoriya o nezakonnoj lyubvi
Rosenberg
description:
Emilia Heartwood’s life is picture-perfect…at least to most people. She lives in a beautiful home within a picturesque neighbourhood, and is a student at Rosenberg College, one of the most exclusive and historic schools in the country. She loves her life, and she loves all the wonderful moments she gets to spend with her best friend, Michael Chelton. When reports of violent crimes in town start appearing, she does not think much of them… until this insidious evil begins taking over everything and everyone she loves…

[From [url=https://marie-marie.itch.io/rosenberg]itch.io[/url]]

Step into the elegant lobby of a grand Nastrond hotel, where a chance meeting with a cute bellhop could change everything. In this story, you’ll get to know her beyond the uniform, discovering a witty, caring side as you share moments of laughter and connection. 

[From [url=https://artyfartygames.itch.io/bellhop-lovematch]itch.io[/url]]
title: Bellhop lovematch
Pushing Up Daisies
description:
A psychological horror visual novel about trusting the wrong people. 

Hiding beneath the internet is a dark underbelly home to plenty of unsavory characters. After a few wrong choices you’re plunged directly into their clutches. Your survival depends on earning their trust, but trust is a currency they don’t part with easily. Will you emerge unscathed, or be consumed by the digital abyss?

[From [url=https://strudelmart.itch.io/pushing-up-daisies-demo]itch.io[/url]]

The latest season of tv's top rated (and only) murder mystery gameshow!

The curtains open on this season of Yokina's Tragic Comedy, a televised death game where you'll have to solve murders committed by your fellow contestants to survive and win!

The spotlight finds itself on a lawyer and a self-proclaimed scientist as they study the game, solve its mysteries, and make friends (mostly enemies, really). Follow Adilah, as she tries to properly solve mysteries and win, and Karou, as he pursues a chaotic type of science over victory. No matter how many bonds you form here, there's only room in the spotlight for one winner in the end.

[From [url=https://chromaticproductions.itch.io/yokinas-tragic-comedy-demo]itch.io[/url]]
title: Yokina's Tragic Comedy

description:
Under the watchful eye of controlling patriarchs and zealous priests of the Old Ones, no good deed goes unpunished. Suffocated by their restrictive lives, a handful of demon princesses struggle for self-determination.

The Lanterne of Light is a rich, Gothic horror story focusing on important, sometimes life-changing choices. It combines a visual novel with elements of traditional 2D pixel art, exploring difficult themes through a dark fantasy narrative full of Lovecraftian mythos and suspense.

[From [url=https://skekpen.itch.io/lanterne-chapter1]itch.io[/url]]
title: The Lanterne of Light

description:
[heca;tomb] is a prequel to the Under The False Sky Series, taking place prior to mankind being forced to seek shelter within the Arks.–Which is why the story can be considered a standalone." 

A group of scientists travel to a remote region to investigate a series of strange disasters, only to accidentally fall into the secret of a secluded, enigmatic tribe. Now, they must spend their lives in the village, or face death.

As they are slowly growing accustomed to their new life, one of the young researchers finds himself overcome by emotions foreign to him–finds himself captured by...her. 
However, as the tribe's mysteries continue to unravel, it becomes clear that their secrets are much darker than he could have ever imagined.

But are they the monsters... or is he? 

This is the story of how a romance crumbles, and mankind along with it.

[From [url=https://elduator.itch.io/hecatomb]itch.io[/url]]
title: UNDER THE FALSE SKY | [heca;tomb]
A Simple Twist of Fae
description:
A Simple Twist of Fae is a romantic comedy presented as a comic story come to life! Follow our heroine as she traverses the ins and outs of attraction, desire and possible fate, while experiencing the shenanigans a troublesome set of fairfolk can get into! 

[From [url=https://tuffmallow.itch.io/a-simple-twist-of-fae]itch.io[/url]]

It's time for the annual Harvest Fest, and this year's festivities have a spooky theme. Sounds like a treat, right? For Lucielle (playable character*), it feels more like a trick after she's been randomly picked to lead the project. Did she mention that she isn't a fan of anything creepy, haunted, ghostly, or Halloween? Not to worry, as other fellow classmates, who are more or less excited to join in this project, have also been volunteered to help. 

So get to know others in your art academy team better, develop your craftsmanship, overcome your fears, spark inspiration, and together create an artistic display to *wow* your peers.

[Edited from itch.io]
title: Class HH!
From Beyond
description:
Ivran gets stabbed and transported into a world that is very different from his own. From the moment he manages to get up on his feet after recovering, he's immediately dragged into situations he's not accustomed to. Will he find happiness in this world or continue his path of indifferent nihilism? Will he uncover the reasons behind his newfound color-blindness? Only the persistent ones will be able to find answers to these questions.

This visual novel is a prequel to the Izora Sequence book series.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3252650/]Steam[/url]]

title: Coalesce
description:
"At the end of the day, I always blamed my weak body for it. There wasn't a single day where I didn't resent it."

Asa Argyris woke up finding herself in a snow white room with nothing but a bed. All she remembered was her name and a man's death.

There were scientists looking over her, watchful eyes constantly observing her every movement. She also found out that she couldn’t exactly die. That there was something planted inside of Asa. Whatever it was, it could prevent her from death. How exactly did she get herself into this predicament, Asa wondered.

Nobody around her was trustworthy. The only thing she could safely rely on was herself and her lost memories.

[From [url=https://syllphana.itch.io/coalesce]itch.io[/url]]

title: Sovremennyj Sovjonok: END OF SKY
description: Modification-continuation of the plot of the series "Modern Owl". The action unfolds by lowering the time after the events of "Change or Die", showing you a new world in which the " Owl " has become not a mystical place somewhere in the fog, but a very ordinary camp. With its own history, secrets and riddles.

Mercedes has always been interested in the more kinkier things in life, but her rural hometown offers little excitement. When a friend invites her to the vibrant city of Cryptopolis—a bustling hub of BDSM parties and a thriving monster population—she jumps at the chance to explore new horizons. Excited yet cautious, she moves, hoping to discover herself and what she'd enjoy sexually. If it doesn’t work out, she can always return home.

However, her plans take a turn when she stumbles upon a magical monster belt that latches onto her waist, refusing to let go. Now, with the 'Revo' in her possession, Mercedes has until the end of the summer to find a partner or two to get rid of it.

[From [url=https://spicerackgames.itch.io/strapped]itch.io[/url]]
title: STRAPPED

aliases: エイティーントリップ
title: 18TRIP
description:
Taking place in future Yokohama, the HAMA 18 district, once a dominating "Independent Special Tourism Zone", finds itself in decline. The protagonist, along with their childhood friend and newly appointed mayor of HAMA 0, Kafka Oguro, embarks on the journey to return the tourism sector to its former glory.

[From [url=https://wiki.18t.rip/wiki/Main_Page]18TRIP Wiki[/url]]

title: ION: Dusha Kur'era
description: This mod is inspired by the Story of a Loser (ION) and tells the story of a guy named Semyon, who, because of his problems, was forced to go to work in delivery. But how significant are these problems in the global plan, what lies in his soul and what events and acquaintances await him on his way? You will find out about all this in our mod!

title: Ljubov', Den'gi, Rok-n-Roll — Leto '94
description:
7 years have passed. Nikolai's life has changed: he has left much behind and now simply goes with the flow, avoiding stress and upheaval. However, fate has its own plans for our hero! New and old acquaintances will rush into his life like a gust of summer wind, bringing with them long-forgotten emotions and love!

* An all-new story taking place across over more than two in-game weeks.
* The opportunity to learn what fate befell the characters after the end of the game.
* New characters, environments, music tracks, and illustrations.
* A chance to see Nikolai from a different perspective and help him find new love.

[Source: [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3313270/Love_Money_RocknRoll__Summer_94/]Steam[/url]]

Takes place after the ending "Procrastination" (Catherine Bad End #1) of the main game.

Inspired by old school game books, Little Red and the Baba Yaga is a choose your own adventure VN where you play as the parent of Little Red Riding hood, Trouble is Granny is now a Baba Yaga. Can you get Little Red and yourself out a alive?

60 Endings and over 200 voice lines that development of Little Red and the Baba Yaga was streamed live and includes some of chats chaotic suggestions
title: Little Red and the Baba Yaga

description:
I tried to be relieved at present, yet the corpse of my past claws their way out.
The dead Undeads is like a fog in my mind.
I don't want to recall. But I have to recall.
Everything is going to start with that Dream...

In the game, you talked to Acesoria Cicadas, an “old friend” of yours, and found yourself in the tragedy...

Is the past just the water under the bridge or something you’re hiding?
title: Bùzhī Lièchē Xiàng Héfāng

description:
You wake up in an unfamiliar diner, head pounding, with no memory of how you got here. Across from you is a stranger who seems to have taken an interest in your situation. All while being pressured to order by a persistent waiter...

Can you remember how you got here, before it's too late to go back?

[From [url=https://dondonpatapon.itch.io/put-it-on-my-tab]itch.io[/url]]
title: Put It On My Tab!

description:
James Mason, a twenty-two-year-old deer, just finished his art degree.

Now that he's no longer allowed to stay at his school's dorms, his only choice is to move back to his sleepy hometown of New Blackden, a little town between Toronto and Sudbury.

But with his parents moving out of that town, his choices lie among the friends he's made in that town ever since he moved in after finishing high school, who have all offered to let him stay with them.

James is excited to return and spend time with his friends. And yet, once he returns, he realizes there's something wrong. All of his friends are acting off like their issues got worse in his absence. And on top of everything else, strange things are happening around town...

The moon shines brightly, reflecting off of the lake's black surface, tinging the world in the dark colors of a rainbow. A prism, made of quartz.

[From [url=https://nihilvn.itch.io/nihil]Itch.io[/url]]

D.C. White Season ~Da Capo White Season~ Circus Amusement Disk Vol. 3
description: This is a collection of short stories depicting the heroines of "D.C ~Da Capo~" and the subsequent episodes of the protagonist, Junichi Asakura.

Snow is slowly falling outside. A girl named Anastasia, who lives in an old multi-story building, decides to leave her apartment. She goes to borrow some salt from her neighbors and find a treasure hidden in this house. But what kind of treasure is this, and is it worth looking for? Her neighbors are very strange, and Nastya will have to make a choice which one to go to.

Reality mixes with nightmares, but the treasure is somewhere very close...

Welcome to Fapno Island, a tropical paradise where your wildest dreams - and biggest challenges - await!

You play as the only male participant in a sizzling new reality show with an impossible twist: survive five nights surrounded by five gorgeous women without succumbing to temptation. Or that's what they tell you anyway. Find a way to disable the cameras, beat the system and get freaky with the ladies.

This is a dating simulation game where you romance the women on the island and have sex with them. Despite cameras watching every corner of the island, you can find a loophole where you can secretly have sex.

Burned out and overwhelmed, your doctor insists you take a break. What better escape than a retreat far from technology?
Help prepare for the local festivities with the overly affectionate Maverick, and do your best to avoid his unsettling brother. 

Explore the secluded, self-sustaining town of Sunlit Grove, where the people are kind and a little bit too welcoming...

Contains a collection of short scenes written during the creation of Higurashi but ultimately discarded during the writing process, along with author commentary and illustrations courtesy of the Higurashi manga artists.

As their bond grows, Maca desires to "own" Lyra, while Lyra hides her own feelings behind sarcasm. The story focuses on conversations that Maca and Lyra have as something sweet and bitter blooms within them...

description:
The new school instructor in town is now teaching at Queen Stone Academy with a lot of hot girls. And back home, he has the best female neighbors. Join the roller coaster ride of our protagonist, who finds himself in the middle of an interesting but challenging daily life.​

Step into the world of the newest instructor at Queen Stone Academy, where academic challenges and steamy encounters blend seamlessly. This isn't just a teaching job – it's an experience brimming with unexpected twists, casual fun, and a touch of the familiar. From the stunning and adventurous students to the equally captivating colleagues, every day brings a new mix of professional duties, flirtatious adventures, and opportunities to explore various fetishes and desires. But that's just half the story. Back home, life continues to sizzle with the most gorgeous neighbors around.

Join our protagonist on this roller coaster ride, navigating a life where each turn brings excitement, temptation, and a rich tapestry of intriguing relationships, both in and out of the academy. Discover a world where your deepest fantasies can be indulged, and where each meeting reveals exciting and sometimes surprising sides of passion.

Play as a university student, going about her daily life surrounded by quirky and surreal characters. The game offers three love routes: Cain Montgomery, Abel Conti, and Florian Seth—all of them full of secrets and crazy stories awaiting you.

The story is about a protagonist who was born from a demon and an angel. But the protagonist himself does not know about it, because he, loses his memory at the age of 10. He lives an ordinary life. And one day he goes to another country. On a student exchange program. There he meets a green-eyed girl with whom he falls in love. Even when he returned to his country, they never stopped talking. And the moment comes when she decides to come to him. Then it is time for the protagonist to find out who he really is.

description: C.A.T. Cyber Attack Team's story takes place in the cyberspace of the computer network, where you must defend the peace and battle against monsters and viruses who attempt to attack the network. There are a total of 10 chapters, each chapter is divided into adventure part and simulation part. During the battle, the members of the CAT team can transform into powerful CAT heroines once they are inside the cyberspace.

You're a freelancer who usually does copywriting. But one day you get an unexpected email. Your new client wants to write a book and is offering you a very tempting fee!

But his ideas and narrative style don't seem to work... So your first task is to choose a genre and gather more material. And since the best works reflect our lives, it's time to make that life more exciting!

For example, through new casual encounters with bright and unusual girls. Who will become your muse and help you write a real bestseller?

Requiem's Echo
description:
In a town abandoned by hope and plagued by nightmarish creatures, you are the last line of defense — a lone hunter with nothing left to lose. But when Leon, a government agent with a dangerous charm, arrives to investigate, everything you’ve built threatens to come crashing down.

With every exchange, every heated argument, the space between you shrinks, charged with something you can’t name. As you prepare for one final hunt, desire and survival become tangled, the stakes rising as the creatures draw closer — and so do you. With every sunset, the stakes rise. And when dawn finally comes, it will be either salvation, or the end of everything.

[From [url=https://khywae.itch.io/requiems-echo]Itch.io[/url]]

title: GENTLEMEN
description:
A story about consequences of small misunderstanding between two friends.

[From [url=https://fox-forest.itch.io/gentlemen]Itch.io[/url]]

Dive into a world of magical evolution and wondrous sci-fi inventions made real. A terraformed planet brings civilization to its knees, desperately waiting to crumble. Unravel the dark mysteries behind this new universe, and those that control it...

description:
Deep in the never-changing autumn, surrounded by the tall buildings of the city. Men in suits move like shadows between the asphalt bridges. Can the songs of their childhood and the sweet taste of a drink make them forget the lies they find in a melancholic sunset?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3292090/]Steam[/url]]
title: Man in a suit in a building in a city

description:
You're a spirit dwelling in a highschool, with the power to pick souls to live with you.

Cherry is ripe for the picking, but before your power will work you must discover why she's ripe.

Your task: listen to the gossip around the school, and delve into the hearts of her peers, to uncover the truth about Cherry.

title: After School Cure

Without much thought about life, Luo Yu accidentally enrolled in Qingling University. By chance, she joined a strange club and met many characters with different personalities. The story begins from then on.

Angel Wings: Endless Night
description: Trapped in a haunted mansion with only your wits and an unlikely ally at your side, what will it take to survive this endless nightmare?

“When you look into your past, what’s looking back at you?”

It’s natural to hold onto the memory of someone you loved and lost. But when does remembrance turn to fixation? When does clinging to the past begin to warp your present and future?

“That Which Surrounds” is a short visual novel about a grieving artist, whose longing for happier times has called something supernatural— you— into their studio. Your words can soothe a lonely heart… or you can break it, and see what grows in its place.

Choose wisely.

You’re the only one they’ll listen to.

It’s Halloween Night on Cat Island, and none are more prepared to hoard candy quite like Bernice and her good friend Theo, the latter of which is… a bird?! Here?! On an island full of predators?! Theo’s safety hangs in the balance, but one thing is certain: For better or for worse, this will be a night to remember.

A 2D adventure- horror visual novel set in the beginnings of the end of a war.

[From [url=https://kimchi-fish.itch.io/chick-or-treat]itch.io[/url]]

Somewhere in Seoul, there is a shop that buys and sells dreams.
Dreams have prophetic powers.
So if you buy a dream, you buy the prophecy with it...

Sehoon is a gumhio, a nine-tailed fox, who works as an apprentice at a dream shop where people can buy and sell their dreams. Join him as he manages the shop and delves into the dreams that people have entrusted to the them.

Investigate, solve mysteries, and maybe even fall in love in Blooming Suspicion — a witchy visual novel set in modern Seoul with a magical twist. 

Use your abilities as a techno-witch along with the help of your familiar, Sagwa, to look for clues, question suspects, and piece together the truth of what is really going on in an unassuming plant shop on the side streets of Seoul. 

But beware — in your quest for truth, you may uncover more than you bargained for. Can love bloom alongside suspicion?

It had been several days since master Raamil fell into the coma.
With mounting concern that Raamil's apprentice, Lauratt,
sought answers in the laboratory of the master, and discovered a special book:
"Meddling In Nightmares"

[From DLsite (https://www.dlsite.com/maniax/work/=/product_id/RJ181931.html/)]
title: Succubus Rhapsodia
Haison Shoujo Gaiden -Kyouraku Mugen-
description:
The Ryoyo Academy's Earth Science Club members escaped Himeyoshi Village - but freedom's toll weighs heavy on their souls. Try as they might to bury the past; echoes of pleasure haunt their every waking moment. 

Then, the village tightens its grip: Shuri and Azusa fall into an endless sleep, and Itsuki finds himself pulled into the mist between worlds.

Through the haze emerges an impossible vision—Kagome's ghost, who should have dissolved into the village mist.

"Before you stands Himeobi Manor," she tells a stunned Itsuki.
"A pleasure palace woven from the village's will, its roots deep in your hearts. Shuri and Azusa's souls lie caught in its web. Abandon them, and you'll fall one by one - until your bodies return to feed the village's hunger. Yet time remains to save you all..."

Her final gift manifests as a bell. "Take this to the manor's depths to shatter the village's chains. But remember - these halls of desire cannot be walked alone. Only bonds stronger than terror itself will light your way.". 

With his remaining clubmates, three tales of passion unfold:

1. Itsuki and Emma seek escape through endless paths, as his feelings for her emerge
2. Caught between Tsubame and Yurara, Itsuki must choose as his heart pulls both ways
3. With Rei and Manaka, they brave an ever-shifting maze where desires twist reality

The village's influence has evolved beyond its ruins, seeping into dreams and reality. Within Himeobi Manor, every sliding door opens to a different fragment of Himeyoshi Village—clinic rooms blur into village paths, and familiar places connect in impossible ways. 

School life and dream walks merge as passion bridges both worlds, drawing those souls into a feast of desire where salvation and temptation dance as one.

[Translated and edited from the official site]

One summer night, a violent storm battered the remote seaside village of Shinju Town. The disaster left deep scars on both the land and the hearts of its inhabitants, and before long the town was abandoned—its people vanishing, leaving behind a trail of unfulfilled yearnings and buried secrets…

Seven years later, on another summer day, Kawakura Reiichi—a university student—steps alone into the ruined remains of Shinju Town.

It all begins with his late grandfather’s final wish—a brief return home to decide the fate of the house where they once lived together.

Then, amid the lingering aromas and familiar vistas of a town that feels like another world, Reiichi meets a mysterious girl who calls herself "Shinju."

[i]"Reiichi… you are destined to be the sacrifice that fulfills the shrine maiden and the box."[/i]

Reiichi and four girls find themselves trapped in Shinju Town, isolated from the outside world.

Among them is Mishio Haruna, a childhood friend who bears a striking resemblance to Shinju; Niinuma Suzu, another childhood friend from the old days of Shinju Town—a little sister in spirit; Ryugatou Yachiyo, a girl on a quest to uncover the town’s legendary treasure; and Tsuzuki Nanase, a university peer drawn into Reiichi’s troubled orbit. Then, in a chilling command, Shinju orders Reiichi to rape and impregnate the imprisoned girls.

Though Reiichi and his companions band together in search of an escape, an insidious, erotic force—bound up with dark ties to their past—lures them into a vortex of debauchery, as the town fills with seductive moans.

Two girls mirror each other. 
Fragmented memories and a promise once made. 
The true identity of the deity worshipped in the town. 
The dormant desires and sins slumbering in the forsaken village.

Facing hidden truths, can Reiichi and the others ever return to the world they once knew?

What lies concealed in the mysterious box—promised hope or the desire that seductively leads to ruin?

[Translated and edited from the official site: https://www.escude.co.jp/product/haison2/world.html]
title: Haison Shoujo [Ni] ~Kageri Sasou Hime no Hako~

Relationships between lovers are tested by distance. Maybe that distance will also reveal some hidden sides of their desires.​
