title: Glitter
description:
In this Gothic horror haunted mansion themed visual novel, you play as Ember, who receives an invitation from her friend, Aurelia, to visit her suburban mansion. Legend says that Aurelia’s family once possessed a collection of worlds within the mansion that can grant any wish. Drawn by the hope of having her deepest wish fulfilled, Ember ventures to Glitterwood mansion. Will Ember find what she’s looking for, or will the cost of her wish be too great? Every wish comes with a sacrifice.

[From [url=https://midnighteclipsy.itch.io/glitter]itch.io[/url]]

title: PaintPain ～Shoujo wa Maid no Te o Totte～
Monstrous Brew
description:
Sprinkling sugar, flour, and a touch of magic; Mae's bakery is open for business!

An average day, a mundane routine, all in the life of a simple witch!

With delectable treats and heavenly pastries to *die* for, a humble dwelling to satiate anyone's sweet tooth!

Surely nothing could go wrong, right? Right?!

Oh, but how wrong she was.

A midnight customer, and a midnight call—all came ominously, in the premonition of a single feather.

And as it flutters into her hand, she knows just what it spells;

A death foreboding, and this time, it was to be her head.

"... Wh-whaaat?!"

Realising just what that sign was, the witch became frantic! Just how could she preserve her life, when she knew death was coming so soon?!

'Oh, I-I know! A love potion!'

Surely that'll do the trick! Something sweet, that'll *strike* that hunter's heart for good! However, if she were to make one before her doom, then all the time she had was...

24 hours on the clock?!

Oh, for pete's sake—!!

[From [url=https://lavendeerstudios.itch.io/monstrous-brew]itch.io[/url]]

You've finally struck gold when you matched with a cute guy on a dating app and scored yourself a date! However, as your time together prolongs, your flirtatious and charming companion may be more than he seems.

[From [url=https://peachieevee.itch.io/delicious-date]itch.io[/url]]
title: Delicious Date

description:
You wake up aboard your ship under red emergency lights and no sign of your crewmates... except for one fresh recruit you've never met before. They're a little eccentric and talk a bit weird, but it's nothing you can't handle.

As the designated mechanic of the Bidadari-221, a vessel set to deliver a shipment of Earthian pet supplies across the galaxy , it's your job to make sure things around the ship work like they're meant to. Something went wrong. That, you knew.

You just hope you can figure it out before things go horribly wrong.

[From [url=https://deerspherestudios.itch.io/astronought]itch.io[/url]]
title: Astronought
God bless you
description:
Romaine is deeply in love with her best friend, Juliet. But she is doomed to pining, considering Juliet is marrying in five days a wonderful man named Paul. But there is a more important barrier to this longing: Juliet and Romaine are both religious and believe in a God of peace, but who forbids homosexuality. But what good is there in looking at a rose one cannot touch? But perhaps Romaine can extend the arm and brush a petal with her fingers...

[From [url=https://chimeriquement.itch.io/god-bless-you]itch.io[/url]]

A Night With: Succubus is an adult romance visual novel that transports you to a medieval world filled with desire and supernatural intrigue. You play as a solitary individual living on the outskirts of a quiet village, yearning for excitement and connection. One restless night, you discover an ancient book containing a mysterious summoning ritual. Out of curiosity and boredom, you perform the ritual—never expecting it to succeed.

In a flash of otherworldly energy, Seraphina, a powerful and alluring succubus, appears before you. She's not just a creature of temptation; she seeks to absorb the lewd energy of those she deems worthy. Seraphina isn't easily impressed—she'll tease, flirt, and test your deepest desires, evaluating your every move to decide if you meet her standards.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3298020/]Steam[/url]]
title: A Night With: Succubus

description:
A long time ago, the kingdom of Johrotos was ruled by a powerful king. While he may have appeared to be a good king, many who worked directly under him knew the truth: that he sought greater power than that allowed for him by the crown. He wanted more than the kingdom had to offer, and feverishly so. Many chose to follow him out of fear; after all, they could not be killed if they were useful to him.

One member of his court stood out, however, and it was not because of his ridiculous choice of clothes or his love of pranks. His name was Ozymandias, and he was the court jester. He was perhaps the king's most trusted court official, and the king would show his love for Ozymandias every day with the finest gifts, foods, and plenty of leniency when his pranks went too far. Ozymandias, however, did not find the same fondness with the king. Ozymandias was a practicing wizard, always searching for all the magic he could possibly learn, and he hoped that one day, he would be able to use his magic to help others, starting with the overthrowing of the king.

One day, the king discovered a way to live forever with more power than anyone could possibly imagine. The first step was to become a lich. The king entrusted Ozymandias to gather the supplies and help him obtain his goal. Ozymandias did so more than willingly, and prepared for the ritual.

When everything was set, he turned to Ozymandias and thanked him for his help. As the last words fell from his lips, Ozymandias thrust a dagger into the stomach of the king and bled him over the phylactery. With a few chants, Ozymandias achieved what the king had wanted for himself...

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3164370/]Steam[/url]]
title: The Trials of Ozymandias
Chicken Police: Into the HIVE!
description:
Sonny and Marty, the Wilderness's toughest detectives, are about to embark on the biggest case of their lives, which will take them through the insect underworld and force them to face the darkest reaches of their past. 

The soul of the game is the characters that bring it to life. There are over 30 deeply fleshed-out characters to talk to, all of them handcrafted, animated, and 100% voice-acted. The Wilderness is a world with a history that goes back thousands of years and is full of fascinating facts and mysteries. Explore the city of Clawville and, with it, its anthropomorphic inhabitants' colorful cultures, traditions, desires, and fears.

You're in for a story that will affect the fate of a whole city, even the whole world, and yet it's also very intimate, and "human." Murder, betrayal, conspiracy, loss, friendship, and love await you in this dramatic and absurd adventure.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2362090/Chicken_Police_Into_the_HIVE/]Steam[/url]]

title: Oshi no Taisetsu na Hito ni Narikawaru

description:
Hana's got some skeletons in her closet. For the past few years the hustle and bustle of the city has served as a great distraction, but the time has come for her to view the reality of what happened to her, "with open eyes."

In "MINE MEMORY" - a short (~1 hour) yet gripping and dynamic visual novel, we dive deep into the memories and psyche of Hana. We navigate through her otherwise stimulating and vibrant city life as we uncover the truth of her past, which includes the reason why she's decided to leave her hometown for a metropolis. 

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2708270/MINE_MEMORY/]Steam[/url]]
title: Mine Memory
Out of Your Mind
description:
We always understood why and how one experiences emotions, but we could never see why.

This changed, however, once a governmental medical institution made a discovery. A way to manifest human thoughts and emotions into a visible entity.
To monitor these entities, a Japanese prefecture has been turned into a labyrinth-like net of hospitals. All of this is for the sake of acquiring complete emotional stability through the removal of illegal emotional states.

In this environment, a young distressed student named Lia experiences her inner problems through many changes in her own manifestation of emotions. Can you help Lia cope with her emotions and her inner voice through your choices
...or will you give in to your negative thoughts?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3141910/]Steam[/url]]

Meet Scoof, a hardened bachelor whose childhood trauma of betrayal has built an impenetrable wall around his heart. He hides in his gray world, avoiding all relationships. But a sudden encounter with a bright and enigmatic personality turns Scoof's life upside down.

Two weeks after Maya’s heartfelt confession, you meet her at a place filled with childhood memories. You're unsure of your own emotions, torn between the past and the future. In this introspective visual novel, explore the complexities of love, connection, and discovering what your heart truly desires. Can you find clarity in the feelings that remain unspoken?

[From [url=https://crueltrick.itch.io/a-feeling]Itch.io[/url]]

Sara is timid, but calm and kind, while Yura is proactive and loves Sara.
Sara is a medical student who lives with the support of Yura every day.
After a busy period, he finally has a day off to relax and spend time with Yura, but...

Both of them have dark feelings for each other, and they hope to be together forever.

[From [url=https://tedopoyo.wixsite.com/bokunosaiaino/]official website[/url]]

You summon a succubus to escape the torment at work, only to find that she looks just like your abusive boss! Can you endure living under the same roof with the bane of your existence and the ultimate object of your desire?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2059310]Steam[/url]]

title: Juicy Futa
description:
Juicy Futa is an open-world visual novel/dating-sim, set in a jazzy, black and white atmosphere.

You are Eliot, a horny Futa time traveler who gets lost on a very special island. You are stuck in the past and need to find a way back to your time.
Immerse yourself in the life of the islanders, get to know them, gain their trust, become their friends and maybe more...

You will have to help people and please them if you want to go home.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2012290/Juicy_Futa/]Steam[/url]]

title: Hitou Meguri・Shin Shou～Yamabuki Ayami no Baai ～
Gakeppuchi Reijou wa Mukiryoku Akuma de Otome o Sutetai
aliases: The Desperate Young Lady Wants To Abandon Her Maidenhood to an Apathetic Demon
description:
The heroine, a young lady of a noble count's family, was panicking as she approached the age of marriage with no prospects in sight. To rebuild her family, which was on the verge of bankruptcy, she needed a wealthy partner. Yet, being very particular about looks, she insisted, "If I'm to marry, it must be the most handsome Christopher!" and couldn't bring herself to settle for anyone else.

However, her childhood friend Christopher, who was older and always smiling, never reacted to her advances. Frustrated, the heroine eventually hinted at marriage, only to receive a reply she hadn’t anticipated—

"I'm not fond of virgins. But you’re still one, right?"

A typical lady would have probably stormed off in outrage at such a remark, saying, "How rude!" Yet, the heroine's mind sparked in an unexpected direction.

"If I were to get rid of my virginity, would Christopher marry me!? And if I could get a few tips on lovemaking as well, I might become even more to his taste!"

Resolved, she didn’t ask a friend for help, nor did she hire a professional—instead, she earnestly summoned a demon.

After all, demons supposedly grant two wishes, and he seemed somewhat... experienced.

Thus begins the story of a slightly (?) eccentric desperate noble lady and an utterly unmotivated demon—a tale of painful, yet endearing days together.

Is the price of freedom worth it? Elm has but a few months to find out... unless a human wouldn't mind sharing a monster's magical burden. Earn the locals' trust or die trying. Can Elm win them over without scaring them away? Or will their monstrous origins prove too much of a hindrance?

[From [url=https://sparkling-horizon-studios.itch.io/to-the-wayside]itch.io[/url]]
title: To The Wayside
A Nova Moment
description:

Ten years ago you visited the town of Brimdale, and now you've finally come back. Hoping to reunite with your childhood friend you meet two peculiar strangers. Could one of them be the mysterious friends of yours...?

[From [url=https://madizzy-studios.itch.io/echoing-tides]itch.io[/url]]

title: Gladston Valley
description:
Two friends reunite amidst a disturbing string of murders in the small town of Gladston Valley. The crime scenes are gruesome, leading many of the townspeople to believe a monster lives in the valley.

Torches and pitchforks are drawn as the bloodshed feeds into a growing unrest. At the precipice of disaster, only Leo knows what is truly going on.

[From [url=https://ladymeowsith.itch.io/gladston-valley]itch.io[/url]]

Keep chasing after what you lack.

Keep running away from the man he is and the one he was.

No matter how far you are, his voice haunts you.

His gentle facade and the violence under are rooted too deep inside.

What way is there to keep them out? 

[From [url=https://meo-eiru.itch.io/hold-your-tongues]itch.io[/url]]
title: Hold Your Tongues

description:
The Devouring Forest is one of the most well-known spots to get rid of the suicidal or unwanted: the children nobody wants to take care of, elderly, sick, injured.

Kassja is ill, and being too weak to birth children or work her village throws her into the forest. Yet, as she is dying under the scorching sun that trespasses the greenery, the spirit patron hears her hateful prayer of death for those who used to be her folk. It resurrects her, green parts merging with her now healed body. 

The patron lets her live under one condition: she will be faithful to it and will help it destroy humanity in the region.

She accepts the deal.

[From [url=https://a-villarroel.itch.io/the-rerooting-of-an-asphodel]itch.io[/url]]
title: The Rerooting of an Asphodel

When Jay hears a noise at night, the one thing they didn't expect was to find not a raccoon but a [i]monster[/i] in their barn!

Luckily, the monster turns out to be quite the attractive gentleman.

Even more luckily, he's [i]very much[/i] Jay's type.

[From [url=https://owlscribble.itch.io/my-new-tenant]itch.io[/url]]

"What happens when you can't even trust those chosen by the Goddess?"

The Saint, meant to be a beacon of hope and peace, has been turned into a bloodthirsty monster for twelve years. Now it's up to Genevievé to stop its reign of terror, even if she got roped into it unexpectedly.  Who will she side with, who will she trust, and will she do whatever it takes to save Soltus, or will she choose her survival above all else?

[From [url=https://nekoii-studio.itch.io/hunting-the-saint]itch.io[/url]]
title: Hunting the Saint

description:
Ellaie and Lyas just finished a big job for a nobleman who claims connection to the royal family. Unfortunately, when it comes time to exchange goods and voin, they are betrayed and thrown into an abyss. But Ellaie somehow survived the fall and now she must find a way to survive in Maugre Chasm. However, it seems she's not alone down here...

[From [url=https://avarisharkay.itch.io/maugre-chasm]itch.io[/url]]

You are a tiny bird, floating in this world

description:
To assume the throne is to assume an identity. Yet the draconic king must be slain.

Rei, a chimera, moves to slay the dragon king-- their father. With four others in tow (a jackalope, shapeshifter, human, and a parasite), they infiltrate the castle. But what will happen once Rei sits atop the throne? When they must answer who they are?

Arizona is an immersive visual novel that thrusts you into the dusty, sun-scorched world of the American Southwest, where a sheltered young man on the run must confront his deepest fears amid the chaos of drugs, wild parties, and unpredictable freedom.

As the days melt together under the endless sky, you'll navigate a world of intoxicating highs—both literal and emotional—while forming complicated bonds with three colorful characters. Each one offers a different path of connection, adventure, and self-discovery. But what if the road ahead leads you right back to the darkness you’re running from?

[From [url=https://reedflower.itch.io/arizona]itch.io[/url]]
title: Arizona

description:
HANASU ～Girls Kiss At The End Of The World～ is a short kinetic novel about finding small joys even in the most dire of situations.

After the news of a meteor strike that is to bring the apocalypse in a few hours breaks out, Hana runs away from home and finds herself standing on her school's rooftop.

"It's pretty from up here, isn't it?"

Underneath a bright blue sky, she meets Charlotte, a bright a cheerful girl with an allure that's hard to describe.

As the cold wind blows, the two reflect on their lives as they share their insecurities and bond over being alone and forgotten in a world that's about to end.

Once their time runs out, will they be able to go out with a smile?

[From [url=https://aokoro.itch.io/hanasu]itch.io[/url]]
title: HANASU ~Girls Kiss At The End Of The World~

The protagonist, Clear, chosen as the hero to save the world, encounters Towa, a saint offered as a sacrifice for the world's sake. Although Clear is initially startled to discover that Towa is actually a man, he is drawn to Towa's personality and begins to worry about the future where he must kill him. Will Clear choose Towa, or the world—or perhaps, both?

Immerse yourself in a serene Mediterranean island where the worlds of the land and sea intertwine. Embark on a heart-warming, epic journey to help a mysterious girl from the sea find her way home. 🏝️

Having always felt adrift in your own life, you'll meet enigmatic characters who will not only help you unearth the island's rich mythology, but unlock hidden truths within yourself! 🔍

title: Sinthesis
description:
You are Gray Ebratir, a paladin initiate who met a grim fate during a harrowing mission against dark cult. Believed to be slain, Gray instead awoke to a nightmare—his life preserved through a profane ritual by the dark cult he sought to destroy.

Now imbued with otherworldly powers, Gray embarks on a quest to not only uncover the truth behind his mysterious resurrection, but to prevent an ancient evil from consuming the world. Only by gathering the sacred vessels of the archangels can Gray hope to stop the rise of this primordial threat. Can he hold true to his noble cause and redeem himself? Or will he be consumed by the very powers that give him a chance at salvation?

Two sisters started living in my house for one simple reason: it was close to their school.
But each of them had their own hidden agenda.

"Big bro, please always keep at least 100 meters between you and Mikaru-nee!"
"Michiru, you’re the one who should stay away from Yuuhi-nii-san!"

Ah… my daily life is already a complete mess.
And just like that, my chaotic, nostalgic, and lively days with them began.

title: Alternate Worlds
description:
You are a household name, renowned internationally as a celebrated athlete whose career was tragically cut short by injury. Despite near financial ruin, you retain your status as a respected figure, holding together a loving family. At home, your devoted wife, an epitome of beauty and dedication, ensures your home is always a sanctuary. Your life, though marked by ups and downs, is fulfilling and deeply rooted in family values.

But one evening, after extending a helping hand to a mysterious older woman in distress, your world is turned upside down. She gifts you an extraordinary opportunity: access to an alternate reality where you can live an entirely different life. Each night as you sleep, you are transported into this new realm where everything you once knew is reshaped.

In this alternate world, you're a successful standalone figure, living the high life unattached. You roam freely, indulging in nightly adventures with a series of beautiful women. Gone are the ties of family life. Instead, you thrive on your own wealth and investments, a lifestyle most would envy but few could handle.

As you delve deeper into both worlds, you'll face critical decisions that will shape your fate. Will you return to the loving arms of your dedicated wife and family, reclaiming the life that, though filled with its own trials, brims with warmth and genuine affection? Or will you stay in the alternate world, basking in wealth, independence, and the unconventional pleasures that come with it?

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/motkeyz/about]Patreon[/url]]

The "Urban Myth Dissolution Center" specializes in investigating and dissolving mysteries, cursed objects, and otherworldly phenomena. The protagonist, Azami Fukurai, works alongside Ayumu Meguriya, the center's director and one of the nation's top psychics.

Through lush, poetic writing, we follow her literal journey through the post-apocalypse on a scavenging mission, and retrace her figurative journey to see how she got here and where she might head next.

Good Morning is a psychological visual novel where every choice matters. Trapped in a repeating morning, your decisions unlock hidden paths and multiple endings. Each replay reveals new secrets as you try to break free from the loop. Can you escape, or will you be stuck forever?

description:
You and your co-worker Nanako have always had a bitter rivalry. Finally, on the order of your boss, you two have to cooperate for once. What bottled up feelings will this predicament reveal? Will it reignite your long-lost feelings for her? Where did it all go wrong between you and her? And how will she eventually help you to reconnect what you've lost in touch with: that there is more to life than just being a productive workaholic?

[From [url=https://parkgdev.itch.io/office-rivals]itch.io[/url]]

title: Prison Princess Hamerareshi Hime-tachi
description:
Under the rule of two great kingdoms, the continent of Maygard once enjoyed a period of prosperity.

However, that prosperity became a thing of the past once the continent came under attack from the Demon King Hamehameha and her formidable magical power... Since then, humanity has gradually been losing ground to the Demon King's forces.

With the survival of humanity at stake, a Hero arises to defeat the Demon King. Heading on a journey together with new allies and two princesses with whom he overcame a sage's trials, the Hero seeks to obtain a sacred relic which is said to vanquish demons.

However, the Hero and his party meet an untimely demise when they encounter a surprise-attack by the Demon King. With humanity's last hope lost, it seemed like the world was all but in the hands of the Demon Lord...

In his fading state of consciousness, the Hero extends his arm towards his captured party members. In that moment, the Hero hears a voice pleading for help somewhere deep in the darkness.

"Someone please help me..."

Drawn to the voice, the Hero's spirit is summoned by Julietta, a princess from a faraway land being held prisoner in the Demon King's castle. The two quickly figure out that Julietta's desire to escape and the Hero's desire to rescue his party members are aligned with one another.

title: CODE 1011: HERO

You must try to recover the pieces of your past to uncover your true identity and purpose while trying to do your main mission, which is saving the world.

On your journey you may end up discovering more than what you bargained for, but can you handle the truth of your past or will it end up consuming you?

[From itch.io: https://yui-enajori.itch.io/code-1011-hero]

Immerse yourself in a gripping narrative adventure with One Day: Replay, where every moment matters and your decision counts. In this heart-pounding virtual novel, you step into the shoes of a determined man on a mission to save his beloved girlfriend. The clock is ticking, and you have just one day to alter the course of fate—over and over again.
Storyline: Your journey begins on an ordinary day that quickly turns into a desperate race against time. As you navigate through the day, you’ll uncover secrets, face challenges, and make choices that impact the fate of your girlfriend and your own future. But be warned—every time your girlfriend’s life is lost, the day resets, and you must start again. Can you piece together the clues and make the right decisions to break the cycle and secure a happy ending?

You've just moved to Glass Shard Beach in your senior year of high school, and you are certain that this will be the worst thing that ever has and will happen to you. But I, one of the people trapped here in the system, need to get out and save the rest of them by any means possible.. Or rather, one Lena. That's the only reason I'm still here. I'll bring Lena back to the real world, no matter what it takes.

In Attempted Redemption, you'll guide a woman trying to live a normal life after everything she's done. She has only one chance to hold on to, but whether she becomes a loving, kind person or reverts to her old self depends entirely on you.​

title: Pink House R
description: you take the role of a man who has lost everything, his job because of a cheating by his bosses, his wife leaves him when he loses his job and can't give her the life she is used to. but all is not lost, your brother invites you to spend some time with him, but you have other plans.

title: How Much is Happiness?
description:
Poverty, hunger, sleepless nights on a cold bed - there was nothing but misery in the life of a young street girl named Bun.

She can no longer put up with hopelessness and plans to leave this world and go to Paradise - a distant city where there is no place for suffering. And then one day, without saying a word to anyone, Bun disappears.

You think of nothing better than to start searching the internet. A suspicious website says it's ready to bring her back, but, uh. in exchange for a thousand signatures on the user agreements. Without thinking, you click on them and.... Bun does come back to you, but she's displeased. No wonder why - you pulled her out of Paradise back to your miserable town.

At the same time Felka appears in your life. He's a funny cat-helper, every day calculating the level of your happiness and suggesting ways to increase it.

“What's going on, who is this cat, what did you agree to?” - none of that matters as long as Bun is around. Or... doesn't it?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3336270/]Steam[/url]]

title: GUILTY GEAR -STRIVE-
description: Guilty Gear Strive (stylized as GUILTY GEAR -STRIVE-) is a fighting video game developed and published by Arc System Works. It is the seventh mainline instalment of the Guilty Gear series, and the 25th overall. The game was released for PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5 and Windows in June 2021, for Japanese arcades in July 2021, and for Xbox One and Xbox Series X/S in March 2023, with a Nintendo Switch port scheduled for a January 2025 release.

Yoshi is an 18-year-old boy with a dim future. Despite his serious illness, he can't complain so much after his enrollment to the Yamaku. At least, he still has a girlfriend, friends, and wealthy parents. No worries and no responsibilities, so lazy and absent-minded Yoshi just goes with the flow, not really thinking about what happens next.

Until fate accidentally brings him together with Kyouko, a girl who lives in eternal darkness and silence. This will force him to make a hard choice....

Aydan, the protagonist, joins his husband Leo in this important family reunion that takes place 2 months after his husband’s father death. Now that everyone is reunited, they are ready to meet the lawyer in charge of reading the will of the late father.

Suddenly, they are all trapped in the house for 3 days and the lawyer states that one of the siblings is the murderer of their own father!

What?! Didn't he die of a heart attack?!

What's going on here?!

Now Aydan not only has to defend his husband from being accused, but he also needs to find out who the real culprit is!

[From [url=https://dmeow.itch.io/guilty-at-5pm]itch.io[/url]]

This is the story of a down-on-his luck drifter, who, due some unforeseen circumstances, ends up donning the identity of a young nobleman. Now, he has to navigate life at the court of a powerful count, while doing his best to not get his cover blown...and maybe get some quality time with the many ladies of the court, while he's at it.

[From [url=https://ds23g.itch.io/the-art-of-diplomacyand-love]Itch.io[/url]]
title: The Art of Diplomacy and... Love

description:
In front of their eyes stretches a decaying world, an endless wasteland.

Embedded in each human brain is a 'memory terminal device' containing the history of a great war. A cataclysmic conflict that spread across the globe, eventually leading civilization to its end.

But whether it’s an actual record of events remains uncertain.

Nonetheless, people shared their 'pieces of memory' via the device.

The vast amount of memory data, mixed on a global scale, had lost its original source, becoming in the eyes of history nothing more than faded recollections. Yet, just as they exchanged words, people exchanged these remembrances and lived each day among what was left of that old world.


[Translated from [url=https://whiteophidion.sakuraweb.com/cross/string/]the official website[/url]]
title: a string

description:
I was reincarnated as an extra character in the magical girl anime that my niece loved to watch.
In this world where stones replace people, I thought if I avoided getting involved with anyone and made it to the end, I could return home.

"Come forth. I have something important to say to you."

The final boss showed up at my house, even though I never gave him my address.

"Ugh, fine. Yeah, I quit. Isn't it about time I quit? I'm tired and fed up."

The protagonist suddenly quit being a magical girl and holed up in her house.

What’s even going on? I just want to go home.

. . .

"This world is doomed."

I thought that as I looked at the situation around me. I didn’t want to do anything, just kill time until I could go home.

But then,

"You want to go home, don’t you? Let’s save the world together."

A time traveler, who didn’t exist in the original story, appeared. He said if I wanted to go home, I’d have to help him save the world.

"Trust me. If you can’t trust me, at least trust the name ■■■."

He even knows my niece’s name, who doesn’t exist in this world?
If saving the world is the only way to go home, then maybe I should give it a try.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3306160/]Steam[/url]]
title: Lieolseog
LIP! Lewd Idol Project Vol. 3 - Hot Springs and Beach Episodes
description:
After the group is finally complete and the girls are enjoying well-deserved popularity both in Akihabara and on the internet, maintaining success becomes quite a challenge and time to rest is increasingly scarce... But that won't stop our favorite lewd idols from having their time to relax!

“Relaxing time is as important as hard work... Especially when you're surrounded by such young and beautiful girls!”
Ranko. Lewd Idol Project member and producer.

The newest member of the group, Kanako-chan, receives a mysterious letter from the town where she grew up when she was just a child... Apparently, an old hot springs inn now belongs to her. Kairi and the others are more than excited about this unexpected news but…
Is everything really as great as it seems?

Kanako is as surprised as she is worried about this situation, so the group decides to embark on a journey to visit this mysterious residence and uncover the truth.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3171240/]Steam[/url]]

title: Inverted Angel
description:
A girl visited your home, who you don't know but she identified herself as your girlfriend. She seems a little bit Menhera, but she knows too much to be just a stalker.

This is a Kawaii Future Mystery, you will answer by free input for branching story. Please Try to find out true identity of her.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2894960/Inverted_Angel/]Steam[/url]]

You are an ordinary girl from a rural area, with a humble background.

For the sixteen years since your birth, the seasons have cycled, the sun has risen and set, and the universe has moved faithfully to the rhythm you know so well.

Immersed in the bittersweet routine of daily life, you believe that this is all there is to existence.

However, upon entering high school, the arrival of two mysterious boys disrupts your once ordinary life.

It seems a supernatural force is shaking the familiar world you thought you understood.

As reality and dreams start to intertwine, you begin to question your preconceptions about the world.

Is this story one of miracles, mysteries, or distortions?

All the answers rest in your choices…

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3310940]Steam[/url]]
title: Shenming Gaozhongsheng
Yuzhi Meng
description:
After being falsely accused and ordered to drop out of school, you are forced to hide in a dark room and live your life. You thought your life could not get any worse, but you fell into a scam of online nude chatting and got caught in the middle of a fight between the gangs and the WSA.
You are not only arrested and imprisoned by the WSA, you are even sentenced to death. You have to either be the dog of a young lady or the hostage of a ruthless killer to have a chance of survival.
You will make your own choice between the daughter of the head of the WSA and the daughter of a gangster.
Modern technology versus the slums, the WSA versus the gangs, third-party mysterious forces, and strange alien creatures - all of these conflicts are shrouded in an impenetrable fog that will shatter your past life. Start over, solve all the mysteries, and become the hero of the city.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3060900]Steam[/url]]

Legends from the 19th century have survived to the present day, and historical records attribute the desolation of the castle and its surroundings to a natural disaster; and a novel whose author shares my name suggests that the disaster was man-made. The father, unable to accept the loss of his daughter, sought out all manner of witches and spells, even going so far as to sacrifice a living person in order to bring the dead girl back to life.
I also came across a young woman sleeping in a coffin, Hetty. Her torso was covered with splicing marks and she seemed to have forgotten much, wondering at her own existence but not very suspicious of me as an outsider. She even begged me to help her recover her memories...

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2651490]Steam[/url]]
title: Jinji Shaonü De Lunhui Zhi Ye

description:
"Secrets and Boundaries" will follow our main character Aaron (name is customizable) as he starts his freshman year at the illustrious Viktor Khondria University. He will meet many people including several lovely ladies for him to try his luck with, though there are plenty of other guys who are also competing for these ladies' attention.

[From [url=https://fronte91.itch.io/secrets-and-boundaries]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Secrets and Boundaries

description:
A boring hike with a femboy yields new experiences... 😜

You meet a special person on a church group hike. After he sprained his ankle, it's your shoulder he has to lean on, and his delicate hands leaves you feeling ways about stuff. After pitching the tent, Cody invites you inside for a friendly match of thumb war..

The rest is history... 😏

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3312410/]Steam[/url]]
title: I Touched Tips with a Femboy
Lewd Family
description:
Between your heartbroken mother and your hot single aunt, you have a lot of action going on in your household. There are various paths you can choose, each with their own endings. 

Will you conquer your mother or aunt? The choice is yours.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3270440/Lewd_Family/]Steam[/url]]

title: Crash-Land Fantasy
description:
In the space fairing futur,e a research satellite orbits above a planet unestablished by the federation. One of the few remaining who's natives possess the ability to use what's known as Magic. Of course, you don't believe in 'Magic'---you're scientists after all---but after many years gaining no real understanding of the phenomenon the research project gets shut down.
​
You worry what you'll do with your life next, but suddenly the satellite gets knocked out of orbit by a mysterious magic force, causing the remaining two inhabitants of the craft to crash land on the fantasy planet. You and your android captain must try to survive on this planet which is ruled by nature.

Go on a fun action adventure and meet friends along the way, and figure out the mystery behind the magical force that made you crash as you try to get back home!

[Edited from [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3063390/CrashLand_Fantasy/]Steam[/url]]

It’s 2040.
You are an intern at a prominent company that specializes in brain pattern technology and VR.

Today is the big day! Digital Horizon’s tech has allowed people across the globe transfer their senses into the digital world.

Today, history will be made. Your brain patterns will be inserted directly into a test server.
No hardware required. No buffers. No body.
Today is just a four-day test… In and out!

That didn’t happen though.

You ended up in the world wide web.
More specific, you ended up in the Twatch Servers, where the streamers stream to the world.

A person’s perspective can change the world directly. Even self-image can drastically change your appearance.
And somehow, they overlap effortlessly in a storm of chaos.

Now that you are here. What will you do?

[From [url=https://therinwhitten.itch.io/b1nary]itch.io[/url]]
title: B1NARY
Zhuanlu Shaonü Zhengjiu Xingdong!
description:
In the year 2030, humanoid robot technology has advanced significantly. After working tirelessly for years, you manage to save up to buy a customized companion robot: “Hina” the Sleeping Beauty.
Unfortunately, the Hina you have purchased is defective and will stop functioning in seven days! Using your skills and resources, you begin to save her from a complete breakdown! Unbeknownst to you, she begins to develop a “soul”...

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2613010]Steam[/url]]

DEAD DETENTION is a rescribbled and fully remade version of the cult flash series. It features 5 episodes of chaotic fun, plus a special epilogue unlocked by achieving either of the good endings.
[From [url=https://jackastral.itch.io/dead-detention-rescribbled]Itch.io[/url]]
title: DEAD DETENTION (Rescribbled)
Xmas Surprise
description:
Christmas Eve 202X, somewhere in the USA. The homeless Protagonist Richard stamps through the snow to find a shelter to protect him from the cold. Luckily he finds an abandoned house where he can rest. Later that night he awakes from a strange sound coming from the fireplace. To his surprise a pretty woman in a seductive Santa Dress crawled down the chimney, claiming that the house belonged to her.
What will Richard do?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3289010/]Steam[/url]]

title: Mogamitei ANOTHER STORY Awasa Yuuka Hen

description:
The fairies of this wood are no stranger to erotic encounters with all sorts of strange and wonderful creatures. But when Lee is caught by a human entomologist studying the breeding habits of his species, the little sprite realizes that the situation might be bigger than he can handle.

[From [url=https://alexisroyce.itch.io/pinup]itch.io[/url]]
title: Pinup

description:
The Drummer’s Last Ten Days: Shiina Taki's Decameron is an interactive novel based on the original anime BanG Dream! It's MyGO!!!!!, with the drummer Shiina Taki as the protagonist.

Over the course of 6–7 hours of gameplay, players will experience the story from Taki’s perspective, set seven years after the events of the anime. You’ll encounter a mix of familiar and unfamiliar characters.

The game features multiple endings, with character routes that are interconnected, interactive, and even include some randomness. Certain choices can have far-reaching consequences.

[Translated from [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3269960/Shiina_Takis_Decameron/]steam[/url]]
title: Gushou Yuming Shi Ri Tan

developers.name: Mianying Qiao Hua Jian Tonghao Hui

description:
Welcome to the Middle World - a purgatory dimension where people's souls go to after they die. In the Middle World people have to complete tasks to atone for their wrongdoings or settle any unfinished matters and emotional traumas before their final destination can be decided.

As a newly arrived, Julius has to seek forgiveness of those whose lives he ruined in life. But with no memories of his Earth life, the task wouldn't be easy. He has to make friends and connections and find out more about this world - a world that exists in a permanent twilight time of the day, has a futuristic cyberpunk flare, and where it is impossible to die, while pain and suffering are all as real as they can be.

While uncovering our past and facing its challenges, we also must face the ever-unpredictable politics and dangers of the Middle World, with different groups contending for power and influence, covert alliances and secret deals, and parasitic creatures that feed on people's suffering. And perhaps in the midst of this chaos we can build a meaningful connection with someone, whose fate will intertwine with our own and seal our final path.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3294360/]Steam[/url]]
title: Interim Crossroads

description:
One day, the protagonist wakes up in an unfamiliar room. For some reason, a schoolmate from a higher pecking order, Akino Yuna, is next to him.

Still confused, he tries to look for a way out, but with no success. There are only white walls and a single bed, a room with nothing. At the same time, Akino Yuna wakes up, unable to hide her confusion as well.

For the protagonist, who has nothing to do with her, this situation is unbelievable. However, in the meantime, there is an announcement.

"Well, then, please begin having sex."

The sudden announcement makes them freeze.
What is going to happen to them?

[Translated and edited from the [url=https://www.hook-net.jp/tily/yarayaru/#story]official website[/url]]
title: Yatte mo Derarenai Heya ni Tojikomerareta no de Hikitsuzuki Motto Yaru Hanashi

description:
You will play as Summer Summerson, an eighteen year old girl from the middle of nowhere trying to achieve her dream of becoming a professional photographer. After participating and winning an online photography contest, Summer receives an offer for a scholarship at one of the most prestigious art colleges in the country. But in order to follow her dream she will have to leave her rural home and move into the big city, a new environment she never experienced before. Help Summer tackle that exciting new environment while meeting its inhabitants.​

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/flipdashit/about]Patreon[/url]]
title: Summer in the City
Angel & Demon
description:
Follow the story of Veronica (and her family), a 22-year-old girl next door, student, and still living at her parents' home.

Her life is going swimmingly, but a simple invitation for a drink from her best friend could change the rest of her life...

What happens next will leave Veronica either sinking gradually into corruption or leading an exemplary life as a traditional woman.

Of course, she will be accompanied to help or encourage her to make her choices, and may influence the rest of her family for good or ill.​

[From F95Zone]

title: Uno DX
description: The game follows Shunichi, a member of his school's Uno club, who wants to be the best Uno player in his school. The game can be best described as a visual novel ware Uno is a core mechanic and the only way to progress the story or get the occasional CG is playing many rounds of said card game

title: Solstice Eve
description:
Cantor Yagon couldn't love his wife. Having been sent as an emissary to a cold and foreign land, their marriage was that of political convenience, made worse by his preference for men. Following her unfortunate death, he is lost.

Darwin Norland-Brice loved nothing more than his wife.  The years following her death have been the hardest of his life, his isolation made even worse by the turmoils of being one of the only therianthropes in the city.

But when the two men meet, and a budding relationship starts to form, the cause of his wife's death is suddenly called into question, and Cantor's monotone life is plunged into chaos. 

Was her death really an accident? What was the conspiracy that she had been investigating before she died? And when the core of said conspiracy seems to lie within the very mage's guild that Cantor belongs to... what will uncovering it lead to?

[From [url=https://chmron.itch.io/solstice-eve]itch.io[/url]]
A cozy dating sim set in the STAR WARS: Jedi Survivor universe.
title: Intergalactic Bound
Monarkh
description:
What does the glass sound like? Quite tinkly.

It crumbled into sand under the feet of all those worried people circling around.

As for you, there was darkness in your eyes for a long time. And the glass has melted into silence long since.

But what is this place? And who is this stranger standing in front of you?

And most importantly, where — or who — did the bullet hit?

[From [url=https://chiiaka.itch.io/monarch-en]itch.io[/url]]

Trapped in a vicious political game, you were executed as the ultimate villainess. But fate has intervened, sending you back in time. Can you rewrite your destiny, escape a tragic end, and win your true love?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3336360/]Steam[/url]]
title: Die For Me
May You Live
description:
May You Live is a horror visual novel about the events of Victoria Vivas and Andrew Mallory. Being known as 'The World's Luckiest Girl', everyone wants to know the secret behind Victorias Vivas' luck. Andrew Mallory, an interviewer for the Unlimited Times, schedules an appointment with Miss Vivas to reveal the truth. But what happens when luck is not in his favour? 

[From [url=https://izburger.itch.io/may-you-live]itch.io[/url]]

title: Tihij klass
description:
Quiet Classroom is a story about the lives of four orphaned teenagers with troubled pasts, enrolled in a new experimental rehabilitation program called the "Quiet Classroom."

You take on the role of Haruto Saito, a former Japanese soldier and veteran of the Third World War, who suffered a serious injury during the conflict. After returning home, Haruto struggles to adapt to civilian life and faces the threat of being sent to a veterans' care facility for compulsory treatment.

However, everything changes when a mysterious stranger offers him an alternative: instead of the care facility, he can become a mentor in the "Quiet Classroom."

Whether Haruto can help himself and the four teenagers confront their inner demons is entirely up to you.

After a disaster wiped out the cursed mining crew, Ilejah is left alone in the dangerous land of Incarna. As he fights to stay alive, new people come into his life—some kind, others strong warriors wanting to be friends. The path ahead is dangerous: fights, tough battles, and strong feelings. Betrayal hides behind smiles, and random meetings could form friendships that change everything.

[From [url=https://dengyou.itch.io/ephemerale]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Ephemerale

description:
With Memories, you’ll embark on a journey through the intimate recollections of a man’s life, exploring hidden desires and secret moments as he records his most cherished and forbidden experiences in a personal diary.

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/deviloper/about]Patreon[/url]]
title: Memories

description:
Satoshi and Mary are a couple in love. They were meant to spent a lovely summer together at a certain summer resort, along with Satoshi's uncle, Kendo... However, Kendo is unable to go, and their plans are cancelled.

Several months later, Satoshi receives an eerie email from his uncle. In it, Kendo explains how during the Fall season, the Naval Treasure Resort hosts a one-of-a-kind Test of Courage, at a nearby abandoned island. Couples who successfully complete this test are made to participate in a ritual, which is said to bind two people in love for all eternity. Feeling that his relationship with Mary is on the road to stagnation, Satoshi accepts the invitation.

Thus begins a kinky, fun-filled Halloween adventure for Satoshi and Mary, along with their friend Hanako and fellow couple Natsuki and Yoshi! Sexy costumes, sexy times, all alone in a deserted island!
...Or that's how it was meant to be.

[From F95Zone]
title: Isle of Fall

description:
Help a long-married couple navigate an unusual new friendship, extra-marital feelings, and potentially polyamory.

[From [url=https://bobcgames.itch.io/the-revelation]itch.io[/url]]
title: Mother: The Revelation
Watashi ga Shinu Tame no Otome Game

aliases: Red Spider Anecdote: The Longest Nite
title: Benigumo Gaiden: Anka
description:
2009. Ben, an officer of the Red Flower Society, an underworld mob that operated in Kowloon, Hong Kong is found murdered in Thailand.

Yeung Kwun, the head of the Red Flower Society, asks Yvet, who used to belong to the assassination organization “the web”, to investigate the case.

In Thailand, Romrowan, the head of Newmoon, a Thai crime syndicate, is wanted for Ben's murder.

Yvet, an old acquaintance of Ramrowan, stands up to exonerate him.

2009. Miok, an agent with North Korea's Ministry of State Security, is tracking a North Korean defector in Thailand.

She discovers that her target is being transported by a Hong Kong broker and follows him, only to have him murdered before her eyes.

Myok and her former subordinate, Yui, who has now defected and is working in Thailand's entertainment district as Kathooey, track down the broker's cell phone.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3355700/]Steam[/url]]

A tale of one dark forest encircling a small village, one foul Beast dwelling in its heart, and one fateful night upon which one ventured into that very forest and beheld that very Beast. 

[From [url=https://snixiy.itch.io/come-towards-me]itch.io[/url]]
title: Come Towards Me.

description:
The Deadwoman, The Witch and The Horse walk into a bar... 

Well, a tavern to be proper. The tavern ensconced by moss-dripping oaks, perched on the swampy marsh, and caressed by the balmy winds. 

Year after year, on All Saints' Day The Deadwoman wakes up from her deathly slumber to join her friends at the tavern. She ain't the only one. Comers and goers from all walks of life wind up here, on the bayou. 

But to-night, she's got an ambitious undertaking — to find a ring for her fiancée! Oh, her girl sure deserves the world! The ragtag visitors of this fine establishment might just be able to give The Deadwoman a few hints as to where to look for the ring. 

She's gotta choose the path wisely and keep her eyes open for the tavern ain't a place for tenderfoots. Will the shady alligator lodgers grab her attention? Will the weeping young man catch her eye? Come what may,  the night is young and full of adventure.

[From [url=https://gods-favourites.itch.io/night-on-the-bayou]itch.io[/url]]
title: Night on the Bayou
slime feet
description:
In the sub-zero temperatures of the Arctic stands The Amoninsula Research Facility, a bunker housing the world's top scientists dedicated to studying and containing “Hazards”, anomalies which defy the laws of physics, as well as common sense.

After a streak of unlucky incidents, Estelle Mcclendon finds herself in an encounter with a Hazard, becoming a “Host” for “Miasma”, an amorphous floating cloud that seeks to subsume living organisms. Miasma will gradually spread through the body, deteriorating bone and tissues alike until the weakened internal organs can no longer sustain the human functions necessary for life.

With no known cure for a Host infected by Miasma, Estelle spends the remainder of her days exchanging messages with her closest coworker, Abbi. Together, they do their best to feel intimacy by being perverts together while staring the looming, macabre regression toward death straight in the eye.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3551200/slime_feet/]Steam[/url]]

In an inevitable apocalypse, the Holy City-State has come to worship a mechanical god, and Tian, an honor student, is the only member of her study group, the only friend of Hoshi's who is able to leave a country full of rules and religion and find simple happiness. Time is short, and parting is imminent: today is the last day of study group, and Tian must decide. 

Spend a final night with HER,
or Leave with her, forsaking ethnicity, religion, country, and.. family.

[Edited from [url=https://insa.itch.io/adieu-to-senior-coursebook]itch.io[/url]]
title: Jol-eobban Gyogwaseoe Jagbyeol-eul
AthenA
description:
Midzuki is a shy and introverted senior high school student. One day her secret crush, Misaki, who is the most popular girl in the whole school, comes up to her and ask s her to join their girl band for the suicide prevention campaign. All of the sudden, Midzuki's life has taken a 180 turn since then...

[From [url=https://daruku-darc.itch.io/athena]itch.io[/url]]

title: APOK-LIPS
description:
You wake up and see a girl... Is it... the end of the world already? And what could be the reason for the apocalypse?

A super-short visual novel about aliens and those things we blame ourselves for—sometimes without reason. 

[From [url=https://sanakan0.itch.io/apok-lips]itch.io[/url]]

title: The Frontier
description:
A point-and-click visual novel where you, Sam, a recent exile from The Frontier, try to understand more about the rapidly declining population, and its local folktale horror, Lilith.

Nothing is what it seems.

[From [url=https://illuminesce.itch.io/the-frontier]itch.io[/url]]

"Glassblowing killed my fear of failure."

Try to keep center, fail. Blow glass, fail again. Find your way.

[From [url=https://illuminesce.itch.io/keep-center]itch.io[/url]]
title: Keep Center
Blunt Soul Trauma
description:
Blunt Soul Trauma is a kinetic visual novel about home-made angels, friendly kidnappings and being roped into doing a stranger a favor that leaves you  feeling shaken afterward.

Ferida is making her way back home after some late-night grocery shopping when she's kidnapped, drugged and tied up to a wall by an angel who calls herself Haydee, and who expresses that she has no desire to harm or inconvenience Ferida in any way. She simply wants a favor from her, small and insignificant.

She want's Ferida's assistance in making a new angel out of her beloved girlfriend.

[From [url=https://inyssa.itch.io/blunt-soul-trauma]itch.io[/url]]

title: meat girl
description:
Your roommate went missing several months ago.

You finally gain a conscience and go look for her.

You find a strange girl in the woods.

[From [url=https://ophanimkei.itch.io/meat-girl]itch.io[/url]]

title: Disiecta Membra
description:
“My first memories of church are ones that I will always hold close to my heart. My brother tenderly takes my hands in his own as he recites words from an old leather-bound book as I stare at a statue of a woman gingerly clutching a baby in her arms. He stands with me reciting verses on loving thy neighbor, and always doing the right thing…”

“Even if you get nothing in return...”

Disiecta Membra is a horror visual novel where you play as Jadwiga Dunajska, an angelic soldier who's found injured and alone by a mysterious traveler who agrees to help her find her way back to her unit. But his help comes with a price.

[From [url=https://sacredveins.itch.io/disiectamembra]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Art Building
description:
Art Building is about Matthew and Andy trying to escape the art building.

[From [url=https://thetadog.itch.io/art-building]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Come Rain or Shine
description:
When Rayne’s car broke down, switching to public transit led to an unexpected encounter at a quiet bus stop. Amidst the storm, a stranger’s voice cuts through the rain—warm, gentle, and unexpected. 

Rayne’s heart beats louder than the downpour.

Take on the role of Rayne and explore a story of fleeting moments, heartfelt connections, and the warmth that lingers—[i]come rain or shine[/i].

[From [url=https://plennty.itch.io/come-rain-or-shine]itch.io[/url]]

You awaken in the middle of the night. Your entire body aches and you're freezing. The shadows of the room seem darker than usual and you swear you saw something move in the corner. This has become routine for Levi. Trapped in his house by chronic illness and stuck in the town of Blackthorn; a remote town plagued by a witch. To top it all off, a series of disturbing letters sent to his sister have driven him to take action once and for all. Levi is determined to live a quiet, happy life with his family. But it may not be that simple...

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3236040/]Steam[/url]]
title: Blackthorn Witch

description:
Voronica is out of jail (for eating people) and looking for employment that makes use of her skills (eating people) and passions (eating people).

Help her to stay employed and out of jail by carefully weighing her options, developing her stats, and, above all, keeping her well fed at all times!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2480830/Voronica_Goes_to_Town_a_Vore_Adventure/]Steam[/url]]
title: Voronica Goes to Town: a Vore Adventure
Taboo Request
description: The game focuses mainly on the story. It’s more realistic than my other games because here you can see consequences\thoughts on both sides. I think that after Incest Story and Milf's Control that was a good idea to create something different at least once. The mom looks like milf not like adult teenager as usual. The game is enough for about 1-2 hours and has more than 180 images.​

A short story that turns everyday tasks into journeys. Can you be the voice that doesn’t let her down?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3317880/]Steam[/url]]
title: Intrusive Thoughts
STERILE
description:
Follow five kids in their quest to not die!

title: Pick My Heart
Ore dake ni Kashizuku Haramaid-tachi ~Seishi o Musaboru Gonin no Yokushin Onna~
description:
The protagonist is a male student attending school. He has a twisted personality, no friends, and is disliked by both men and women.
Living alone with his mother, he leads a harsh life with no hope for the future, spending his days in gloom.
However, one day, his life changes completely. On his way home, a luxurious limousine suddenly stops in front of him, and an unknown beautiful woman accompanied by men in black suits appears and says:

Woman: "I have come to pick you up, 'Seedbearer'."

The women forcefully take the bewildered protagonist to a certain mansion.
The beautiful woman, "Kousaka Iyo," reveals a shocking truth to the confused protagonist. This place is the private residence of the famous company "Tenkuin Shoji"'s president, and that president, "Yoichiro Tenkuin," is the protagonist's real father. His mother was once a maid in the Tenkuin household, got pregnant by Yoichiro, and was ordered to abort to avoid future troubles, but she refused and disappeared from the mansion. Thus, the protagonist was born. He was astounded as he had never been told about his father.
Moreover, the reason for bringing him here is explained. Successors to the president have met with misfortune one after another, leaving no one to carry on the family blood. Yoichiro, being elderly, can no longer have new heirs.
Therefore, they have chosen the protagonist, even though he is an illegitimate child, as he shares the same blood.

Protagonist: "So, you want me to become the successor...?"
Iyo: "No, not at all. Our company's AI, 'Demeter (Goddess of Fertility),' predicts that if you become the successor, the group would collapse in no time."
Protagonist: "Huh...!? Then what should I do?"
Iyo: "We want you to produce an heir."

In this mansion, there are maids prepared for the protagonist, and they are to bear his children to create an heir. Each maid has her own compelling circumstances and is strictly ordered to comply with the protagonist's commands.

Iyo: "If you have children with them, an excellent heir will be born, and the group will prosper even more... according to Demeter's predictions."
Iyo: "I recommend you follow the predictions and embrace them."

While being treated like a stud isn't something he likes, with the opportunity to do whatever he wants with beautiful women... there's no reason to let this chance go to waste.
Thus, the protagonist, who had lived in the shadows until now, fully utilizes his accidentally acquired position to enjoy a deprived life of impregnating sex with the maids.

Translated from https://www.guilty-soft.com/product/harameido/#story

title: The Veil of Ravenstadt
description:
Elea Volterr, Nicolas Avenier, Sorin Avenier, and Levian Siegfried were closer than family. Growing up in a small mountain village, they spent their days exploring hidden paths, sharing dreams, and imagining what lay beyond the village’s unseen borders. Life felt simple, safe, and full of possibilities.

But everything changed the night Levian’s parents were killed.

The village offered no answers, only silence. Levian, overwhelmed with grief, began to question the strange curfews said to protect them. Why did the village enforce such rigid curfews? His sorrow turned into anger and threatened to tear their group apart. 

Sorin tried to hold the group together, stepping into the role of protector. He shielded his brother Nicolas while helping Levian carry the weight of his loss. But cracks were forming, and Elea could feel them growing wider.

She admired Sorin’s strength, but her heart ached for Levian’s pain and Nicolas’s distance. The village’s secrets loomed over them like a shadow, and Elea couldn’t shake the feeling that something terrible was coming.

The once-bright days of their youth were fading, replaced by whispers of danger. And the truth, whatever it was, felt closer than ever—waiting just beyond.

title: Simple Moments

description:
After learning of her sister's death in a tragic accident, Lucilia Willowswood embarks for the remote town of Leadwood, far from her home, deep within The American Sea. Here she finds herself drawn into a world of crime, danger and mystery...

[From [url=https://digital-poppy.itch.io/leadwood]itch.io[/url]]
title: Leadwood
CRUSH!!!
description:
"This weird girl came up to me and says she loves me, but I don't think I've ever seen her before?"

Where did she come from? Why you? All she says is that she’s been watching you for a long time, learning everything about you. She’s built her entire world around you, and now, she’s finally ready to reveal herself. Or rather… to let you see what she’s always known: You belong to her.


Features:
Psychological Thriller Romance: A dark, unsettling story where desire and danger collide.🔥

Interactive Choices: Immersive, unsettling interactions that blur the line between game and reality. 💻

Multiple Endings: Will you resist or fall deeper in love with her too? 💕

title: Lunar Tears
description:
You follow the journey of Atlas, a man striving for justice in an apocalyptic future where Werewolves have taken over as the dominant species; With these monsters only keeping humans alive due to the possibility of them becoming destined soulmates.  Atlas must choose whether to fight for justice or for love, each path demanding its own sacrifices. 

[From [url=https://aster08.itch.io/lunar-tears]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Poslesvechenie:Remaster
description:
Our hero is an ordinary teenager, enjoying his shift at the camp. He didn't know that this was his last shift before the inevitable – "So. A lot. Deaths"
But don't be afraid of death. She is... unavoidable. This is the price of a lifetime; sooner or later, everyone pays it back... no one wants to pay early, right? Our main character will have to survive in the harsh and unexpected conditions of a post-apocalyptic world.

What will become of the camp that is left alone? He's cut off from the rest of the world... He is in a "nuclear cauldron"
Food supplies will last for several weeks: there is no clean water, communication, they will have to get out of this disaster... Or die. This is a perfect new world, not the one we are used to. He's completely burned out, ruined, hungry, and exhausted.
What happened, happened. Or not? I think it's better to look to the future. Life is only a momentary shadow, isn't it?
It's closer to you... ration? Emotions? You listen to the mind... or the heart? There is no correct answer. Sometimes one is better, sometimes the other. Let me give you some advice... "Above all: faithful... be yourself.""

An unprecedented catastrophe enveloped young souls who were not lucky enough to find themselves in a series of tests for their survival. Constant pain, their aspirations for life. Suffering that they will have to get used to. Anxiety that has become a part of their lives. Too much testing, isn't it? Our heroes, having managed to pass the first level, will be forced to endure and overcome the nuclear ash that has settled on their shoulders. But they weren't the only ones who survived, were they? There is only their faithful companion, who has become a potential salvation - this is a steam locomotive. The locomotive that gave hope to the surviving pioneers. But survival in the scorched earth is only part of what they will experience. Hope is what will guide them.
One by one... their lights... they will go off if you don't find a way to save them. Trapped in the abyss. Will you find a way to escape? Or will you disappear into the darkness forever?
title: Poslesvechenie 2: Pustye granicy

description:
And did that story end so well? About the young guys who were forgotten in the pioneer camp during the general evacuation on the eve of a nuclear war?

No, it doesn't happen that way…

Afterglow Legacy-the ideological heir to the original modification of Afterglow Remastered, but in the author's vision - more gloomy, evil and cruel.
title: Poslesvechenie: Nasledie

description:
This story takes place in a remote village in a distant land. Mountains surround the village, their snowy peaks forming a natural barrier, and a thick blanket of snow covers everything. But it isn’t the snow or the isolation that makes this village unique.

A young man living in this village is a monk entrusted with numerous responsibilities. He has a deep love for exploration and adventure, but his duties prevent him from pursuing these dreams. Over time, this conflict causes him to question himself and the purpose of his obligations.

Until one day, an event occurs that completely changes his life...

title: Barrel of Time

description:
"hey, so i'm gonna be in duluth this thursday"
"got this cabin a few miles out, gonna crash there after the gig"
"wanna meet up after?"

21 year old Ben Tackett rides shotgun in Matty Ackerman's minivan.

They're driving to a remote lakeside cabin for a night of intimacy; planned over the past week via texts.

Ben is a lonely yet perceptive small town chipmunk who is finally comfortable with his sexuality.

Matty is an extroverted, witty black bear from the Twin Cities.

He's also the vocalist and rhythm guitarist in a hardcore band that Ben is a fan of.

They can't wait to finally spend time together in person.

They even brought all their personal baggage along.

They don't realize it.

WALLS is a short, small-scale story about love, the mistakes we make and the people we push away when we seek it, as well as the importance of taking responsibility for yourself.

[From [url=https://sagedeer.itch.io/walls]Itch.io[/url]]
title: WALLS

description:

Will she keep her sanity intact while discovering the truth?

description:

After five long years, two lords of the northern lands use a celebration to reunite as lovers for what should be several days uninterrupted, and behind the secrecy of castle walls. One would hope that, away from the pressures of society, the two would find peace and fully enjoy one another's presence. However, the memories of war, and fear of what's to come threaten to sour their union...

title: The Creature in My House
Hervé
description:
In this gay furry visual novel, you will meet for the first time in real life, your old bear friend Hervé, living in the Alps in France. 

You just finished college, and still figuring out what to do. But you hope this little Christmas holiday will bring something new in your life.
Despite the large age gap between you two, Hervé has always been there to help you out during college on Discord. He's a bit like a mentor, the strong figure always there. 

It will be your choice to decide whether you want this odd relationship to bloom, or maybe pursing your career?

[From [url=https://sourou.itch.io/herve]Itch.io[/url]]

Picnic Season Studio is back at it with another state of the art, major motion interactive picture (aka a Hallmark movie): I Fell In Love With a Mailman!

Set in the RADICAL 1980s with the rise of the claw machine industry, play as a girl boss big city girl who's grappling with the realization that her successful corporate life might not be as fulfilling as she imagined. Return home for the holidays and discover a new side of yourself: will you win a prize in the game of love, or is romance simply a rigged game of chance?

Experience the premier dating simulator & claw machine gameplay that ensues in I fell In Love With a Mailman.

[From [url=https://mysmee.itch.io/i-fell-in-love-with-a-mailman]itch.io[/url]]
title: I Fell in Love with a Mailman
