You are a knight. He is a baron. He is a priest.

Can I make it any more obvious?

[From [url=https://vyeriosaki.itch.io/bearony]Itch.io[/url]]

Vicki is sentenced to a winter's worth of community service for a town of sleepy bears. This city fox must learn how to exist in small town life while paying off her debt to society.

[From [url=https://danji-isthmus.itch.io/the-fox-in-sleepy-creek]Itch.io[/url]]
title: The Fox in Sleepy Creek

description:
Soldiers, aristocrats and alchemists. These are men you would never see in modern Japan. 

Shiori is about to have a “love affair” with one of these men.  Shiori, who is active in the track team, has a best friend, Yua. Yua is a childhood friend who belongs to the cheerleading club at the same school. 

When Yua loses contact during the summer vacation, Shiori worries about her, but when the second semester starts, she finds out that she has been involved in compensated dating.

When Shiori expresses her indignation, she hears an unbelievable story from Yua mouth. Yua had been doing compensated dating in a "different world". Shiori still not believing the story is shown by Yua the door that leads to the other world.

[From [url=https://nexton-net.jp/ms-toybox/darkmew/mew005/]official site[/url]]
title: Isekai Enkou - After
Lanú
description:
Layla is trapped in a tiny village in Las Hurdes. There's no one to turn to, no one to understand her, and no one to help her escape. Thankfully, there's a small glimmer of hope to her painfully dull life: her best friend and occult enthusiast, Guadalupe, whom she's in love with.

But it's not easy to confess your love. And it's not going to get any easier when Layla's life turns for the stranger the night she meets a girl who seems to be the Devil herself... and their lives get intertwined.

Now Layla's got more secrets to keep. And as they pile, and pile, time is running out. If she doesn't let it all out... it might be over for her.

[From [url=https://swirly-glasses-games.itch.io/lanu]itch.io[/url]]

Tsukimiya Minami is just an ordinary convenience store worker trying to make ends meet—another day, another dollar. But things take an unexpected turn during a late-night shift when she encounters a mysterious stranger in need of help. Against her better judgment, Minami offers her a place to stay. Little does she know her new and annoying (yet surprisingly captivating) roommate is more than meets the eye (and ear) with a plate full of troubles. Yet, Minami can’t seem to resist lending a hand. As Minami gains a new temporary roommate, she soon also ends up gaining something else unexpectedly… find out by playing through The Moon That Fell For The Star!

[Edited from [url=https://teamanpim.itch.io/the-moon-that-fell-for-the-star]Itch.io[/url]]
title: The Moon That Fell For The Star

description:
Suffocated and stifled in their small town's religiosity and ever-watching eyes, Ther desperately desires to escape Angelwood. Ronin provides them with a solution.

How do you escape a small town that has undone your body?

Murder its skin and its filth.

[From [url=https://rosesrot.itch.io/gluttony-gods]itch.io[/url]]
title: Gluttony Gods

description:
A reward tournament is planned in the town, and the young demoness needs money. But even more, she wants to win the heart of a cute fairy elf, who, it seems, is ready to reciprocate her!..

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3289280/]Steam[/url]]
title: Lady's Tourney
Polar Opposites
description:
A story about an unlikely pair overcoming themselves and adversity to acheive the impossible.

[From [url=https://jmjerbear.itch.io/polar-opposites]Itch.io[/url]]

title: McMurdo
description:
McMurdo is a linear furry visual novel featuring themes of romance, drama, and NovemBEAR. Step into the webbed feet of kitchen hand Oliver Pirc as he and his McMurdo Station teammates take on the undefeated Scott Base Kiwis in the most heated sledge race of the century.

"FUCK YEAH!"

Marshal claps his paw into Linus's and pulls him into a bear bro hug.

I fall to my knees and spit in the snow. I grab a handful and smush it against my face. Into my feathers. Into my beak. Into my eyes. 

Cold, wet snow. Hot, sweaty skin.

"Good race, you guys. You deserve it."

"Thanks. You really gave us a run for our money. Goddamn."

"Give them Kiwis hell for us, mmkay?"

"You bet."

I open my eyes. I'm panting hard. Natasha holds a paw out to me.

"You all right?"

I take it, and she lift me up. A slick of melted snow chills my neck.

"I'm fine. Just pushing myself, you know?"

She smiles. 

Marshal turns our way. A big smile and bigger outstretched arms.

He catches me. Lifts me. Squeezes me. 

Snow flies from my feathers, and I'm not so cold anymore.

[From [url=https://kraajlanding.itch.io/mcmurdo]Itch.io[/url]]

What if the red thread of destiny was visible?
But it's only visible when the connected people touch.
Would that be a good thing, or not?

In this short story we explore one of these connections.

[From [url=https://bazcus.itch.io/on-a-string]Itch.io[/url]]
title: On a String
Help Me Date Your Dad!
description:
On this day, I find myself returning to a place with many memories, both good and bad.

There, in that old house, is someone very important to me, someone who has sacrificed so much for my happiness.

Now it is my turn, to return their kindness, to save them.

Wait for me.

[From [url=https://imrikun.itch.io/hmdyd]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Made with Honey
description:
After talking about needing a new job, Wes takes up a job to be taste testing new honey products at the company his crush works at. Despite what the job might bring him, he can't stop thinking about maybe getting closer to his crush during that time. Follow Wes as his simple job turns into a sweet new experience...

[From [url=https://hollow-soul-stories.itch.io/made-with-honey]Itch.io[/url]]

Work as a freelance photographer can be a challenge, especially when your assignment involves helping an enthusiastic bear chase after a 40-metre-tall monster. He’s convinced he’s got a solution to help people live in harmony with the giant beasts that menace their homes. You’re just hoping you can make it home without getting stepped on.

[From [url=https://curiouscritters.itch.io/big-steps]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Big Steps
Every Date Has Its Progs And Cons
description:
Billy is a bull working as a receptionist in a local hospital. All he wants in life is a boyfriend, but there doesn't seem to be anyone who meets his standards. One day, he decides to date a newly-out middle-aged patient his friend is working with. Considering the vast differences in their values and beliefs, could these two find an unexpected spark they'd been missing all their lives?

[From [url=https://chellaytiger.itch.io/every-date-has-its-progs-and-cons]Itch.io[/url]]

A grieving bear is taking a short stay at an old fishing cabin, hoping to reel in one final trout during a winter holiday. In his despondent isolation, however, he meets someone new who may rekindle that spark he's been looking for.
Will he get his colors back, or will his world stay faded and gray?

[From [url=https://gruntsteel.itch.io/end-of-the-line]Itch.io[/url]]
title: End of the Line
Since November
description:
What are you doing with your time on Earth?

Are you happy?

Stay inside.

We have pizza.

[From [url=https://keithballard.itch.io/since-november]Itch.io[/url]]

Step into the eerie world of Spectral , a gripping adventure where foster brothers Sam Wesson and Dean Smith find themselves drawn to the infamous Vandertunt Mansion. The mysterious estate, steeped in dark legends and chilling ghost stories, becomes the centerpiece of their latest investigation. As the duo, you'll unravel cryptic clues, navigate ominous halls, and face malevolent spirits lurking in the shadows.

Your choices shape their journey—will they emerge victorious, or will the mansion claim them as its next victims? Spectral combines immersive storytelling, rich character dynamics, and pulse-pounding suspense, making every decision crucial. Dive deep into the lore, confront the unknown, and decide the brothers' fate in this unforgettable haunted house adventure.

[From [url=https://mystery-zone-games.itch.io/spectral]Itch.io[/url]]
title: spectral
Ports and Plugs
description:
Nico and Carter are a husband and husband freelance IT and electrical services company. They just got a job. A completely normal job. Do some wiring, set up some networking. Is the job at a sex club? Sure.

[From [url=https://vampigeon.itch.io/portsandplugs]Itch.io[/url]]

The protagonist, who thought he had been studying for the exam all night, was shocked when he woke up in the morning. It was the day of the exam that would determine his fate, but he hadn't studied at all. 

When he wished for time to stop for at least an hour, a girl called the Goddess of Time appeared before him. The goddess smiled and said to the protagonist, "Congratulations!" 

This is the story of three different people who met the Goddess of Time and changed their destinies.
title: Kuro no Kuronosu
Bet on Serendipity
description:
A romantic WLW kinetic novel about Seren, a budding artist, and Aoife a cosplayer who "happens" to attend the same convention.  

Unable to believe her luck Seren can't find the nerve to ask the important questions and take a chance on a new relationship. 

But when you're standing next to a Lvl 10 goddess, can this sweaty lesbian really put all her bets on Aoife? 

[From [url=https://atashums.itch.io/bet-on-serendipity]itch.io[/url]]

Once upon a time Kiyomi lived quietly alone in her derelict forest shine, but those days are long over. Now Cecilia and her knight retainer Char have become a permanent fixture in her life despite the rocky first encounter. Where once there was just the whistling of the trees now there is chatter and laughter. Kiyomi can no longer imagine a world without Cecilia next to her.


Yet when Cecilia announces she will not be visiting for a while due to the arrival of a foreign envoy, Kiyomi is overcome with emotions she does not understand. As the days without Cecilia drag on the longing only grows strong and Kiyomi is confused as to what she really wants from Cecilia. 


Can she sort out her feelings for Cecilia and find the meaning behind her desires? 

[From [url=https://pallas-raven.itch.io/quiet-moment-for-two]itch.io[/url]]
title: Quiet Moment For Two
Namaiki na Kyonyuu Gyaru to Seikoui Jisshuu!? ~Jitsu wa Shojo Nante Ienai shi~

description:
My family consists of my parents, my sister and her husband, we are all close to each other and live under one roof.

However, after failing the job hunt and becoming unemployed, I was no longer part of the happy family I was once part of. One day, my mother, worried about me, comes to visit me in my room.

"Mother will do anything if it will help you get better!"
"Then help me get off then!"

I was just saying those words out of annoyance. I started to have physical relations with my mother. Eventually, my sister found out about the relationship and...

"Why won't you stop? It's going to destroy our family."
"Then, why don't you take over then!?"
"Just once! I'll take her place for today! Then everything will be good again, right?"

Thus began an illicit affair masked under the guise of a happy family.

[From [url=https://www.appetite-game.com/apt273/apt273.html#link_character]official site[/url]]
title: Haha to Ane to no Himitsu no Kazoku Kankei ~Midara na Omoi ni Oboreru Kairaku~
Natsu no Sagashimono
description:
Summer vacation is finally here! Our story follows Natsu, a timid, effeminate young man who embarks on a family trip to the countryside to visit his aunt Misaki. But just as everyone's getting settled in, a mix-up at his father's workplace forces Natsu's parents to hop right back in the car and drive home, leaving him to spend the remainder of his summer break out in the sticks. Misaki is more than happy to take him in, of course, and so begins a peaceful, relaxing few weeks where absolutely nothing out of the ordinary threatens to disturb his tranquil everyday routine... Bwahahaha, as if!

It isn't long before a self-proclaimed magical girl named Chitose worms her way into Natsu's life, but her boisterous intrusion is the least of his problems. An eccentric candy seller, an insecure wanna-be teacher, a pink-haired loudmouth... Not to mention, his aunt's strange behavior around the topic of the outdoors. Surrounded by misfits, it soon becomes apparent that Natsu's real summer homework is to learn more about the women around him and help them with their problems. And yet, with only 30 days until his parents pick him up, is this one assignment he's fated to flunk, or will he pass with flying colors?

(Steam)

title: QPrey 2: House Arrest
description: After surviving the incidents at the lake house, Tom and Claudia face unwarranted punishment for a crime they didn't commit. Confined within the familiar walls of the place he knows, Tom must harness his newfound, unexpected ability to unveil the truth and protect his loved ones, all while being under the watchful eyes of an even bigger monster.​

It's your summer break right in the middle of summer heat.
You are alone in your apartment, bored with too much time in your hand.
Then, you received a phone call.
「We'll be going for a trip. Can you come over and look after Hazuki during the summer?」
Your childhood friend Hazuki lives in a relaxing countryside surrounded by nature.
It's probably healthier for you to stay here rather than your apartment in the hot and humid city.
You hurry to prepare yourself for a trip to the countryside.
[From https://store.steampowered.com/app/1508570/SummerLife_in_the_Countryside/]
title: SUMMER -Inaka no Seikatsu-

aliases: Captured Dark Elf: Lod*ss War Heroine Assault Collection II
title: Toraware no Dark Elf ~Lod*ss War Heroine Assault Collection  II~
Aisai x Revenge Porn ~Seiso na Tsuma ni Kakusareta Otto no Shiranai Midara na Kako~
Hungry Neighbors
description:
Turning away from the stress of the big city, you set sail for Horizon Island, a place far from civilisation, where a small community of residents live a simple life in tune with nature. As their new chef, you will ensure that everyone gets fed. It's not so bad.

Not when there's enough food to go around, at least.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3301310/Hungry_Neighbors/]Steam[/url]]

An unusual case calls for an unusual detective.

MEMORALYSIS is a murder mystery visual novel with point and click elements that follows the psychic detective Philon Delancy to a strange seaside town to solve the murder of one of its most notable public figures. What starts as a routine house call quickly reveals a tangle of messy relationships, local superstitions, and past unsolved mysteries— and at the center of it all is the victim’s enigmatic niece, Celosia James.

He’s not one to balk at whisperings of the occult. How could he, when the greatest tool at his disposal is the ability to catch glimpses of his suspects’ memories? But surely the rumors about the young heiress have been greatly exaggerated. After all, everyone knows demonic possession isn’t real.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3299990/MEMORALYSIS_The_Scorched_Home/]Steam[/url]]
title: MEMORALYSIS: The Scorched Home
NO DOGS UNDER HEAVEN
description:
You play the role of MALA SESTRA, a girl raised in a... "religious organization..." on a retreat to a convent in the mountains to learn cloistered life in the wake of a terrible trauma, who learns that being a Sister isn't anything like she ever imagined.

[From [url=https://doggiewoggiez.itch.io/no-dogs-under-heaven]itch.io[/url]]

title: Coffee, Snow, and You
description:
On December 31st, life in the big city changes. The air is filled with the anticipation of celebration and wonder, so even going to a job you don’t like doesn’t seem that bad.

The main character is a guy named Tom, a barista at a shopping mall. His shift falls on December 31st, so he makes coffee and watches the world dive into the New Year's hustle and bustle.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3376570/]Steam[/url]]

title: Purple
description:
Pink and Blue, both trans and gay as heck, have been chatting online for months. Can they get to know each other even better? Confess their feelings? Maybe even finally close the virtual gap between them? There's only one way to find out...

[From [url=https://snittenstudios.itch.io/purple]itch.io[/url]]

title: Pillow talk while the world goes mad.
Wanwan Aijou Monogatari
description: A little girl and the puppy she just got for her birthday have to go to a fantasy world and save it from evil vegetables. This game for the Casio Loopy can be best described as a kinetic novel  that occasionally makes you play a mini-game or solve a puzzle to progress the story.

title: Golodnyj gorod
description:
You're a young vampire with bad luck. Most of your kin are endowed with inhuman beauty and charm. You drew the short straw, losing your human form. With your new appearance, you are an outcast among humans and your kind. But the skills you acquired while still alive ensure your dignified existence in society.

It's been ayear since you've heard from your mentor. But suddenly you receive a message that sets in motion a series of strange, confusing events involving a confrontation between two vampire clans.
Finding yourself between two fires, it's up to you to sort through the chaos, choose a side or stay true to yourself, and most importantly, survive in this Hungry Town!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2481160/]Steam[/url]]

title: She Was Swallowed By The Sun
description:
[i]Grief, death, and hate fill your veins. Let your girlfriend exsanguinate you.[/i]

description:
''Kafka's Metamorphosis' is an emotional short-form story game based on the life of Czech writer Franz Kafka and his most famous novella, 'The Metamorphosis'. The game is set in the fall of 1912 when Kafka wrote The Metamorphosis. It captures Kafka's struggle to live as a writer while being pressured to fulfill roles as a young man, employee, and eldest son. The game aims to explore and express why Kafka wrote The Metamorphosis.

The feeling of being insignificant or treated as such under pressure is something we face today, as well as what Kafka and countless others experienced in 1912. Discover how Kafka, both as a human and as a writer, made his choices and wrote his stories in Kafka's Metamorphosis.

You immediately discard it, for it is so disgusting it makes you nauseous. “No, definitely not.” And yet it doesn’t leave, waiting in your psyche’s deepest parts, watching closely. A safety rope from torment of anxiety and harsh reality can be found in virtual heaven, where you can forget about everything and dive into a new world hiding dozens of mysteries. No need to hesitate – you are a guest of honor here.

Join Luke in his journey to Nyctora City where he meets his girlfriend Alice and a whole cast of different characters. Luke will get entangled in a whole bunch of different hot scenarios which will test his resolve. Will he stay the pure hearted soul that he is, or will he surrender himself to corruption?

Dive into the visually stunning world of "Sofia's Dark Fantasies," a captivating adult visual novel where protagonist Sofia embarks on a journey to explore her deepest desires. This narrative isn’t just a feast for the eyes but also delves deeply into the complexities of passion and longing. Witness Sofia's transformation as she decides to adopt a bold new look—blonde hair and a sun-kissed tan, changes spurred by her daring decision to install the mysterious Veil App.

Each scene is crafted to perfection, ensuring an immersive experience as Sofia navigates through her fantasies with elegance and allure. Whether uncovering hidden aspects of her personality or intertwining with intriguing characters, Sofia looks incredible every step of the way. Join her as she unravels the threads of desire in a narrative that’s as visually stunning as it is emotionally engaging.

As the forest becomes their sanctuary and their prison, they must confront the passions that threaten to consume them and the secrets that could shatter everything they hold dear.

Love Live! ~After School Ends~
description: It's the last week of the semester at Uranohoshi Girls’ High School and EVERYBODY's graduating when the weeks up! Yeah, everybody, even Nico. It doesn't matter what school year you were in either, it's been decided that EVERYONE attending Uranohoshi will be graduating, even if they're a first year! To celebrate, the school has been invited on a senior trip to Idol City, but some suspect there's more to the sudden vacation than Miku and Mono are letting on. With only a week to prepare for their future after school ends, how will The Chikafag and Chika spend their final week as students?

title: The Mysterious Thief, Forget Me Not
description:
Dazzling phantom thief heists, romantic meetings in the dead of night, and making a name for yourself; The Mysterious Thief, Forget Me Not is a mostly linear visual novel that features multiple POVs throughout. 

The story is set in the fictional city of Twinbells, England, and shows how the lives of our four main characters are changed forever when a ballet company — and its treasured jewel — visits the phantom thief-loving city. 

[From [url=https://solarprotagonist.itch.io/forget-me-not]itch.io[/url]]

title: Trek to Dead Water
description:
Your life as an alchemist has been safe and comfortable so far... but when your sister makes you one last wish before passing away, you'll embark on a dangerous journey that might change your life—and the lives of your two companions—forever.

YOUR SISTER HAS CARRIED the mantle of "Peregrine" for more than two decades. Twelve years older than you, she saw and wrote about the lives of common people, the birth and fall of foreign noble houses, the discovery of plants and animals, and the complex politics of your home kingdom. She lived a life of dangers and excitement, of travels, passions, and experiences you can't even begin to imagine.

And now that she's dead, this mantle (and her newborn child) is yours. 

Ghosts, zombies, fantastic animals, arcanes, and criminals. Fool the monster hunting you, the bandits trying to kidnap you, and your own fears while you travel from South Safira to the very heart of Dead Water.

Thank Goddess, you won't be alone. But with a conniving liar at your left and a deluded "Knight" at your right, will you be able to fulfill your sister's last wish? Will you go back to your niece? And will you allow yourself to love for the first time?

Develop your personality, see how your choices build, and change your bond with Yulie and Tobias (and yourself).

Hopefully, you'll also learn to see the world in a new light after this Trek to Dead Water.

[From [url=https://ligianunes.itch.io/trek-to-dead-water]itch.io[/url]]

title: WINTER
description:
There's something about yourself that you can't live with. Some part you think abhorrent, to be hidden away from sight.

It's not a good absence.

You've told yourself you feel better. But you don't really believe that, do you?

-

WINTER is an interactive fiction about sex, trans insecurity, and a girl with a skull for a face.

description:
Nate is just another college student trying to balance his studies with the pressures of adulthood. Faced with mounting bills and a dwindling bank account, he begins his search for a job, eventually landing at a quirky and vibrant cosplay store. 

The store is a haven for those passionate about costumes and creativity, and it’s here that Nate encounters Dia—a stunning cosplayer with a personality as colorful as her outfits. As Nate settles into his new role, he and Dia embark on a thrilling and passionate relationship, where boundaries blur, and fantasies become reality.

Monster Lover 2: Ambrosilas
description:
He's a Failure of a Yakuza. He's an Arcane Murder Genie - Can They Find Love?

Our main character (you name him) has been a screw-up his entire life.  That's what led him to his life of crime.  His screw-ups now have higher stakes, and that's where the demon Ambrosilas comes in.  Can this sexy murder genie get him out of his latest life or death blunder?

Ambrosilas has one mission: kill bad people to make the world a better place.  He's not about to be the puppet of a worthless criminal!  

The rules are set in stone:  Give him someone worthy of death to kill or he kills the one who summoned him.  But what does our main character do when his target isn't worthy of death?  He really didn't think this through...as per usual.

He needs Ambrosila's help if he wants to stay alive, but the demon isn't going out of his way for a criminal.  

"But you said I was at least nice to look at?"

It's true, his criminal master is a handsome mortal, and the more he gets to know him the more he realizes he might not be so worthless after all.  Perhaps he can help him...for a price.

Our main character is surprised at how attracted he is to Ambrosilas. He's got no one else to turn to...and he doesn't mind when he's pulled into the demon's arms.

Step into a world of forbidden desire in Cuckolded – where boundaries blur, and temptation becomes irresistible.

After missing your brother’s wedding due to grad school in Europe, you finally visit him and his stunning new wife. But things aren’t quite what they seem. As you get closer to your sister-in-law, you realize there’s trouble in their bedroom—and she’s looking to you for more than just advice. Torn between family loyalty and the allure of her advances, you’ll explore the thrill of taboo relationships and hidden desires.

With realistic visuals and a playful, intimate atmosphere, Cuckolded invites you to dive deep into a provocative world where the lines between right and wrong are never clear. As you navigate complex emotions and steamy encounters, the decisions you make will shape the story—and your role in this unforgettable dynamic.

Ready to embrace temptation and see where it leads? In Cuckolded, what happens next is entirely up to you.

description:
Congratulations on saving the world! Now its time to get a job!

Defeating the fallen angel Mastema means nothing when your social skills and charisma are as low as Viri's. After all, saving the world isn't something you can put in a resume. Still, despite all odds, Viri has at last managed to get a job as Jr. engineer at the Tether House Electronics factory. Whether she will be able to keep the job is a different matter altogether.

Follow Viri as she gets used to a 12 hour work day, meets her coworkers, tries to form new friendships, and avoid doing something stupid that will get her fired.

But an awkward handshake might be the least of Viri's worries. Many mysteries abound in the factory and Viri will become involved in them whether she likes it or not. In Tether, things are not always what they seem,  or worse, they are EXACTLY as they seem.

description:
Step into the shoes of an overworked café barista whose life takes an unexpected turn in My Beeloved! Tired of dealing with dreadful customers who make your days miserable, you decide to spice up your life with a blind date. But it’s not what you would expect…

In this absurdly romantic and hilariously dark dating sim, you'll navigate the quirks and charms of your unexpected insect lover. Enjoy a rollercoaster of emotions with dark humor, raunchy jokes, and steamy encounters that will leave you buzzing with excitement. From the daily grind at the cafe to the intimate moments, every choice you make will shape your story.

Earn Buzzies by making decisions that delight your lover. These points are your key to unlocking good endings and special saucy full-sized images that reveal the more intimate side of your relationship.

Whether you're sharing sweet moments or diving into the raunchy, absurd depths of your romance, My Beeloved offers a unique experience filled with laughter, love, and a touch of honey. Get ready for a date that's as sweet as it is bizarre!

description:

For Elena, victory is more than just a trophy—it’s the key to maintaining her scholarship and social status in this prestigious environment.

The team is dedicated to perfecting their routines and securing their dominance, but behind the scenes, they grapple with internal power struggles, personal ambitions, and shifting dynamics that threaten to derail their path to the top.​

title: Fighting the Past
description:
You have just moved into your childhood friend Katie's house to start a new chapter of your life at Luxford University.

As you try to settle into the household with Katie's mother and livestreaming sister, you try to adapt to the newfound technologies you never had growing up on a farm, like social media, and especially the new Virtual Reality platform HoloVerse.

Just as you're starting to get comfortable, you are made aware of the shocking news that your father, who already spent years wrongfully imprisoned, is now facing the death penalty.

Realizing you're his only hope, you try to clear his name before this happens.

You will meet a variety of people that can and will help you on your journey, and some of them might even be interested in you in intimate ways - who knows?

Along the way, you get to make choices that will have an effect on your relationships with characters, so choose carefully as they might have lasting consequences.

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/deloreen/about]Patreon[/url]]

Kumitantei is an episodic adventure game with a twisting character-driven narrative, following sixteen eccentric Absolute Students who find themselves trapped in a deadly psychological experiment designed to chip away at their capacity for empathy. All the while, the class is goaded on to kill each other by a sadistic little two-faced cat who assumes the role of overseer.

You play as Himari Sanada, the sheepish Absolute Barista, who desires to overcome the unrelatability of her fellow participants and make friends, but is often instead forced to investigate and solve their grisly murders.

Play as Wint on her last year of school as you try to find her a date for the upcoming end of the year party! Despite being probably the last pick for a date, introduce Wint to would-be partners as you try to be the least awkward you can on your quest for true love.

JADS - Just Another Dating Simulator is a dating simulator where you take the role of a student in his last year of school. What does this warm story, full of clichés and decisions, have in store for you?

Manage your time: you decide what to do and when to do it (but be aware of the consequences).
Build bonds: Spend time with your colleagues and friends to strengthen relationships.
Gift system: identify the preferences of that special person and give them a good gift to strengthen relationships faster.
Study!: It's a school dating sim, after all.
Get ready for exam week: get good grades or you'll have to face the principal.

One Room -Yui Hanasaka Memorial-
description:
That pure love, that lovey-dovey moment again――
A brand-new project from the beloved short anime series "OneRoom" has begun!

Introducing "PROJECT OneLeaf," a completely new project where you can once again experience the story of the main heroine, Yui Hanasaka from the "OneRoom" series in an innovative animated novel game!

Yui Hanasaka is the only heroine to appear in all seasons of the "OneRoom" series. In the first season, she moves to Tokyo for her university entrance exams and meets the protagonist (you), who is her neighbor in the same apartment. Their bond grows as they spend special days together, and they eventually fall in love. In the second season, we follow their lives as university students and lovers. Though they argue and face insecurities, their relationship strengthens. In the third season, the couple faces a major turning point as they transition into working adults.

In this game, you can revisit the story from the second season and experience the third season's events.

Hanataba o Kimi ni Okurou -Kinsenka-
description:
"The human heart is but a vessel for pain."

That's what someone once whispered―a voice laced with loneliness, whispering directly into the soul. It's an indescribable sadness, a love just beginning to bloom. It becomes an invisible pain that pierces the heart. And that's what makes up life: a cyclical series of highs and lows.

Tachibana Sai was born without the ability to feel pain in his heart. He spends his days eliminating any seeds of malice that sneak up on his sister, the one person he treasures, without drawing attention to himself.

Sick of the never-ending monotony he lives through, he chances upon a meeting with Benio Matsuri, a young girl whose aloof demeanor resembles that of a beautifully crafted doll.

For the first time in his life, he encounters a heart-piercing sensation―that of falling in love.

On the edge between day and night, in a twilight world where the dead and living mingle, stands an apartment building called Maison sans Nom, which is home to a group of boys and girls.

A ruthless boy who knows no pain in his heart.
A lonely girl without any friends.
A friendly girl who struggles to make connections.
A prickly, ambitious girl who is keen to be of help.
A boy who loves his own cute self above anything else.
A mess of a woman who tries to solve everything through brute force.
And a boy with a tender heart who knows no pain in his body.

This ill-assorted group of residents, hands stained with blood from battling the supernatural Maledicts, shall encounter the hearts they never knew and begin nurturing their souls.

The human heart is but a vessel for pain.

To protect this pain akin to love... To gently break the world apart, piece by piece... Even if it means abandoning humanity. That's why the heart is but a vessel for pain.

For life blazes brilliantly, while the heart goes around in an endless cycle.

[From [url=https://hanakimi.frontwing.co.jp/en/#Story]Official website[/url]]

title: Hitozuma no Netori wa Anaru kara

description:
Lessons in Lust: A Xmas Spe is an emotionally intense exploration of desire, boundaries, and the forbidden dynamics that arise when unexpected guests stir simmering tensions. The story shifts as Veronica's younger sister, Victoria, a carefree and magnetic travel blogger, visits for Christmas, bringing her chaotic energy and stunning beauty into Tyler and Veronica's already delicate arrangement.

Tyler, a young and ambitious man navigating his first year of independence, has settled into Veronica's home, where her poised demeanor and maternal authority have become a source of fascination and conflict. Veronica, juggling her roles as Tyler's teacher, landlord, and protector, strives to maintain structure in their lives—but Victoria's arrival disrupts the balance.

Victoria's free-spirited charm and flirtatious nature immediately capture Tyler's attention, heightening his confusion and desire. Unlike her composed sister, Victoria thrives on spontaneity, teasing boundaries, and exposing hidden truths. Her presence not only stirs Tyler's fantasies but also tests Veronica's restraint, forcing her to confront emotions she's buried beneath her stoic exterior.

As snow falls and holiday festivities unfold, the tension in the household simmers to new heights. Secrets are revealed, desires are laid bare, and the delicate lines between propriety and passion begin to blur. With Christmas as the backdrop, the story explores the complexities of power dynamics, family bonds, and the consequences of temptation.

Lessons in Lust: A Xmas Special delves into forbidden attraction, sibling contrasts, and emotional turmoil, offering a holiday tale filled with desire, tension, and self-discovery.
title: Lessons in Lust - Xmas Special

description:
Akane, a wife who struggles with her confidence as a woman has been troubled by how her figure has worsened compared to the past.
Even when her husband, Yusuke, praises her, she finds it hard to believe him.

To help boost her confidence, Yusuke decides to post pictures of her on social media.
As Akane receives compliments, she gradually starts to regain her confidence.

As her self-esteem improves, her outfits become increasingly revealing.
Yusuke, meanwhile, finds himself excited by the idea of other men looking at his wife with lustful eyes.

Eventually, this escalates into posting provocative videos and live streams.
Akane, too, begins to feel more beautiful as she attracts more attention.
But for Yusuke, this isn’t enough.

What if his wife were to meet another man directly…?

This desire leads to the idea of "lending out" his beloved wife.
The candidates? Three carefully selected individuals from among her followers.

And then, he chooses the first man...
title: Boku ni Dakare Aegu Tsuma wa, Hoka no Otoko ni Dakareta Hanashi o Tsumugu 2 ~ Urei no Bokunyuu Tsuma wa Taninbou de Jishin to Nikuyoku o Takaburase, Etsuraku no Hana o Sakaseru~

description:
[b]Spend Your Summer Vacation in the World of Natsume’s Book of Friends[/b]

Become Takashi Natsume and move freely through the world of Natsume’s Book of Friends. The season is summer, and school is already out for vacation. Hang out with Nishimura, Kitamoto, and Tanuma, help out Touko, give advice to the youkai of The Dog’s Circle… and of course, do not forget your summer assignments. Enjoy summer to your heart’s content with Nyanko-Sensei and your friends.

[b]Beautiful and Nostalgic Scenery[/b]

The background art is handled by Ishigaki Production, which also worked on the anime. In addition to memorable scenes from the anime, there is plenty of background art that you will only see in the game. Players can freely explore a lovely town and interact with the characters from Natsume’s Book of Friends.

[b]An Original Story that Weaves Various Characters[/b]

A story of family, a story of friends, a story of youkai… In this game, you can enjoy a story that weaves together the various characters from Natsume’s Book of Friends. Who will you spend your time with in your limited span of one month…? That choice is yours to make. Please enjoy a wonderful summer vacation all your own.

[b]Fond and Nostalgic Memories[/b]

Each episode of Natsume’s Book of Friends tells a story that touches someone’s heart. As you progress through the scenario, events from seasons one to seven of the anime may be recalled. Look back on the journey so far through the lens of Takashi Natsume.

[via [url=https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/natsumes-book-of-friends-hazuki-no-shirushi-launches-june-5-2025-in-japan-for-switch-pc]Gematsu[/url]]

Asahi is a young man who was born and raised in the countryside. He moves to Tokyo, hoping to make a new life for himself, but he soon discovers that the big city isn't all it's cracked up to be. Asahi doesn't have much in the way of money, and he has to scrimp and save while working a low-paying job at a convenience store.

Asahi's co-worker, Nazuna, is unfailingly cold and rude, and as chilly winter sets in, Asahi begins to wonder whether he made a mistake in leaving home...

At least, until he meets the mysterious maid, Holly, and feelings between them begin to blossom.

Holly is Asahi's dream girl. She's kind, gentle, and affectionate (even if she is slightly taller than he is), but there's a catch. Holly isn't a human at all: she's a robot! Can Asahi's relationship with Holly flourish, or is it doomed to a critical failure?

title: YFE
The Nature of Magic
description:
Magic is dying.

With every passing generation, fewer and fewer are born with the Affinity.  Where once every human, elf, and orran could wield magic, now only half of those born to Eorþe's six Great Families develop the ability.  Outside the Families the percentage drops significantly.

And worse, a spate of suspicious deaths have left only two men with the Affinity alive, both among the Families: Cymhen Grym and Cyril Cenric.

Unknown to all but Cymhen, however, a third lives in secret, shunning the intrigue and exploitation of the Families.

You.

The Families are never denied for long, and a threat soon forces Cymhen's hand.  Your old mentor seeks you out and offers you a place with the Gryms.  In exchange for their protection, he asks that you aid him in his latest endeavor: to determine the cause of the dwindling number of those born with the Affinity.

Will you mend the wounds rent by your sudden disappearance five years ago?  Will you stay true to yourself under the weight of the Great Families?

Will you discover The Nature of Magic?

[From [url=https://sudo-nim.itch.io/the-nature-of-magic]itch.io[/url]]

Seven years have passed since the Koenji Girls' Academy soccer team won the international tournament. Yet again, the soccer club is on the verge of being discontinued.

With no other options you talk to them, using your last moments to reflect on the life that led you here; your family, your friends, your regrets, and whether your life was worth anything at all.

Tinfoil Coffin is a melancholic look at life, regret, and love through the lens of accepting your own mortality.

description:
An unknown energy “kinetic aura” was identified in Tokyo Bay. Through its technological diversion, modern Japan has grown overnight into an energy superpower.

There is Haruna Sagata, a crazy senior girl with whom he has a rotten relationship, and ......, an employee who is presumably a good tease and a dominant older sister. Rito feels a sense of fulfillment as he spends his days at the center of cutting-edge technology, being pushed around and squeezed, but also feeling a sense of not being satisfied.
　One day, however, Rito has a chance meeting with his estranged childhood friend, Anne Yumeoka. She is a highly popular member of an international idol group, but she is currently suspended due to certain suspicions.
　Even stranger, Anne's appearance is unrecognizable to others and only Rito seems to be able to see her. ......?

I made you black coffee, just like you like it. Now, let's talk.

Over a year has passed since asking too many murder-related questions online (for your [i]book[/i]) got you invited to a serial killer chatroom. Of course, you did what [i]any[/i] [s]in[/s]sane person would do and [s]called the police[/s] pretended to be a serial killer. For, uh… [s]hot singles in your server[/s] research purposes. 

Somehow, you got your [s]bad[/s] happy ending. You’re now a bestselling writer, desperately in love, and have come to think of the server as family - it's like a dream come true. Sure, most of them still think you are a serial killer, your boss needs you to write another hit ASAP and your one true love is [s]definitely[/s] [i]technically[/i] a murderer, but look on the bright side - it’s Christmas!

description:
You're the third son of Santa Claus, running your own tavern in the cozy town of Mistle Grove. When Morgan Strong - a tall, Jotunn businesswoman from Silverpine City - and Cedar Evergreen - a passionate Elven tree farmer - become your regulars, you quickly realize that in order for them to open their hearts, you must mix them the perfect drink! In doing so they might be able to find something more magical than the perfect drink: love.

[From [url=https://nameless-crab.itch.io/holiday-spirits]itch.io[/url]]

The Winter 20XX skiing competition is just around the corner, will you choose to pursue your smug, smooth talking best friend , or your hot headed rival with a peculiar interest? Either way romance will blossom, sparks will fly, and someone has to win that competition!

[From [url=https://harleorah.itch.io/red-run-romance]itch.io[/url]]
title: Red-Run Romance

description:
When an ill young woman returns to perfect health under mysterious circumstances, she must assemble her drifting friend group to enjoy a perfect day before time marches on.

[From [url=https://eeecee.itch.io/good-morning-morgan]itch.io[/url]]
title: Good Morning, Morgan
FROSTBOUND
description:
Step into the shoes of Cadence Daycott and come aboard the SS Nimbus. Being the daughter of a world-renowned detective comes with a perk:

You already know the captain is dead.

Three days ago you were locked in your cabin and no one will explain why. It might have something to do with the mysterious blizzard that froze the sea solid. Luckily, you were born with a gift to detect when people are lying. But there's a catch: no one must ever know.

[From [url=https://emilylin.itch.io/frostbound]itch.io[/url]]

The downfall of a once peaceful life.

"Oh, pitiful priest deprived of desire, I shall grant you the thrill of forbidden pleasure."

The protagonist, a priest-in-training, is kidnapped by a mysterious group and cursed with an overwhelming, insatiable desire. Bound by a vow of purity, he now suffers unbearable pain unless he surrenders to a man’s touch. The curse threatens to destroy his future unless he can break it before his secret is revealed!

Can he escape this curse and reclaim his life as a holy priest? Or will he be consumed by desire with no return?
title: UNHOLIC Syndrome

description:
Two childhood friends, Augustine and Winnie, are suddenly trapped in a freezing blizzard even though it's the summer. The two have to work together to escape the chilling dangers they are suddenly forced into.

[Edited from [url=https://racheldrawsthis.itch.io/cold-front]itch.io[/url]]
title: Cold Front

description:
You have been told that the pastor of your church had suddenly passed away last night.

As you helped with his wife's funeral not so long ago,
you were assigned to assist the pastor's funeral service today as well.

But as soon as you were about to start the service, you hear a strange voice in your head...

[From [url=https://racheldrawsthis.itch.io/eloquent-countenance]itch.io[/url]]
title: Eloquent Countenance
The Three Panels
description:
A story about a married couple who, through the medium of art, discovered much about each other and themselves, and a sexuality that had previously escaped them. It's a slow burn with few, but important choices for the couple as they walk the path that could lead to sharing or swinging.​

[From F95Zone]

A young man and a loved one travel together to Tokyo for the latter's piano concert. Despite police warnings about the escape of a maniacal killer, the young man doesn’t seem to take it seriously, and the night turns into a nightmare. The maniac puts them through a trial that pushes the boundaries of their relationship.
title: Midnight Terror

description:
Caelan wakes up longing for his lover to arrive back from his quest of scouting for a missing tribe, and as Vulgor reminds him of his debt to society, Vulgor insists that Caelan works with him at the butchery. However, upon discovering Vulgor's relationships with other wolves in Avalan, Caelan decides to push matters further in order to get a better understanding of Vulgor.

[From [url=https://lupusfeng.itch.io/vulgors-exchange]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Far Beyond the World: Vulgor's Exchange

description:
Haruki is a young writing prodigy. Since he was a child, his novels have been acclaimed by critics and readers, establishing him as a successful and promising author. However, after years following the same path, he begins to feel stagnant and seeks a challenge that will allow him to reinvent himself as a creator.

This is how the idea of writing an erotic novel arose, a genre completely foreign to his experience. But he soon faces an obstacle: he has never had a romantic or sexual relationship, leaving him with no real references to build an authentic story.

Determined that his lack of experience will not be an impediment, Haruki decides to enter a new and unknown world to find the inspiration he needs. His search will not only lead him to explore emotions and situations that he has never experienced before, but will also force him to face his own fears, desires and internal conflicts.

Along the way, Haruki will discover that life, love and desire are as complex as they are fascinating, and that perhaps true inspiration is not only found in experiences, but also in the way we choose to live them.

Discover the secrets and desire in Paradise in the Academy!
title: Paradise in the Academy
Blood Shepherd
description:
Maria is hungry. It drives her through a world broken by a disease no one understands and no one can stop. Grappling with her nature, threats from every shadowed nook, and the ache in her stomach that never settles, she finds her path crossing with a child in need. Now she's tasked with getting that child to safety before they're both swallowed by the gaping maw snapping at their heels.

Will you help guide her through this journey?

[From [url=https://lemonink.itch.io/blood-shepherd]itch.io[/url]]

You're powerless.

Everyone you once knew can wield magic since way before they hit puberty. You can't. You're what they call a husk, hollow in every way that matters. The eternal winter is harsh and your society does not tolerate those who don't contribute. Ironic that you are the one person who can put a stop to the perpetual frost and return the seasons to their normal cycle. The question is: do you really want to?

[From [url=https://maxspartan.itch.io/the-spark-poacher]itch.io[/url]]
title: The Spark Poacher
Honey Twigs: Winter Memories
description:
Everyone's in a  festive mood because of Hearthsong celebrations but you have other things on your mind!

Between your job at Honey Twigs and the upcoming present exchange with your friends, you are also catching feelings for a certain someone!

Perhaps you will finally be able to express your feelings and maybe even have them reciprocated. Either way, an eventful few days await you!

[From [url=https://crayoncat.itch.io/honey-twigs-winter-memories]itch.io[/url]]
A little adventure with Ulyana.
title: Neugomonnaja Ul'janka

description: Semyon is a long-known character, and there's almost nothing he hasn't tried to escape from the 'Sovyonok' camp. Our hero finds himself in the exact same situation, but even after a hundred cycles without finding a way out, he simply continues to live week after week. However, in one of the cycles, events unfold for Semyon that differ from the usual routine. On the very first night, he learns that he is not the only one trapped in the camp, which compels him to start digging for answers to the new questions that arise, all while trying to wrestle with his past.
title: Put' pacifista
Shinobi Gear_Ninja Rikune wa Torotoro Kairaku Ochi Nante Shinai
Shinobi Train_Ninja Rikune to Kairaku Ochi Ressha
Netorare Spy Operator -Musen no Mukou de Kanojo wa Ochiru-

aliases: I Want You To F*ck My Urethra.
title: Anata ni Oshikko no Ana o Okasarete mitai

aliases: The Succubus of All Boys Academy
title: Danshikou no Succubus
description:
"I want to watch you get r*ped by another man..."

Immerse yourself in a fantasy school set in alternate Japan, where magic is a part of life, and where the newest student is a succubus. As a girl she feeds on sperm. For the sake of diplomacy, her lunch must be served!

Masochist Manami's first time expands to hentai play across the all-male campus!

9 base images, 57 total incl. variations.
Some voice acting in parts.

Watching sex, urine, bondage, neglect, blowjob, penetration, anal, urethra, etc.

[From [url=https://www.dlsite.com/maniax-touch/work/=/product_id/RJ077678.html]DLSite[/url]]

title: We Were Faithful
description:
Eveline “Evil” Batlet has just ended a three-way affair in the office. First with his boss, then his boss’ secretary, and finally his boss’ daughter. Now his boss is dead, his daughter despises him, and his secretary still wants him. Of the three of them, only Hart remains by his side.

At the funeral, Hart comforts him the only way he knows how.

[From [url=https://arbitrrrary.itch.io/we-were-faithful]itch.io[/url]]

Congratulations on your mandatory participation!

Magnum Broadcasting welcomes you to the most popular inter-dimensional speed dating show in eight different realities! 

Enjoy the thrill of finding shallow love alongside the anxiety of having your ego dragged through the mud in front of a hostile audience. Our combative and spiteful hosts will help you choose your one and only, or watch you die trying to make it work with something antithetical to your very existence, all while your fears and shortcomings are heavily monetized in a broadcast sent out to multiple dimensions!

Come on human, what have you got to lose?

[From [url=https://bmurphyart.itch.io/yass-or-pass-2]itch.io[/url]]
title: Yass or Pass 2

description:
Semyon is an ordinary, apathetic person who fears everything. He has no need for society as such; he lives for himself, unburdened by the mundane problems of existence. His only concerns are biological necessities: food, water, and shelter. However, on January 1st, Semyon falls asleep, effectively signing an eight-day contract with the "Sovyonok" camp. All he has with him is a mysterious and enigmatic presence in his mind—unfamiliar yet somehow deeply familiar.

Will Semyon find someone who can ignite an unprecedented thirst for life in his heart? Or will he remain forever a lonely outcast, seeing nothing beyond the screen of his monitor?
title: I my tancevali sredi zvjozd...
Mortal Fate
description:
When an unknown event wipes out humanity, people all over the world find themselves in the eerie town of Gallows Crossing, where magic runs rampant for a select few and memories twist and turn. The protagonist, an expert bounty hunter known as the Summoner, is pulled headfirst into the enigmatic origin of this cursed town.

Fate will force him to face taxing trials that will test his emotional, spiritual, and physical fortitude, all the while trying to save a dear friend and find out what led to the origin of this town.

Things are not what they seem. Will the hidden ones in the dark devour you, or will you tame the abyss?

[From [url=https://lwitch.itch.io/mortal-fate]Itch.io[/url]]

title: One Thousand Acts of Decency
description:
Trapped inside a mysterious Dome and being forced to solve a murder case, Chive O’Higgins must work together with a cast of oddball characters to investigate and debate the facts of the case and catch the killer.

It’s an unremarkable December 26th when Chive is unceremoniously thrust into a murder case, when his enigmatic neighbor, Mischief Applegate, is found stabbed to death in his apartment building’s lobby. Left with no other choice but to solve the murder, Chive is joined by his easy-going and excitable cousin, Shallot Fogg, as well as a prurient telemarker named Herb Petters, and a spirited savant named RJ Miller. With an enigmatic time limit counting down, the four of them must comb over every inch of the crime scene to gather the evidence they need to unmask the culprit behind Mischief’s murder. As time passes, and the truth unravels, it slowly becomes clear that what appeared to be a simple homicide is anything but.

[From [url=https://domedev.itch.io/one-thousand-acts-of-decency]Itch.io[/url]]

Experience a blend of technology and storytelling. Each scene is brought to life through AI animation, delivering dynamic visuals and lifelike movements. From intricate character details to immersive environments, everything is crafted to create a seamless and captivating cinematic experience.
title: Agent Sherine
Trouble iN The aRena
description:
Our main character finds himself reincarnated into a fantasy world full of elves, dwarves, orcs, and magic. He sets out to create a harem for himself, just like any isekai protagonist should. Unbeknownst to him, Ruru, the demon maid he summoned has other plans.

She wants the MC for herself.

In order to accomplish this she will seduce and conquer any women that tries to get between them. Or adjacent to them. Or who just so happens to be in the vicinity. She's not picky.

[From [url=https://sir-gary-bummer.itch.io/trouble-in-the-arena]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Jessica Jane Has A Crush!?
description:
Jessica Jane has a crush!? And to make matters worse,  a crush on her best friend Rena! Follow Jessica as she navigates these complicated feelings, all while dealing with the struggles of attending an art university and coping with her mum's strict parenting. 

One day Jessica decides to meet up with Rena at the local halloween themed cafe "Ghoffee",  but something seems... off. Rena mentions a surprise, she refuses to reveal it yet, but Jessica can't help but wonder if it's... surely not! Right? 

[From [url=https://starsauce.itch.io/jessica-jane-has-a-crush]itch.io[/url]]

Tales of Bella Ventus: Bushel is an expansion-focused, furry fantasy VN featuring a number of illustrated endings and animations from various contributing artists.

As a member of the Gilded Point Investigation Unit, it's your job to root out cultist activity in the province of Belverta. You'll be joined by Wendy McCarthy, a cadet fresh out of the academy. Will you solve the mystery of Bushel? Or will you become yet another victim of the town's harvest festival?

[Edited from [url=https://red-deer-studios.itch.io/tales-of-bella-ventus-bushel]itch.io[/url]]
title: Tales of Bella Ventus: Bushel

description:
A Story of Pleasure, Survival, Growth and Self-Discovery
Step into the life of Catalina, an 18-year-old forced to take charge after finishing high school. With her parents gone, a sick grandmother to care for, and a sister who refuses to step up, Catalina must navigate a neighborhood teeming with danger. Surrounded by predators and tough decisions, she struggles to carve a path to success while holding onto her values and sense of self. Every choice she makes will shape her future. Help her not lose who she is in the process.


Based on the compelling novel [url=https://www.amazon.com/Bodycount-Vol-1-Saga-ebook/dp/B0DNMXNVVF]Bodycount Vol.1[/url], this game brings Catalina’s story to life, encasing you in a deeply personal narrative where every choice matters.
title: Bodycount
Offerings of the Willow Witch
description:
Under the shade of a willow, two souls stumble in, looking for the perfect gift between themselves. Yet the past creeps in with them, and it seems like even the most mundane of objects have quite the story with them.

[From [url=https://gray-lofi.itch.io/offerings-of-the-willow-witch]itch.io[/url]]

Death, puppets, cats, a clown, and classic literature.

Limbo Puppet Theatre is a visual novel that follows the story of a puppet who finds themself at The Theatre! But they can't stay here for free~! They'll have to find somewhere to belong. That not easy to do without any memories or even most basic feelings, hm?

Shed your identity and build a new ego! 

Or recover the shattered remains of your heart and grasp who you once were! 

and if you refuse to do either...?

You don't want to find out. 

[From [url=https://cieloquest.itch.io/limbo-puppet-theatre]itch.io[/url]]
title: Limbo Puppet Theatre

description:
Will, an ordinary office worker who has lost but all of his hope and dreams for the future.

May, a kind and warm cat-loving old lady hiding a bitter past behind her smile.

This is a story of their fateful encounter. A story of their little act of kindness in feeding stray cats, and how it changes their lives in an unexpected way. A story to inspire you to not give up on your dreams, and to always believe in second chances.

[From [url=https://sippit.itch.io/a-little-kindness]itch.io[/url]]
title: A Little Kindness
Life in Rio
description:
Elza is an innocent woman; she grew up being indoctrinated from a young age to follow the principles of a perfect woman, Because of her innocence, she often ends up getting into unexpected situations.

The city of Rio de Janeiro is a corrupt city to the teeth, where money and luxury will always be what civilians seek most, Elza is an innocent girl who plunged headlong into this world full of corruption. Many people will want to take advantage of Elza because of her innocence and lack of experience.

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/blackninjaofc/about]Patreon[/url]]

Romance Bytes tells the story of a college student who is bored with relationships that have become superficial due to the rapidly developing internet and technology. Our protagonist, who has lost faith in society, has started to seek happiness in simulations.

Now he has the chance to make his dream come true, but he is going to have to work hard for it.. In doing so, he will come to understand better what he wants and how he wants to live.

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/drpenguingames/about]Patreon[/url]]
title: Romance Bytes

description:
It is the year 94AP, ninety-four years after the alien comet struck the earth and reset the calendar, causing psions (‘psionically-gifted children') to be born around the world. Only 2% of the population is found to have such superpowers at adolescence, so when the ages passed you by wherein such powers typically manifest themselves, you resigned yourself to a lifetime *without* the powers of a demigod.

Until today.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3384380/]Steam[/url]]
title: Psi Academy: Orientation
Syndromedia's Dracula
description: After Mina Murray is reunited with her childhood friends Jonathan and Lucy Harker, they are all invited on a cruise to Transylvania with a mysterious man named Count Dracula.

An aimless traveler arrived in UCOPIA, a nation where death and suffering are absent, and where many seemingly impossible feats are achieved.

At the behest of a welcoming elder sister, the traveler embarked on a mission to spread the art form, visiting various exhibition halls across the country to make copies of the works on display.

It was there that she encountered a peculiar young girl, lost in admiration of the artworks alone.

What kind of tale and conclusion awaited these two friends?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3390890/UCOPIA/]steam[/url]]
title: UCOPIA

description:
MC is an ordinary guy who has just started his journey of independent and adult life. MC goes to school, has a part-time job and rents a small apartment, without even dreaming of the love and popularity of all. However, one evening turns his life upside down when three unfamiliar girls break into his house. What if, by accident (or not by accident?), the MC now has the power to capture women’s hearts by subordinating them to his own will? So he finds himself in a world of lust and debauchery that he does not understand. What will MC do with the power he has been given, and how will his life be changed? It’s up to you!

[From [url=https://fessix.itch.io/corrupted-world]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Corrupted World

description:
Your life is changed forever when a mysterious package arrives at your front door. Go on many different outings with your new android companion as you both form unforgettable memories in this beautiful visual novel.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3352470]Steam[/url]]
title: Your Android
Monstrous Liberation
description:
The Golden Shears- a magical implement capable of nullifying even the strongest of magics. This legendary item was thought lost to the ages, until they resurfaced in an unexpected way, in an unexpected realm.

Sasha is a spunky internet streamer with bills to pay. One day she stumbles across a shiny pair of scissors- The Golden Shears. They transport her to Civitas Imperito, the capital of a magical fantasy world. This great walled city is ruled with an iron fist by the dictator known as The Usurper, who uses hypnosis magic to enforce a regime built around order and repression.

Armed with her set of curse-breaking cutters and contemporary sensibilities- Sasha embarks on a quest to inject a little bit of color and chaos back into the dull lives of the inhabitants of this new world.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2884750/]Steam[/url]]

title: Lust Survivor
description:
7 girls crashland into an uninhabited planet, now it’s up to you to take them to safety...  Or not! The only thing sure is there is going to be sex involved.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3339730/]Steam[/url]]

title: Survive The Date
description:
You wake up in a strange and isolated place, with nothing and no one to look at except a small set of furniture, a man, and his TV. You don't remember anything. How to escape? Who can be trusted? There is only one way to find out the full truth: ask questions and gather clues.

Figure out how you got there and learn about your new companions. Who knows? You might learn something about yourself too.

[From [url=https://nerdudi.itch.io/survive-the-date]itch.io[/url]]

title: Kie yuku hoshi no merodi
description:
In a spring of despair, with no hope for the future.
Even in such a world, you were smiling...

The one who spoke to me as I sat dejectedly in the park was an exchange student from England.
Guided by her ever-cheerful and bright demeanor, I gradually began to regain my color.
Yet, my heart remained difficult to recover...

When the stars have completely lost their light,
will the unfinished melody play once again at the edge of time?

Source: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/fading-star-melody-switch/

Time flows like a river, quietly taking away the warmth of the past, yet unable to erase the whispers deeply buried in the heart.
Memories are like the morning mist, soft and hazy, drifting across the distant years.
Unspoken longing, like starlight on the far side of time, never extinguished, patiently awaits the moment to be rediscovered.

An enchanting journey through the silence of time, allowing you to experience the echoes of emotions at the end of time, and feel the eternal bond in the boundless years.
title: Toki no kanata de kimi o omou
His Soft Spot
description: An adorable Bromance turns into Romance when Blayne shares a room with his mother’s fiancé’s son. "Mom, I fell hard for the incredibly hot model who annoys the heck out of me".♥︎BL

title: Kimi ga Kiete Shimau Mae ni
Detention Delight
description:
A small but funny and lovingly made adventure taking place in school. Young Lucas is a new student in a class with four notable classmates. The domineering and strict class monitor Evelyn keeps her own order. Femboy Rei is trying to get along with her and school bully Mia, who has unexpected weak spots, but still gets mad at everyone around her, except for the cute and shy Emily, who immediately sees Lucas as a new friend, or even more.

Source: https://sillybox.itch.io/detention-delight

Dan (renamable) is a vampire frozen in time in the 1960's, childe and servant to Cyra, a much older and more powerful vampire bent on climbing the ranks of their nocturnal society.  Now, in the present day, rumors of unknown newcomers to the city unsettle the balance of power, his vampiric sister returns from a secretive mission in Tibet, and his mistress has suddenly gone missing.
title: Venomous Smiles
Fairwood Retreat 87
description:
Fairwood Retreat 87 Is a horror visual novel where you step into the shoes of a young woman who goes to spend her first summer away at camp. As you and the other campers enjoy their summer retreat, it is only a short period of time until something is amiss. As the nights roll on, followed by the sunrise, it becomes apparent that this will be like no summer you have ever experienced. Tucked away in the secluded forest with no town in sight, it becomes apparent that maybe you never should have set foot in camp. The question is, will you and the others survive?

[From [url=https://sakurablossomgames.itch.io/fairwood-retreat-87]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Her Love, Like Poison
description:
Ethel Briggs is a shy, self-conscious girl in her final year of university. Though she should be working on her thesis about Romantic poetry, her well of inspiration has run dry. After a nasty break-up with her former girlfriend, Clementine, Ethel is feeling very blue - and it certainly doesn't help that she's spending the winter holidays in the depressingly drab village of Oxbury, while her family are off holidaying in sunny Australia.

Left to her own devices, Ethel struggles to finish her thesis while the cold, wintry wind blows outside and the days continue to get shorter and darker.

Staying inside proves to be unbearable, however, and Ethel escapes the confines of her family's home for a breath of fresh air. Going for a walk in the woods should be enough to invigorate her, and fill her with newfound passion for Romanticism.

That was Ethel's plan, at least - but she wasn't counting on meeting a mysterious, dark-haired beauty in the woods, who is much more than she seems.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3412620/]Steam[/url]]

Today's Tomoya's 27th birthday and some people he knows are coming to celebrate it!

Ushio would have to be on her very best behaviour for Mama's wonderful tonkatsu and cake so she has to try her best to navigate the various conversations with Daddy's friends, family and potentially former crushes.

Hopefully it would go all according to plan...

(https://team-iwaki.itch.io/clannad-happy-birthday)
title: CLANNAD -Happy Birthday-
lie xin ren
description:
This is a modern masterpiece themed around anti-PUA (Pick-Up Artist)! It tells the story of a female protagonist (you) who possesses the ability to "sense when others are attracted to her." To pay for her younger brother's expensive medical bills, she becomes a bounty hunter for an app designed to take revenge on scumbags. A task with a bounty worth tens of millions, a love conspiracy—you're both the hunter and the "completely unaware" prey. When the truth is unveiled, can you still believe in the sincerity hidden within the conspiracy? Sincerely produced by Ruanli in 2020, it invites you to experience a love story "in the name of hate."

*Machine-translated from  https://www.66rpg.com/game/1510053?ivk_sa=1023345p.

title: Manko ni Nanika ga Haitte Kuru! ~Toumei Ningen! An Invisible Man~
aliases: マ◎コに何かが入ってくる！～透明人間～, There's Something In My P*ssy! an invisible man story

title: Daiji na Idol ni Te o Dashite Shimaimashita 1 Rin
Another Heaven: Memory of those Days
description: Another Heaven: Memory of those Days (アナザヘヴン〜memory of those days〜) is a Horror/Visual Novel video game published by Omega Micott released on 2000 for the WonderSwan Color.
a modern fantasy story by Parun.
title: Gote to Handa

description: Visual novel on the "Heaven Official's Blessing" in Modern AU.
title: Svet moego koshmara
Journey to die
description:
The story of Yume and Utsutsu's search for "true happiness".

[Edited from [url=https://mugnet.jp/Journey-to-die/]official website[/url]]
https://www.memoryofsouls.fr
title: Memory of Souls
Love Cult
description:
Upon receiving visions of doomsday fast approaching, Meridian is left with one mission before time runs out: to reverse the world’s fate by summoning love through the forbidden art of divine matchmaking.

Skilled in an arcana of her own, Meridian’s answer lies in the heart of the mystical Lapis cards, as she consults the cosmos to inspire new love connections across the city, which has been overtaken by astral gods peddling their own twisted notions of love to their believers.

With the astrals’ targets set on her, Meridian must ensure that those who believe in her magic will be guaranteed an everlasting love, no matter the otherworldly obstacles awaiting. For as she sees it, a true love as foretold by the stars is simply the only way to stop the doomsday clock... and the key to a most amorous salvation.

[From [url=https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/nochistudios/love-cult?ref=3b2l6x]Kickstarter[/url]]

title: Rite of Decay
description:
The testimony of one Nastya V. Yarocz, Rot Physician, on the peculiar happenings at Pavia Manor following the death of honoured Guest Lord Kallistos of Arkhé.

And on the even more curious romances she has forged therein.

[Edited from [url=https://skolaztika.itch.io/rite-of-decay]itch.io[/url]]

title: Wicked Problem
description:
A murder has taken place in the city, but it's not like any other murder, it's like it was magic. There's no conclusive evidence, no witness that gives valuable information....Nothing.

[From [url=https://yokkerst.itch.io/wicked-problem]itch.io[/url]]

title: Turpentine
description:
An OEL Visual Novel by Nemirutami.

A mystery with psychological horror elements and monster yuri! Angels and Devils live amongst us, and they demand YOU make an offering for their benevolence! Create art to satiate the Gods.. or pay the price!

title: Crossed Signals
description:
Crossed Signals is a character-driven, 18+ visual novel about swapping bodies with your college crush, or your sexy professor. Or maybe that bitchy, popular cheerleader...

Take the role of an average college sophomore who stumbles upon a phone capable of switching two people's bodies... though he doesn't know that. Whoever he calls will swap bodies with him, and it'll take some time before they're able to return to normal, [i]if[/i] they can return to normal...

[From [url=https://cinswitch.itch.io/crossed-signals]itch.io[/url]]

title: I Am Here, I Won't Disappear. I Am Here, I Won't...
description:
A short visual novel about a girl who is afraid of disappearing.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3426300/]Steam[/url]]

title: Bittersweet Blossoms
description:
Set in England in the early 1919, Bittersweet Blossoms is a slowly developing romance story between a working class girl and her mistress.

Our protagonist, Dot Graves, is a working class girl from Manchester. When Dot's father and older brother both die in World War I, Dot takes it upon herself to find work, in the hopes of supporting herself and her mother. A disastrous stint in a factory, however, encourages Dot to leave the city behind her, to seek employment elsewhere.

Dot finds employment as a maid in Bly: a tumbledown mansion deep in the countryside which has fallen into decline. With the old master of the mansion dead, the house is being barely kept together by the harried, harassed Fran, who is struggling to keep her head above the water.

Dot forms an unlikely bond with Fran's daughter, Patience, but the other maids warn Dot to keep her distance. Patience's moods are known to be mercurial, her temperament poor, and she fails to live up to her (rather optimistic) name in every regard.

Dot hears these warnings, yet she pays them little heed. She can't help but pity her mistress, who is consigned to her bedroom day in, day out: left immobile after an accident as a child. Dot wants to console Patience, if she can - but how will Patience react to the kindness of a girl whose status is so far beneath her own?

description:
You're Taylor. Your dad died suddenly a few weeks ago. It looks like he left you the family house. 

Really though, you swore you'd never come back here. Nothing specific bad ever happened, but the place makes you feel sick to your stomach. Like you're some how allergic. 

You know it's up to you to at least clean the place out. Your dad and stepmom had been divorced for years, and you've never been close with your half sister, Paige.

Fortunately, you get to do this alone, at your own pace. 

As you start the process though, that same feeling from your childhood is still there. But there's more... a presence, maybe? It shifts from terrifying to comforting. And it all seems to circle around the basement that your dad never let you enter.

You need to find out what's down there. You need to understand what is in the house with you. And you need to open this lockbox that your dad left behind.

One certainty in Nathan Quiver's life is that he's the breathing prodigy of the legendary hero Jerry Quiver, who brought peace to the lands of Griffindale 30 years ago. Eager to follow his father's footsteps, Nathan has set onto a grand adventure in hopes to meet with his father once again, who has vanished without a trace. Joining him are his band of best friends: the curious Melanie Star, the brave Resistance scout Grant Winters, and the cheerful Isabelle Black.

Taking a trip down to the Meadow of the Roses - a place where the sun never shines - was supposed to be a nice day out for our wandering heroes... until a mysterious group of alleged crooks called The Red Roses bargain for their help. Their courageous leader Taffy Rose and their bumbling first mate Licorice Nipits have been taken hostage by the cruel land owner Aphsdel, and it's up to Nathan and his friends to save the day!

title: The Legend of Jerry Quiver: Adventures of Griffindale

description:
It's just a dream.

People who don't know say that, but in this world, dreams have an important meaning.

Disasters and abnormal weather are caused by someone's dreams,
and there are people who have the power to even control the actions of others.

I was one of those people who didn't know this fact.
--Until I met them.

That day, I encountered three things.

The first was a mysterious woman who appeared from the darkness.

The second was a hated being, a tapir.

The third was a masked girl.

The masked girl appeared again the next day and said,

"The world is being eaten by tapirs."

Because this world is all about dreams, she said.
title: Kamisama no Furusato

description:
The world of shadows is where "shadows" train to become "shadows".

The day he had a bad feeling, he was called by the master of shadows and it was decided that he would become a certain human's shadow.

His first time seeing the human world. A beautiful sight.

However, contrary to that, the behavior of the humans he was attached to was always terrible.

What a terrible person. I have to do something about it.

Thinking this, he broke the rule that "shadows must not be found out to be alive" and started talking to humans.

Then, what the humans taught him was common sense that was completely different from what he knew.

"I don't know about death. Humans can't break like other things. We will continue to live forever."

A story of living shadows and immortal humans.

After what she's done, you want nothing more than to turn your back on her and take your rightful leave. But you’ve never been great at standing your ground. 

Forgiveness truly is a virtue. 

It turns out there's something she's been hiding from you for a long time.  Not like you're one to talk, really.

Maybe it's time to be honest to one another, before everything crashes and burns?

When Mila enters a prestigious university, she doesn't even realize that she has found herself in a place where students are not ordinary students at all. The academy turns out to be a haven for ancient vampire clans, and Mila herself is the only human among the nocturnal predators.

The situation becomes even more complicated when two of the most powerful heirs of vampire clans begin to fight for her attention, believing her to be a descendant of an ancient vampire family. But how long can Mila hide her human identity?

Immersed in a world of intrigue, danger and forbidden feelings, she faces insidious enemies, dark secrets and temptations that are impossible to resist.

Can Mila survive in a world where even love can be deadly? Or will she succumb to the darkness and become part of this eternal night?
