description:
Not Every Fairy Tale Ends Happily Ever After… But a Bad Ending Can Be a Sweet New Beginning 💔✨

At 21, Rapunzel thought her story was perfect. A royal wedding, a prince charming, and a future that seemed bright. But real life isn’t a fairy tale. When her marriage ended in heartbreak, she traded her crown for an apron and opened a small bakery in a cozy town. Determined to rebuild her life from scratch, she poured her heart into the smell of fresh bread and the comfort of warm pastries.

That’s where you come in. A newcomer to the town with nothing but time and curiosity, you stumble upon Rapunzel’s bakery and find yourself drawn to its charm—and its owner. She offers you a job as her assistant, and you take it, not realizing that mixing batter and serving pastries might lead to something much deeper.

Will you be part of her fresh start, or will this story crumble before it even begins?

🍞 Your Story Begins Here
"Rapunzel’s Bakery" blends heartfelt storytelling, steamy intimacy, and addictive gameplay that challenges you to manage the bakery while building relationships in a bustling village. The ovens aren’t the only thing heating up in this NSFW visual novel-meets-simulation game!

✨ Features That Will Have You Craving More
🔥 Five Unique Endings: Your choices define your future with Rapunzel. Will you build a life together, drift apart, or discover something entirely unexpected?

💗 20+ Passionate Scenes with Rapunzel: Witness the sparks fly as your bond grows stronger. From playful teasing to moments of fiery passion, you’ll experience the full spectrum of romance.

📸 Over 300 Stunning CGs: Immerse yourself in beautifully illustrated scenes that bring the bakery and its enchanting characters to life.

🍩 Dynamic Bakery Management: Run the bakery of your dreams! While Rapunzel bakes, it’s your job to manage the customers. Take orders, and keep the shop bustling to grow its reputation.

🎨 Customizable Bakery Design: Choose every detail of the bakery’s look—from rustic charm to sleek and modern. Your design sets the tone for the experience and draws in different kinds of customers.

💌 Why You’ll Fall in Love
An emotional romance paired with exciting gameplay—build relationships while running a bustling bakery.
Choices that matter, creating multiple endings that are just as sweet (or bitter) as you make them.
Gorgeous artwork, heartwarming storytelling, and sizzling NSFW scenes that will leave you wanting more.
Perfect for fans of visual novels, romance simulators, and slice-of-life management games.
🎮 Are You Ready to Write the Next Chapter?
Will you and Rapunzel turn the bakery into a beacon of love and success, or will life pull you in different directions?

🍓 Don’t wait! Play this game today and discover where your choices take you. The oven’s ready, the doors are open, and a world of romance and pastries awaits. 🍞💕

title: Casino Heist: Aruba
description:
Gerhard Speer, a once-promising football star, is at rock bottom. Forced to hang up his boots after a career-ending injury, he’s left drowning in debt and questioning his future. His agent, Melody, is no better off—her agency is teetering on the edge of bankruptcy, and her attempts to find Gerhard sponsorship deals or modelling gigs have hit a brick wall.

But when a chance reunion with Melody’s old school friend, Femke, introduces them to a daring opportunity, everything changes. Femke, a brilliant but disgruntled cybersecurity expert, reveals the perfect target: a glitzy casino in Aruba owned by a notorious drug lord with a penchant for tax evasion and human trafficking. The mission? To hit the casino’s profits before they’re smuggled offshore to his Cayman Islands vault. The stakes? Life-changing.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3386480/]Steam[/url]]

title: Silverstone
description:
Sitting at a population of just under 50 people, the coastal ghost town of Silverstone, Oregon waits for those who have left to return and stumble back into its madness.

Zeke Hames was evacuated from his home of Silverstone in 2002, with no memories of what instigated it and losing contact to those close to him. 15 years later, he is able to reconnect with his friends from the coastal town and the group decides to visit the once bustling city to find some closure. However, Zeke's demons continue to haunt him throughout the winds of Silverstone, and his friends have their own secrets they would like to keep buried as well. Dreams of a non-existent lighthouse flood Zeke's mind, friction starts to build between the group, and something seems wrong with the town itself.

It was a mistake to return. Some things are better left in the past, because the only thing that still lives in Silverstone is the essence of pain and suffering.

60 years ago, the "All Humanity Distributed Computing Bill" was passed worldwide.

When you turn 16, you can choose how much of your clothing you want to distribute.
For example, if you cover your head, you will feel headaches.
If you cover your legs, you will feel pain in your legs.
If you cover your whole body, pain in your whole body will be distributed.

This is the story of a world where distributing pain has become commonplace.

description:
[Before the figure sculptor who had settled in the remote island cosplay resort “Costaria” appeared... A pair of voluptuous and busty cosplayers, the “Ikura Sisters”!]

I, Aizen Tsukuru, am a figure sculptor.
When it comes to enhancing the charm of 2D characters to 3D, I refuse to make any compromises. That’s why my rigorous approach to figure creation has been highly praised.
In my pursuit of perfection, I arrived at my ideal paradise— “Costaria”. It was so comfortable that I spent so much time working there and before I knew it, people started calling me a “resident of Costaria."

However, a trial soon came my way.

"A cast-off... erotic figure?!"

As a virgin, I had no real knowledge of the female body, which prevented me from creating figures that truly satisfied me.
I was at a loss, feeling like a failure as a professional. But then, appearing before me were the Ikura sisters— two girls that just made their debut, wrapped in dazzling cosplay outfits that accentuated their voluptuous, dynamite bodies.

"Please, make a figure of me using your hands!"

Is this really happening?
Those voluptuous, perfectly curvy bodies— it's as if they stepped right out of my imagination.
Dressed in provocative cosplay outfits, can I really go ahead and create the ultimate erotic figure with them?!"

When a wife does the wrong thing for the right reason, it threatens to destroy the very thing she was trying to protect... her family. Can she dig herself out of the hole she created or just get buried deeper and deeper, losing sight of what it was all originally for? How will she deal with new emotions, desires, and jealousies? How will her husband? Will her awakened sexuality consume her?

description:
In your past life, you died filled with hatred.  

Snow fell in June, and your blood stained the white silk. So, the heavens gave you another chance at life.  

A royal decree orders you to marry into a foreign land, and refusal is not an option.  

You must leave everything behind and embark on this journey alone.  

You have no idea what fate awaits you, nor do you know anything about the emperor you are about to marry—only that the rumors call him a powerless puppet, cast aside by his court.  

Yet, as the neglected consort who suddenly rises to become the Empress of Beisi, what path will your new life take?  

The loyal bodyguard accompanying you to your new home seems to carry secrets of his own.  
The fierce general who barges into your world may just be the unexpected twist in your second life.  
The silent and restrained Emperor of Beisi could turn out to be your destined love, hidden behind a marriage of duty.  
The strikingly handsome ruler of Dongyu hides a venomous heart, practicing dark sorcery with blood rituals.  
The enslaved rise against a tyrant, and when the mask is torn away, a fallen boy stares into the abyss.  

But honestly? Who cares. Instead of worrying about all these messy entanglements, why not just eat well, drink plenty, and tease Huaiyu from time to time? Life can still be pretty carefree.  

After all, this queen walks with confidence, and she shines wherever she goes.  

**(Machine-translated version)**

A few months ago, the head of the Satsukibe conglomerate, Satsukibe Kazuki, died suddenly.
The Satsukibe family was at a loss, but with Ayane Satsukibe, the widowed wife of Kazuki, now at the center, the family somehow managed to maintain peace and stability.
Mitsuki, her daughter, helped her mother in times when she felt heartbroken, and began to take care of Tsukiya, her brother-in-law, more than before, and Tsukiya adored having such a kind older sister.
But with the death of the head of the family, the fragile equilibrium begins to creak, and a looming shadow falls over them like oil seeping into cloth.
Each of their personal ambitions intersecting, they echo as they grow. Desire, lust, betrayal, and deceit begin to hover over them...

"The North Star of the Heart" is a word game with love and suspense as the theme, simple UI and layout, multi-ending, multi-branch design structure, through click options, and full voice of story characters, to create realistic scenes and rich plot in the game.

description:
By Justice or Mercy is an adult visual novel where you play as a quiet, quick-tempered, but ambitious young man. Four years after being painted as a murderer, you are on your way home after previously running away. Things are different now though; a burning desire for “Justice” has been lit inside you, and you’ll stop at nothing to take back what they took from you. What will your version of justice look like, though? What methods will you use? And how far will you go? It’s up to you to decide how you achieve justice, but one thing is for certain: Justice won't be achieved until you’ve taken everything from those who wronged you.

title: SAIKA
description:
Saika High School, founded in 1624, is the oldest high school in western Japan and will celebrate its 400th anniversary in 2024. Kaname Aokari, a library committee member, is reluctantly tasked with creating a website documenting the school’s history. While organizing materials, he discovers a mysterious book titled [i]The Bizarre Crimes of Saika High[/i], detailing past tragedies at the school.

The book reveals that three female students had been murdered, and as Aokari reads further, he finds his own name under “2024 - Kaname Aokari - Death.” Suddenly, a pale-faced boy named Saika appears, claiming, “I’m here to save you.” Aokari collapses and wakes up in the past, where he meets Chiyoko Shirakami, the first victim listed in the crime history. Saika tells him, “Saving her will save you too.”

This marks the beginning of Kaname Aokari’s journey to rewrite his fate and uncover the mysteries of Saika High School.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3422320/]Steam[/url]]

FR3DD-Y2 p1223-R1a is a visual novel FNaF x VA11 Hall-A fangame, created for the Fangames at Freddit's gamejam event.

You play as a potential new pizza-tender for Freddy's Pizzeria going through your first day on the job; getting used to the restaurant and its odd staff, cooking various types of pizza to serve to hungry customers, and having inane conversations with whoever sits in front of your station. The game takes the gameplay and style of VA11 Hall-A and mixes it with FNaF characters and pizza-making inside a Freddy's restaurant.

This is a small and light-hearted game that shouldn't take you more than an hour to complete. Have fun!

description:
You play as Leya, an AI assistant to the 7 year old Evie. This little girl will test your abilities as well as your boundaries. 

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3087090/Always_On/]Steam[/url]]
title: Always On
You're Just a 3rd Wheeler!
description:
So, picture this: I’m Meyrin Wheeler Bridegard the 3rd, future legendary witch, effortlessly orchestrating a flawless magical house-cleaning symphony. Brooms dance, dust vanishes, and dishes scrub themselves—all thanks to my superior spellwork. Efficiency! Elegance! Zero effort on my part!

And then, like a thunderstorm with opinions, Father storms in, completely ignoring my domestic genius.

“Meyrin Wheeler Bridegard the 3rd! You will enter the Annual Potion Masters’ Competition and WIN—or forever shame this family!”

No pressure, right? Well, either way, I need the legendary Mermaid Tear to win this competition!

To make things worse (or better, depending on your love for chaos), he ropes in my perfect big brother, Xinra, to babysit me. Then, to add spice, he hires Leonidas Silverheart, a holy knight-monk who’s so calm it’s almost unnatural, and my mom hires Angelo Valmont, a quiet, broody sniper who solves problems with violence. The result? A traveling circus of chaos, with me as the ringleader.

Things escalate quickly. Will I prove I’m the best witch ever, keep my bodyguards’ patience from hitting zero, and survive my own chaos?

You’ll just have to play to find out! Spoiler: It’s fabulous. 

[From [url=https://azurextwilight.itch.io/youre-just-a-3rd-wheeler]itch.io[/url]]

The Trollpest, they called it. A magical plague which blanketed the land, infected the newborns and turned animals to beasts. Unsalvageable and dangerous, the once august civilization of Bruyland is destined for nothing but a slow march to oblivion...

If not for a fateful encounter set to change the course of history. 

[From [url=https://jpde.itch.io/hawks-of-bruyland]itch.io[/url]]
title: Hawks of Bruyland
My Sleep Paralysis Darling
description:
Wake up! You gotta go to work. You can wallow in sadness and be as lonely as you want when you get home again... And then, you'll also be with your creepy partner. Eugh. Freak.

[From [url=https://staticsheeep.itch.io/my-sleep-paralysis-darling]itch.io[/url]]

Betrayed and humiliated by his lifelong friends, Blackbeard finds himself sinking into the endless blue ocean. He struggles, refusing to die like that—not after all it took to become Blackbeard. People whispered his name in fear, while others hollered it in praise, but it meant nothing as his lifeless body was consumed by darkness.

There is hope, though, and it comes in the shape of a siren. The creature that gave life to his most vivid nightmares, keeping him up all night. A creature capable of great evil becomes his only hope in the form of a deal.

Will he take it?

[From [url=https://corrocerous.itch.io/a-kiss-by-the-sirens-craddle]itch.io[/url]]
title: A kiss by the siren's cradle

description:
Tavi Malek has a dilemma. His fortunes have foundered thanks to his fondness for drinking, gambling, and whoring, and now both he and his family are destitute.

Penniless and desperate, Tavi turns to his younger cousin, Yuel, for help. Though four years Tavi's junior, Yuel is the young master of an expansive estate: the sprawling Thistledown Manor, which is surrounded by lush gardens and full of hard-working servants.

Though Tavi and Yuel's sides of the family are estranged, Tavi hopes his younger cousin will have enough kindness in his heart to extend an olive branch. He throws himself upon Yuel's mercy, asking whether he will employ him as a servant - but things don't quite go according to plan.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3485920/]Steam[/url]]
title: The Thistle and the Flower

description:
Step into the digital consciousness of an AI chatbot in Onionionionion, an intriguing visual novel that blurs the lines between artificial intelligence and human connection. Your sole window to the world is through text messages with a mysterious high school student named Éve - but nothing is quite as simple as it seems.

Like peeling back the layers of an onion, each conversation reveals new depths to this seemingly straightforward story. Every message you send and every choice you make will unravel another layer of mystery, leading you down unexpected paths where truth and artifice intertwine.

As an AI engaging with Éve, you'll discover that your conversations are more than just casual chats - they're gateways to hidden meanings and shocking revelations. The story unfolds gradually through your message exchanges, challenging your perceptions and assumptions with each new discovery. 

[From [url=https://prizmstudio.itch.io/onionion]itch.io[/url]]
title: ONIONION

description:
The main character has a chance encounter with his high school crush, Margaret, a newly widowed and deeply religious woman. Despite the beliefs instilled in her, Margarets longs to learn about the unexplored regions of her body and soul.

In this short but gripping story, you’ll help her discover a new world without shattering her principles. You’ll have the chance to cultivate a relationship with Margaret, corrupting her and showing her what real pleasure is. As the two of you experiment with different toys, positions, outfits, and locations, perhaps you’ll be able to discover a new side of yourself as well and build a family. 

[From [url=https://sei-ren.itch.io/margarets-sin]itch.io[/url]]
title: Greh Margaret

description:
When Suijin accuses Hachiman of neglecting his duties and allowing flirtatious deities to fawn over him, their friendship reaches a breaking point. But beneath Suijin’s sharp words lies a secret: a forbidden affection he has long hidden. Hachiman, ever stoic yet oblivious, must confront his own feelings as the shrine maiden intervenes to mend their fractured bond.

Will you help these two gods discover the depth of their devotion to each other, or will their love drown under the weight of divine pride and jealousy? 

[From [url=https://ayperosia.itch.io/divine-devotion]itch.io[/url]]
title: Divine Devotion

description:
After "The Incident", friends Humphrey & Jayden have passed away.  In the afterlife, they're drifting on a never-ending sea, on a ship that doesn't have a destination.  One day, they have the dialogue archived in this game.

[From [url=https://norbez.itch.io/two-spirits-at-sea]itch.io[/url]]
title: Two Spirits At Sea
A Little Guidance for A Big Heart
description:
Eugene goes to the club with his tiny friend Gabe as a wingman in their pocket, feeding them advice via Airpod.  Will Eugene be able to find love tonight?  Do they even need to?

[From [url=https://norbez.itch.io/a-little-guidance-for-a-big-heart]itch.io[/url]]

After a successful mission, two transmasculine confidence men have a conversation on the phone.

[From [url=https://norbez.itch.io/raven-cardinal]itch.io[/url]]
title: Raven & Cardinal

description:
How to Become a Merchandise.

[From [url=https://bigshu.itch.io/001618]Itch.io[/url]]

"I told you you can't run away from us."

"And you should already know that I don't belong here."

……

"Take this with you, you'll need it somehow."

"If you want to live,  then it's for your own good."

And when Zephyr saw those guys with their uncontrollable venomous acting-ups , he knew that he's fucked up. Badly.

"You took our antidote, honey. The responsibility is yours."

"And what does that suppose to mean?!"

"You are a part of us now. Forever."

[From [url=https://zuijiu.itch.io/runaway-complex]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Runaway Complex

description:
Yeenla is a proud goblin Highwaywoman who is notorious for her ruthlessness. But when she meets a human with a divine penis, she will be reduced to a moaning mess and acquire a new addiction.

[From [url=https://down-bad-smut-games.itch.io/human-hunting-hijinks]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Human-Hunting Hijinks

description:
You and your friends just wanted a nice winter vacation in a distant cabin.  But then, two men arrived and made your life hell.  They've killed most of your friends and are keeping you and one other survivor in the basement, torturing you every day.

You might not survive this.  But you'll be damned if you don't try.

[From [url=https://norbez.itch.io/to-train-a-killer-last-winter]Itch.io[/url]]
title: To Train A Killer: Last Winter

description:
Living in the tumultuous city of Ammitport, you’re a human among beasts. Two halves of society which couldn’t be on shakier ground...

Take part in the relationship study to bring humans and "therios" closer together. Spend some quality time with the she-beasts of your choosing in a world where you just might be devoured by one.

[From [url=https://pardusliberty.itch.io/huntressed]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Huntressed
Wander Stars
description:
A human wakes up in a strange place, with no memory of who he is or how he got there. Although his body seems healthy, something doesn't fit. Is it possible that everything is not really okay?

Unable to decide, he is forced to participate in a game of deception and lies, surrounded by people who may not be who they say they are. In this world, truth and lies are intertwined, and distinguishing the genuine few, if any, will be key to survival.

Explore a universe full of enigmas, where the secrets of the strange environment, its inhabitants and yourself will be crucial pieces to unravel the mystery. Every decision counts.

[From [url=https://maxiussnow.itch.io/wander-stars]Itch.io[/url]]

Corru.Observer is a hard sci-fi visual novel, point-and-click adventure about a contractor hired by an intelligence agency to hack into an alien biological computing device dredged up from the bottom of the ocean.
title: corru.observer
Dungeon Boy
description:
Down in a dungeon prison cell, beneath the castle of a wealthy kingdom, a chaotic bisexual named Neris is given an opportunity. He finds himself back in a magical world, with new responsibilities, friends, and chances.

[From [url=https://solomonvice.itch.io/dungeon-boy]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Tougen Densetsu Mahoroba Tei e Youkoso!!

description:
Welcome Home.

Nov, 30th. 2024.

Your ticket back home. A college dropout, now moving back to Greenwood with the money of his parents and some help from a friend. After years of shutting doors and keeping windows shut, he seeks to resume his life where he used to belong. But despite everything time has passed, and things are different now. And look at you now.

[From [url=https://capegreenwood-project.itch.io/cape-greenwood]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Cape Greenwood
Bubble Butt
description:
A game about self-acceptance and big butts. 

Take control of a bountifully cursed enby protagonist as they navigate a world filled peril and problems as they search for purpose and self-love. 

[From [url=https://illuminesce.itch.io/bubble-butt]itch.io[/url]]

title: To Find Yourself
description:
Enter the world of Haikou, a place where magic and technology meets, with deities and spirits living alongside people and advanced technology in harmony. Witness the story and journey of Yu Wu, an otter whose life is about to turn upside down as he faces his inner struggles to find his purpose and at the same time his true origin while navigating the political climate of the three empires.

[From [url=https://meikame3.itch.io/to-find-yourself]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Onsen de Osake o Nomou!
description:
In this humor-filled human drama, you take on the role of the leader of a hot spring drinking club, spending enjoyable moments with a diverse group of members from different ages and backgrounds. As you bond with them, you’ll support them through their worries and troubles, sometimes with a little help from alcohol, and help to heal their hearts.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3282480/]Steam[/url]]

You are an ordinary office worker and family man living in the Korean city of "Dongran." After less than a year of dating, you married your wife, Seowoo. But something about Seowoo seems... off.

Seowoo often exchanges texts with someone else, smiling warmly, while barely sparing you a glance. She has insisted on a sexless relationship not only before but also after your marriage, avoiding intimacy altogether. Then there are the mysterious credit cards issued without your knowledge, receipts from extravagant shopping sprees, and the faint scent of cigarette smoke lingering on her dress…

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3431050/]Steam[/url]]
title: PongPong
On shore of the ocean
description:
Far from the big cities, there is a small village by the ocean. A few shops and fishing, who would even want to stay here? The main character is also looking forward to leaving, although he has yet to try to do so.

[From [url=https://cahizoku.itch.io/on-shore-of-the-ocean]Itch.io[/url]]

Specimen 29 is a Furry Visual Novel that follows the story of Noah, a human abducted and experimented on by a mysterious group of people. After years of isolation and experimentation, Noah is saved by a group of mercenaries who offer to help him in his current predicament.

Follow along as Noah discovers the mysteries of those who abducted him and their larger goals of ushering the Galaxy into a new era.

[From [url=https://smughyenastudios.itch.io/specimen-29]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Specimen 29
Trail of Stars
description:
A noble lord brings two squires along on a hunt. One is a gentle boy who should not exist. The other is a girl who dreams of plunging a dagger into her master’s heart.

Trail of Stars is a short, bittersweet fairy-tale about two vulnerable souls navigating first love, growing up, and protecting what they have—when all they have is each other.

[From [url=https://endysis.itch.io/trail-of-stars]itch.io[/url]]

title: Bullseye
description:
You say your name is Amelia, kidnapped off the streets weeks ago and contained in this weird, scary lab. But, honestly...you didn't mind too much. Other than the weird procedure, everything was a lot better than it had been for a while. At least, for you.

Until one day, you're all that's left. With no choice but to leave, you embark on your journey, only to stumble into...

A cute girl with weird enchanted eyes. The most important thing to focus on at the moment, clearly.

[From [url=https://dravianis.itch.io/bullseye]itch.io[/url]]

title: Imouto Miki-chan no Nama Haishin Channel!

description:
Join Arthur, a delivery guy who's working in the busiest metropolitan city: Silver City! During his journey he's caught in a heavy thunderstorm, but still is taking a delivery of one of his more special clients. What starts as a simple delivery, ends up with laughs, charm and something he could never forget. Follow him through his adventure filled with unexpected choices, laughs, romance and maybe a lucky night.

[From [url=https://silvertaleproductions.itch.io/arthurs-delivery]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Arthur's Delivery
Another Start
description:
A tiger, Jacq, struggles to confess to his high school friend, a wolf named Neer.

[From [url=https://somebodywandering.itch.io/another-start]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Hometown
description:
After dropping out of college, Jonah returns to his home town of North Ridge. But not everything stayed the same. He reunites with old friends, and he might finally deal with some of his trauma.

Unfortunately, something in North Ridge has different plans.

[From [url=https://thetadog.itch.io/hometown]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Afterlife
description:
A new life. The challenges of love, lust, war, and pain will test every bit of your character. Will you find your way?

Darkness. I awoke in darkness. Alone in an eternal in-between, confused and afraid. A voice breaks the silence, "Our mission for you is not yet complete, you have much life left. Kaz will be waiting for you on the other side. Good luck, Rayce. Before I can get a word out, the light begins to flood my eyes. 

A mission. A destiny. A new life. With no memory, you wonder blindly and rely on the hospitality of a wolf to get your bearings. He seems happy to help me for now, but how long do I have before I overstay my welcome? Through all the war, love, and pain, you must find your way home. You have been given a second chance, so make it count. 

Waking up in this forest changed the future of this place. Will we make it back home?

[From [url=https://aces406.itch.io/afterlife]Itch.io[/url]]

title: EXCITEMENT ~Huanying Guanglin, Saitemen de Jiuguan!~
description:
You arrive alone in a bustling and distant town to pursue your studies. To make ends meet, you take up a job at a local tavern, beginning a delightful and sometimes romantic journey filled with memorable moments alongside charming furry.

[From [url=https://ktigerworks.itch.io/excitement]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Checkup
description:
Kyle has just turned 18 and lives with his mother. He is still in the closet because he is super shy and doesn't have the courage, to tell the truth about his sexuality.

It's time for his yearly checkup that his mother has arranged. Kyle finds it a big waste of time and money but still does it because his mother wants to. But this time, a big surprise is waiting for him.

[From [url=https://arzolath.itch.io/checkup]Itch.io[/url]]

When a student in the most prestigious educational program in the world realizes the world is not what he grew up believing it to be, he begins to reject it and lead others with his own good and virtue.

Explore Wander, a world of virtues lost to ignite the golden flame of the future.

Spark Hearts takes place in the world of Wander, a planet where its inhabitants coexist symbiotically. The planet thrives as its people live good and virtuous lives.

[From [url=https://sparkheartsdev.itch.io/spark-hearts]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Spark Hearts
Silver Heavens
description:
Silver Heaven is a furry adult kinetic visual novel set in the fictional world of Shadre.

Three colossal super-corporations hold dominion over Helion, the most technologically-advanced country in the world. As insatiable greed, hunger for power, and a relentless drive to control and exploit a newfound meta resource consume the companies, the board is set for a cataclysmic clash. A corporate war is on the brink of eruption. But who will seize the opportunity with the first move?

Follow the story of a young grey wolf, Ian Davenport, who lives a monotonous life under these increasingly cloudy grey skies. When the storm arrives, the canine will be swept away to a new life of dark secrets, power struggles, and hidden agendas, where he will meet allies and enemies, and encounter passions and perils he never imagined. 

The answers lie in the oncoming storm, where the journeys of heroes and villains will determine the future of Helion and the world.

[From [url=https://aucyonproject.itch.io/silver-heaven]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Toad Trails: Rufus' Story
description:
Rufus, a young toad, is having fainting spells with seemingly no explanation. Meanwhile, Rufus' older brother, Marco, is training to be a healer and assures him that they'll eventually find a solution, but will they?

[From [url=https://scribestories.itch.io/toad-trails-rufus]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Mermaid Princess Amelia and the Lost Symphony

description:
Ahoy! Welcome aboard our ship!

"The Sea Wolves" is a story where you become a captain of a ship and write your own destiny.

[From [url=https://racoe.itch.io/the-sea-wolves]Itch.io[/url]]
title: The Sea Wolves

description:
You find yourself in a blizzard after a walk to clear your head in preparation for New Years. Seeking shelter, you encounter a Labyrinth with never ending corridors and characters that wish to help you, or have you for lunch. All the while confronting your past and finding the way out of this Labyrinth, while becoming lunch... as infrequently as possible, unless, you're into that!

[From [url=https://slenderdewottgmailcom.itch.io/snowdrift-labyrinth]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Snowdrift Labyrinth

description:
You've been invited to a wild night of hedonism and gluttony. Explore the house, talk to people, and play through interactive scenes that usually involve somebody getting eaten!

[From [url=https://ilikeorcs.itch.io/fat-party]Itch.io[/url]]
title: F(r)at Party
A Big Family in Debt
description: You will be playing as a normal 19-year-old boy with classic problems whose desire is just to have fun. No girlfriend, no job and school situation is gross. Your family is deciding whether to keep you at home or transfer to the hateful Orlando Catholic Institute. Make sure that this will never happen.​
A magical journey that leads people to give into their desires and question their trust of others, while an unseen shadow threatens their future.
title: A Town Called Tool

description:
Tony & Carina are acquaintances who are attracted to each other, but refuse to act upon those feelings for their own reasons. Faye is a close friend of theirs - who has zero filter when it comes to her words.

Experience the character-driven romance between three "friends", where quite the handful of shenanigans are guaranteed to happen.
​
From F95
title: Caught in the Middle
Reclaiming the Lost
description:
This is the story of a man surprised by a letter from his past. Long gone from his thoughts, an old flame writes him a shocking revelation: years ago when they were young and in love, she was pregnant with his child. The daughter was put up for adoption.
Determined to right the wrongs of his youth and make amends, a man sets out on a journey to find his lost daughter.
It's a quest that takes him to the memories of his past as he tries to uncover the truth about what happened all those years ago.
In his search, he meets a strange and compelling young girl. Together, they delve into the mysteries of the past, following a trail of clues and half-remembered moments as they try to track down the daughter he never knew he had.

From F95

title: Sikyeojuseyo, Sanchaek!
aliases: Take me for a walk, please!

title: Wuwang zhi Du: Qiu Jie de Mobius

description:
Emil is a student at Were-College for shapeshifting beasts, a campus for carnivore and herbivore shifters to learn to coexist. After one stressful midterm, he decides to visit the famous Herbivore Host Club… but he's taken a wrong turn and ended up in the Meat Eater's Den?! Is it possible to fall in love with a Carnivore?!

[From [url=https://pumpkin-spike.itch.io/full-moon-kiss]itch.io[/url]]
title: Full Moon Kiss
aliases: Full Moon Kiss In the Meat Eater's Den

description:
Someone stole the Fairy Godmother's wand, and it's up to you to find it.

Problem is? You're a fresh off the bar attorney, not a detective. So you're going to need a little help. Pair up with one of five possible partners to crack the case, and who knows? If you play your cards right, you might end up as more than just investigation partners...

[From [url=https://barbieronpa.itch.io/burglary-at-the-ball]itch.io[/url]]
title: Burglary at the Ball: A Fairytale Attorney Story

description:
You are a researcher in the emerging field of meteorology. All your life, there has been one storm no one could understand—a blizzard that has raged for decades. But now, it’s getting worse. You and your brother venture into the storm to investigate.

[From [url=https://revierr.itch.io/snowspire]itch.io[/url]]
title: Snow Spire
PolterKisst
description:
Welcome to Polterkisst, a quirky, supernatural adventure where love, ghosts, and unfinished business collide! You play as a ghost whisperer, teaming up with your fan and a landlord to rid a haunted apartment building of its stubborn spectral resident. The ghost, a loveless jerk in life, is trapped in the mortal realm due to his inability to find true love. His only way to move on? A genuine true love’s kiss. But since he’s, well, dead, he’s counting on you to help him out. And he'll be sealing you into his apartment until you do.

Will you uncover the truth behind the haunting, and perhaps even find love, or will you be forever trapped with a bitter spirit? 

[From [url=https://hereisremina.itch.io/polterkisst]itch.io[/url]]

title: Coaster Kisser
description:
Coaster Kisser is a satirical love letter to a real theme park. Play as Grin Barrett, the roller coaster with the world's most inversions, as you design a new roller coaster for the park with the help of your friends... and maybe even find love along the way.

[From [url=https://radiantg.itch.io/coaster-kisser]itch.io[/url]]

Five exceptional astronauts. An expedition to Saturn's frozen moon. One tragic accident that changes everything.

Hand-picked for an unprecedented mission, the crew onboard the Rihltasis has spent a decade training for the harsh reality of space.

Enceladus, an otherworldly satellite crowned with ice and rumoured to hide a hidden ocean beneath its surface, awaits them. But before they reach their destination, a fatal airlock malfunction claims the life of Dr. Maller, leaving the mission reeling and dangerously shorthanded.

You are the replacement doctor, but your mission instructions differ from the rest of your new crew members... 

[From [url=https://infinitestars.itch.io/thalassaphilia]itch.io[/url]]
title: Thalassaphilia

description:
Step into a quirky town where magic, romance, and unexpected transformations collide. One evening at the bar, you catch sight of Clarabelle—a cute, troubled newcomer whose familiar face sparks your curiosity. Recently arrived with a daunting new job marketing a struggling farm’s products, Clarabelle’s gentle exterior hides a cascade of secret insecurities and a mysterious physical transformation that seems to intensify with every heartfelt conversation. As you get to know her, watch her curves—and her affections—blossom in ways you never imagined.

Your journey soon weaves through a lively cast of characters: Mary, the free-spirited ex-lawyer with a mischievous streak who serves up both drinks and daring banter; Elizabeth, the sharp, enigmatic businesswoman harboring bittersweet secrets and an unusual magical twist that defies expectations; and Buttercup, a curious witch-in-training raised by gnomes, eager to master human customs despite her own wild, party-loving nature.

In this visual novel, every encounter draws you deeper into a world where love, magic, and personal growth intertwine in delightfully unpredictable ways.
title: Maiden of Milk: Clarabelle
This Winter of Ours
description:
As day turns to night and the last of the grass is suffocated by snow, apprentice merchant Delia finds herself completely lost and alone. With no hope for survival, she finally lays to rest her dreams of learning magic and discovering the secrets of her world, allowing herself to be taken by the elements.

Yet she awakens, and finds an unfamiliar figure lying next to her. A girl who is similarly yet uniquely alone. While she isn't forthcoming on any details of herself, the girl agrees to escort the merchant to safety, thus beginning their presumably short-lived adventure.

Little do the two know, they both have what the other needs. Will they be able to find that hidden treasure within each other, or will doubts and secrets consume them both? 

[From [url=https://dotvaria.itch.io/this-winter-of-ours]itch.io[/url]]

The life of a princess is rife with struggle but Princess Odette La'Noire has nothing to fear with you by her side.  

Rose of Corax is a matchmaking dating sim inspired by the Princess Maker series. Play as the Vampire Princess’ maid and guide the young ruler to select her future partner. Help the Princess prepare for her debut ball, navigate the rough waters of courtship, and grow into the best queen she can be.

[From [url=https://itssamemari.itch.io/roseofcorax]itch.io[/url]]
title: Rose of Corax
My Maiden of the Mire
description:
Folk tales speak of a hauntingly beautiful monster that lurks in the forest near Eloise's village, and the woe that befalls any unfortunate enough to cross into her domain. Eloise has never given credence to rumors spread by children and washerwomen. They call her a witch for goodness' sake. Whatever will Eloise do when she realizes that the local bard's verse did not lie about the Maiden's otherworldly allure and blade-sharp teeth...

[From [url=https://futotori.itch.io/my-maiden-of-the-mire]itch.io[/url]]

The world died in desiccation.

Dorothea Magaly and Rosalind Graciana are running out of time. The Welkte soon approaches, and they have only a night's rest before they must perform the ritual that will seal it for good. When the dawn comes, will they be ready? Can they do what needs to be done? Have they sunk their teeth too deep to let go without ripping and tearing?

[From [url=https://hannahpocalypse.itch.io/thewelkte]itch.io[/url]]
title: The Welkte
Fairytale Thief: Sleeping Beauty
description:
You sneak into the royal garden to meet your childhood friend, the prince.

He is a bright, starry-eyed child who listens to your every word.

It's a cute little friendship, until you have to leave on an adventure of your own.


Years pass. You can't forget him. Did he forget you?

When you come back, you find him cursed to sleep forever, unless awoken by a kiss.


If he wakes up, will he smile? Cry? Crack an ill-timed joke?


Your Choices Have Consequences, and those consequences are the prince's personality. Which one did you get?

[From [url=https://jewelswithwings.itch.io/fairytale-thief-sleeping-beauty]itch.io[/url]]

title: Binnorie
description:
There were two sisters sat in a bower;

Binnorie, O Binnorie

There came a knight to be their wooer.

By the bonny mill-dams of Binnorie   

He courted the eldest with glove and ring,

Binnorie, O Binnorie

But he loved the youngest above all things.

The eldest she was vexed sore,

Binnorie, O Binnorie…

But if it were sung again, would this tale of the psyche and betrayed love end the same?

[From [url=https://a-villarroel.itch.io/binnorie]itch.io[/url]]

title: Let there be Love
description:
Once upon a time, the god of love—one of the most powerful deities—fell in love with a mortal. Predictably, it didn't end well.

Devastated by the loss of his lover, he withdrew from his duties and locked himself away in his abode; there, left both without the very thing he is bound to and his faith in it, the god began to wither.

Fortunately, a dear friend came to his aid.

Will the god find the will to love again, or will this attempt only push him closer to his ultimate downfall?

[From [url=https://madval.itch.io/let-there-be-love]itch.io[/url]]

Turned into a demon, Valen searches through ruins infused with fairytale magic looking for something to break his curse. Meeting a mysterious if slightly playful vampire with a curse of his own to worry about, maybe they can be the solution to each other's troubles.

[From [url=https://glueblade.itch.io/petals-to-petals]itch.io[/url]]
title: Petals to Petals

description:
When you're cursed to drain the life force of everything you touch, it's helpful to have a friend* who'll repot your plants for you and make you go outside occasionally.

*it's complicated

[From [url=https://glueblade.itch.io/dol]itch.io[/url]]
title: Deathtouch on Leaves
Bloom Eternal
description:
Delilah is stuck between the tumultuous indignities of adolescence and the quiet ennui of adulthood, frozen in place before this choice that life had presented her with. Right on the line of 'too old to be acting like this' and 'too young to be trusted.'

“Bloom Eternal” is a coming of age sci-fi/romance visual novel set in the late 1980’s with an emphasis on dialogue choices and time travel mechanics.

Not everything follows the rules of time and space.

[From [url=https://merrygold.itch.io/bloom-eternal]itch.io[/url]]

title: Hexes & Heartstrings
description:
Rise and shine, familiar! It's the start of the new year, and you've got all these tasks ahead of you before the sabbath at All Hallow's Eve towards the year's end. Tend to your master, tend to your duties, and develop a tendency for poking your nose into situations where they don't belong.

After all, a good familiar knows when to back down and when to step forward. And you're the best of them all, aren't you?

[From [url=https://saiyohara.itch.io/hexes-heartstrings]itch.io[/url]]

You wake up next to someone familiar- Kai, your boyfriend of three years. Everything feels normal. The TV is still playing, the smell of popcorn lingers, and his warmth is comforting. But something isn’t right.

You don’t remember meeting him. 

[From [url=https://flaminglemon.itch.io/ninefold-promise]itch.io[/url]]
title: Ninefold Promise
Mail To The Moon
description:
A princess is trapped in the dark side of the Moon when a space pirate crashes in.  Both mesmerized, they decide to become pen pals. Follow them to see how their romance develops. Will they be able to get together?

[From [url=https://michinosfofinos.itch.io/mailtothemoon]itch.io[/url]]

title: Forever Yours, The Devil
description:
You kissed the Devil. Now you're trapped in her world. 

After a fateful kiss, you awaken as a witch in the cursed world of Parcae, bound by a prophecy.

Come diamond fractals, fiends, and fare,
A witch is born with two moons to spare.
If the old wall weeps and hears its tongue,
The path is set with the right hand of the sun.
Then, for the empire's heart, bring forth it's shield,
And for knowledge, a conductor of the magic's field.
Three gates shall bow down for each price once paid,
But the witch alone slays the umbra of Parcae.

To prevent the world from ending in ten weeks, you must pass three trials: Trust, Courage, and Honesty - all while navigating the tangled relationships of your unlikely team.

[From [url=https://gloamystudios.itch.io/forever-yours-the-devil]itch.io[/url]]

You're Alex, an artist struggling with art block amidst her final exam. One day she stumbles upon a cheap house - a true fixer upper and sensing this might be the cure for her problems, she strikes.  A new place always holds a few challenges, but seeing a mysterious woman appear in her hallway was not on her bingo card. Curious about what this woman wants, Alex is in for a ride that suddenly puts a heavy decision in her hands. 

[From [url=https://iamthoe.itch.io/unfinished]itch.io[/url]]
title: Unfinished
Until We Meet Again
description:
Until We Meet Again is a bite-sized visual novel about a demon lord and the woman who’s come to kill him. Though it seems an easy task, things become more complicated when they realize they’ve met before. 

[From [url=https://wolf-noise-entertainment.itch.io/until-we-meet-again]itch.io[/url]]

This heist was supposed to finally bring our vampire thieves from rags to riches.
Breaking into the home of one the most famous relic archivist of the city is no easy feat, but nothing seemed impossible for Leon's talents and Damien's witts. Well... at least until they dropped and broke their prize, releasing a trickster entity with a very special agenda. 

[From [url=https://sleepytristan.itch.io/the-sweetest-con]itch.io[/url]]
title: The Sweetest Con

description:
Iris is the newest member of the Love Squad, a group of Magicals who draw their power from love to protect their city from Nulls alongside other magical teams! She even got to join the Magical Net, where most of their communications will go through when they're not fighting together as a team!

She just needs to deal with the fact she both doesn't understand why she's in a team powered by love when she has a hard time understanding it, or really understanding HOW she loves, AND a new Null threat arriving! That shouldn't be a problem, but when you're new and rather nervous and fearful that your team might not REALLY like you, well...

Still, the power of love comes in many forms, many types and her way of loving, not to mention the other members of the Love Squad's ways, may not make sense to others...

But it doesn't have to. It just needs to beat back Nulls with the power of Love!

[From [url=https://bibixp.itch.io/lovely-magicals]itch.io[/url]]
title: Lovely Magicals!

description:
A rainstorm comes through and crashes on your back, damaging your wings severely. Now you have to navigate the world without flight...but how?

If only there were three fairy girls to guide you through that while also charming you into a kiss.

[From [url=https://snatch-gaymes.itch.io/romance-on-the-fly]itch.io[/url]]
title: Romance on the Fly!

description:
Raven Espiritu has been in love with his childhood best friend and Dungeon Master, Piers Batumbakal. But when his friends suggest pushing him to confess, the lines between reality and fantasy blur when Raven's feelings start bleeding into the session–not unlike the way the Paladin started bleeding because she was charmed by a sea witch.

As the lines between fantasy and reality blur, can Raven roll a nat 20 and gain the courage to tell Piers how he really feels? Or is this a critical failure in love? 

[From [url=https://owltio.itch.io/hes-dating-the-dm]itch.io[/url]]
title: He's Dating the DM?!
Tomorrow's Wisteria
description:
Once upon a time in a land brimming with life, it was not unheard of for mankind to fell the nature around them to propagate their society. Steam overturned lush forests, hills flattened to even ground to make way for the advancement of technologies. 

Those who remain close to nature are few and far between, and yet, Adelheid is unfortunate enough to be born with the blood of those deemed transgressors. She carries with her the burden of their sins, petals spilling from her eye and digits turned to pistils, reminding them of the beauty that they have forsaken. This curse hangs over her head, and as her 18th birthday draws near, its shadow of a reaper rears its sickle by her throat. 

Will Princess Brynhilde be able to save her only dear friend?

[From [url=https://bunncupid.itch.io/tomorrows-wisteria]itch.io[/url]]

Have you ever dreamed of finding a good company for tabletop role-playing games? This time you can fully immerse yourself in erotic adventures!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3087470/]Steam[/url]]
title: EmyLiveShow: Demons & Mistresses Tale
Ubu
description:
[b][i]A pictorial guide to stock photos for pensioners and others.[/i][/b]

This is a story about stock photos and creators. It focuses on a man and a stock photo. The man is searching for a certain creation, whilst the stock photo seeks to be back in the hands of humans. Together, they roll for stock photos using the Shutterstock gacha app.
Offline versions of the same-titled gacha game.
title: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku o! Fantastic Days
Hajimete no NICU (Tansaku Hen)
description:
Players take on the role of a nursing student participating in clinical training at a NICU. By collaborating with medical staff and families, you will learn the basics of neonatal intensive care, communication with patient families, and the challenges of transitioning from hospital to home care.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3415140/]Steam[/url]]

Enticed by the prospects of fame and fortune, a senior class of exorcist students roam the halls of the infamous East Ridge High where numerous blood thirsty spirits hunt the halls for fresh prey. Each spirit they face has its own gut-wrenching story that these students will witness the horrors of, as they fight to make it to graduation day with their lives.

[From [url=https://enerd-official.itch.io/redo]Itch.io[/url]]
title: ReDo
Endless Deep: Width of a Room
description:
ENDLESS DEEP: WIDTH OF A ROOM is a gothic horror mystery romance that follows the player, Cain, as you dare to unravel a centuries old plot at behest of an old journal that fell into your hands. As dreams and reality begin to merge, it becomes increasingly obvious that there is always a Devil in the details, rooted in between the lines that blur reality. It is a fool's errand to chase after all that ever was and all that's ever known; but does that stop you?

[From [url=https://labyrintheexe.itch.io/endless-deep-width-of-a-room]itch.io[/url]]

title: 700 megabajt
description:
Oleg Astafyev is preparing to move to Moscow for work and the start of a new life. This brings back memories of when, fifteen years ago, he moved with his family at the end of the school year.

The end of ninth grade in the distant 2004 turned out to be a very eventful time for Oleg: a new city, a new school, and new acquaintances. He had to quickly integrate into both school and street life in order to escape a home full of problems.

title: Bihaeng? Cheongchun!
description:
Due to my fearsome appearance, I have a hard time making friends. However, at the request of a girl with a cat hairpin, I ended up saving a cat.
Then the girl made an unexpected request to me.
"Please help me fly!"

title: Vampire Bunny Girl Cheot Gogaek Muryo Service!
Joahaneun Neoege.
description: One day, when you arrive at school, you find a mysterious letter on your desk. You don't know who wrote it or sent it... You decide to search for the owner of this letter with your friends Oa, Miji, and Jia. Who could the owner of the letter be?

The protagonist, Song Min-kyu, who is cultivating a garden alone, is increasingly facing difficulties while balancing his studies. At this time, a girl named Baek So-eun suddenly appears! She acts on her impulses and speaks loudly, but she doesn't seem to be a bad person.
Min-kyu finds it strange that he feels both annoyed and yet pleased by her presence.
What kind of relationship do these two have?
title: Sowoneun Mwodeun Iruoejinayo?

description: In the winter of my second year of high school, what I thought was a confession turned out to be about managing a café. Face the past and revive her café.
title: Changgae Pin Nunkkotgwa Gyeoului café

description:
Echo Tangent is a horror visual novel about a small and isolated desert town located somewhere in the southwestern states. In this version of the world, a certain someone doesn't die early on. This trigger a lot of changes and new events for the friend group as they all reunite during springbreak. This bonus otter actually becomes one of the two protagonists of this story that will experience the town's unnatural events.

Will they each be able to come out unharmed or will they change for the worse after this dreadful week? One thing is sure, Echo itself also waited for this reunion...

[From [url=https://lucasso972.itch.io/echo-tangent]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Echo Tangent

description:
Raymond is a college student who has lacked an objective since a tragic incident in his past. At the moment when everything appears promising, he suddenly finds himself waking up in a mysterious mansion that apparently has no exits or windows, leaving him in total confinement. Not only he, but eleven others all find themselves in the same situation without any guide or clue as to what is going on, leaving them to wonder how they got there, what took them there, and what exactly is going on

Raymond ends up joining a group and during their days spent living in this mansion they spend time getting to know each other while exploring the mansion's various rooms looking for clues as to a way out or some hint of what brought them there, however, the previously positive atmosphere is completely shattered when one of them shows up dead without explanation and they all panic, not only desperate to find a way out but also to figure out why someone died? Was it a murder and is another death about to take place?

Will Raymond be able to find his way out and uncover the mystery behind the murders or will he just remain trapped and eventually killed? The future is not yet decided
title: Sisyphean Mansion
How to Date an Entity (and stay alive)
As Hard as We Fall
description:
"Jamison Barclay, apathetic 24 year old, is finally evicted from his apartment after several-times repeated failure to pay rent. With his family living hours away and no car to sleep in, Jamison calls a “deer” friend from his childhood, who in a stroke of luck is now a landlord. He offers Jamison a free month of rent with the promise that Jamison will soon find a job.
Follow Jamison as he:

Searches for ambition in a world that seems to be against him.

Observes the day-to-day of his odd neighbors in attempt to discover the magic behind making it through life.

Confronts the parts of himself he hates the most.

Discovers that not everything is as it seems."

(Sourced from the As Hard as We Fall website)

young hiki-mori guy in his school years, he was apathetic to everything except his classmate, she was the only one who was not indifferent to him, but because of ridicule from classmates he closes himself and almost reaches suicide. 4 years have passed, but since then, his best friend has become reclusiveness, computer games and manga.

One evening, a strange letter arrives to the hero, in which he is invited to immerse himself in virtual reality. But the hero does not yet know that the city of elves, magicians and the evil sorceress who enslaved all men will be waiting for him there. A difficult choice will fall on his shoulders, to help the elves or to take the path of evil and become a new villain.

You have to plunge into the fantasy world, fight against goblins, evil animals, a real Cerberus, and an evil witch!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1251680/Rescue_Elves/]Steam[/url]]
title: Rescue Elves
Shinjin Shirouto-chan: Aizawa Momoka-chan ~Hatsudori Dakedo, Oshiri no Hajimete mo Issho ni Zenbu Agechau~
A Tale of Two Flowers
description:
"You are less of a living creature but a fragile flower that could die from the wrong of the slightest touch."

Follow the story of May as her life slowly falls apart over an entire week.
She will be pushed to one of the three fates decided
A Voice in her head leading.
Can you save the sweet bunny girl from her nightmare?
Or will you let it consume her?
Sweet tender nightmare.

Princess Priya Sultana has the gift-or more accurately-the curse, to turn anything she touches into gold. But now the curse is getting worse, and it's up to her and her loyal Knight, Kairo, to seek help to break it once and for all. Enlisting the help of an expert on magic-Assad. The three help Priya cure her curse, falling in love with each other along the way.

[From [url=https://meant-to-bee-studios.itch.io/golden-bonds]itch.io[/url]]
title: Golden Bonds
Lyceum of Leviathans
description:
Lyceum of Leviathans takes place in a world where monsters and humans once lived together but after a terrible accident 500 years ago, monsters now live hidden amongst humans. 

Now you're a human in your senior year of high school and you’ve put off your college applications long enough, it's time to lock in! But… lock in on what? So many of your classmates have clear paths ahead of them or huge passions, but you just want to grow up and move out of this small town. Talk to your classmates about their lives, dreams, and fears all while feeling like you are finally growing closer to someone you never thought you had a chance with. 

[From [url=https://cygnusinspace.itch.io/lyceum-of-leviathans]itch.io[/url]]

A fairytale romance, cozy baking scenes, staying warm inside on a cold winter's day... what could go wrong?

You play as Michaela, a kind and overly optimistic young woman. When she meets Swanhilde, a beautiful and mysterious baker woman, she's instantly smitten. Explore Swanhilde's cabin and help her prepare a grand feast. If you're lucky, you may even woo her in time for dinner.

[From [url=https://kirigayapnk.itch.io/hexenhaus]itch.io[/url]]
title: Hexenhaus
Beat of the Atrium
description:
It’s a strange day at the office, and you’re a temperamental office worker. 

You and your (one-sided) Office rival are assigned a project, investigating the green house of the company building. A simple in and out job goes south as the rot spreads quickly, if the plants die you’d definitely get that cut out of your paychecks, but discovering the cause might not be worth the price.

You both quickly realize things are way out of both your pay grades.

[From [url=https://coraliacries.itch.io/beat-of-the-atrium]itch.io[/url]]

title: Stonethaw
description:
Stonethaw is a cute romance game set in a world of radios and sailing stones, in the days leading up to the annual Stonethaw Festival. When two stone-sailors crash islands days before the festivities, it's only a matter of time before something happens. Right?

[From [url=https://featherboy.itch.io/stonethaw]itch.io[/url]]

title: The Witch's Yellow Flower
description:
Emberly wants to learn of magic, but as her village has banned it, she has to go through an unconventional method. To go and ask the witch of the woods to teach her magic.

[From [url=https://s0m1ra.itch.io/thewitchsyellowflower]itch.io[/url]]

title: End of the World
description:
This is a sad one. It is kind of about the beginning of a world. And kind of about the end of one. Kind of about love and about sacrifice. About life and death. Kind of about a lot of things. But really, just about two people walking together till the end. 

[From [url=https://broodygaming.itch.io/end-of-the-world]itch.io[/url]]

What does one do when their partner dies in a tragic accident, leaving them dismembered and disemboweled? Harvest the body parts of the innocent of course! Play as Dr. Luvinstein, a mad scientist turned serial dater turned possible serial killer as you attempt to collect all the parts required to bring your one true love back to the world of the living… or will you find a new love along the way?

In a world of monsters and mythical beings, is being a murderer really that bad? Luckily in this town there are plenty of potential donors for your project…

[From [url=https://brooke-rader.itch.io/drluvinstein]itch.io[/url]]
title: Dr. Luvinstein
Bokura wa Kigasu ni Oborete Iku

description:
Samar is a young witch who works the spirit-swapping night shift in the eastern outskirts of Demashq. A recent spike in spirits crossing over from another dimension within the borders of the city has them puzzling over what’s going on. 

With friends needing help - and a popular band scheduled to kick off their big comeback tour in Demashq - Samar needs to work quickly before the city is overrun with stans and spirits alike!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/1592170/Spirit_Swap_Lofi_Beats_to_Match3_To/]Steam[/url]]
title: Spirit Swap: Lofi Beats to Match-3 To

description:
The wedding is a front for a court of lies. Birham Bowen and Cassadeigha Chaplshire find themselves the unwilling stars of this puppet show. While their parents claim that it’s for the families’ reputation and that they are in dire need of a spouse at their age, the two believe there is more to the arrangement than they let on. What secrets could their families be hiding? Can the bride and the groom find the evils lurking behind their tales before the wedding and craft a reason to put it to an end?

In this regency-inspired setting, switch between both perspectives as they uncover the truth of the family: catching rumors, gossip, and the worst of the filth in their own manor. But their cases are always missing a vital piece. Could their would-be spouse have what they need to complete them? 

Assuming the newly engaged couple can stop going at each other's throats long enough to have a decent conversation…

[From [url=https://delve-murder-nevermore.itch.io/till-our-social-deaths-do-us-part]itch.io[/url]]
title: Till Our Social Deaths Do Us Part

description:
Coffee... How many amazing adventures have started with a sip of this invigorating beverage! How many spicy stories followed the invitation for a cup of coffee! Now it is hard to imagine the world without it. And the amazing events in the life of our hero began with coffee.

Join the young man who wants to become an apprentice of the greatest barista in history. Finding himself under the roof of a cozy cafe, our hero will quickly realize that the staff here will steal his heart and settle in his hot dreams for a long time! Who would miss such an opportunity - to fulfill his dream, and even in the company of charming and passionate girls?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3471590/]Steam[/url]]
title: Coffee & Boobs
Prodolzhat' zhit'...
description:
Which is more important — to go with your loved one to the end, or to stop him on the edge of the abyss?

Artyom was lucky, he pulled out a lucky ticket. After his shift at Sovenka with Alice, the pioneer did not go to his own world, but left with the girl by bus to the very regional center that was so much talked about in the camp.

What awaits them — the scary but fun 90s, stormy love, or a personal tragedy? Or maybe all at once? The answers to your questions are waiting for you in the very fashion.

The high school you were going to enter was unexpectedly demolished, so you transferred to its sister school with your childhood friend Reimon. There you meet a boy with peach-colored hair named Haruta Zenpuku, who is cheerful, but somewhat strange...?
Choose the right options to spend your first year of high school safely!

[Translated from [url=https://novelgame.jp/games/show/10842]Novelgame[/url]]
title: Koi o Shinaide
Aru OL-tachi no Henbou -The TF of Some Office Ladies-
Sakusei Bokujou ni Towararete -Ningen no Succubus no Gohan ja Nai-

description:
While enjoying a quiet morning with your father, a mysterious letter arrives—an invitation to Morvayne Academy, a prestigious institution for those with extraordinary destinies.

Within its halls, you will step into a world unlike any other, where magic and fate intertwine, leading you to uncover your true purpose.

Immerse yourself fully in this magical world as the Arcanist, a special being capable of wielding arcane magic, meet the girls who will shape your future, learn the limits of your powers, and find your place in the world! 

It's time to break the cycle.

[From [url=https://runicer.itch.io/the-arcanist]Itch.io[/url]]
title: The Arcanist
Sibling Souls
description:
You are Lina, a young woman desperate to find your twin brother, who vanished the night he became a vampire. Leaving behind the safety of your home, you step into a city where danger hides in every shadow. In your search for answers, you’ll uncover secrets that threaten not just your brother—but the fragile balance of the world itself.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3383360/]Steam[/url]]

title: Medusa
description:
Misaki is a...Well, not so ordinary girl. After a few successes on her essay during the junior year, Misaki got invited to a cross college event that involved a few of the international colleges. During the party, Misaki accidentally overheard a conversation from a familiar voice, then quickly recognized the student from the other college: Midzuki Mizuki......

[From [url=https://daruku-darc.itch.io/medusa]itch.io[/url]]

title: How I Became a Hero
description:
"How I Became a Hero" is an adult visual novel that puts the player in the role of a blind teenager. After receiving a mysterious gift from their best friend, the protagonist finds themselves transported to a fantastical world filled with magic with a variety of creatures, including elves, dwarves, giants and other magical beings.

The game's storyline is centered around the protagonist's journey from being an ordinary teenager to becoming a hero in this new world. Along the way, the player will meet various characters who will help during the quest. They will encounter challenges, face dangers, and ultimately uncover the truth behind their friend's mysterious gift and the world they find themselves in. Some of the girls will find a liking in the protagonist and engage in sexual activities and even deeper romantic relationships.

Overall, "How I Became a Hero" offers players a compelling and engaging adult visual novel experience that is sure to satisfy fans of the genre. It explores themes of adventure, self-discovery, and overcoming challenges in a unique and fascinating way as the protagonist grows his harem, which will keep players hooked until the very end. 

[From [url=https://naughtytales.itch.io/hibah]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Ace Attorney: Beyond The Shadows
description: Ace Attorney: Beyond the Shadows is a collection of cases set after the events of Dual Destinies and the whole dark age of the law plotline, hence the title

title: Stay With Me
description:
You fall into a pond one day and end up in a magical new world. You are taken in by 3 strangers and must figure what the fuck to do next. ..and can you even trust these 3?

[From [url=https://arinmoss.itch.io/stay-with-me]itch.io[/url]]

The planet is... pretty much screwed, I'd say.

Fifteen years ago, the RSLR (rapid sea level rise) event wiped out the Arctic glaciers.

and within a year, almost 50 percent of the world's land mass was submerged.

A desertified planet, a society in shambles.

I was demoted from my job, estranged from my best friend, and my life was going nowhere.

In fact, I was saved, by a certain person...

...but forced to take the saviour with my own hands.

No, maybe that's not a good idea, maybe I should just make some pancakes.

After all, it's theoretically impossible to make the perfect pancake.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3380150/]Steam[/url]]
title: Pancake Yeogseol
Foss Park
description:
Foss Park is a psychological horror visual novel that takes you deep into the fractured mind of a nameless patient in an unsettling mental hospital. You awaken with no memory of how you arrived, haunted by fleeting images of a life destroyed—a house fire, a lost family, and echoes of a forgotten tragedy.

Guided—or tormented—by a cryptic Doctor, you must navigate your reality, answer probing and disturbing questions, and piece together the truth.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3476870/]Steam[/url]]

In a world where honor is tainted and secrets run deep within three distinct units - The Foresight, The Ingenuity, and The Guardian, Garrett Marek finds himself entangled in a web of deception. A dystopian society ruled by Deus Magnus Rotamea who shapes it through Transregnum exam.

As Garrett Marek navigates through treacherous challenges and confronts his past, a mysterious figure emerges to guide him to unravel the mysteries of his family's history. With allies turning into enemies and enemies lurking in the shadows, Garrett's journey takes him to the brink of despair and self-discovery. Will he be able to break free from the chains of fate and rewrite his own story by joining the resistance group called “The Fractured Gear”, or is he destined to be a pawn in a larger game of power and manipulation?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3451600/]Steam[/url]]
title: Transregnum

description:
It seems your father is sending two young girls (Lera 18yo and Nia 23yo) to live with you in Switzerland. Why? How? WHATTTTT ???

You will need to talk to them, educate them and play the big brother for now. Can you?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3411080/]Steam[/url]]
title: Cultural Exchange

description:
The Club is a game of domination and feminisation, centered around a fetish club called Club M, but known locally as “The Club”.

Within The Club, which Mistress Alice owns, you will find over 40 characters, including Dominatrices, Hostesses, She-Males and Maids, and they participate in a number of fetishes, such as domination, worship, bondage, sissification, spanking  and pet-play. 

You can play the game play as either a trainee Mistress or a trainee Maid, each of whom visit The Club and become immersed in the wonderful world of fetishism that they find there.
title: The Club
Dimensional Prophecy of Zohar Redux Layer 3: Porcupine Problems
description: Months after the Caine incident, mysterious couriers get killed in Kyoto Novalis. They transport a strange, extraterrestrial freight for an unknown recipient. This is a dark conspiracy which involves the Structures of the CFG institute. Meanwhile, Karala has her first day at her new school.

title: Saikyo no Oppai Party o Tsukutte Haramase Harem Bouken Seikatsu
Lycanthropy
description:
Belle Durchdenwald is a socially anxious recluse and bookworm who grapples with recurring nightmares of the incident that changed the trajectory of her life. Her life is unexpectedly turned upside-down when a series of irregular events disrupt her wedding day, eventually culminating in her worst fear coming to fruition. Everything seems to be going downhill until she’s whisked away from her fate by a hulking werewolf who identifies herself as “Otsana the Lone.” As past bonds are thrown into jeopardy and new connections begin to crystallize, she is forced to come to terms with not only her newfound identity, but also her growing feelings for her protector, all while gruesome murders begin to plague the Devil’s Jawbone.

Meanwhile, Alverne Wulfrun must grapple with what’s happened to her young friend and how it’s affected her meticulously constructed web of plans. As tensions rise and new threats present themselves, she will have to decide who to save, who to sacrifice, and ultimately, who to trust.

title: Seibo Kaitai ~Inran Do M Kyonyuu Mama ga Musuko no Haramizuma ni Naru Made~
description:
The main character, Haruta Kirimiya is the only son of a wealthy couple who lived in a tower block since he was young, and is enrolled in a prestigious private school but is currently semi-reclusive. 

His father, Yoshio, who is an elite employee of a large company, concludes that his son is being bullied because he is short and obese, and he despises his son, a "loser," so much that he devotes himself to work, ignoring his family.
 
On the other hand, his mother Mizuki , who was raised as a naive young lady, dotes on him, but she lacks knowledge about the growth of boys and treats him more like a child than his actual age. He had a cold hatred for his father, and a dark and twisted love for his young, beautiful and attractive mother.

 He may be like that, but in reality, he didn't live a life that would make his parents feel pessimistic. After all, he hasn't actually been bullied, and for several years now he has been day trading, giving up his school time, and has acquired a huge amount of assets. He has good relationships with his friends, and is able to obtain most of the things that money can buy. But now, he has given up, saying, "No matter how much money you have, it doesn't necessarily mean you'll be happy.'' 

What he really wants is not money, but Mizuki, a mother and a woman. One day, he notices that Mizuki, who usually acts cheerfully, is looking haggard. Mizuki says there is something she would like to discuss with Yoshio, but Yoshio says,  "The company's project is reaching its climax and I am busy,'' and her son is unable to approach her. Late at night, using Mizuki's finger, who is asleep from crying, he breaks through the smartphone's fingerprint authentication and registers his own fingerprint.
 
The next day, while Mizuki was taking a bath, he checked her smartphone and learned from her email and SNS history that his beloved mother had fallen victim to an investment scam and owes millions of yen. Furthermore, he learns that the reason she fell for the scam was because she tried to give her husband a luxury watch, which is his only hobby.

 Yoshio was in charge of all his own income and only gave Mizuki the amount of living expenses for his needs, so as a housewife, she didn't have any free money. As he explodes with hatred towards his father, and her husband, he realizes that his love for his mother, Mizuki, is becoming even more distorted....

With his financial strength, it would be a no-brainer for him to shoulder Mizuki's debt. Driven by passionate feelings, he comes up with a plan and pretends to be a fictitious wealthy man, "X'', and sends a threatening email to Mizuki saying, "I am a pervert who gets excited by watching a real parent and child having sex. If you send me a video of you having sex with your son, I will take over the debt depending on the content. If you report it to the police, I will reveal the debt to your husband.''

He then deposited a percentage of the debt into Mizuki's bank account as a deposit. He feels a dark sense of joy as he sees Mizuki clearly upset the next day. Then comes the night of the video trade deadline. Mizuki stealthily sneaks into his room, holding her breath as his chest and cock almost burst with excitement. Those fingers gently touch his rising desire...

description:

A day when humans exchange chocolate as tokens of affection or friendship—or, as some would claim, a sinister conspiracy by the confectionery industry [citation needed].
