However, on his way home, he was hit by a car and tragically lost his life.

In the afterlife, he met Chocoriel, the angel of Valentine’s Day.

“Congratulations! You are the 214th person to die on February 14th! As a special bonus for this milestone, you’ve earned the right to relive the day!”

And so, Akira was granted a chance to redo February 14th.

But there’s a catch…

“Forget about getting chocolates today!”

Yes, the very thing that triggered his death was receiving multiple chocolates.

An overwhelming amount of love can destroy a man, after all.

To change his fate, Akira must ensure he avoids accepting chocolates from any girl except the one he truly has his heart set on.

“Focus on your true love and break all the other flags, okay? ❤”

And so begins Akira’s day of systematically shattering the flags he had worked so hard to set up.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3424470/]Steam[/url]]
title: Kyou wa Valentinus ga Shokei Sareta Hida Yo!
aliases: The Day Valentine Died, and So Did I!

title: Tomboy: Annoying Childhood Friend
description:
Join Jimmy and his mischievous, tomboyish childhood friend Nana in this steamy, emotional visual novel. Years after their playful but troublesome school days, fate brings them back together during an unexpected reunion. What starts as an annoying reminder of the past soon turns into a journey of discovery, challenges, and unexpected feelings as the two find themselves stranded and relying on each other to get back home.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3439530/]Steam[/url]]

title: This Body Is Not Mine
description:
Your loved ones were once two might orcs with pride and power in their hands. Until injury befell them, rendering them weak and confused. They are no longer familiar with their own bodies.

[Edited from [url=https://trisghost.itch.io/this-body-is-not-mine]itch.io[/url]]

title: Wakai Otoko ni Hamatte Shimatta Part no Okusan no Ohanashi
Hero in Training
description:
You live in a peaceful village, and after a discovery of an ancient evil awakens, you need to answer the call to defend everyone you love against a terrible evil that is approaching! For that, you have three masters to train you into becoming a powerful hero! a motherly master in the arcane arts, a young but powerful ranger of the forest, and an experienced priestess of war.

But your natural powers awaken a strong lustful desire towards your masters, resulting in sexy situations, and you can decide which one you will end up having relationships with... or maybe you can have them all; it's your decision to make. It will be full of fun interactions, lighthearted characters, sexy situations, discovering new sexy kinks, dealing with them, and finding out that accepting this part of yourself is part of self-growth.

[From [url=https://toshikagame.itch.io/hero-in-training]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Burgundy shadows
description:
Set in a dark and dangerous world inhabited by vampire, players will find themselves entangled in a complex conspiracy aimed at seizing control of the city. To unravel the plot and save their friends, players must team up with other vampires, and explore the city's dark corners in search of clues and answers.

[From [url=https://hroft32.itch.io/burgundy-shadows]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Inkou Gyoumu Report ~Watashi ga Shuushoku Shita Kigyou wa, Ecchi na Oshigoto ga Aru Kaisha Datta Ken~

description:
Friendship is… something.

You may be asking yourself: “Why attend Canterlot High?”

This is an environment where you will be presented with the opportunity to make cherished memories, form lifelong friendships, and experience exciting adventures you wouldn’t find anywhere else!

As you get settled in with your host family, you may feel a little overwhelmed at first, but we’re confident you’ll get the hang of it all in no time!

(Description from official game site: https://homeschool-studios.itch.io/canterlot-exchange)
title: Canterlot Exchange

description:
You will be a young prince that is not only in the middle of a crisis, but whose road to the throne is less than certain. The kingdom is ravaged by war, schemes, debt, and death among other things.

You will play the first day of each week, which is meant to set the example of what your character does the rest of that week. I found this made more sense than a day to day game for the logic of how fast skills increase, how quickly relationships develop, and the time between game events, etc.
That first day will then be divided in four stages. Morning, Noon, Evening and Night.
During the morning you will hold court. That is the time when subjects of the kingdom will bring you petitions for you to give your judgement.
Your choices will affect how the kingdom sees you as a ruler. With this in mind it will be near impossible to please all the factions, and they might rebel or scheme if their support reaches zero. Having a good relationship with them on the other hand might unlock different things that are more pleasant.
Your skill level might also unlock different solutions for the problems brought to the court. These options are usually better.
After holding court, the noon and evening times you will spend them in the map menu. There you can decide which skills you will develop during the week.
title: Kingmaker
Shattered Minds
description:
Shattered Minds is an open-world game, in which you take control over the life of a college student.
Your normal life is thrown out of whack after you realize you have the power to control the minds of others.
You will use this power to make all your dreams, desires and wishes come true!
A world with countless quests, figures, plots and locations are waiting to be discovered and controlled by you!

Shattered Minds includes plenty of animations, a licensed soundtrack and atmospheric sound effects!
Be ready to experience a game full of sexy adventures!
All paired with a thrilling, mysterious yet humorous plot.

title: Parasite Dawn
description: Parasite Dawn is about a modern town which comes under the dark and sexy influence of a parasite which gives people the body of their dreams. However, that comes at the cost of their minds. Follow the Empress in her takeover of this town, and the various people that will fall to her rule. Or maybe, they will resist instead...

title: Chosen
description:
Chosen by a demoness, you are destined to satiate lust in your slowly dying world...

After waking up to a magical sight, your world has been turned upside down.
Accepting the contract without much thought, forced you into a spiral of unforeseen circumstances, and You need to take control over whats happening.

title: Eclipse: Special Forces
description:
The world that achieved 1,500 years of peace under the blessing of the Creator La, and the supernatural special forces "Eclipse", which exist to maintain that peace.

While investigating a series of indiscriminate assault cases, Haesu, a member of Eclipse, uncovers the existence of a rising cult known as “Apep”….

She gradually begins to uncover the "existence of a hidden traitor within Eclipse" and the "long-buried truth" that has been forgotten for 1,500 years….

What truths will Haesu come to uncover, and what choices will she ultimately make?

Will Haesu be able to keep safe the one she holds dear?

It's in your hands.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3280020/Eclipse__Special_Forces/]Steam[/url]]

It's been two weeks after reuniting with your annoying ex-boyfriend Zachariah Crowley. 

Two weeks of you working on trusting him again. 

Two weeks of fleeting touches and unspoken words fuelled by memories of the past and a love that is still there.

But that fragile tranquility is shattered when Zachariah is left injured and bleeding after an ambush and It's up to you to get you both to safety.

Between stitching his wounds, all too familiar banter, and whispered confessions...
Will Zachariah finally tell you the truth about his betrayal?

[From [url=https://helloyinny.itch.io/honey-trap-burned]itch.io[/url]]
title: Honey Trap: Burned

description:
You wake up in a strange place with a strange blue... Prince(?) who is trying to help you.

He talks about going through trials to help you find yourself, but what does that even mean? What is happening? Nothing makes any sense!

Who are you? 

The choice is yours.

[From [url=https://wordy-octopi.itch.io/falling-for-prince-crashing-demo]itch.io[/url]]

A companion game to [url=https://tapas.io/series/Knightfall/info]KNIGHTFALL[/url]
title: Falling For Prince Crashing

description: Follow Shura and the Order of the White Rose as they battle against demons and other supernatural creatures. As he joins forces with the Order he will learn about an underworld that exists within the city, a battle of good and evil stretching for hundreds of years, and a secret about his past that may put him at the center of the current struggle.
title: Order of the White Rose

description:
It follows a young man haunted by his past and vivid nightmares. Oliver Reed is thrust into a hidden world of magic and danger, where he must train as a sorcerer to uncover the truth about himself and confront a power that threatens to consume him, all while being constantly tempted by a captivating array of pretty and unusual girls, each with their own secrets and desires.

[From [url=https://www.patreon.com/henvoxy/about]Patreon[/url]]
title: Lewdcraft

description:
After losing your position as a priest for the Vatican, you find yourself employed for a shady company. You've been hired to perform exorcisms on all sorts of entities. The only thing you can't seem to understand is... Why do they all haunt video games?


"The Retro Exorcist" is a narrative-focused visual novel centered around a former priest as he attempts to exorcize a plethora of haunted video game discs and cartridges. In order to set these entities free, you must ask them several questions to learn more about their past lives. But be careful, too many questions will cause them to go berserk, and not every question is important to the investigation. 

[From [url=https://mettaseven.itch.io/retro-exorcist]itch.io[/url]]
title: Retro Exorcist

description:
Rubbernecking is a dangerous sport, and after being caught in the act by your GF, it's blue balls for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Luckily the person in question takes sympathy and offers you a Plan B--some relief on the side.

However, after engaging through instant messaging, you soon learn that your interest has a secret, and your role will be less than "traditional".

Find out if the grass is greener on the other side. 🍆🍑

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3320790/]Steam[/url]]
title: Caught Lacking - Femboy Edition
Succubus Summon
description:
Delphi's curiosity gets the best of her once more... And this time that makes her meddle with a naughty succubus!
Without knowing, she'll become a summoner, bringing forces beyond anyone's control to this world.
Will she be able to tame this lewd creature's sexual drive? Or will it be the other way around?

title: Mind Control
description:
Mind Control is an adult visual novel that narrates the journey of a young man who discovers his mental powers. As a young man living with his parents and sister, you lead an everyday life attending school and socializing with friends. Despite being a virgin, your newfound abilities might offer new opportunities.

Engage in an immersive experience that challenges the norms of ethics and personal relationships in the ever-changing world of young adults.

[From [url=https://specialmind.itch.io/mind-control]Itch[/url]]

title: The Adored Marriage
description:
A happily married couple, having shared many joyful years together, decides to explore a new dimension in their relationship. Step by step, they venture into uncharted territories, embarking on a journey of self-discovery and shared experiences. Along the way, they meet new people, embrace fresh fantasies, and inject an exhilarating sense of adventure into their lives. Their story unfolds as they navigate the delicate balance between love, trust, and the thrill of the unknown.

[From F95Zone]

title: Your Harem Will Be Mine
description:
Norman is a young man who is quite popular with girls, one day he discovers that his wife was cheating on him with a personal trainer. He decides to separate from her and return to his parents' house... With his heart full of hate and resentment, he decides that from that day onwards he will create his own harem, to show his ex-wife that he doesn't care about her anymore. However, he doesn't know that several men are also interested in the same girls as him. Will he be able to assemble his harem or will someone get in his way?

[From [url=https://kazuki-chan.itch.io/your-harem-will-be-mine]Itch.io[/url]]

aliases: Let's Bring Her to the Verge of Tears!
title: Zettai Nakibeso Kakashite Yaru!
Sisterhood
description:
[url=https://sisterhood.whizvox.me]Sisterhood[/url] is an ambitious project to expand the narrative of the cult classic visual novel, [url=https://vndb.org/v945]Katawa Shoujo[/url], by adapting the [url=https://ks.fhs.sh/viewtopic.php?t=9907]eponym epic-length work of fanfiction[/url] into a full-fledged visual novel.

This is an epilogue story to Hanako's route, starting a few days after her good ending. It's highly recommended you (re)read Katawa Shoujo before experiencing Sisterhood. While Hanako is, for the most part, the central character in the story, the point of view alternates between her, Hisao and Lilly.

Sisterhood is a mod for [url=https://vndb.org/r97944]Katawa Shoujo - Re-Engineered[/url], a fan-made HD remaster that includes modding support.
Sisterhood is a work in progress. Act 1 is complete and covers chapters 1 through 17 of the original fanfiction. Chapters 18 to 60+ will be covered in subsequent releases.

title: Gakuen Abaddon -THE END IS NEAR-
description:
You, Yamanobe Homura, have bid adieu your average life at Manakami Academy. Coinciding with a total solar eclipse, the school has malformed into a wriggling hellscape!

Sure enough, having helped some survivors, you are given the option to join forces with your loved ones among them. Can you take back peace for this school from the wretched river spirits flooding through it all in one piece?!

Who, between the people in this party of five you choose, will be the ones last standing?! Whatever happens will be all by your hands...

[Translated from [url=https://www.dlsite.com/home/announce/=/product_id/RJ377878.html]DLSite[/url]]

Come on an adult fantasy adventure in an ancient realm of Celtic myth and legend!
You are 'the Scythian', a hero of an immortal race of demi-gods known as the Tuatha De Danann. Fighting in the final great battle for the fate of his people, the Scythian suddenly finds himself in a wild land of warring kingdoms and beautiful, fiery women. Where is he? And why he is he being pursued by a relentless evil with no name? Will you raise your fabled sword in the name of your people, or will you give into the shadowy impulses that dwell inside your heart?
Based on the tales and characters of Irish and Welsh mythology, Heroes of Celtica is a story-rich and choice-based visual novel adventure. Play the Scythian (name selectable) through four storylines as either a heroic champion, a rougish bard, a scheming druid or a ruthless warlord!

[From [url=https://slamjax.itch.io/heroes-of-celtica]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Heroes of Celtica

description:
Laughing Lily is a short visual novel about Alex - an ordinary guy who just started dating a girl from his class named Lily. She’s affectionate, upbeat and super sweet, but being the daughter of a famous touring comedian is not easy. When her dad is not around, it’s up to Alex to bring the laughs by doing his best to…Think!

Which naturally involves completing tricky platforming challenges, duh. Bring a spark to your jokes by guiding Bulb Boy to the finish line and romance may blossom this summer. Fail and your jokes fall flat, making things take a turn for the worse… one less laugh at a time.

[From [url=https://treetop-bandits.itch.io/laughing-lily]itch.io[/url]]
title: Laughing Lily
Vaporwave 2059
description:
Overview:
In the sci-fi/cyberpunk setting of Vaporwave 2059, you navigate complex relationships, and dive deep into personal histories. At the same time, you struggle with unveiling your past, stirring emotions and seeking understanding in a world colored by cyber aesthetics. As tensions rise, decisions made will either strengthen bonds or pull people apart. Beyond the neon lights and synth vibes, lies a story of trust, lust, patience, and the importance of relationships with others.​
From F95

You play for Frank, the protagonist, who was imprisoned for 18 years. And suddenly he was released for unknown reasons. During this time, much has changed. The city was influenced by one person. There are gangs on the streets of the city. They are spreading a new synthetic drug Mirage. Prostitutes do not smile at your meeting. Local merchants pay to others. You have just to go away from the hustle and bustle of the city and live alone. If it is about you, then do it (you may not to read further). But our hero is not like that. He is used to be the best in everything. If he has nothing, he will take it from others. And it is better not to get on his way.
From F95
title: Bad Hero
Wicked Ways
description:
Wicked Ways is an adult visual novel that puts you in the role of a creative director at an advertising agency, navigating a world filled with temptation and desire.
As you balance your career with complex relationships, you'll find yourself drawn into a web of romance and moral dilemmas. The game features slice-of-life and semi-harem elements, where your choices often blur the lines between loyalty and passion, drawing you deeper into the intricate lives of those you engage with.
Get ready for a journey where temptation is never far away, and the decisions you make have consequences, shaping the unfolding drama and the convoluted relationships around you.​
From F95

The idol duo Stardust is having their last concert.  Their biggest fan, Ori, is attending, and the last thing they want is to see their favorite group fade away.  So when they get to meet Stardust as a part of their VIP ticket, what will they decide to say?

[From [url=https://norbez.itch.io/stardust]itch.io[/url]]
title: Stardust

description:
A game about music, romance, and the covid-19 pandemic as a convenient plot device.

Perfect Pitch is set in the American Midwest in late summer 2020. Just before the crescendo of covid cases later that year which would mark one of the deadliest winters on record.

You are an up-and-coming multi-instrumentalist (named Miles by default) who is presented with a rather unique opportunity: a full-ride scholarship to the internationally renowned,  all-girls music conservatory named Géante Endormie.

But this scholarship is no simple charity... you have a job to do. The future of your classmates, and the future of the Conservatoire, depends on it.

Enjoy your stay at Géante Endormie~

[From [url=https://soundsommelier.itch.io/perfect-pitch]itch.io[/url]]
title: Perfect Pitch

description:
Twilight is a small dividing line between light and darkness. Sometimes you have to choose where you should stay and for what purpose.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3484310/]Steam[/url]]
title: Sumrak
PRECIOUS -Naze Shou wa Kami ni Idonda no ka?-

description:
Greetings!

Would you like to embark on an adventure with Ubgur?  

A happy little lizard who was tired of building houses every day.
He decided to escape from his home village to taste freedom.

In a world of libraries, where almost every book is magical. 
Reptiles are born and live to protect the knowledge written by wizards and gods alike.
It is a duty that has been fulfilled since the beginning of time...
But time has changed and many cults have arisen.
- It's definitely not safe outside the village thought.

[Edited from [url=https://harybdis.itch.io/brunn]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Brunn
IDUNN.
description:
That time of year has arrived again, the season of warmth and fun. It's the perfect time for a vacation on one of the country's luxurious islands!

Finn and his sister, along with their friends, are about to embark on an amazing trip. They'll explore new places and play various games together.

Along the way, they'll also meet new people who will make their journey even more exciting!

So, join them on this adventure, But just remember, don’t stay too close to the shore at night!

[From [url=https://polar-cake.itch.io/idunn]Itch.io[/url]]

“An unsettling visual novel where every decision shapes your destiny. Face seven diverse, cunning demons in a dark, atmospheric world and uncover hidden truths through multiple branching paths, culminating in nine distinct endings.”

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3424010/]Steam[/url]]
title: The Night of the Exorcism
The Beast of All
description:
The Beast of All is a visual novel about dating anthropomorphic animals.

[From [url=https://jakeline.itch.io/the-beast-of-all]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Three Weeks On The Atlantic
description:
Three Weeks On The Atlantic is an engrossing visual novel set in the 19th century that blends historical fiction and fantasy. The Player takes on the role of John Doe (A.Non), a young man who decides to leave his own country on a spur of the moment decision following a heated dispute with his father. John sets out on a life-altering voyage across the Atlantic Ocean aboard the first ship that becomes available, with nothing but uncertainty in store.

As the voyage unfolds, John encounters a diverse cast of characters, each with their own stories, struggles, and secrets. What makes this journey truly unique is that all the passengers and crew are dragons; majestic beings who challenge John’s understanding of the world and himself. 

Through conversations, choices, and introspection, John must navigate the complexities of his newfound relationships while grappling with the central question: What will he do with his life once the ship reaches its destination?

[From [url=https://horumaito.itch.io/three-weeks-on-the-atlantic]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Elf Life
description:
You bought an elf woman on the black market to become your wife, but you want to hear her ask you to marry her and to achieve this you will first have to break her will.

A very short visual novel where you buy an elf woman and keep her locked in a dungeon to try to break her will, but you end up falling in love with her.

[From [url=https://mogikaput.itch.io/elf-life]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Sweet!
description:
"They say the key to a person's heart is through his stomach... and I guess they'd be right!"

Delve into the world of Sweet in all its saccharine glory... and gore. Come and play as the main love interest in this rose-tinted world and settle back into your hometown for a while. College has been hard, and you deserve a break, don't you?  Luckily your old friend has offered to house you until you find your bearings. Why don't you explore the town while you're here? It's been quite a while, after all...

[From [url=https://rattata-wren.itch.io/sweet]Itch.io[/url]]

title: Yandere Wonderland
description:
Down on your luck, you take the train home, with the feeling of dread knowing that you may not have a job the next day. However the train home takes place on the eve of the heart queens untimely murder. Bringing you to the mirror dimension of your world.

[From [url=https://soapinsoup.itch.io/yandere-wonderland]Itch.io[/url]]

It used to be that ghosts, fae, gods, and everything in between were things of fiction. The “veil between worlds” was something mystical; something intangible.

That was before the boundary between physical and metaphysical came crashing down, and all those things turned out to be real. 

Already too wary of the world, the change adds another layer of uncertainty to your life that you’re barely able to handle. As the situation deteriorates globally, you feel your sanity steadily slipping away. 

And amidst it all, they call for you.

[From [url=https://chasmcritterstudios.itch.io/theycall]Itch.io[/url]]
title: They Call

description:
After failing to make it in the city, Cameron (you) is forced to return to their abusive home and enrol in a local university. You join a drama club since it’s something you wanted to experience that you could not before. Your goal is to make the most of your situation while experiencing all the things you missed out on and find a way out of your home.  

[From [url=https://venusinez.itch.io/sinner-solace]Itch.io[/url]]
title: Sinner Solace
The Symbiant II
description:
Rhodias is a low-rank criminal. One day, an inexplicable urge prompts him to leave his gang behind and take to the distant mountains.

While wandering the alien hinterlands, he comes across a handsome traveler who invites him to the Temple of Renewal, where he claims Rhodias is bound to obtain many answers to his questions.

Being in the sacred Temple reveals unexpected things about him, including a primal hunger he didn’t know he had. Even stranger… he now has a new desire, he’s not so comfortable admitting: a desire for a close connection with the men he meets.

Dive into this new mature story filled with mystery, tentacles and gorgeous men!

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3497960/The_Symbiant_II/]Steam[/url]]

title: Corporate Suck Up
description:
Oliver’s future at Reeve's Capital depends on winning over three strange colleagues while working as a secretary. Nothing ominous is happening if he doesn't think too hard about it.

A modern fantasy visual novel set in a corporate office. Interact with three main characters and two side characters to navigate the challenges of workplace dynamics and politics by building relationships and a good reputation for the ultimate goal of advancing your career.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3461430/]Steam[/url]]

title: Selfish Hope
description:
Life in a wolf tribe hasn't been kind some folk within it. Separated from the rest of the world in an ancient forest, two healers of this tribe find themselves at odds with the rest of the tribe. Marx, a human druid who discovered the tribe and offered help due to the tribe's lack of medical practices. Despite the help he offers, he's seen as an outsider along with other person named, Aster. A wolf with white fur that was outcasted for his brith being the result for the death of his mother, and for the color of his fur. Aster has found apprenticeship under Marx at his arrival and the two have found comfort with each other despite the hostile environment. Despite his role and duties of a healer, Marx finds the treatment of him and Aster too much to bare, and ask if a selfish desire justifies potentially risking the tribe's safety.

[From [url=https://maskedminos.itch.io/selfish-hope]Itch.io[/url]]

Welcome to MinotaurStories, a series of tales from the land of Asterian.

Meet Henry, a traveling minotaur who chronicles the people and places he encounters. With no memory of his past, Henry wakes up in an empty field, alone and searching for answers. As he journeys through Asterian, he documents everything from the towns and their inhabitants to the mysteries that seem obvious to others but perplexing to him. Through his writings, Henry hopes to uncover why he is the only minotaur in these lands and unlock the secrets of his forgotten past.

[From [url=https://maskedminos.itch.io/minotaurstories]Itch.io[/url]]
title: MinotaurStories

description:
Have you ever had an online friend? What if you were to meet them in real life? Can you be sure that nothing will go wrong? 

Find out in this horribly adorable experience!

[From [url=https://sourmiiiilk.itch.io/online-obsession]itch.io[/url]]
title: Online Obsession
HUNDRED LINE -Saishuu Bouei Gakuen-
description:
Takumi Sumino is a totally average teenager living in the Tokyo Residential Complex, a place where every day is much like the last and nothing bad ever happens. All that changes when freakish monsters attack the town and start wreaking havoc. A strange creature calling himself Sirei appears and offers Takumi the power to protect those he holds dear... All he has to do is stab himself in the chest!
The next thing he knows, Takumi is in Last Defense Academy, a school in the middle of nowhere surrounded by a wall of otherworldly flames. He and 14 other students have been drafted into the Special Defense Unit, a team tasked with keeping the school safe for the next 100 days. How much are they willing to sacrifice to take back their normal lives and save the world from the grotesque school invaders?

The curtain rises on 100 days of war and despair...

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3014080/The_Hundred_Line_Last_Defense_Academy/]Steam[/url]]

title: Unfriendly Friend
description:
Hey. Dakota here.

I'm a high school student. My friends and I decided to explore St. Mercy Hospital, an old place abandoned for decades. Things got weird fast. 

You can step into my shoes in this RPG adventure horror game.

Look, I'm not here to sell you on some epic adventure. This is my nightmare, and for some reason, you get to watch. Maybe even help, if you're into that sort of thing.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2938980/Unfriendly_Friend/]Steam[/url]]

[b]Tokyo, Japan, 2021.[/b]

Newly employed psychotherapist Honda Gaku joins the adolescent research project “[b]U.Z.U.[/b]” at MCNP, an institute specializing in psychological and neurological research, marking the beginning of his career as a therapist.

From midsummer to late autumn, Honda must simultaneously navigate the lives of three young girls and the complex relationships they are entangled in. Even among other patients, these three stand out—
- A runaway girl besieged by a hereditary disease and an impossible love,
- The daughter of a kyudo master, lost in paranoia and hallucinations,
- A cold and elusive foreign girl whose whereabouts are never certain.

Despite years of education and training, Honda must exhaust every resource to guide them back toward society; should he falter even slightly in his daily work, they might slip away into an unknown fate…

However, beyond simply maintaining good relationships with these young girls, Honda will have to face some real challenges. Otherwise, wouldn’t all of this be just a little too dull? "Right? Honda sen?"

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3443700]Steam[/url]]
title: JinYu ZhengHouQun
Lian'ai Paomo! Qingchun Lao-Shaan
description:
Shannxi Love Story is a visual novel-style game set against the backdrop of university life in Shaanxi, infused with local cultural flavors. After completing a year at a prestigious university in Xi'an, an unexpected event disrupts the protagonist's routine-driven life.

Amid the tranquil summer, under the shade of green phoenix trees, the story unfolds through themes of academic research, savoring paomo (a traditional Shaanxi dish), visits to the iconic Giant Wild Goose Pagoda, and the joys of video games. Over the course of this summer, the protagonist teams up with the mysterious campus idol "Xiao Xi" and four classmates, each with their own unique personalities and aspirations. Together, they explore the youthful spirit of Xi'an and discover the myriad possibilities life has to offer.

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3453470/]Steam[/url]]

title: Hizome no Yuki
description:
This suspenseful visual novel, with a touch of horror, depicts the confrontation between three men and women trapped in a snowy mountain and an unknown presence lurking in the snow-dark.
A man barricaded in a mountain cabin, a strange old man, a beautiful yet eerie snow woman...What is the 'truth of Hino Mountain' uncovered after facing various abnormalities and dire situations?

title: Shuiqian Gushi:Shengxin
description:

The year is 2079. More than two decades have passed since the AI bubble burst, leaving behind a world where strong AI research is strictly outlawed. But during a live reality show, A bold claim is made—someone among them isn't human, but AI! Some scoff, some seize the moment for attention, and Lucas, a part-time delivery worker, is just an unlucky bystander caught in the chaos—or is he?

Secretly possessing a mind-altering ability hasn’t made Lucas’s life any easier. Two years into adulthood, he remains trapped in the same struggle: jumping between jobs, barely making ends meet, and unable to to move on from the ghosts of his past. Worse still, he may have just landed himself in serious trouble. Maybe it’s time to start pruning his life.

Ethereal demigods and goddesses; (they are beyond the binary) beings of immense power within their own dominions.

You see, the Yunka will, very soon, all go their separate ways...

title: Eres humano
description: A very short game reflecting on an encounter between a human and a kukai, a being from another world.

A literary machination about corporations, conspiracies, and the unspeakable horrors you’ll commit for minimum wage.

Take part in an expansive choose-your-own-adventure novel, where you’ll uncover the secrets of an anachronistic corporation reigning over a post-truth world. Solve cryptic riddles, make difficult choices, and do whatever it takes to escape the depths of SMYRNACORP with your mind intact. 

With hundreds of possible story routes, multimedia content and interactive puzzle elements, INHUMAN RESOURCES aims to elevate the traditional reading experience to more immersive, engaging heights, without forgoing the satisfaction of reading a well-crafted story.

Explore a non-linear storyline with hundreds of possible story routes, including multiple endings.

Flesh out your employee profile by increasing your skills and finding hidden items, allowing you to discover hidden story branchings.

Solve cryptic riddles during your stay at SMYRNACORP. Find evidence, examine footage, snoop in a colleague's computer and crack open a safe to discover the truth.

Discover a collection of short stories written for the game's setting by a cast of Canadian authors.

description:
After the scandalous Cronford serial murder case, Christian Tyler found herself in a difficult position. As a coin can't have just one side, 'the local heroine' title was instantly mixed up with the dubious details of the solved crime. The police station was besieged by journalists, and given the captain's ability to communicate with the public, the entire police department was under threat.

That is why she is now standing under the scorching sun with a suitcase in her hands. The Corcante Embassy has requested an investigator to solve the case of the kidnapping of a famous businessman, and who better than a local heroine is suitable for this role? That's how you can hide her away from the media, right?

But the darkness that lives in the captain's head has not completely weakened yet. And in this strange, abandoned place, surrounded by kilometers of forest on the one hand, and the endless ocean on the other, it flares up with renewed vigor. The predator is on her heels, and Christian will once again have to maneuver on the edge of life and death, trying to overcome her demons.

Rosa in Wonderland
description:
The game revolves around three main characters: Vincent, Rosa, and Camellia.

Rosa is a married woman from Earth who accidentally wanders into another realm. In this unfamiliar land, she meets a friendly merchant named Vincent. He insists that they once knew each other as teenagers and were incredibly close. However, Rosa has no memory of him, which causes Vincent deep anguish.

At Vincent’s mansion, Rosa meets a new maid, Camellia. The two are quickly drawn to each other, and their bond grows stronger over time. One night, Rosa stumbles upon Camellia’s diary, left behind on the dining table, and discovers the maid’s hidden feelings for her.

The game begins at Chapter 3 of the novel. After Camellia promises to help Rosa escape from Vincent, Rosa is drugged and falls asleep in her bedroom. When she wakes up, Vincent throws Camellia’s bloodied hand at her as a warning. Overwhelmed with shock, Rosa faints. By the time she regains consciousness, morning has arrived. This is where the events of the game begin.

title: My evil magician boss suddenly loves me?!
Boku to Kanojo-tachi no Jisshuu Nisshi
description:
How long has it been since I started my residency at Amagi University Hospital? After completing three months of training in the orthopedics department, where I was first assigned, I spent six months in the internal medicine department, where I was next assigned. I also successfully completed three months in emergency medicine and anesthesiology, and was able to get through the first year of my initial training.

Perhaps I, Takuya Shirasawa, am blessed.

My childhood friend Mio Akagi was working as a nurse in the orthopedic surgery department. Although I was unfamiliar with the life of a resident, thanks to Mio, I think I got off to a good start.

Furthermore, Ryo Amagi, who was my senior at university in internal medicine. She was my senior in internal medicine at the university, Ryo Amagi, a.k.a. Oryo-senpai, served as my supervisor. Thanks to her guidance, I was able to get through my training in internal medicine without much trouble. Well, was it a reaction to the fact that the orthopedics and internal medicine were going well? I was unimaginably busy in the emergency and anesthesiology departments. ......

Shirasawa's next internship was in obstetrics and gynecology. In pursuit of his dream of becoming a pediatrician, What awaits him in the next step of his training? While being bewildered by the new environment, a new training program is about to begin.

[Edited from [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3145810/]Steam[/url]]

College life――Studying, exercising, dating, working part-time, the only period where you can do anything you like. In this moratorium period, the protagonist, Yamabuki Minato is enjoying his freedom. In the spring of his third year, by raising his awareness a little, he realizes that he have had a few encounters.
"A freshman who has been helping him."

"A regular at his part-time."
And......"An old acquaintance in an ambiguous relationship."

description:
One month after that dreadful Halloween night, Raiko’s school grade travels to the city of Tenrintou. While many of the students are excited and plan to make the most of the long-awaited trip, some are still affected by the tragic events they have been through and struggle with their aftermath.

Life goes on, however.

And whether it’s by reverting back to their old shenanigans to blend out the problems, or by confronting them head-on, everyone needs to find a way to move along… unless they wish to wither away.

[From [url=https://gosatsu.com/saku/]Gosatsu[/url]]

description:
Eighteen-year-old Maxim Karasev, full of hopes for adulthood, finally left his parents' home. He invested his small savings in renting a modest apartment in an old, somewhat dilapidated neighborhood of the city. Max was looking forward to freedom, silence and the opportunity to manage his own life, not realizing that his new home was shrouded in a dark secret.

His journey to the nearest grocery store was marred by an unexpected encounter. Anatoly, nicknamed Tolik, a former classmate with whom Maxim had had a difficult, even hostile relationship since high school, came out to meet him. Tolik, who had visibly grown up and had acquired the appearance of a local hooligan, brazenly declared that the neighborhood was under his “protection” and demanded money from Maxim, ostensibly for a “roof”, explicitly hinting at possible problems in case of refusal. The unpleasant incident spoiled Maxim's mood and gave him a bad feeling.

Back in the apartment, Max began to notice strange things. At night his sleep was disturbed by unexplainable rustles and creaks, icy draughts walked around the apartment, although all the windows were closed. The old photographs on the walls, left by the previous tenants, seemed alive to Maxim, as if watching his every move. Once he clearly felt someone's presence nearby, although he was absolutely sure that he was alone in the apartment. The atmosphere thickened, became heavy and ominous.

Mystical events made Maxim nervous and looking for explanations for what was happening. He began to look into the past of his new dwelling, trying to find answers to the questions that arose. The mystery of the apartment became a real test for him, forcing him to face not only the inexplicable, but also his own past.

The terrifying truth intertwined in a spiral?

Worry, suffer, struggle.

Give everything for the so-called 'perfect ending' that you don't even know if exists.

Only in this way can we end this tragic 'fate'.

Only in this way can we welcome the 'future' that you have hoped for.

description: UnderGirl is a femdom 2D visual novel with fighting elements. You play as a young guy, surprised to see a cute girl as your first opponent in an underground fighting tournament. Now, you face a choice: defeat her with ease, or step onto the Submission Path. Which will you choose?

It's a world of the near future.
The gossip of a town is becoming a reality.
There is a strange phenomenon happening.

The gossip becoming real has caused strange creatures to exist.
To protect humans from their own wild delusions and loose tongues,
a single magical girl must brave the battlefield...

title: Aquarium wa Odoranai
description:
Suze and her childhood friend, Lulu, visit the renowned Bianca Aquarium.
However, the latter ends up disappearing without a trace.
Determined to find Lulu, Suzu wanders through the fearful aquarium.

Suddenly, she is attacked by a mysterious woman who names herself "Retro"
The aquarium director's wife, "Chris", lends Suze her hand in escaping the facility.
The girl who's been continuously trapped within the aquarium, "Kitty".

The only hint to escaping...
is to become a creature of the aquarium.

Suze must unravel the mysteries behind these women―――
and discover the identity of the traitor...

description:
Li Zhaoyin accidentally got caught up in an infinite dungeon on his way to work one day, and woke up to find himself in the midst of a snowy mountain. The cold wind howled, butchers, ghosts, everything was too incredible, and the development of the situation would be up to you.

description:
3 short stories set in a mystical fantasy universe. You are a newborn Face of God and must decide which face you are by hearing 3 drama-packed tales of human suffering and triumph. Choose a different ending for each story. A short, linear experience that is introspective and emotionally powerful.

title: Firelore: Short Tales

description:
A murder brought about by the twisted oppression of the Showa era...

A mystery puzzle novel game full of the emotion, fear, and macabre from the Showa era has arrived in the modern Reiwa era.

The Koto Murder Case... A horrifying locked room murder that beset the Ichiyanagi family.

Together with a detective novelist from Okayama, your goal is to piece together testimonies collected from villagers and those involved in the incident and uncover the truth.

Then, you must complete the detective novel based on this incident.

What kind of ending awaits you?

[From [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/3443380/]Steam[/url]]
title: Kindaichi Kousuke Series: Honjin Satsujin Jiken
Herald of the Mists
description:
You are the Herald of the Queen. 

Your task is to travel to The Mists—where loyalty to the Queen is fragile—and uncover the fate of her lost army. Will your choices uphold loyalty, or lead you down a path of betrayal?

...

Queen Nayan sent her army to The Mists, a mist-covered, rebellious corner of Berang. Leading them was Kai, the Queen’s most esteemed knight—one who had rarely tasted defeat. But neither Kai nor the army ever returned from the shrouded mountains.

Having lost both her army and her finest knight, the Queen has now sent you, her Herald, to The Mists to uncover the truth.

As the Queen’s Herald, it’s up to you to unravel the secrets hidden within the thick mist. But every truth you uncover comes with consequences.

title: Fate's Masquerade
description:
As a child, you witnessed the fall of your noble house and that left you with many burning questions about the tragedy that transpired. Seeking answers, you come to the royal palace, where you will be the governess to the young princess of the empire.

Soon, you realize that under the glittering chandeliers and behind excessive decadence, the palace is not as perfect as it seems. 

When the young princess suddenly becomes ill, you have no choice but to seek one of the princes for help.

As you draw closer and closer to the revelation. You realize that maybe, just maybe, some truths might be best forgotten.

Will you be able to survive the consequences that follow? Or will it consume you and the ones you love?

[From [url=https://smallserenitystudio.itch.io/fates-masquerade]itch.io[/url]]

title: Surviving Purge
